analyzed: māgha śiśupāla vadha

original: śriyaḥ pati śrīmati śāsituṃ jagajjagannivāso vasudevasadmani /
analyzed: śriyaḥ pati śrīmati śāsitum jagat jagannivāsaḥ vasudeva sadmani
vasan dadarśa avatarantam ambarāt hiraṇyagarbha aṅga bhuvam munim hariḥ
gatam tiraścīnam anūru sāradheḥ prasiddham ūrdhva jvalanam havirbhujaḥ

original: patatyadho dhāma visāri sarvataḥ kimedatityākulamīkṣitaṃ janaiḥ // MSpv_1.02 //
analyzed: patati adhas dhāma visāri sarvatas kim eda titya ākulam īkṣitam janaiḥ
cayaḥ taviṣām iti avadhāritam purā tatas śarīrī iti vibhāvita ākṛtim

original: vibhurvibhaktāvayavaṃ pumāniti kramādamuṃ nārada ityabodhi saḥ // MSpv_1.03 //
analyzed: vibhuḥ vibhakta avayavam pumān iti kramāt amum nāradaḥ iti abodhi saḥ
navān adhas dhas bṛhataḥ payodharān samūḍha karpūra parāga pāṇḍuram

original: kṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇotkṣiptagajendrakṛttinā sphuṭopamaṃ bhūtisitena śamghunā // MSpv_1.04 //
analyzed: kṣaṇam kṣaṇa utkṣipta gaja indra kṛttinā sphuṭa upamam bhūti sitena śamghunā
dadhānam ambhoruha kesara dyutīḥ jaṭāḥ śarad candra marīci rociṣam
vipākaḥ tuṅgāḥ tuhina sthalīruhaḥ dharā ādara indram vratatītatīḥ iva
piśaṅga mauñjī yujam arjuna chavim vasānam eṇa ajinam añna dyuti
suvarma sūtra ākalita adhara ambarām viḍambayantam śitivāsasaḥ tanum
vihaṅga rāja aṅgaruhaiḥ iva āyataiḥ hiraṇmaya urvīruha valli tatnubhiḥ

original: kṛtopavītaṃ himaśubhramuccakairghanaṃ ghanānte taṭitāṃ gaṇairiva // MSpv_1.07 //
analyzed: kṛta upavītam hima śubhram uccakais ghanam ghana ante taṭitām gaṇaiḥ iva
nisarga citra ujvala sūkṣma pakṣmaṇā lasat bisa cheda sita aṅga saṅginā
cakāsatam cāru camūru carmaṇā kuthena nāga indram iva indravāhanam
ajasram āsphālita vallakī guṇa kṣata ujvala aṅguṣṭha nakha aṃśu bhinnayā
puras pravālaiḥ iva pūrita ardhayā vibhāntam accha sphaṭika akṣa mālayā
raṇadbhiḥ āghaṭṭanayā nabhasvataḥ pṛthak vibhinna śruti maṇḍalaiḥ svaraiḥ
sphuṭībhavat grāma viśeṣa mūrcchanām avekṣamāṇam mahatīm muhur muhur
nivartya saḥ nuvrajataḥ kṛtānatīn ati indra yajñān anidhiḥ nabhaḥ sadaḥ
samāsadat sādita daitya saṃpadaḥ padam mahā indralāya cāru cakriṇaḥ
patat pataṅga pratimaḥ tapaḥ nidhiḥ puras sya yāvat na bhuvi
gireḥ taḍitvān iva tāvat uccakais javena pīṭhāt utiṣṭhat acyutaḥ
atha prayatna unnamita anat phaṇaiḥ dhṛte kathañcid phaṇinām gaṇaiḥ adhas

original: nyadhāyiṣātāmabhi devakīsutaṃ sutena dhātuścaraṇau bhuvastale // MSpv_1.13 //
analyzed: nyadhāyiṣātām abhi devakī sutam sutena dhātuḥ caraṇau bhuvaḥ tale
tam arghyam arghya ādikayā ādi puruṣaḥ saparyayā sādhu sa paryapūjayat

original: gṛhānupaituṃ praṇayādabhīpsavo bhavanti nāpuṇyakṛtāṃ manīṣiṇaḥ // MSpv_1.14 //
analyzed: gṛhān upaitum praṇayāt abhīpsavaḥ bhavanti na apuṇya kṛtām manīṣiṇaḥ
na yāvat etau udapaśyat utthitau janaḥ tuṣāra añjana parvatau iva
sva hasta datte munim āsane muniḥ ciran tāvat abhinyavīviśat

original: mahāmahānīlaśilārucaḥ puro niṣedivān kaṃsakṛṣaḥ sa viṣṭare /
analyzed: mahā mahā nīla śilā rucaḥ puras niṣedivān kaṃsa kṛṣaḥ sa viṣṭare
śrita udayādreḥ abhi sāyam uccakais acūcurat candramasaḥ bhirāma tām

original: vidhāya tasyāpacitiṃ praseduṣaḥ prakāmamaprīyata yajvanāṃ priyaḥ /
analyzed: vidhāya tasya apacitim praseduṣaḥ prakāmam aprīyata yajvanām priyaḥ
grahītum āryān paricaryayā muhur mahā anubhāvāḥ hi nitāntam arthinaḥ
aśeṣa tīrtha upahṛtāḥ kamaṇḍaloḥ nidhāya pāṇau ṛṣīṇā abhyudīritāḥ
agha ogha vidhvaṃsa vidhau paṭīyasīḥ natena mūrdnā hariḥ agrahīt apaḥ
sa kāñcane yatra muneḥ anujñayā nava ambu daśayāma vapuḥ nyavikṣata

original: jigāya jambūjanitaśriyaḥ śriyaṃ sumeruśṛṅgasya tadā tadāsanam // MSpv_1.19 //
analyzed: jigāya jambū janita śriyaḥ śriyam sumeru śṛṅgasya tadā tad āsanam
sa tapta a kārtasvara bhāsvara ambaraḥ kaṭhora dhārādhipa lāñchana chaviḥ

original: vididyute bāḍavajātavedasaḥ śikhābhirāśliṣṭa ivāmbhasāṃ nidhiḥ // MSpv_1.20 //
analyzed: vididyute bāḍava jātavedasaḥ śikhābhiḥ āśliṣṭaḥ iva ambhasām nidhiḥ
rathāṅga pāṇeḥ paṭalena rociṣām ṛṣi tviṣaḥ saṃvalitāḥ virejire
calat palāśa antara gocaraḥ tarotuṣāra mūrteḥ iva naktam aṃśavaḥ
praphulla tāpiccha nibhaiḥ abhīṣubhiḥ śubhaiḥ ca saptacchada pāṃsu pāṇḍubhiḥ

original: parampareṇa cchuritāmalacchavī tadekavarṇāviva tau babhūvatuḥ // MSpv_1.22 //
analyzed: parampareṇa churita amala chavī tad eka varṇau iva tau babhūvatuḥ
yugānta kālam atisaṃhṛta ātmanaḥ jaganti yasyām sa vikāsam āsata

original: tanau mamustatra na kaiṭabhadviṣastapodhanabhyāgamasaṃbhavā mudaḥ // MSpv_1.23 //
analyzed: tanau mamuḥ tatra na kaiṭabhadviṣaḥ tapodhana abhyāgama saṃbhavāḥ mudaḥ
nidādha dhāmānam iva adhidīdhitim mudā vikāsam munim abhyupeyuṣī

original: vilocane bibhradadhiśritaśriṇī sa puṇḍarākākṣa iti sphuṭābhavat // MSpv_1.24 //
analyzed: vilocane bibhrat adhiśrita śriṇī sa puṇḍarākākṣaḥ iti sphuṭā abhavat

original: sitaṃsitimnā sutarāṃ munervapuḥ visāribhiḥ saudhamivātha lambhayan /
analyzed: sitam sitimnā sutarām muneḥ vapuḥ visāribhiḥ saudham iva atha lambhayan
dvija āvali vyāja niśākara aṃśubhiḥ śuci smitām vācam avocat acyutaḥ

original: haratyaghaṃ saṃprati hetureṣyataḥ śubhasya pūrvācaritai kṛtarṃ śubhai /
analyzed: harati agham saṃprati hetuḥ eṣyataḥ śubhasya pūrva ācaritaiḥ śubhaiḥ

original: śarīrabhājāṃ bhavadīyadarśanaṃ vyanakti kālatritaye 'pi yogyatām // MSpv_1.26 //
analyzed: śarīra bhājām bhavadīya darśanam vyanakti kāla tritaye pi yogyatām
jagat paryāpta sahasra bhānunā na yat niyantum samabhāvi bhānunā

original: prasahya tejobhirasaṃkhyatāṃ gatair adastvayā nunnamanuttamaṃ tamaḥ // MSpv_1.27 //
analyzed: prasahya tejobhiḥ asaṃkhya tām gataiḥ adaḥ tvayā nunnam anuttamam tamaḥ
kṛtaḥ prajā kṣema kṛtā prajā sṛjā

original: sadopayoge 'pi gurustvamakṣayo nidhiḥ śrutīnāṃ dhanasaṃpadāmiva // MSpv_1.28 //
analyzed: sadā upayoge guruḥ tvam akṣayaḥ nidhiḥ śrutīnām dhana saṃpadām iva

original: vilokanenaiva tavāmunā mune kṛtaḥ kṛtārthosmi nibarhitāṃhasā /
analyzed: vilokanena eva tava amunā mune kṛtaḥ kṛtārthaḥ asmi nibarhita aṃhasā

original: tathāpiśuśrūṣurahaṃ garīyasīrgiro 'thavā śreyasi kena vā tṛpyate // MSpv_1.29 //
analyzed: tathā api śuśrūṣuḥ aham garīyasīḥ giraḥ śreyasi kena vā tṛpyate
gata spṛhaḥ pi āgamana prayojanam vada iti vaktum vyavasīyate yayā

original: tanoti nastāmuditmagauravo gurustavaivāgama eva dhṛṣyatām // MSpv_1.30 //
analyzed: tanoti naḥ tām uditma gauravaḥ guruḥ tava eva āgamaḥ eva dhṛṣyatām

original: itibruvantaṃ uvāca sa vratī na vācyamitthaṃ puruṣottama tvayā /
analyzed: iti bruvantam uvāca sa vratī na vācyam ittham puruṣottama tvayā

original: tvameva sākṣātkaraṇīya ityataḥ kimasti kāryaṃ guru yogināmapi // MSpv_1.31 //
analyzed: tvam eva sākṣāt karaṇīyaḥ iti atas kim asti kāryam guru yoginām api
udīrṇa rāga pratirodhakam janaiḥ abhīkṣṇam akṣuṇṇa tayā ati durgamam
upeyuṣaḥ mokṣa patham manasvinaḥ tvam agra mūrtiḥ nirapāya saṃśrayā
udāsitāram nigrahīta mānasaiḥ gṛhītam adhyātma dṛśā kathañcana

original: bahirvikaraṃ prakṛteḥ pṛthagviduḥ purātanaṃ tvāṃ puruṣaṃ purāvidaḥ // MSpv_1.33 //
analyzed: bahis vikaram prakṛteḥ pṛthak viduḥ purātanam tvām puruṣam purāvidaḥ
niveśayāmāsitha helayā uddhṛtam phaṇābhṛtām chādanam ekam okasaḥ
jagatā eka sthapatiḥ tvam uccakais ahi īśvara stambha śiraḥ su bhū talam
an anya gurvāḥ tava kena kevalaḥ purāṇa mūrte mahimā avagamyate
manuṣya janma api sura asurān guṇaiḥ bhavān bhava cheda karaiḥ karoti adhas
laghūkariṣyan ati bhāra bhaṅgurām amūm kila tvam tridivāt avātaraḥ

original: udūḍhalokatritayena sāṃprataṃ gururdharitrī kriyatetarāṃ tvayā // MSpv_1.36 //
analyzed: udūḍha loka tritayena sāṃpratam guruḥ dharitrī kriyatetarām tvayā
nija ojasā ujjāsayitum jagat rahām upajihīthāḥ na mahī tale yadi

original: samāhitairapyanirūpitastataḥ padaṃ dṛśaḥ syāḥ katham īśa mādṛśām // MSpv_1.37 //
analyzed: samāhitaiḥ api anirūpitaḥ tatas padam dṛśaḥ syāḥ katham īśa mādṛśām
upaplutam pātu madaḥ mada uddhataiḥ tvam eva viśvaṃbhara viśvam īśiṣe

original: ṛte raveḥ kṣālayituṃ kṣameta kaḥ kṣapātamaskāṇḍamalīmasaṃ tamaḥ // MSpv_1.38 //
analyzed: ṛte raveḥ kṣālayitum kṣameta kaḥ kṣapā tamaskāṇḍa malīmasam tamaḥ

original: karoti kaṃsādimahībhṛtāṃ vadhājjano mṛgāṇāmiva yattava stavam /
analyzed: karoti kaṃsa ādi mahībhṛtām vadhāt janaḥ mṛgāṇām iva yat tava stavam

original: hare hiraṇyākṣapuraḥsarāsuradvipadviṣaḥ pratyuta sā tiraskriyā // MSpv_1.39 //
analyzed: hare hiraṇyākṣa puraḥsara asura dvipa dviṣaḥ pratyuta sā tiraskriyā

original: pravṛtta eva svayamujjhiśramaḥ krameṇa peṣṭuṃ bhuvanadvaṣāmasi /
analyzed: pravṛttaḥ eva svayam ujjhiśramaḥ krameṇa peṣṭum

original: tathāpi vācālatayā yunakti māṃ mithastvadābhāṣaṇalolupaṃ manaḥ // MSpv_1.40 //
analyzed: tathā api vācāla tayā yunakti mām mithas tvad ābhāṣaṇa lolupam manaḥ
tat indra saṃdiṣṭam upendra yat vacaḥ kṣaṇam mayā viśvajanīnam ucyate
samasta kāryeṣu gatena dhurya tā mahidviṣaḥ tat bhavatā niśamyatām
abhūt abhūmi pratipakṣa janmanām bhiyām tanūja spana dyutiḥ diteḥ
yam indra śabda artha niṣūdanam hareḥ haraṇya pūrvam kaśipum pracakṣate
sa matsareṇa asuraḥ iti upeyuṣā cirāya nāmnaḥ prathama abhidheya tām

original: bhayasyapūrvāvatarastarasvinā manastu yena dyusadāṃ nyadhīyata // MSpv_1.43 //
analyzed: bhayasya pūrva avataraḥ tarasvinā manaḥ tu yena dyusadām nyadhīyata

original: diśāmadhīśāṃścaturo yataḥ surānapāsya taṃ rāgāhṛtāḥ siṣevire /
analyzed: diśām adhīśān caturaḥ yatas surān apāsya tam rāga āhṛtāḥ siṣevire

original: avāpurārabhya tataścalā iti pravādamuccairayaśaskaraṃ śriyaḥ // MSpv_1.44 //
analyzed: avāpuḥ ārabhya tatas calāḥ iti pravādam uccais ayaśaskaram śriyaḥ

original: purāṇi durgāṇi niśātamāyudhaṃ balāni śūrāṇi ghanāścakañcukāḥ /
analyzed: purāṇi durgāṇi niśātam āyudham balāni śūrāṇi ghanāḥ ca kañcukāḥ

original: svarūpaśobhaikaphalāni nākināṃ gaṇairyamāśaṅkya tadādi cakrire // MSpv_1.45 //
analyzed: sva rūpa śobhā eka phalāni nākinām gaṇaiḥ yam āśaṅkya tad ādi cakrire

original: sa saṃcariṣṇu bhuvanāntareṣu yāṃ yadṛcchayāśiśriyādāśrayaḥ śriyaḥ /
analyzed: sa saṃcariṣṇu bhuvana antareṣu yām yadṛcchayā aśiśriyāt āśrayaḥ śriyaḥ

original: akāri tasyai mukuṭopalaskhalatkaraistrisandhyaṃ tridaśairdiśe namaḥ // MSpv_1.46 //
analyzed: akāri tasyai mukuṭa upala skhalat karaiḥ trisandhyam tridaśaiḥ diśe namaḥ

original: saṭācchaṭabhinnaghanena bibhratā nṛsiṃha saiṃhīmatanuṃ tanuṃ tvayā /
analyzed: saṭā ācchaṭa bhinna ghanena bibhratā nṛsiṃha saiṃhīm atanum tanum tvayā
sa mugdha kāntā stana saṅga bhaṅguraiḥ uraḥ vidāram praticaskire nakhaiḥ

original: vinodamicchannatha darpajanmano raṇena kaṇḍvāstridaśai samaṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: vinodam icchan atha darpa janmanaḥ raṇena kaṇḍvāḥ tridaśaiḥ samam punar

original: sa rāvaṇo nāma nikāmabhīṣaṇaṃ babhūva rakṣaḥ kṣatarakṣaṇaṃ divaḥ // MSpv_1.48 //
analyzed: sa rāvaṇaḥ nāma nikāma bhīṣaṇam babhūva rakṣaḥ kṣata rakṣaṇam divaḥ
prabhuḥ bubhūṣuḥ bhuvana trayasya yaḥ śiraḥ tira āgāt daśamam cikartiṣuḥ
atarkayat vighnam iva iṣṭa sādhasaḥ prasādam icchā sat dṛśam pinākinaḥ

original: samutkṣipanyaḥ pṛthivībhṛtāṃ varaṃ varapradānasya cakāra śūlinaḥ /
analyzed: samutkṣipan yaḥ pṛthivībhṛtām varam vara pradānasya cakāra śūlinaḥ
trasat tuṣārādri sutā sa saṃbhrama svayaṅgraha āśleṣa sukhena niṣkrayam

original: purīmavaskanda lunīhi nandanaṃ muṣāṇa ratnāni harāmarāṅganāḥ /
analyzed: purīm avaskanda lunīhi nandanam muṣāṇa ratnāni hara amara aṅganāḥ

original: vigṛhya cakre namucidviṣā balī ya itthamasvāsthyamahardivaṃ divaḥ // MSpv_1.51 //
analyzed: vigṛhya cakre namuci dviṣā balī yaḥ ittham asvāsthya mahardivam divaḥ
sa līla yātāni na bhartuḥ abhramoḥ na citram uccaiśravasaḥ pada kramam

original: anudrutaḥ saṃyati yena kevalaṃ balasya śatruḥ praśaśaṃsa śīghratām // MSpv_1.52 //
analyzed: anudrutaḥ saṃyati yena kevalam balasya śatruḥ praśaśaṃsa śīghra tām
a śuknuvan soḍhum adhīra locanaḥ sahasraraśmeḥ iva yasya darśanam

original: praviśya hemādriguhāgṛhāntaraṃ nināya bibhyaddivasāni kauśikaḥ // MSpv_1.53 //
analyzed: praviśya hemādri guhā gṛha antaram nināya bibhyat divasāni kauśikaḥ
bṛhat chala a niṣṭhura kaṇṭha ghaṭṭana a vikīrṇa lola agni kaṇam suradviṣaḥ
jagatprabhoḥ a prasihiṣṇu vaiṣṇavam na cakram asya ākramata adhi kandharam
bibhinna śaṅkhaḥ kaluṣībhavan muhur madena dantī iva manuṣya dharmaṇaḥ

original: nirastaghāṃbhīryamapāstapuṣpakaṃ prakampayāmāsa na mānasaṃ na saḥ // MSpv_1.55 //
analyzed: nirasta ghāṃbhīryam apāsta puṣpakam prakampayāmāsa na mānasam na saḥ
raṇeṣu tasya prahitāḥ pracetasā sa roṣa huṅkāra parāṅmukhīkṛtāḥ

original: praharturevoragarājarajjavo javena kaṇṭhaṃ sabhayāḥ prapedire // MSpv_1.56 //
analyzed: prahartuḥ eva uraga rāja rajjavaḥ javena kaṇṭham sa bhayāḥ prapedire
parebhartuḥ mahiṣaḥ munā dhanuḥ vidhātum utkhāta viṣāṇa maṇḍalaḥ

original: hṛte 'pibhāre mahatastrapābharāduvāha duḥkhena bhṛśānṛtaṃ śiraḥ // MSpv_1.57 //
analyzed: hṛte pibhāre mahataḥ trapā bharāt uvāha duḥkhena bhṛśa anṛtam śiraḥ
sṛpaśan sa śaṅkaḥ samaye śucau api sthitaḥ kara agraiḥ asamagra pātibhiḥ
agha gharma udaka bindu mauktikaiḥ alañcakāra asya vadhū rahaskaraḥ
kalā samagreṇa gṛhān amuñcatā manasvinīḥ utkayitum paṭīyasā
visāsinaḥ tasya vitanvatā aratim na narma sācivyam akārinā indunā
vidagdha līlā ucita dantapatrikā vidhitsayā nūnam anena māninā

original: na jātu vaināyakamekamuddhṛtaṃ viṣāṇamadyāpi punaḥ prarohati // MSpv_1.60 //
analyzed: na jātu vaināyakam ekam uddhṛtam viṣāṇam adya api punar prarohati
niśānta nārī paridhāna dhūnana sphuṭa āgasā api ūruṣu lola cakṣuṣaḥ
priyeṇa tasya anaparādha bādhitāḥ prakampanena anucakampire surāḥ
tiraskṛtaḥ tasya jana abhibhāvinā muhur mahimnā mahasām mahīyasām
babhāra bāṣpaiḥ dvaguṇīkṛtam tanu tanūnapāt dhūmam a vitānam ādhi jaiḥ
parasya a marma vidham ujjhatām nijam dvijihva tā doṣam ajihma gāmibhiḥ

original: tamiddhamārādhayituṃ sakarṇakaiḥ kulairna bheje phaṇināṃ bhujaṅgatā // MSpv_1.63 //
analyzed: tam iddham ārādhayitum sa karṇakaiḥ kulaiḥ na bheje phaṇinām bhujaṅga tā
tadīya mātaṅga ghaṭā vighaṭṭitaiḥ kaṭa sthala proṣita dāna vāribhiḥ
gṛhīta dikkaiḥ apunarnivartibhiḥ cirāya yāthārthyam alambi diggajaiḥ
abhīkṣṇam uṣṇaiḥ api tasya sa ūṣmaṇaḥ surendra vandī śvasita anilaiḥ yathā
sa candana ambhaḥ kaṇa komalaiḥ tathā vapuḥ jala ārdrā pavanaiḥ na

original: tapena varṣāḥ śaradā himāgamo vasantalakṣmyā śiśiraḥ sametya ca /
analyzed: tapena varṣāḥ śaradā hima āgamaḥ vasanta lakṣmyā śiśiraḥ sametya ca

original: prasūnakḷptiṃ dadhataḥ sadartavaḥ purosya vāstavyakuṭumbitāṃ yayau // MSpv_1.66 //
analyzed: prasūna kḷptim dadhataḥ sadā ṛtavaḥ puras sya vāstavya kuṭumbi tām yayau

original: amānavaṃ jātamajaṃ kule manoḥ prabhāvinaṃ bhāvinnamantamātmanaḥ /
analyzed: amānavam jātam ajam kule manoḥ prabhāvinam bhāvinnam antam ātmanaḥ

original: mumoca jānannapi jānakīṃ na yaḥ sadabhimānaikadhanā hi māninaḥ // MSpv_1.67 //
analyzed: mumoca jānan api jānakīm na yaḥ sat abhimāna eka dhanāḥ hi māninaḥ
smarati adaḥ dāśarathiḥ bhavān amum vanāntāt vanitā apahāriṇam
payodhim ābaddha calat jalā bilam vilaṅghya laṅgām nikaṣā haniṣyati
parām avāpya śailūṣaḥ iva eṣa bhūmikām

original: tirohitātmā śiśupālasaṃjñayā pratīyate saṃprati sāpyasaḥ paraiḥ // MSpv_1.69 //
analyzed: tirohita ātmā śiśupāla saṃjñayā pratīyate saṃprati sā api asaḥ paraiḥ

original: sa bāla āsīdvapuṣā caturbhujo mukhena pūrṇendunibhastrilocanaḥ /
analyzed: sa bālaḥ āsīt vapuṣā catur bhujaḥ mukhena pūrṇa indu nibhaḥ trilocanaḥ
yuvākara ākrānta mahībhṛt uccakais asaṃśayam saṃprati tejasā raviḥ
svayam vidhātā sura daitya rakṣasām anugraha avagrahayoḥ yadṛcchayā
daśānana ādīn abhirāddha daivata a vitīrṇa vīrya atiśayān hasati asau
bala avalepāt adhunā api pūrva vapra bāddhyate tena jagat jigīṣuṇā

original: satīva yoṣitprakṛtiḥ suniścalā pumāṃsaṃmabyeti bhavāntareṣvapi // MSpv_1.72 //
analyzed: satī iva yoṣit prakṛtiḥ su niścalā bhava antareṣu api
tat enam ullaṅghita śāsanam vidheḥ vidhehi kīnāśa niketana atithim
śubha itara ācāra vipaktrima āpadaḥ vipādanīyāḥ hi satām asādhavaḥ
hṛdayam avirodha udaya da dūḍha draḍhima dadhātu punar purandarasya
ghana pulaka pulomajā kuca agra druta parirambha nipīḍana kṣama tvam

original: omityuktavato 'tha śāṅgiṇā iti vyāhṛtya vācaṃ nabhastasminnutpatite puraḥ suramunāvindoḥ śriyaṃ bibhrati /
analyzed: om iti uktavataḥ śāṅgiṇāḥ iti vyāhṛtya vācam nabhaḥ tasmin utpatite puras sura munau indoḥ śriyam bibhrati

original: śatruṇāmaniśa vināśapiśunaḥ kruddhasya caidyaṃ prati vyomni bhrakuṭicchalena vadane ketuśacakārāspadam // MSpv_1.75 //
analyzed: śatruṇām aniśa vināśa piśunaḥ kruddhasya caidyam prati vyomni bhrakuṭi chalena vadane ketuśa cakāra āspadam
yiyakṣamāṇena āhūtaḥ pārthena atha dviṣan muram
abhicaidyam pratiṣṭhāsuḥ āsīt kārya dvaya ākulaḥ
sārtham udhdhava sīribhyām atha asau asadat sadaḥ
guru kāvya anugām bibhrat cāndrīm abhinabhaḥ śriyam
jājvalyamānā jagataḥ śāntaye samupeyuṣī
vyadyotiṣṭa sabhā vedyām asau naraśikhi trayī
ratna stambheṣu saṃkrānta pratimāḥ te cakāśire
ekākinaḥ pi paritas pauruṣeya vṛtāḥ iva
adhyāsāmāsuḥ uttuṅga hema pīṭhāni yāni amī
taiḥ ūhe keśāri krānta trikūṭa śikhira upamā
guru dvayāya guruṇoḥ ubhayoḥ atha kāryayoḥ
hari vipratiṣedham tam amācacakṣe vicakṣaṇaḥ
dyotita antar sabhaiḥ kunda kuḍmala agra dataḥ smitaiḥ
snapitā iva abhavat tasya śuddha varṇā sarasvatī
bhavat girām avasara pradānāya vacāṃsi naḥ
pūrvaraṅgaḥ prasaṅgāya nāṭakīyasya vastunaḥ
karadīkṛta bhūpālaḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ jitvaraiḥ diśām
vinā api asmat alaṃbhūṣṇuḥ ijyāyai tapasaḥ sutaḥ
uttiṣṭhamānaḥ tu paras na upekṣyaḥ patyam icchatā

original: samau hi śiṣṭairāmnātau vartsyantāvāmayaḥ sa ca // MSpv_2.10 //
analyzed: samau hi śiṣṭaiḥ āmnātau vartsyantau āmayaḥ sa ca
na dūye sātvatī sūnuḥ yat mahyam aparādhyati
yat tu dahyante loka madaḥ duḥkhā karot imām
mama tāvat matam idam śrūyatām aṅga vām api
jñāta sāraḥ pi khalu ekaḥ saṃdigdhe kārya vastuni
yāvat artha padām vācam evam ādāya mādhavaḥ
virarāma mahīyāṃsaḥ prakṛtyā mita bhāṣiṇaḥ
tatas sapatna apanaya smaraṇa anuśaya sphurā
oṣṭhena rāmaḥ rāma uṣṭha bimba cumbana cuñcunā
vivakṣitām artha vidaḥ tad kṣaṇa pratisaṃhṛtām
prāpayan pavana vyādheḥ giram uttara pakṣa tām
ghūrṇayat madirā āsvāda mada pāṭalita dyutī
revatī vadana ucchiṣṭa paripūta puṭe dṛśau
āśleṣa lolupa vadhū stana kārkaśya sākṣiṇīm
mlāpayan abhimāna uṣṇaiḥ vanamālām mukha anilaiḥ
dadhat saṃndhyā aruṇa vyoma sphurat tārā anukāriṇīḥ
dvaṣa dveṣa uparakta aṅga saṅginīḥ sveda vipruṣaḥ
prollasat kuṇaḍala prota padmarāga dala tviṣā
kṛṣṇa uttarāsaṅga rucam vidadhat cauta pallavīm
kakudmi kanyā vaktra antarvāsa labdha adhivāsayā
mukha modam madirayā kṛta anuvyādham udvaman
jagāda vadana chadma padma paryanta pātinaḥ
nayan madhulihaḥ śvaityam udagra daśana aṃśubhiḥ
yat vāsudevena adīnam anādīnavam īritam
vacasaḥ tasya sapadi kriyā kevalam uttaram
na etat laghu api bhūyasyāḥ vacaḥ vācā atiśayyate
indhana ogha dhak api agni tviṣā na atyeti pūṣaṇam
saṃkṣiptasya api atas vākyasya artha garīyasaḥ

original: suvistaratarā vāco bhūṣyabhūtā bhavantu mo // MSpv_2.24 //
analyzed: suvistaratarāḥ vācaḥ bhūṣya bhūtāḥ bhavantu mo
virodhi vacasaḥ mūkān vagīśān api kurvate
jaḍān api anuloma arthān pravācaḥ kṛtinām giraḥ
ṣaḍguṇāḥ śaktayaḥ tisraḥ siddhayaḥ udayāḥ trayaḥ
grandhān adhītya vyākartum iti durmedhasaḥ pi alam
a nirloḍita kāryasya vāc jālam vāgminaḥ vṛthā
nimittāt aparāddha iṣoḥ dhānuṣkasya iva valgitam
sarva kārya śarīreṣu muktvā aṅga skanda pañcakam
saugatānām iva ātmā anyaḥ na asti mantraḥ mahībhṛtām
mantraḥ yodhaḥ iva adhīraḥ sarva aṅgaiḥ saṃvṛtaiḥ api

original: ciraṃ na sthātuṃ parebhyo bhedaśaṅkayā // MSpv_2.29 //
analyzed: ciram na sthātum parebhyaḥ bheda śaṅkayā
ātma udayaḥ para jyā niḥ dvayam nītiḥ iti iyati
tat ūrīkṛtya kṛtibhiḥ vācaspatyam pratāyate
tṛpti yogaḥ pareṇa api mahimnā na mahātmanām
pūrṇaḥ candra udaya ākāṅkṣī mahārṇavaḥ
saṃpadā a su sthiraṃmanyaḥ bhavati su alpayā api yaḥ

original: kṛtakṛtyo vidhirmanye na vardhayanti tasya tām // MSpv_2.32 //
analyzed: kṛtakṛtyaḥ vidhiḥ manye na vardhayanti tasya tām
śamūla ghātam aghnantaḥ parān na udyanti māninaḥ
pradhvaṃsita andhatamasaḥ tatra udāharaṇam raviḥ
vipakṣam am akhilīkṛtya pratiṣṭhā khalu durlabhā
a nītvā paṅka tām dhūlim udakam na avatiṣṭhate
dhriyate yāvat ekaḥ pi ripuḥ tāvat kutas sukham

original: puraḥ klaśnāti somaṃ hi saiṃhikeyo 'suradruhām // MSpv_2.35 //
analyzed: puras klaśnāti somam hi saiṃhikeyaḥ suradruhām
sakhā a garīyān śatruḥ śa kṛtrimaḥ tau hi kāryataḥ
syātām amitrau sahaja prakṛtau api
upakartrā ariṇā saṃdhiḥ na mitreṇa apakāriṇā
upakāra apakārau hi lakṣyam lakṣamam etayoḥ
tvayā aviprakṛtaḥ caidyaḥ rukmiṇīm harata ahare
baddha mūlasya amūlam hi mahat vaira taroḥ striyaḥ
tvayi bhaumam gate jetum arautsīt sa purīm imām
proṣita aryamaṇam meroḥ andhakāraḥ taṭīm iva
ālāpya alam idam babhro yat sa dārān apāharat
kathā api khalu pāpānām alam aśreyase yatas

original: virāddha evaṃ bhamatā virāddhā bahudhā ca naḥ /
analyzed: virāddhaḥ evam bhamatā virāddhāḥ bahudhā ca naḥ

original: nirvatyate 'riḥ kriyayā sa śrutaśravasaḥ sutaḥ // MSpv_2.41 //
analyzed: nirvatyate riḥ kriyayā sa śrutaśravasaḥ sutaḥ
vidhāya vairam sāmarṣe nare rau yaḥ udāsate
prakṣipya udarciṣam kakṣe śerate te bhimārutam

original: manāganabhyavṛtyā vā kāmaṃ kṣāmyatatu yaḥ kṣamī /
analyzed: manāk anabhyavṛtyā vā kāmam yaḥ kṣamī
kraya a samabhihāreṇa virādi antam kṣameta kaḥ

original: anyadā bhūṣaṇaṃ puṃsaḥ kṣamā lajjeva yoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: anyadā bhūṣaṇam puṃsaḥ kṣamā lajjā iva yoṣitaḥ
parākramaḥ paribhave vaiyātyam surateṣu iva
mā ājīvanyaḥ para avajñā dukha dagdhaḥ pi jīvati
tasya a jananiḥ evā astu jananī kleśa kāriṇaḥ
pada āhatam yat utthāya mūrdhānam adhirohati
svasthādeva vapamāne pi dehinaḥ tat varam rajaḥ
a saṃpādayataḥ kañcid artham jāti kriyā guṇaiḥ
yadṛccha śabda vat puṃsaḥ saṃjñāyai janma kevalam
tuṅga tvam itarā na adrau na idam sindhau āgādha tā
a laṅghanīya tā hetuḥ ubhayam tat manasvini
tulye parādhe svarbhānuḥ bhānumantam cireṇa yat

original: himāṃśumāśu grasate tanmradimnaḥ sphuṭaṃ phalam // MSpv_2.49 //
analyzed: himāṃśum āśu grasate tad mradimnaḥ sphuṭam phalam
svayam praṇate lpe pi para vāyau upeyuṣī
nidarśanam asārāṇām laghuḥ bahu tṛṇam naraḥ
tejasvi madhye tejasvī davīyān api gaṇyate
pañcama pañca pasaḥ tapanaḥ jātavedasām
a kṛtvā helayā pādam uccais mūrdhasu vidvaṣām
kathaṅkāram anālambā kīrtidyām adhirohati
aṅga adhiropitaḥ candramāḥ mṛga lāñchanaḥ
caturtha upāya sādhyetu ripau sāntvam apakriyā
svedyam āma jvaram prājñaḥ kaḥ mbhasā pariṣiñcati
sāmavādāḥ sa kopasya tasya pratyuta dīpakāḥ
prataptasya iva sahasā sarpiṣaḥ toya bindavaḥ
guṇānām āyathātathyāt artham viplāvayanti ye
amātya vyañjana a rājñām dūṣyāḥ te śatru saṃjñitāḥ
sva śakti upacaye kecid parasya vyasane pare
yānam āhuḥ tad āsīnam tvām utthāpayati dvayam
lilaṅghayiṣataḥ lokān a laṅghyān a laghīyasaḥ
yādava ambhonidhīn rundhe velā iva bhavataḥ kṣamā
vijaya svayi senāyāḥ sākṣi mātre
phala bhāji samīkṣya ukte buddheḥ bhoge iva ātmani
hṛta ihi ḍimba ripuṇā rājñi dvaimāture yudhi
cirasya mittra vyasani su damaḥ dama ghoṣa jaḥ
nītiḥ āpadi yat gamyaḥ paraḥ tat māninaḥ hriye
vidhuḥ vidhun tasya iva pūrṇaḥ tasya utsavāya saḥ
anyat ucchṛṅghalam satvam anyat śāstra niyantritam
sāmānādhikaraṇyam hi tejaḥ tamirayoḥ kutas
indraprastha gamaḥ tāvat kāri mā santu cedayaḥ
ā asmāka danti sānnidhyāt vāmanībhūta bhūruhaḥ
niruddha vīvadha āsāra prasārāḥ gāḥ iva vrajam

original: uparundhantu dāśārhāḥ purīṃ māhiṣmatīṃ dviṣaḥ // MSpv_2.64 //
analyzed: uparundhantu dāśārhāḥ purīm māhiṣmatīm dviṣaḥ
yajatām pāṇḍavaḥ svargam avatu indra spasvinaḥ

original: vayaṃ hanāma dviṣataḥ sarvaḥ svārthaṃ samīhate // MSpv_2.65 //
analyzed: vayam hanāma dviṣataḥ sarvaḥ sva artham samīhate
prāpyatām vidyutām saṃpad saṃparkāt arka rociṣām
śastraiḥ dviṣat śiraḥ cheda procchalat śoṇita ukṣitaiḥ
iti saṃrambhiṇaḥ vāṇīḥ balasya ālekhya devatāḥ
sabhā bhitti pratidhvanaiḥ bhayāt anvavadan iva
niśamya tāḥ śeṣa ga vīram abhidhātum adhokṣajaḥ
śiṣyāya bṛhatām pratyuḥ prastāvam adiśat dṛśā
bhāratīm āhita bharām atha anuddhatam uddhavaḥ
tathyām utathyānuja vat jagāda agre gadāgrajam
saṃprati asāṃpratam vaktum ukte musala pāṇinā
nirdhārita irthe lekhena khalu uktvā khalu vācikam
tathā api yat mayi api te guruḥ iti asti gauravam
tad prayojaka kartṛ tvam upaiti mama jalpataḥ
varṇaiḥ katipayaiḥ eva grathitasya svaraiḥ iva
anantā vāc mayasya aho geyasya iva vicitra tā
bahu api sva icchayā kāmam prakīrṇam abhidhīyate
anujjhita artha saṃbandhaḥ prabandhaḥ durudāharaḥ
mradīyasīm api ghanām analpa guṇa kalpitām
prasārayanti kuśalāḥ citrām vācam paṭīm iva
viśeṣa viduṣaḥ śāstram yat tava udgrāhyate puras
hetuḥ paricaya sthairye vaktuḥ guṇanikā eva sā
svāmī yateta ādhātum ātmani
tau hi mūlam udeṣyantyāḥ jigīṣoḥ ātma saṃpadaḥ

original: sopadhānāṃ dhiyaṃ dhīrāḥ stheyasīṃ khaṭvayanti ye /
analyzed: sa upadhānām dhiyam dhīrāḥ stheyasīm khaṭvayanti ye

original: tatrāniśaṃ niṣamṇṇāste jānate jātu na śramaṃm // MSpv_2.77 //
analyzed: tatra aniśam niṣamṇṇāḥ te jānate jātu na śramam
spṛśanti śara vat tīkṣṇa stokam antar viśanti ca
bahu spṛśā api sthūlena sthīyate bahis aśma vat
ārabhante lpam eva ajñāḥ kāmam vyagrāḥ bhavanti ca
mahā ārambhāḥ kṛta dhiyaḥ tiṣṭhanti ca nirākulāḥ
upāyam asthitasya api naśyanti arthāḥ pramādyataḥ
hanti na upaśaya sthaḥ śayāluḥ mṛgayuḥ mṛgān
udetum atyajan īhām rājasu dvadaśasu api
jigīṣuḥ ekaḥ dinakṛt ādityeṣu iva kalpate

original: cārekṣaṇo dūtamukhaḥ papuruṣaḥ ko 'pi pārthivaḥ // MSpv_2.82 //
analyzed: cāra īkṣaṇaḥ dūta mukhaḥ papuruṣaḥ kaḥ pi pārthivaḥ

original: tejaḥ kṣamā vā naikāntaṃ kālajñasya mahīpateḥ /
analyzed: tejaḥ kṣamā vā na ekāntam kāla jñasya mahīpateḥ

original: naikamojaḥ prasādo vā rasabhāvavidaḥ kaveḥ // MSpv_2.83 //
analyzed: na ekam ojaḥ prasādaḥ vā rasa bhāva vidaḥ kaveḥ
kṛta apacāraḥ pi paraiḥ anāviṣkṛta vikriyaḥ

original: asādhyaḥ kurute vā rasabhāvavidaḥ kaveḥ // MSpv_2.84 //
analyzed: asādhyaḥ kurute vā rasa bhāva vidaḥ kaveḥ
mṛdu vyavahitam tejaḥ bhoktam arthān prakalpate
pradīpaḥ sneham ādatte daśayā ābhyantara sthayā
na ālambate naiṣṭhika tām na niṣīdati pauruṣe
śabda arthau sat kaviḥ iva dvayam vidvān apekṣate
sthāyinā ūrthe pravartante bhāvāḥ saṃcāriṇaḥ yathā
rasasya ekasya bhūyāṃsaḥ tathā netuḥ mahībhṛtaḥ
tantra vāpa vidā yogaiḥ maṇḍalāni adhiṣṭhitā
sunigrahā narendreṇa phaṇi indrāḥ iva śatravaḥ
kara praceyām uttuṅgaḥ prabhu śaktim pratīyasīm
prajñā bala bṛhat mūlaḥ phalati utsāha pādapaḥ
alpa tvāt prabala tvāt vaṃśasya iva itare svarāḥ
vijīgīṣo nṛpatayaḥ prayānti parivāra tām
api an ārabhamāṇasya vibhoḥ utpāditāḥ paraiḥ

original: vrajanti guṇatāmarthāḥ śabdā iva vihāyasaḥ // MSpv_2.91 //
analyzed: vrajanti guṇa tām arthāḥ śabdāḥ iva vihāyasaḥ
yātavya pārṣṇi grāha ādi mālāyām adhika dyutiḥ
eka artha tantu protāyām nāyakaḥ nāyakāyate
ṣāḍguṇyam upayuñjīta śakti apekṣaḥ rasāyanam
bhavanti asya evam aṅgāni sthāsnūni balavanti ca
sthāne śamavatām śaktyā vyāyāme vṛddhiḥ aṅginām
ayathābalam ārambhaḥ nidānam kṣaya saṃpadaḥ
tad īśitāram cedinām bhavān tam avamaṃsta mā
nihanti arīn eka pade yaḥ udāttaḥ svarān iva
mā vedi yat asau ekaḥ jetavyaḥ cedi rāj iti

original: rājayakṣmeva rogāṇāṃ samūha sa mahībhṛtāṃ // MSpv_2.96 //
analyzed: rājayakṣmā iva rogāṇām samūha sa mahībhṛtām
saṃpādita phalaḥ tena sapakṣaḥ para bhedanaḥ
kārmukeṇa iva guṇinā bāṇaḥ saṃdhānam eṣyati
ye ca anye kālayavana śālva rukmidruma ādayaḥ
tamaḥ svabhāvaḥ te
pi enam pradoṣam anuyāyinaḥ
upajāpaḥ kṛtaḥ tena tāna ākopavataḥ tvayi
āśu dīpayitā alpaḥ pi sa agnīnedhān iva anilaḥ
bṛhat sahāyaḥ kārya antam kṣodīyān api gacchati
saṃbhūya ambhodhim abhyeti mahā nadyāḥ naga āpagā

original: tasya mitrāṇyamitrāste ye ca ye cobhaye nṛpāḥ /
analyzed: tasya mitrāṇi amitrāḥ te ye ca ye ca ubhaye nṛpāḥ

original: abiyuktaṃ tvayainaṃ te gantārastvāmataḥ pare // MSpv_2.101 //
analyzed: a biyuktam tvayā enam te gantāraḥ tvām atas pare
makha vighnāya sakalam ittham iti utthāpya rājakam
hanta jātam ajāta areḥ prathamena tvayā ariṇā
saṃbhāvya tvām ati bhara kṣama skandham sa bāndhavaḥ
sahāyam adhvara dhurām dharmarājaḥ vivakṣate
mahātmanaḥ nugṛhṇanti bhajamānān ripūn api
sapantīḥ prāpayanti abdhim sindhavaḥ naga nimnagā
cirāt api balātkāraḥ balinaḥ siddhaye
chanda anuvṛtti duḥḥsādhyāḥ suhṛdaḥ vimanīkṛtāḥ
manyase ri vadhaḥ śreyān prītaye nākinām iti
puroḍāśa bhujām iṣṭam iṣṭam kartum alantarām
amṛtam nāma yat santaḥ mantra jihveṣu juhvati
śobhā eva mandara kṣubdha kṣubhita ambhodhi varṇanā
sahiṣye śatam āgāṃsi sūnoḥ te iti yat tvayā
pratīkṣyan tat pratīkṣyāyai pitṛṣvasre pratiśrutam

original: tīkṣṇā nāruntudā buddhiḥ karma śāntaṃ pratāpavat /
analyzed: tīkṣṇā na aruntudā buddhiḥ karma śāntam pratāpavat

original: nopatāpi manaḥ soṣamavāgekā vāgminaḥ sataḥ // MSpv_2.109 //
analyzed: na upatāpi manaḥ sa uṣama vāc ekāḥ vāgminaḥ sataḥ
svayaṅkṛta prasādasya tasya ahnaḥ bhānumān iva
samaya avadhim aprāpyaya na antāya alam bhavān api
kṛtvā kṛtya vidaḥ tīrtheṣu antar praṇidhayaḥ padam
vidām kurvantu mahataḥ talam vidviṣambhasaḥ
an utsūtra pada nyāsā sat vṛtti sannibandhanā
śabda vidyā iva naḥ bhāti rāja nītiḥ aspaśā
ajñāta doṣaiḥ deṣa jñaiḥ uddūṣya ubhaya vetanaiḥ
bhedyāḥ śatroḥ abhivyakta śāsanaiḥ sāmavāyikāḥ
upeyivāṃsi kartāraḥ purīm ājātaśatravīm
rājanyakāni upāya jñaiḥ eka arthāni caraiḥ tava
sa viśeṣam sute pāṇḍoḥ bhaktim bhavati tanvati
vairāyitāraḥ taralāḥ svayam matsariṇaḥ tarale

original: ya ihātmavido vipakṣamadhye saha saṃvṛddhiyujo 'pi bhūbhujaḥ syuḥ /
analyzed: ye iha ātma vidaḥ vipakṣa madhye saha saṃvṛddhi yujaḥ pi bhūbhujaḥ syuḥ
bali puṣṭa kulāt iva anya puṣṭaiḥ pṛthak asmāt acireṇa bhāvitā taiḥ
sahaja doṣa cāpala samuddhataḥ calita durbala pakṣa parigrahaḥ
tava durāsada vīrya vibhāvasau śalabha tām labhatām asuhṛd gaṇaḥ
iti viśakalita artham auddhavīm vācam enām anugata naya mārgam argalām durnayasya
janita mudam udasthāt uccakais ucchrita uraḥsthala niyata niṣaṇṇa śrī śrutām śuśruvān saḥ

original: kauberadigbhāgam apāsya mārgam āgastyam iva āśuḥ iva avatārṇaḥ /
analyzed: kaubera digbhāgam apāsya mārgam āgastyam iva āśuḥ iva avatārṇaḥ
apeta yuddha abhiniveśa saumyaḥ hariharaprastham atha pratasthe

original: jagatpavitraiḥ api taṃ na pādaiḥ spraṣṭuṃ jagatpūjyam ayujyata arkaḥ /
analyzed: jagat pavitraiḥ api tam na pādaiḥ spraṣṭum jagat pūjyam ayujyata arkaḥ
yatas bṛhat pārvaṇa cāru tasya ātapatram bibharāṃbabhūve
mṛṇāla sūtra amalam antareṇa sthitaḥ cala cāmarayoḥ dvayam saḥ
bheje bhitas pātuka siddha sindhoḥ a bhūta pūrvām rucam amburāśeḥ
citrābhiḥ asya upari mauli bhājām bhābhiḥ maṇīnām aṇīyasībhiḥ
aneka dhātu churita aśma rāśeḥ go vana ṛdhanasya ākṛtiḥ anvakāri
tasya ullasat kāñcana kuṇḍala agra pratyupta gā rugma tarasra bhāsā
avāpa bālya ucita nīlakaṇṭha picchā avacūḍā kalanām iva uraḥ
tam aṅgade mandara kūṭa koṭi vyāghaṭṭana uttejana tayā maṇīnām
baṃhīyasā dīpti vitānakena cakāsayāmāsatuḥ ullasantī
nisarga raktaiḥ valaya avanaddha tāmra aśma raśmi churitaiḥ nakha agraiḥ
vyadyota adya api surāri vakṣaḥ vikṣobha ja asṛj snapitaiḥ iva aso
ubhau yadi vyomni pṛthak pravāhau ākāśagaṅgā payasaḥ patetām
tena upamīyate tamāla nīlam āmukta muktā latam asya vakṣaḥ
tena ambhasām sārasa mayaḥ payodheḥ dadhe maṇi dīdhiti dīpita āśaḥ
antar vasan bimba gataḥ tad aṅge sākṣāt iva alakṣyata yatra lokaḥ
muktā mayam sma
aṅguṣṭha niṣṭhyūtam iva ūrdhvam uccais tri sasrotasaḥ saṃtata dhārām ambhaḥ
saḥ indranīla sa sthala nīla mūrtī rarāja karpūra piśaṅga vāsāḥ
visṛtvaraiḥ amburuhām rajobhiḥ yama svasuḥ citraḥ iva uda bhāraḥ
prasādhitasya asya mudhā dviṣaḥ bhūt anyā eva lakṣmīḥ iti yuktam etat
vapuṣi aśeṣe khila loka kāntā sā ananya kāntā hi urasi itarā tu
kapāṭa vistīrṇa manorama uraḥsthala sthita śrī lalanasya tasya
ānandita aśeṣa janā babhūva sarva aṅga saṅginī aparā eva lakṣmīḥ
prāṇa chidām daitya pateḥ nakhānām upeyuṣām bhūṣaṇa tām kṣatena

original: prakāśakārkaśyaguṇai dadhānāḥ stanau taruṇyaḥ parivrurenam // MSpv_3.14 //
analyzed: prakāśa kārkaśya guṇaiḥ dadhānāḥ stanau taruṇyaḥ parivruḥ enam
ākarṣatā iva ūrdhvam atikraśīyān ati unnata tvāt kuca maṇḍalena
nanāma ti guru tva bhājā nitāntam ākrāntaḥ iva aṅganānām

original: yāṃ yāṃ priyaḥ praikṣata kātarāśkṣīṃ sā sā hriyā namramukhī babhūva /
analyzed: yām yām priyaḥ praikṣata sā sā hriyā namra mukhī babhūva
niḥḥśaṅgam anyā sama māhita īrṣyāḥ tatra antare jaghruḥ amum kaṭākṣaiḥ
tasya atasī sūna samāna bhāsaḥ bhrāmyat mayūkha āvalī maṇḍalena

original: cakreṇa reje yamunājalaughaḥ sphuranmahāgarta ivaikabāhuḥ // MSpv_3.17 //
analyzed: cakreṇa reje yamunā jala oghaḥ sphurat mahā gartaḥ iva eka bāhuḥ
virodhinām vigraha bheda dakṣā mūrtā iva śaktiḥ kvacid a skhalantī

original: nityaṃ hareḥ saṃnihitā nikāmaṃ modayati sma cetaḥ // MSpv_3.18 //
analyzed: nityam hareḥ saṃnihitā nikāmam modayati sma cetaḥ

original: na kevalaṃ yaḥ svatayā murārerasādhāraṇatāṃ dadhānaḥ /
analyzed: na kevalam yaḥ svatayā murāreḥ asādhāraṇa tām dadhānaḥ

original: atyarthamudvejayitā pareṣāṃ nāmnāpi tasyaiva nandako 'bhūt // MSpv_3.19 //
analyzed: atyartham udvejayitā pareṣām nāmnā api tasya eva nandakaḥ bhūt
na nītam anyena natim kadācid karṇa antika prapta guṇam krayāsu

original: vidheyamasyā bhavadantikasthaṃ śārṅgaṃ dhanurmitramiva draḍhīyaḥ // MSpv_3.20 //
analyzed: vidheyam asyāḥ bhavat antika stham śārṅgam dhanuḥ mitram iva draḍhīyaḥ
dadhānaḥ nidhvānam aśrūyata pāñcajanyaḥ
rarāja saṃpādakam iṣṭa siddheḥ sarvāsu dikṣu aprasidgha mārgam

original: mahārathaḥ puṣyarathaṃ rathāṅgī kṣipraṃ kṣapānātha ivādhirūḍhaḥ // MSpv_3.22 //
analyzed: mahā rathaḥ puṣyaratham rathāṅgī kṣipram kṣapānāthaḥ iva adhirūḍhaḥ
dhvaja agra dhāmā dadṛśe tha śauraiḥ saṃkranta mūrtiḥ maṇi medinīṣu
phaṇau atas trāsayitum rasāyāḥ talam vivakṣan iva pannagāriḥ
yiyāsataḥ tasya mahīdhara ndhra bhida paṭīyān paṭaha praṇādaḥ
jala antarāṇi iva mahā arṇava oghaḥ śaśabda antarāṇi antarāyāñcakāra

original: yataḥ sa bhartā jagatāṃ jagāma dhartrā dharitryāḥ phaṇinātato 'dhaḥ /
analyzed: yatas sa bhartā jagatām jagāma dhartrā dharitryāḥ phaṇinā ātataḥ
mahā bhara ābhugna śiraḥ sahasra sahāyaka vyagra bhujam prasasre
atha uccakais toraṇa saṅga bhaṅga bhaya avanamra ākṛta ketanāni
kriyā phalāni iva su nīti bhājam sainyāni somān vayan vayuḥ tam
śyāma aruṇaiḥ vāraṇa dāna toyaiḥ āloḍitāḥ kāññcana bhū parāḥ
ānemi magnaiḥ śitikaṇṭha pakṣa kṣoda dyutaḥ cukṣudire ratha oghaiḥ
na laṅghayāmāsa mahājanānām śirāṃsi na eva uddhatim ājagāma
aceṣṭata aṣṭāpada bhūmi reṇuḥ pada āhataḥ yat sadṛśam garimṇaḥ
niruddhyamānāḥ yadubhiḥ kathañcid muhur yat uccikṣipuḥ agra pādān

original: dhruvaṃ gurūnmārgarudhaḥ karāndrānullaṅghya gantuṃ turagāstatīṣuḥ // MSpv_3.29 //
analyzed: dhruvam gurūn mārga rudhaḥ kara andrān ullaṅghya gantum turagāḥ tatīṣuḥ
avekṣita anāyata valgam agre turaṅgibhiḥ yatna niruddha vāhaiḥ
prakīḍitān reṇubhiḥ etya tūrṇam ninyayuḥ jananyaḥ pṛthukān pathibhyaḥ
didṛkṣamāṇaḥ pratirathyam īyuḥ murārim ārāt anagham jana oghāḥ

original: anekaśaḥ saṃstutamapyanalpā navaṃ navaṃ pratiraho karoti // MSpv_3.31 //
analyzed: anekaśas saṃstutam api analpā navam navam pratiraho karoti
upeyuṣaḥ vartma nirantarābhiḥ asau nirucchvāsam anīka nībhiḥ

original: rathasya tasyāṃ puri dattacakṣurvidvānvidāmāsa śanairna yātam // MSpv_3.32 //
analyzed: rathasya tasyām puri datta cakṣuḥ vidvān vidāmāsa śanais na yātam
madhyesamudram kakubhaḥ piśaṅgīḥ iryā kurvatī kāñcana vaprabhāsā
turaṅga kāntā mukha havyavāha jvālā iva bhitvā jalam ullalāsa
kṛta āspadā bhūmibhṛtām sahasraiḥ udanvat ambhaḥ parivīta mūrtiḥ

original: anirvidā yā vidadhe vidhātrā pṛthivī pṛthivyāḥ pratiyātaneva // MSpv_3.34 //
analyzed: anirvidā yā vidadhe vidhātrā pṛthivī pṛthivyāḥ pratiyātanā iva
tvaṣṭuḥ sadā abhyāsa gṛhīta śilpa vida jñāna saṃpad prasarasya sīmā
adṛśyata ādarśa tala amaleṣu chāyā iva yā svar jaladheḥ jaleṣu
rathāṅga bhartre bhinavam varāya yasyāḥ pitā iva pratipāditāyāḥ
premṇā upakaṇṭham muhur aṅga bhājaḥ ratna valīḥ ambudhiḥ ābabandha
yasyāḥ calat vāridhi vīci chchaṭā ucchalat śaṅkha kula ākulena
vapreṇa sumeru vapraḥ ham anvakāri
vaṇikpathe pūga kṛtāni yatra bhrama āgataiḥ ambubhiḥ amburāśiḥ
lolaiḥ alaḥ dyuti bhāñji muṣṇan ratnāni ratnākara tām avāpa
ambhu cyutaḥ komala ratna rāśīn apāṃnidhiḥ phena pinaddha bhāsaḥ
trātape dātum iva adhi talpam vistārāyamāsa taraṅga hastaiḥ
yat śālam uttaṅga tayā vijetum dūrāt udasthīyata sāgarasya
mahā ūrmibhiḥ vyāhata vāñchita arthaiḥ vīḍā divā abhyāśa gataiḥ vililye
kutūhalena javāt upetya prākāra bhityā sahasā niṣiddhaḥ
rasan arodīt bhṛśam ambu varṣa vyājena yasyāḥ bahis ambuvāhaḥ
yat aṅgana rūpa sarūpa tāyāḥ kañcid guṇam bhedakam icchatībhiḥ

original: ārādhito 'ddhā manurapsarobhiścakre prajāḥ svāḥ sanimeṣacihnāḥ // MSpv_3.42 //
analyzed: ārādhitaḥ ddhā manuḥ apsarobhiḥ cakre prajāḥ svāḥ sa nimeṣa cihnāḥ
sphurat tuṣāra aṃśu marīci jālaiḥ vinuhnutāḥ sphaṭika paṅktīḥ

original: āruhya nāryaḥ kṣaṇadāsu yatra nabhogatā devya iva vyārājan // MSpv_3.43 //
analyzed: āruhya nāryaḥ kṣaṇadāsu yatra nabhaḥ gatāḥ devyaḥ iva vyārājan
kānta indukānta upala kuṭṭimeṣu pratikṣapam harmya taleṣu yatra
uccais adhapāti payomucaḥ pi samūham ūhuḥ payayasām praṇālyaḥ
ratau hriyāḥ yatra niśāmya dīpān jāla gatābhyaḥ dhi gṛham gṛhiṇyaḥ
bibhyuḥ biḍāla īkṣaṇa bhīṣaṇābhyaḥ vaidūrya kuḍyeṣu śaśi dyutibhyaḥ
yasyām ati ślakṣaṇa tayā gṛheṣu vidhātum ālekhyam aśuknuvantaḥ

original: cakruryuvānaḥ pratibimbitāṅgāḥ sajīvacitrā iva ratnabhittīḥ // MSpv_3.46 //
analyzed: cakruḥ yuvānaḥ pratibimbita aṅgāḥ sa jīva citrāḥ iva ratna bhittīḥ
sāvarṇya bhājām pratimā āgatānām lakṣyaiḥ smara pāṇḍu tayā aṅganānām

original: yasyāṃ kapolaiḥ kaladhautadhāmastambheṣu bheje maṇidarpaṇaśrīḥ // MSpv_3.47 //
analyzed: yasyām kapolaiḥ kaladhauta dhāma stambheṣu bheje maṇi darpaṇa śrīḥ
śuka aṅga nīla upala nirmitānām lipteṣu bhāsā gṛha dehalīnām

original: yasyāmalindeṣu na cakrureva mugdhāṅganā gomayagomukhāni // MSpv_3.48 //
analyzed: yasyām alindeṣu na cakruḥ eva mugdha aṅganāḥ gomaya gomukhāni
gopānasīṣu kṣaṇam āsthitānām ālambibhiḥ candrakāṇām kalāpaiḥ
harinmaṇi śyāma tṛṇa abhirāmaiḥ gṛhāṇi nīdhraiḥ iva yatra rejuḥ
bṛhattulaiḥ apipyatulaiḥ vatāna mālā apinaddhaiḥ api

original: reje vicitrairapi yā sacitraigṛhairviśālairapi bhūriśālai // MSpv_3.50 //
analyzed: reje vicitraiḥ api yā sa citraiḥ gṛhaiḥ viśālaiḥ api bhūri śālaiḥ
cikraṃsayā kṛtrima pattri paṃṅkateḥ kapota pālīṣu niketanānām

original: mārjāramapyātaniścalāṅkaṃ yasyāṃ janaḥ kṛtrimameva mene // MSpv_3.51 //
analyzed: mārjāram api āta niścala aṅkam yasyām janaḥ kṛtrimam eva mene
kṣitipratiṣṭhaḥ upi mukha aravindaiḥ vadhū janaḥ candram adhas cakāra
atīta nakṣatra pathāni yatra prasāda śṛṅgāṇi vṛthā adhyarukṣat

original: ramyā iti prāptavatīḥ patākā rāgaṃ viviktā iti vardhayantīḥ /
analyzed: ramyāḥ iti prāptavatīḥ patākāḥ rāgam viviktāḥ iti vardhayantīḥ
yasyām asevanta namat valīkāḥ samam vadhūbhiḥ valabhīḥ yuvānaḥ
sugandhi tām apratiyatna pūrvām bibhranti yatra pramadāya puṃsām
madhūni vaktrāṇi ca kāminīnām āmoda karma vyatihāram īyuḥ
rata antare yatra gṛha antareṣu vitardi niryūha viṭak nīḍaḥ
rutā niśruṇvan vayasām gaṇaḥ ntevāsi tvam āpa sphuṭam aṅganānām
channe spaṣṭatareṣu yatra su acchāni nārī kuca maṇḍaleṣu

original: ākāśasāmyaṃ dadhurambarāṇi na nāmataḥ kevalamarthataḥ'pi // MSpv_3.56 //
analyzed: ākāśa sāmyam dadhuḥ ambarāṇi na nāmataḥ kevalam arthataḥ
yasyām a jihmāḥ mahatīm apaṅgāḥ sīmānam atyāyatayaḥ tyajantaḥ
janaiḥ jātu vinīta mārgāḥ
paraspasphardhi para arghya rūpāḥ paura striyaḥ yatra vidhāya vedhāḥ
śrī nirmita prāpta guṇa kṣata eka varṇa upamā vācya malam mamārja
kṣuṇṇam yat antaḥkaraṇena vṛkṣāḥ phalanti kalpa upadāḥ tat eva

original: adhyūṣuṣo yāmabhavañjanasya yāḥ sampadastā manaso 'pyagamyāḥ // MSpv_3.59 //
analyzed: adhyūṣuṣaḥ yām abhavan janasya yāḥ sampadaḥ tāḥ manasaḥ pi agamyāḥ
kalāḥ dadhānaḥ sakalāḥ sbhābhiḥ udbhāsayan saudha sitābhiḥ āśāḥ

original: yāṃ revatījāniriyeṣa hātuṃ na rauhiṇīyo na ca rohiṇīśaḥ // MSpv_3.60 //
analyzed: yām revatī jāniḥ iyeṣa hātum na rauhiṇīyaḥ na ca rohiṇīśaḥ
bāṇa āhava vyāhata śaṃbhu śakteḥ āsattim āsādya janārdanasya

original: śarīriṇā jaitraśareṇa yatra niḥśaṅghamūṣe makaradhvajena // MSpv_3.61 //
analyzed: śarīriṇā jaitra śareṇa yatra niḥśaṅgha mūṣe makaradhvajena
niṣevyamāṇena śivaiḥ marudbhiḥ adhyāsyamānā hariṇā cirāya
ud raśmi ratna aṅkura dhāmni sindhāvā ahā āsta merau amarāvatīm yā
su vṛttaḥ su vṛttaḥ

original: viśeṣako vā viśiśeṣa yasyāḥ śriyantrilokītilakaḥ sa eva // MSpv_3.62 //
analyzed: viśeṣakaḥ vā viśiśeṣa yasyāḥ śriyan trilokī tilakaḥ saḥ eva
tām īkṣamāṇaḥ sa puram purastāt prāpat pratolīm atula pratāpaḥ
vajra prabhā udbhāsi sura āyudha śrīḥ yā deva senā iva paraiḥ a laṅghyā
prajāḥ iva aṅgāt aravindanābheḥ śaṃbhoḥ jaṭā jūṭa taṭāt iva apaḥ
mukhāt iva atha śrutayaḥ vidhātuḥ purāt nirīyuḥ murajit dhvajinyaḥ
śliḥṣyadbhiḥ anyona mukha agra saṅga skhalat khalīnam haribhiḥ vilolaiḥ
paraspara utpīḍita jānubhāgāḥ duḥkhena niśacakramuḥ aśvavārāḥ

original: nirantarāle 'pi vimucmāne dūraṃ pathi prāṇabhṛtāṃ gaṇena /
analyzed: nirantarāle pi vimucmāne dūram pathi prāṇabhṛtām gaṇena
tejaḥ mahadbhiḥ tamasā iva dīpaiḥ dvīpaiḥ
śanais anīyanta rayāt patantorathāḥ kṣitim hasti nakha āda khedaiḥ
sa yatna sūta āyata raśami bhugna grīvā agra saṃsakta yugaiḥ turaṅgaiḥ
bala ūrmibhiḥ tad kṣaṇa hīyamāna rathyā bhujāyāḥ valayaiḥ iva asyāḥ
prāyeṇa niṣkrāmati cakrapāṇaiḥ paras dvāravatī tvam āsīt
pāre jalam nīranidheḥ apaśyat murāriḥ ā nīla palāśa rāśīḥ
vana āvalīḥ utkalikā sahasra pratikṣaṇa utkūlita śaiva lābhāḥ
lakṣībhṛta ambhodhi taṭa adhivāsa āndra mānasau nīrada nīla bhāsaḥ
latā vadhū saṃprayujaḥ divelam bahūkṛtān svān iva paśayati sma
āśliṣṭa bhūmim rasitāram uccais lolat dhvaja ākāra bṛhat taraṅgam
phenāyamānam patim āpagānām asau apasmāriṇam āśa saṅge
pītvā jalānām nidhinā ati gārdhyāt vṛddhim gate pi ātmani nā eva

original: kṣiptā ivendoḥ sa ruco 'dhivelaṃ muktāvalīrākalayāñcakāra // MSpv_3.73 //
analyzed: kṣiptāḥ iva indoḥ sa rucaḥ dhi velam muktā āvalīḥ ākalayāñcakāra
sa āṭopam urvīm aniśam nadantaḥ yaiḥ plavayiṣyanti
tāni aka deśāt nibhṛtam payodheḥ saḥ mbhāṃsi meghān pibataḥ dadarśa
uddhṛtya meghaiḥ tatas eva toyam artham muni indraiḥ iva saṃpraṇītāḥ
ālokayāmāsa hariḥ patantīḥ nadīḥ smṛtiḥ vadam iva amburāśim
vikrīya diśyāni dhanāni urūṇi daipyān asau uttama lābha bājaḥ
tarīṣu tatratyam aphalgu bhāṇḍam sāṃyāntrika anāvāpataḥ abhyanandat
utpitsavaḥ ntar nada bhartuḥ uccais garīyasā niḥśvasita anilena

original: payāṃsi bhaktyā garuḍadhvajasya dhvājānivoccikṣipire phaṇīndrāḥ // MSpv_3.77 //
analyzed: payāṃsi bhaktyā garuḍadhvajasya dhvājān iva uccikṣipire phaṇi indrāḥ
tam āgatam vīkṣya yugānta bandhum utsaṅga śayyā āśayam amburāśiḥ
pratyujjagāma iva guru pramoda prasārita uttuṅga taraṅga bāhuḥ
utsaṅgita ambhaḥ kaṇaka nabhasvān udanvataḥ sva dalavān mamārja
tasya anuvelam vrajataḥ dhi velam melā latā sephāla nala bedha gandhaḥ
uttāla tālī vana saṃpravṛtta samīra sīmantita ketakīkāḥ

original: āsedire lāvaṇasaindhavīnāṃ camūcaraiḥ kacchabhuvāṃ pradeśāḥ // MSpv_3.79 //
analyzed: āsedire lāvaṇa saindhavīnām camū caraiḥ kaccha bhuvām pradeśāḥ
lavaṅga mālā kalita avataṃsāḥ te nārikela antarapaḥ pibantaḥ
āsvāditāt rakramukāḥ samudrāt abhyāgatasya pratipattim īyuḥ

original: turagaśatākulasya paritaḥ paramekaturaṅgajanmanaḥ pramathitabhūbhṛtaḥ pratipathaṃ mathitasya bhṛśaṃ mahībhṛtā /
analyzed: turaga śata ākulasya paritas param eka turaṅga janmanaḥ pramathita bhūbhṛtaḥ pratipatham mathitasya bhṛśam mahībhṛtā

original: paricalataḥ balānujabalasya puraḥ satataṃ dhṛtaśriyaściravigataśriyo jalanidheśca tadābhavadadantaraṃ mahat // MSpv_3.82 //
analyzed: paricalataḥ balānuja balasya puras satatam dhṛta śriyaḥ cira vigata śriyaḥ jalanidheḥ ca tadā abhavat adantaram mahat
niśa vāsa dhūmam saha ratna bhār bhittvā utthitam bhūmim iva uragāṇām
nīla upala syūta vicitra dhātum asau girim raivatakam dadarśa
gurvīḥ rajasram dṛṣadaḥ samantāt upari upari ambumucām vitānaiḥ

original: vindhyāyamānaṃ divasasya bhartumārgaṃ punā roddhumivonnamadbhiḥ // MSpv_4.2 //
analyzed: vindhyāyamānam divasasya bhartu mārgam punar roddhum iva unnamadbhiḥ
krāntam rucā śyāmalitābhiḥ āmaṃlatābhiḥ āmantrita ṣaṭpadābhiḥ
śritam śilā śyāma latā abhirāmam

original: sahasrasaṃkhyair gaganaṃ pādair bhuvaṃ vyāpya vitiṣṭhamānam /
analyzed: sahasra saṃkhyaiḥ gaganam pādaiḥ bhuvam vyāpya vitiṣṭhamānam
vilocana sthāna gata uṣṇaraśmi niśākaram sādhu hiraṇyagarbham
kvacid jala apāya vipāṇḍurāṇi dhauta uttarīya pratima chavīni
abhrāṇi bibhrām umā aṅga saṅga vibhakta bhasmānam iva smarārim
chāyām nija strī caṭula alasānām madena kiñcid caṭula alasānām
kurvāṇam utpiñjala jāta patraiḥ vihaṅgamānām jala jāta patraiḥ
skandha adhirūḍha ujjvala nīlakaṇṭhān urvīruhaḥ śliṣṭa tanū nahi indraiḥ
pranartita aneka latā bhuja agrān rudrān anekān iva dhārayantam
vilambi nīlotpala karṇapūrā kapola bhittīḥ iva lodhra gaurīḥ
nava ulapa alaṅkṛta saikata ābhāḥ śucīḥ apaḥ śaivala nīḥ dadhānam
rājīva rājīva śalola bhṛṅgam muṣṇa antam uṣṇam tatibhiḥ tarūṇām
kānta alaka antāḥ lalanāḥ surāṇām rakṣobhiḥ akṣebhitam udvahantam
mude murāreḥ amaraiḥ sumeroḥ ānīya yasya upacitasya śṛṅgaiḥ
bhavanti nā uddāma girām kavīnām ucchrāya saundarya guṇāḥ mṛṣodyāḥ
yatas para arghyāni bhṛtāni anūnaiḥ prasthaiḥ muhur bhūribhiḥ
āḍhyāt iva prāpaṇikāt ajasram jagrāha ratnāni amitāni lokaḥ
akhidhyata āsannam udagra tāpam ravim dadhāne

original: bhṛṅgāvaliryasyataṭe nipītarasā namattāmarasā na mattā // MSpv_4.12 //
analyzed: bhṛṅga āvaliḥ yasya taṭe nipīta rasā namat tāmarasā na mattā
yatra adhirūḍha ena mahīruha uccais unnidra puṣpa akṣi sahasra bhājā
surādhipa adhiṣṭhita hasti malla līlām rājata gaṇḍaśailaḥ
vibhinna varṇa agaruḍa agrajena paritas sphurantyā

original: ratnaiḥ punaryatra rucaṃ svāmāninyire vaṃśakarīranīlaiḥ // MSpv_4.14 //
analyzed: ratnaiḥ punar yatra rucam svām āninyire vaṃśa karīra nīlaiḥ
yatra ujjhitābhiḥ muhur ambuvāhaiḥ samunnamadbhiḥ na
vanam babādhe viṣa pāvaka utthā vipannagānām avipannagānām
phaladbhiḥ uṣṇāṃśu kara abhimarśāt karśā navam dhāma pataṅga kāntaiḥ
śaśaṃsa yaḥ pātra guṇāt guṇānām saṃkrāntim ākrānta guṇa atirekām
dṛṣaṭaḥ pi śailaḥ sa muhur murāreḥ apūrva vat vismayam ātatāna
kṣaṇekṣame yat nava tām upaiti tat eva rūpam ramaṇīya tāyāḥ
uccāraṇa jñe thagirā ādadhānam uccā raṇat pakṣi gaṇāḥ taṭīḥ tam

original: utkaṃ dharaṃ draṣṭumavekṣya śauriṇutkandharaṃ dāruka ityuvāca // MSpv_4.18 //
analyzed: utkam dharam draṣṭum avekṣya śauriṇ utkandharam dārukaḥ iti uvāca
ācchādita āyata da diś ambaram uccakais gām ākramya saṃsthitam udagra viśāla śṛṅgam

original: mūrdhniskhalattuhinadīdhitikoṭimenam udvīkṣya ko bhuvi na vismayate nageśam // MSpv_4.19 //
analyzed: mūrdhniskhalat tuhina dīdhiti koṭim enam udvīkṣya kaḥ bhuvi na vismayate nageśam
udaya tivita tarṣa dhvara śami rajjau ahimarucau himadhāmni yāti ca astam
vahati giri rayam vilambi dhaṇaṭā dvaya parivārita vāraṇa indra līlām

original: vahati yaḥ paritaḥ kanakasthalīḥ saharitā lasamānanavāṃśukaḥ /
analyzed: vahati yaḥ paritas kanaka sthalīḥ sa haritāḥ lasamāna nava aṃśukaḥ
acala iṣa bhavān iva rājate sa haritāla samāna nava aṃśukaḥ
pāścātya bhāgam iha sānuṣu sanniṣaṇṇāḥ paśyanti śānta mala sāndratara aṃśu jālam
saṃpūrṇa labdha lalanā lāpana upamānam utsaṅga sahgi hariṇam asya mṛgāṅga mūrteḥ
kṛtvā pum vat pādam uccais bhṛgubhyaḥ mūrdhni grāvṇām jarjarāḥ nirjhara oghāḥ
kurvanti dyām utpatantaḥ smara ārta svar loka strī gātra nirṇam atra
sthagayanti amūḥ śāmita cātaka ārtasvarāḥ jaladāḥ taḍit tulita kāntaka ārtasvarāḥ

original: jagatīrihasphuritacārucāmīkarāḥ savituḥ kacitkapiśayanti cāmī karāḥ // MSpv_4.24 //
analyzed: jagatīḥ iha sphurita cāru cāmīkarāḥ savituḥ kacid kapiśayanti ca amī karāḥ
utkṣiptam ucchrita sitāṃśu kara avalambaiḥ uttambhita uḍubhiḥ ativatarām śirobhiḥ
śraddheya nirjhara jala vyapadeśam asya viṣvak taṭeṣu patati sphuṭam antarīkṣam
ekatra sphaṭika taṭa aṃśu bhinna nīrāḥ paratra

original: kālindījalajanitaśriyaḥ śrayante vaidagdhīmiha saritaḥ surāpagāyāḥ // MSpv_4.26 //
analyzed: kālindī jala janita śriyaḥ śrayante vaidagdhīm iha saritaḥ surāpagāyāḥ
itas tatas smin vilasanti meroḥ

original: striyaśaca patyau surasundarībhiḥ samā navapremaṇisānurāgāḥ // MSpv_4.27 //
analyzed: striyaḥ ca patyau sura sundarībhiḥ samāḥ nava premaṇi sa anurāgāḥ
uccais mahārajata rāji virājitā asau durvarṇa bhittiḥ iha sāndra sudhā savarṇā
abhyeti bhasma paripāṇḍurita smarāreḥ udvahni locana lalāma lalāṭa līlām
ayam atija raṭhāḥ prakāma guru vīra laghu vilambi payodhara uparuddhāḥ
satatam asugatām agamya rūpāḥ pariṇata dikkarikāḥ taṭīḥ bibharti

original: dhūmākāraṃ dadhati puraḥ sauvarṇe varṇenāgneḥ sadṛśi taṭe paśyāmī /
analyzed: dhūma ākāram dadhati puras sauvarṇe varṇena agneḥ sadṛśi taṭe

original: śyāmībhūtāḥ kusumasamūho 'līnāṃ līnāmālīmiha taravo bibhrāṇāḥ // MSpv_4.30 //
analyzed: śyāmībhūtāḥ kusuma samūhaḥ līnām līnām ālīm iha taravaḥ bibhrāṇāḥ
vyoma spṛśaḥ prathayatā kaladhauta bhittīḥ unnidra puṣpa caṇa campaka piṅga bhāsaḥ
saumeravīm adhigatena nitamba śobhām etena bhāratam ilāvṛta vat vibhāti
rucira citra tanūruha śālibhiḥ vicalitaiḥ paritas priyaka vrajaiḥ
vivadha ratna mayaiḥ abhibāti asau avayavaiḥ iva jaṅgama tām gataiḥ
kuśa śayaiḥ atra jalāśaya uṣitā mudāram ante kala bhāvika svaraiḥ
pragīyate siddha gaṇaiḥ ca yoṣitām udāram a kala bhāvika svaraiḥ
āsāditasya tamasā niyateḥ niyogāt ākāṅkṣataḥ punar apakramaṇena kālam
patyuḥ tvaṣām iha mahā oṣadhayaḥ kalatra sthānam parā enat anabhibhūtam amūḥ vahanti
vanaspati skandha niṣaṇṇa bāla pravāla hastāḥ pramadāḥ iva atra
puṣpa īkṣaṇaiḥ lambhita locakaiḥ vā madhuvrata vrāta vṛtaiḥ vratatyaḥ
vihagāḥ kadamba surabhau iha gāḥ kalayan tanu kṣaṇam aneka layam
bhramayan upaiti muhur abhramayam pavanaḥ ca dhūta navanī pavanaḥ
vidvadbhiḥ āgama paraiḥ vivṛtam kathañcid śrutvā api durgraham aniścita dhībhiḥ anyaiḥ

original: śreyāndvijātiriva hantumaghāni dakṣaṃ gūṭhārthameṣa nidhimantragaṇaṃ bibharti // MSpv_4.37 //
analyzed: śreyān dvijātiḥ iva hantum aghāni dakṣam gūṭha artham eṣa nidhi mantra gaṇam bibharti

original: bimboṣṭhaṃ bahu manute turaṅgavaktraś cumbantaṃ mukhamiha kiṃnaraṃ priyāyāḥ /
analyzed: bimba uṣṭham bahu manute turaṅga vaktraḥ cumbantam mukham iha kiṃnaram priyāyāḥ
śliṣyantam muhur itaraḥ pi tam nija strīm uttuṅga stana bhara bhaṅga bhīru madhyām
yat etat asya anu taṭam vibhāti vanam tata aneka tamāla tālam

original: na puṣpitātra sthagitārkarasmāvanāntatāne katamā latālam // MSpv_4.39 //
analyzed: na puṣpitā atra sthagita arka rasma avanānta tāne katamā
danta ujjvalāsu vimala upala mekhalā antāḥ sat ratna citra kaṭakāsu bṛhat nitambāḥ
asmin bhajanti ghana komala gaṇḍa śailāḥ nāryaḥ nurūpam adhivāsam adhityakāsu
an ati cira ujjhitasya jaladena cira sthita buddhi udayasya payasaḥ nukṛtim

original: viralavikīrṇavajraśakalā sakalām iha vidadhāti dhautakaladhautamahī // MSpv_4.41 //
analyzed: virala vikīrṇa vajra śakalā sakalām iha vidadhāti dhauta kaladhauta mahī

original: varjayantyā janaiḥ saṃgamekāntatas tarkayantyā sukhaṃ saṅgame kāntataḥ /
analyzed: varjayantyā janaiḥ saṃgama ekāntataḥ tarkayantyā sukham saṅgame kāntataḥ
yoṣayā eṣa smara āsanna tā apāṅgayā sevyate na ikayā saṃnna tā apaṅgayā
saṃkīrṇa kīcaka vana skhalita eka vāla viccheda kātara dhiyaḥ calitum camaryaḥ
asmin mṛdu śvasana garbha tadīya randhra ryad svana śruti sukhāt iva nā utsahante
muktam muktā gauram iha kṣīram iva abhraiḥ vāpīṣu antar līna mahā nīla dalāsu
śastrī śyāmaiḥ aṃśubhiḥ āśu drutam ambhaḥ chāyām acchām ṛcchati nīlī salilasya

original: yā na yayau priyamanyavadhūbhyaḥ sāratarāgamanā yatamānam /
analyzed: yā na yayau priya manya vadhūbhyaḥ sāratara āgamanā yatamānam

original: tena saheta bibharti rasaḥ strī sā ratarāgamanāyatānām // MSpv_4.45 //
analyzed: tena saheta bibharti rasaḥ strī sā rata rāgam anāyatānām
bhinna iṣu ratna kiraṇaiḥ kiraṇeṣu iha indoḥ uccāvacaiḥ upagateṣu sahasra saṃkhyām

original: doṣāpi nūnamahimāṃśurasau kileti vyākośakokanadatāṃ dadhate nalinyaḥ // MSpv_4.46 //
analyzed: doṣā api nūnam ahimāṃśuḥ asau kila iti vyākośa kokanada tām dadhate nalinyaḥ
apaśaṅkam aṅka parivartana ucitāḥ calitāḥ puras patim upetum ātmajāḥ

original: anuroditīva karuṇena pattriṇāṃ virutena vatsalatayayaiṣa nimnagāḥ // MSpv_4.47 //
analyzed: anuroditi iva karuṇena pattriṇām virutena nimnagāḥ
madhukara viṭa pāna mitāḥ taru paṅktīḥ bibhrataḥ sya viṭa pāna mitāḥ
paripāka piśaṅga latā rajasā rodhaḥ cakāsti kapiśam galatā
prāc bhāgataḥ patat iha idam upatyakāsu śṛṅgārita āyata mahā ibha kara ābham ambhaḥ
saṃlakṣyate vividha ratna kara anuviddham ūrdhva prasārita surādhipa cāpa cāru
dadhāti ca vikasat vicitra kalpadruma kusumaiḥ abhigumphitān iva etāḥ
kṣaṇam alaghu vilambi piccha dāmnaḥ śikhara śikhāḥ śikhi śekharān amuṣya
sa vadhūkāḥ sukhinaḥ
na āsevante rasavat avaratam amanda rāga tāmara sadṛśaḥ
ācchādya puṣpa paṭam eva mahāntam antarāvartibhiḥ gṛha kapota śirodharā ābhaiḥ

original: śasvaṅgāni dhūmarucimāguravīṃ dadhānair dhūpāyatīva paṭalairnīradānām // MSpv_4.52 //
analyzed: śasu aṅgāni dhūma rucim ā aguravīm dadhānaiḥ dhūpāyati iva paṭalaiḥ nīradānām
anyonya vyatikara cārubhiḥ vicitraiḥ atrasyat navamaṇiḥ janmabhiḥ mayūkhaiḥ
vismerān gagana sadaḥ karoti amuṣmin ākāśeḥ acitam abhitti citra karma
samīra śiśiraḥ śiraḥsu vasatā satā javanikā nikāna sukhinām
bibharti janayan ayam mudam apām apāya dhavalāḥ valāhaka tatīḥ
mairttrī ādi citta parikarma vidaḥ vidhāya kleśa prahāṇam iha labdha sa bīja yogāḥ

original: khyātiṃ casattvapuruṣānyatayādhigamya vāñcanti tāmapi samādhibhṛtaḥ niroddhum // MSpv_4.55 //
analyzed: khyātim ca sattva puruṣa anya tayā adhigamya vāñcanti tām api samādhi bhṛtaḥ niroddhum
marakata maya medinīṣu bhānoḥ taru viṭapa antara pātinaḥ mayūkhāḥ
avanata śitikaṇṭha kaṇṭha lakṣmīm iha dadhati śphurita aṇu reṇu jālāḥ
yā bibharti kala vallakī guṇa svāna mānam ati kāli mālayā

original: nātra kāntamupagītayā tayā svānamānamati kālimālayā // MSpv_4.57 //
analyzed: na atra kāntam upagītayā tayā kāli mālayā
sāyam śaśāṅga kiraṇa āhata candrakānta nisyandi nīra nikareṇa kṛta abhiṣekāḥ

original: arkopalollasitavahnibhirahni taptās tīvraṃ mahāvratamivātra caranati vaprāḥ // MSpv_4.58 //
analyzed: arka upala ullasita vahnibhiḥ ahni taptāḥ tīvram mahā vratam iva atra vaprāḥ

original: etasminnadhikapayaḥśriyaṃ vahantyaḥ saṃkṣobhaṃ pavanabhuvā javena nītāḥ /
analyzed: etasmin adhika payaḥ śriyam vahantyaḥ saṃkṣobham pavana bhuvā javena nītāḥ

original: vālmīkerarahitarāmalakṣmaṇānāṃ sādharmyaṃ dadhati girāṃ mahāsarasyaḥ // MSpv_4.59 //
analyzed: vālmīkera rahita rāma lakṣmaṇānām sādharmyam dadhati girām mahā sarasyaḥ

original: iha muhurmuditaiḥ kalabhai ravaḥ pratidiśaṃ kriyate kalabhairavaḥ /
analyzed: iha muhur muditaiḥ kalabhaiḥ ravaḥ pratidiśam kriyate kala bhairavaḥ

original: sphurati cānuvanaṃ camarīcayaḥ kanakaratnabhuvāṃ ca marīcayaḥ // MSpv_4.60 //
analyzed: sphurati ca anuvanam camarīcayaḥ kanaka ratna bhuvām ca marīcayaḥ
tvaksāra randhra paripūraṇa labdha gītiḥ asmin asau mṛdita pakṣmala rallaka aṅgaḥ

original: kastūrikāmṛgavimardasugandhireti rāgīva saktimadhikāṃ viṣayeṣu vāyuḥ // MSpv_4.61 //
analyzed: kastūrikā mṛga vimarda sugandhiḥ eti rāgī iva saktim adhikām viṣayeṣu vāyuḥ

original: prītyai yūnāṃ vyavahitatapanāḥ prauḍhadvāntaṃ dinamiha jaladāḥ /
analyzed: prītyai yūnām vyavahita tapanāḥ prauḍha dvāntam dinam iha jaladāḥ
vidadhāti surata krīḍā āyāsa śrama paṭavaḥ

original: bhagne nivāso 'yamihāsya puṣpaiḥ sadānataḥ yena viṣāṇi nāgaḥ /
analyzed: bhagne nivāsaḥ yam iha asya puṣpaiḥ sadā ānataḥ yena viṣāṇi nāgaḥ

original: tīvrāṇi tenojjhati kopito 'sau sasānatoyena viṣāṇi nāgaḥ // MSpv_4.63 //
analyzed: tīvrāṇi tena ujjhati kopitaḥ sau sa sāna toyena viṣāṇi nāgaḥ
prāleya śītalam acala īśvaram īśvaraḥ pi sāndra bha carma vasana āvaraṇā adhiśete

original: sarvartunivṛttikare nivasannupaiti na dvandvaduḥkhamiha kiñcidakiñcano 'pi // MSpv_4.64 //
analyzed: sarva ṛtu nivṛtti kare nivasan upaiti na dvandva duḥkham iha
nava naga vana lekhā śyāma dhyābhiḥ ābhiḥ sphaṭika kaṭaka bhūmināṭayati eṣa śailaḥ
ahi parikara bhājaḥ bhāsma nairaṅgarāgaiḥ adhigata dhavalimnaḥ śūlapāṇeḥ abhikhyām
dadhadbhiḥ abhitas taṭau vikaca vāri jāmbūnadaiḥ vinodita dina klamāḥ kṛta rucaḥ ca jāmbūnadaiḥ

original: niṣevya madhu mādhavāḥ sarasamatra kādambaraṃ haranti rataye rahaḥ priyatamāṅgakādambaram // MSpv_4.66 //
analyzed: niṣevya madhu mādhavāḥ sarasam atra kādambaram haranti rataye rahaḥ priyatama aṅga kādambaram

original: darpaṇanirmalāsu patite ghanatimiramuṣi jyotiṣi raupyabhittiṣu puraḥ pratiphalati muhuḥ /
analyzed: darpaṇa nirmalāsu patite ghana timira muṣi jyotiṣi raupya bhittiṣu puras pratiphalati muhur

original: vrīḍamasaṃṃmukho 'pi ramaṇairapahṛtavasanāḥ khāñcanakandarāsu taruṇīriha nayati raviḥ // MSpv_4.67 //
analyzed: vrīḍam asaṃṃmukhaḥ pi ramaṇaiḥ apahṛta vasanāḥ khāñcana kandarāsu taruṇīḥ iha nayati raviḥ
anukṛti śikhara ogha śrībhiḥ abhyagate sau tvayi sarabhasam abhyuttiṣṭhati iva adriḥ uccais
druta marut upanunnaiḥ unnamadbhiḥ sa helam haladhara paridhāna śyāmalaiḥ ambuvāhaiḥ

original: itthaṃ vyalīkāḥ priyatamā iva so 'vyalīkaḥ śuśrāva sūtatanayasya tadā vyalīkāḥ /
analyzed: ittham vyalīkāḥ priyatamāḥ iva saḥ vyalīkaḥ śuśrāva sūta tanayasya tadā vyalīkāḥ

original: rantuṃ nirantaramiyeṣa tato 'vasāne tāsāṃ girau ca vanarājipaṭaṃ vasāne // MSpv_5.1 //
analyzed: rantum nirantaram iyeṣa tatas vasāne tāsām girau ca vana rāji paṭam vasāne
tam sa dvipa indra tulita atula tuṅga śṛṅgam abhyullasat kadalikā vana rājim uccais
vistāra ruddha vasudhaḥ nu acalam cacāla lakṣmīm dadhat pratigireḥ alaghuḥ bala oghaḥ
bhāsvat kara vyatikara ullasita ambara antar tāpa trapā iva mahā jana darśanena
saṃvivyuḥ ambara vikāsi camū samuttham pṛtvī rajaḥ karabha kaṇṭha kaḍāram āśaḥ
āvartinaḥ śubha phala prada śukti yuktāḥ saṃpanna deva maṇayaḥ bhṛta randhra bhāgāḥ

original: aśvāḥ pyadhurvasumatīmatirocamānās tūrṇaṃ payodhaya ivormibhirāpatatantaḥ // MSpv_5.4 //
analyzed: aśvāḥ pyadhuḥ vasumatīm atirocamānāḥ tūrṇam payodhayaḥ iva ūrmibhiḥ āpatatantaḥ

original: ārakṣamagnamavamatya sṛṇiṃ śitāgram ekaḥ palāyata javena kṛtārtanādaḥ /
analyzed: ārakṣa magnam avamatya sṛṇim śita agram ekaḥ palāyata javena kṛta ārta nādaḥ
anya punar muhur uda plava tā asta bhāram anyonyataḥ pathi bata abibhātam ibha uṣṭrau
āyāḥ tam aikṣata gacchantam uccalita cāmara cārum aśvam

original: nāgaṃ punarmṛdu salīlanimīlitākṣaṃ sarvaḥprayaḥ khalu bhavatayanurūpaceṣṭaḥ // MSpv_5.6 //
analyzed: nāgam punar mṛdu sa līla nimīlita akṣam sarvaḥ prayaḥ khalu bhavatai anurūpa ceṣṭaḥ
trastaḥ samasta jana hāsa karaḥ kareṇoḥ tāvat kharaḥ prakharam ullalayāñcakāra
yāvat cala āsana vilola nitamba bimba visrasta vastram avarodha vadhūḥ papāta
śaila upaśalya nipatat ratha nemi dhārā niṣpiṣṭa niṣṭhura śilā tala cūrṇa garbhāḥ
bhū reṇavaḥ nabhasi naddha payoda cakrāḥ cakra vat aṅgaruha dhūmra rucaḥ visasruḥ
udyat kṛśānu śakaleṣu surā abhighātāt bhūmī samāyāta śilā phalaka ācita eṣu

original: parntavartmasu vcakramire mahāśvāḥ śailasya dardurapuṭāniva vādayantaḥ // MSpv_5.9 //
analyzed: mahā aśvāḥ śailasya dardura puṭān iva vādayantaḥ
tejaḥ nirodha samatā avahitena yantrā niyuktaḥ
ārāṭṭajaḥ caṭula niṣṭhura pātam uccais citram cakāra padamarda pulāyitena
nīhāra jāla mālinaḥ punar ukta sāndrāḥ kurnvadhū jana vilocana pakṣma mālāḥ

original: kṣuṇṇaḥ kṣaṇaṃ yadubalairdivamātitāṃsuḥ pāṃśurdisāṃ mukhamatutthayadutthito 'dreḥ // MSpv_5.11 //
analyzed: kṣuṇṇaḥ kṣaṇam yadu balaiḥ divam ātitāṃsuḥ pāṃśuḥ disām mukham atutthayat utthitaḥ dreḥ

original: ucchidya vidviṣa iva prasrabhaṃ mṛgendrān indrānujācarabhūtapatayo 'dhyavātsuḥ /
analyzed: ucchidya vidviṣaḥ iva prasrabham mṛgendrān indra anujā cara bhūtapatayaḥ
vanya ibha mastaka nikhāta nakha agra ya mukta muktāphala prakara bhāñji guhā gṛhāṇi
vibhrāṇayā bahalayā avakaṅka piṅka piccha avacūḍām anu mādhavam āsa jagmuḥ
cañcu agra daṣṭa caṭula āhita patākayā anye sva āvāsa bhāgam uragāśana ketu yaṣṭyā

original: chāyāmapāsya mahatīmapi vartamānām āgāminīṃ jagṛhire janatāsrūṇām /
analyzed: chāyām apāsya mahatīm api vartamānām āgāminīm jagṛhire janatā asrūṇām
sarvaḥ hi na upāgatam api apacīyamānam vardhiṣṇum āśrayam anāgatam abhyupaiti
agra gatena vasatim parigṛhya ramyām āpātya sainika nirākarāṇa ākulena

original: yānto 'nyataḥ plutakṛtasvaramāśu dūrād udbāhunā juhuvavire muhurātmavargyāḥ // MSpv_5.15 //
analyzed: yāntaḥ nyatas pluta kṛta svaram āśu dūrāt udbāhunā muhur ātma vargyāḥ
siktāḥ iva amṛta rasena muhur janānām klānti chidaḥ vana vanaspatayaḥ tadānīm
śākhā avasakta vasana ābharaṇa abhirāmāḥ kalpadrumaiḥ saha vicitra phalaiḥ virejuḥ
yānāt janaḥ parijanaiḥ avatāryamāṇāḥ rājñīḥ nara apanayana ākula sauvidallāḥ
srasta avaguṇṭhana paṭāḥ kṣaṇa lakṣyamāṇa vakra śriyaḥ sa bhaya kautukam īkṣate sma
kaṇṭha avasakta mṛdu bāhu latā turaṅgāt rāja avarodhana vadhūḥ avatārayantaḥ

original: āliṅganānyadhikṛtāḥ sphuṭamāpureva gaṇḍasthalīḥ śucitayā na cucumburāsām // MSpv_5.18 //
analyzed: āliṅganāni adhikṛtāḥ sphuṭam āpuḥ eva gaṇḍa sthalīḥ śuci tayā na cucumbuḥ āsām
dṛṣṭvā iva nirjata kalāpa bharām adhastāt vyākīrṇa mānya kabarām kabarīm taruṇyāḥ

original: prādudruvatsapadi candrakavāndrumāgrāt saṃgharṣiṇā saha guṇābhyadhikairdurāpam // MSpv_5.19 //
analyzed: prādudruvat sapadi candrakavān druma agrāt saṃgharṣiṇā saha guṇa abhyadhikaiḥ durāpam
rociṣṇu kāñcana caya aṃśu piśaṅgita āśāḥ vaṃśa dhvajaiḥ jalada saṃhatim ullikhantyaḥ

original: bhūbharturāyata nirantarasaṃnivṛṣṭāḥ pādā ivābhivabhurāvalayo rathānām // MSpv_5.20 //
analyzed: bhūbhartuḥ āyata nirantara saṃnivṛṣṭāḥ pādāḥ iva abhivabhuḥ āvalayaḥ rathānām
chāyā vidhāyibhiḥ anujjhita bhūti śobhaiḥ ucchrāyibhiḥ bahala pāṭala dhātu rāgaiḥ
dūṣyaiḥ api kṣitibhṛtām dviradaiḥ udāra tārā āvalī viracanaiḥ vyarucat nivāsāḥ
utkṣapta paṭaka antara līyamānam anda anila praśamita śrama gharma toyaiḥ

original: durvāpratānasahajāstaraṇeṣu bheje nidrasukhaṃ vasanasadmasu rājadāraiḥ // MSpv_5.22 //
analyzed: durvā pratāna sahaja āstaraṇeṣu bheje nidrā sukham vasana sadmasu rāja dāraiḥ
prasveda vāri sa viśeṣa viṣaktam aṅge kūrpāsakam kṣata nakha kṣatam utkṣipantī
āvirbhavat vana payodhara bāhu mūlā śāta udarī yuva dṛśām kṣaṇam utsavaḥ bhūt

original: yāvatsa eva samayaḥ samameva tāvad avyākulāḥ paṭamayānyabhito vitatya /
analyzed: yāvat saḥ eva samayaḥ samam eva tāvat a vyākulāḥ paṭa mayāni abhitas vitatya
paryāpatat krayika lokam agaṇya paṇya pūrṇa paṇāḥ viṇunaḥ vipaṇīḥ vibhejuḥ
udgūrṇa loṣṭa guḍaiḥ paritas
udyāta mudrata manokaha jhāla madhyāt anyāḥ śaśaṅguṇam analpam avan avāpa

original: trāsākulaḥ paripatanparito niketān puṃbhirna kaiścidapi dhanvabhiranvabandhi /
analyzed: trāsa ākulaḥ paripatan paritas niketān puṃbhiḥ na kaiścid api dhanvabhiḥ anvabandhi

original: tasthau tathāpi na mṛgaḥ kvacidaṅganānām ākarṇapūrṇanayaneṣuhatekṣaṇaśrīḥ // MSpv_5.26 //
analyzed: tasthau tathā api na mṛgaḥ kvacid aṅganānām ākarṇapūrṇa nayana iṣu hata īkṣaṇa śrīḥ
āstīrṇa talpa racita āvāsathaḥ kṣaṇena veśayājanaḥ kṛta nava karma kāmyaḥ
khinna an a khinna matiḥ āpatataḥ manuṣyān pratyagrahīt cira niviṣṭaḥ iva upacāraiḥ
sasnuḥ payaḥ papuḥ anenijuḥ ambarāṇi jakṣuḥ bisam dhṛta vikāsi bhisa prasūnā
sainyāḥ śriyām anupabhoga nirarthaka tva doṣa pravādam amṛjan naga nimangānām
nābhi hradaiḥ parigṛhīta rayāṇi nimnaiḥ satrīṇām bṛhat jaghana setu nivāritāni
jagmuḥ jalāni jala muḍḍaka vādya valgu valgat dhana stana taṭa skhalitāni mandam
ālola puṣkara mukha ullasitaiḥ abhīkṣṇam ukṣāṃbabhūvuḥ abhitas vapuḥ ambu varṣaiḥ
svedāyata śvasita nirasta vega mugdha mūrdhanya ratna nikaraiḥ iva hāstikāni
ye pakṣiṇaḥ prathamam ambunidhim gatāḥ te ye pi indra pāṇi tulā āyudha lūna pakṣāḥ
tejagmuḥ adripatayaḥ sarasīḥ vigāḍhum ākṣipta ketu kutha sainya gaja chalena

original: ātmānameva jaladheḥ pratibimbitāṅgam ūrmau mahatyabhimukhāpātitaṃ nirīkṣya /
analyzed: ātmānam eva jaladheḥ pratibimbita aṅgam ūrmau mahati abhimukha āpātitam nirīkṣya
krodhāt adhāvat apabhīḥ abhihantum anya nāga abhiyuktaḥ iva yukta mahaḥ mahā ibhaḥ
na ādātum anya kari mukta mada ambu tiktam dhūta aṅkuśena na vihātum api icchatā ambhaḥ

original: ruddhe gajena saritaḥ saruṣāvatāre riktodapātrakaramāsta ciraṃ janaughaḥ // MSpv_5.33 //
analyzed: ruddhe gajena saritaḥ sa ruṣā avatāre rikta udapātra karam āsta ciram jana oghaḥ

original: panthānamāśu vijahīhi puraḥ stanau te paśyanpratidvaradakumbhaviśaṅgicetāḥ /
analyzed: panthānam āśu vijahīhi puras stanau te paśyan pratidvara da kumbha viśaṅgi cetāḥ

original: stamberamaḥ pāriṇinaṃsurāvupaiti ṣiṅgairagadyata sasaṃbhramameva kācit // MSpv_5.34 //
analyzed: stamberamaḥ sa saṃbhramam eva kācid
kīrṇam śanais anu kapolam aneka pānām hasta aurvi gāḍha mada tāpa rujaḥ śamāya
ākarṇam ullasitam ambu vikāśikā aśanī kāśam āpa sama tām sita cāmarasya
gaṇḍūṣam ujjhitavatā payasaḥ sa roṣam nāgena labdha para vāraṇa mārutena
ambhodhi rodhasi pṛthu pratimāna bhāga ruddha ūru danta musala prasaram nipete
dānandadattayā api jalaiḥ sahasā adhirūḍhe kaḥ vidyamāna gatiḥ āsitum utsahate

original: yaddantinaḥ kaṭakaṭāhataṭānmimaṅkṣor maṅkṣūdapāti paritaḥ paṭalairasīnām // MSpv_5.37 //
analyzed: yat dantinaḥ kaṭa kaṭāha taṭāt mimaṅkṣoḥ maṅkṣu udapāti paritas paṭalaiḥ asīnām
antar jala ogham avagāḍhavataḥ kapolau hitvā kṣaṇam vitata pakṣatiḥ antarīkṣe

original: dravyaśrayeṣvapi gaṇeṣu rarāja nīlo varṇaḥ pṛthaggata ivāligaṇo gajasya // MSpv_5.38 //
analyzed: dravya śrayeṣu api gaṇeṣu rarāja nīlaḥ varṇaḥ pṛthaggataḥ iva ali gaṇaḥ gajasya
saṃsarpibhiḥ payasi gairika reṇu rāgaiḥ ambhoja garbha rasa sa aṅga niṣaṅgiṇā ca
krīḍā upabhogam anubhūya sarit mahebhau anyonya vastra parivartam iva vyadhattām

original: yāṃ candrakairmadajalasya mahānadīnāṃ netraśriyaṃ vikasato vidadhurgajendrāḥ /
analyzed: yām candrakaiḥ mada jalasya mahā nadīnām netra śriyam vikasataḥ vidadhuḥ gaja indrāḥ
tām pratyavāpuḥ avilambitam uttarantaḥ dhauta aṅga lagna nava nīla payoja vastraiḥ
pratyanya danti niśita aṅguśa dūra bhinna niryāṇa niryat asṛjam calitam nipādī

original: roddhuṃ mahebhaparivraḍhimānamāgād ākrantito na vaśameti mahānparasya // MSpv_5.41 //
analyzed: roddhum mahā ibha parivraḍhimānam āgāt ākrantitaḥ na vaśam eti mahān parasya
sevyaḥ pi sa anunayam ākalanāya yantrā nītena vanya kari dāna kṛta adhivāsaḥ

original: nābhāji kevalamabhāji gajena śākhī nānyasya gandhamapi mānabhataḥ sahante // MSpv_5.42 //
analyzed: na abhāji kevalam abhāji gajena śākhī na anyasya gandham api mā an abhataḥ sahante
adri indu kuñca cara kuñjara gaṇḍa kāṣa saṃkrānta dāna payasaḥ vana pādapasya

original: senāgajena mathitasya nijaprasūnair mamle yathāgatamagāmi kulairalīnām // MSpv_5.43 //
analyzed: senā gajena mathitasya nija prasūnaiḥ mamle yathāgatam agāmi kulaiḥ alīnām
na uccais yadā taru taleṣu mamuḥ tadānīm ādhoraṇaiḥ abhihitāḥ pṛthu mūla śākhāḥ

original: bandhāya cicchiduribhāstarasātmanaiva naivātmanīnamatha vā kriyate madāndhaiḥ // MSpv_5.44 //
analyzed: bandhāya cicchiduḥ ibhāḥ tarasā ātmanā eva nā eva ātmanīnam atha vā kriyate mada andhaiḥ
uṣṇa uṣṇa śīkara sṛjaḥ prabala ūṣmaṇaḥ antar utphulla nīla nalina udara tulya bhāsaḥ
haricandaneṣu nāgān babandhuḥ apārān manujāḥ nirāsuḥ

original: kaṇḍūyataḥ kaṭubhuvaṃ kariṇo madena skandhaṃ sugandhimanulīnavatā nagasya /
analyzed: kaṇḍūyataḥ kaṭu bhuvam kariṇaḥ madena skandham sugandhim anulīnavatā nagasya
sthūla indranīla śakala āvali komalena kaṇaṭheguṇa tvam alīnām valayena bheje
nirdhūta vītam api bālakam ullalantam yantā krameṇa parisāntvana tarjanābhiḥ

original: śikṣāvaśena śanakairvaśamānināya śāśtraṃ hi niścitadhiyāṃ kva na siddhameti // MSpv_5.47 //
analyzed: śikṣā vaśena śanakais vaśam ānināya śāśtram hi niścita dhiyām kva na siddham eti

original: stambhaṃ mahāntamucitaṃ sahasā mumoca dānaṃ dadāvatitarāṃ sarasāgrahastaḥ /
analyzed: stambham mahāntam ucitam sahasā mumoca dānam dadau atitarām sarasa agra hastaḥ

original: baddhaparāṇi parito nigaḍāneyalāvīt svātantryamujvalamavāpa kareṇurājaḥ // MSpv_5.48 //
analyzed: baddha parāṇi paritas svātantryam ujvalam avāpa kareṇu rājaḥ
jajñe janaiḥ mukulita tā akṣaman ādadāne saṃrabdha hastipa kaniṣṭura codanābhiḥ

original: gambhīravedini puraḥ kavalaṃ karīndre mando 'pi nāma na mahānavagṛhya sādhyaḥ // MSpv_5.49 //
analyzed: gambhīra vedini puras kavalam kari indre mandaḥ pi nāma na mahān avagṛhya sādhyaḥ

original: kṣiptaṃ puro na jagṛhe muhurikṣukāṇḍaṃ nāpekṣate sma nikaṭopagatāṃ kareṇuṃ /
analyzed: kṣiptam puras na jagṛhe muhur ikṣu kāṇḍam na apekṣate sma nikaṭa upagatām kareṇum
sasmāra vāraṇa patiḥ parimīlita akṣam icchā vihāra vana vāsa mahā utsavanām
duḥkhena bhojayitum āśayitā śaśāka tuṅga agra kāyam anamantam anādareṇa
utkṣipta hasta tala datta vidhāna piṇḍa sneha sruti snapita bāhu ribha adhirājam
śukla aṃśuka uparacitāni nirantarābhiḥ veśmani rasmi vitatāni narādhipānām
candrākṛtāni gaja maṇaḍalikābhiḥ uccais nīla abhra paṅkti pariveṣam iva adhijagmuḥ

original: gatyūnamargagatayo 'pi gatorumārgāḥ svairaṃ samācakṛṣire bhuvi vellanāya /
analyzed: gati ūna marga gatayaḥ pi gata ūru mārgāḥ svairam samācakṛṣire bhuvi vellanāya
darpa udaya ullasita phena jala anusāra saṃlakṣya palyayana vardhra padāḥ turaṅgāḥ
ājighrati praṇata mūrdhani vāhlaje śve tisya aṅga saṅgama sukha anubhava utsukāyāḥ

original: nāsāvirokapavanollasitaṃ tanīyo romāñcatāmiva jagāma rajaḥ pṛthivyāḥ // MSpv_5.54 //
analyzed: nāsā viroka pavana ullasitam tanīyaḥ romāñca tām iva jagāma rajaḥ pṛthivyāḥ

original: hemnaḥ sthalīṣu paritaḥ parivṛtya vājī dhunvanvapuḥ pravitatāyatakeśapaṅktiḥ /
analyzed: hemnaḥ sthalīṣu paritas parivṛtya vājī dhunvan vapuḥ pravitata āyata keśa paṅktiḥ

original: jvalākaṇāruṇarucā nikareṇareṇoḥ śeṣeṇatejasaḥ ivollasatā rarāja // MSpv_5.55 //
analyzed: jvalā kaṇā aruṇa rucā nikareṇa reṇoḥ śeṣeṇa tejasaḥ iva ullasatā rarāja
danta alikā dharaṇa niścala pāṇi yugmam ardha uditaḥ hariḥ iva udayaśaila mūrdhnaḥ

original: stokena nākramata vallabhapālamuccaiḥ śrīvṛkṣakī puruṣakonnamitāgrakāyaḥ // MSpv_5.56 //
analyzed: stokena nā akramata vallabha pālam uccais śrīvṛkṣakī puruṣaka unnamita agra kāyaḥ
reje janaiḥ snapana sāndratara ārdra mūrtiḥ devaiḥ iva animiṣat dṛṣṭibhiḥ īkṣyamāṇaḥ

original: śrīsaṃnidhānaramaṇīyataro 'śva uccair uccaiśravā jalanidheriva jātamātraḥ // MSpv_5.57 //
analyzed: śrī saṃnidhāna ramaṇīyataro śvas uccais uccaiśravāḥ jalanidheḥ iva jāta mātraḥ

original: aśrāvi bhūmipatibhiḥ kṣaṇavītanidrair aśnunpuro haritakaṃ mudamādadhānaḥ /
analyzed: aśrāvi bhūmipatibhiḥ kṣaṇa vīta nidraiḥ aśnun puras haritakam mudam ādadhānaḥ
grīvā agra lola kala kiṅgiṇīkā nināda miśram dadhat daśana carcura śabdam aśvaḥ

original: utkhāya darpacalitena sahaiva rajjvā kīlaṃ prayatnaparamānavadurgraheṇa /
analyzed: utkhāya darpa calitena saha eva rajjvā kīlam prayatna parama ānava durgraheṇa

original: ākulyakāri kaṭakasturageṇa tūrṇam aśveti vidrutamanudrutāśvamanyam // MSpv_5.59 //
analyzed: ākulyakāri kaṭakaḥ turageṇa tūrṇam aśva iti vidrutam anudruta aśvam anyam
a vyākulam prakṛtam uttaradheya karma dhārāḥ prasādhayitu vyatikīrṇa rūpāḥ

original: siddhaṃ mukhe navasu vāthiṣu kaścidaśvaṃ valgāvibhāgakuśalo gamayāṃbabhūva // MSpv_5.60 //
analyzed: siddham mukhe navasu vāthiṣu kaścid aśvam valgā vibhāga kuśalaḥ gamayāṃbabhūva
mukta asṛṇāni paritas kacakam carantaḥ truṭyā a vitāna tanikā vyatiṣaṅga bhājaḥ
sasruḥ sa roṣa paricāraka vāryamāṇāḥ dama añcala skhalita lola padam turaṅgāḥ
uttīrṇa bhāra laghunā api alaghu ulapa ogha sauhitya niḥsahatareṇa taroḥ adhastāt
romantha manthara calat guru sāsnam āsāṃcakre nīmīlat alasa īkṣaṇa maukṣakeṇa
mṛd piṇḍa śekharita koṭibhiḥ ardhacandram śṛṅgaiḥ śikhā agra gata lakṣma malam hasadbhiḥ

original: ucchṛṅgitānyavṛṣabhā saritāṃ nadanto rodhāṃsi dhīramapacaskirire mahokṣāḥ // MSpv_5.63 //
analyzed: ucchṛṅgitāni avṛṣabhā saritām nadantaḥ rodhāṃsi dhīram apacaskirire mahā ukṣāḥ
medasvinaḥ sarabhasa upagatān abhīkān parān anaḍuhaḥ muhur āhavena
ūrjasvalena jagme jaya uddhura viśāla viṣāṇam ukṣṇā
bibhrāṇam āyatimatīm avṛthā śirodhim pratyagra tām ati rasām adhikam dadhanti

original: loloṣṭramauṣṭrakamudagramukhaṃ tarūṇām abhraṃlihāni lilihe navapallavāni // MSpv_5.64 //
analyzed: lola uṣṭram auṣṭrakam udagra mukham tarūṇām abhraṃlihāni lilihe nava pallavāni
sārdham kathañcid ucitaiḥ picumarda pattraiḥ āsya antarāla gatam āmra dalam mradīyaḥ

original: dāserakaḥsapadi saṃvalitaṃ niṣādair vipraṃ purā patagarāḍiva nirjagāra // MSpv_5.66 //
analyzed: dāserakaḥ sapadi saṃvalitam niṣādaiḥ vipram purā pataga rāj iva nirjagāra

original: spaṣṭaṃ bahiḥ sthitavaterapi nivedayantaś ceṣṭāviśeṣamanujīvijanāya rājñām /
analyzed: spaṣṭam bahis sthita vateḥ api nivedayantaḥ ceṣṭā viśeṣam anujīvi janāya rājñām

original: vaitālikāḥ sphuṭapadaprakaṭārthamuccair bhogāvalīḥ kalagiro 'vasareṣu peṭhuḥ // MSpv_5.67 //
analyzed: vaitālikāḥ sphuṭa pada prakaṭa artham uccais bhoga āvalīḥ kala giraḥ vasareṣu peṭhuḥ
unnamra tāmra paṭa maṇḍapa maṇḍitam tadā ānīla na nāga kula saṃkulam ābabhāse
saṃdhyā āśu bhinna ghana karburita antarīkṣa lakṣmī viḍambi śiviram śiva kīrtanasya

original: dharasyoddhartāsitvamitinanu sarvatra jagati pratītastatkiṃ māmatibharamadhaḥ prāpipāyiṣuḥ /
analyzed: dharasya uddhartā asi tvam iti nanu sarvatra jagati pratītaḥ tat kim mām ati bharam adhas prāpipāyiṣuḥ
upālabdhā iva uccais giripatiḥ iti śrīpatim asau bala ākrāntaḥ kraḍat dvirada mathita urvīruha ravaiḥ
atha riraṃsum amum yugapad girau kṛta yathāsva taru prasava śriyā

original: ṛtugaṇena niṣevitumādadhe bhuvi padaṃ vipadantakṛtaṃ satāṃ // MSpv_6.1 //
analyzed: ṛtu gaṇena niṣevitum ādadhe bhuvi padam vipad anta kṛtam satām
nava palāśa palāśa vanam puras sphuṭa sphaṭa parāgata paṅgajam
mṛdu latā anta latā antam alokayat sa surabhim sumanobharaiḥ
vilulita alaka saṃhṛtiḥ āmṛśan mṛga dṛśām śrama vāri lalāṭa jam
tanu taraṅga tatim sarasām dalat kuvalayam valayat marut āvavau
tulayati sma vilocana tārakāḥ kurabaka stabaka vyatiṣahkiṇi
guṇavat āśraya labdha guṇa uda daye mālini mālini mādhava yoṣitām
sphuṭam iva ujvala kāñca kāntibhiḥ yutam aśokam aśobhata campakaiḥ

original: virahiṇāṃ hṛdayasya bhidābhṛtaḥ kapiśitaṃ piśitaṃ madanāgninā // MSpv_6.5 //
analyzed: virahiṇām hṛdayasya bhidā bhṛtaḥ kapiśitam piśitam madana agninā
smara āhutāśana murmura cūrṇa tām dadhuḥ iva āmra vanasya rajaḥ kaṇāḥ

original: nipātitāḥ paritaḥ pathikavrajānupari te paritepurato bhṛśam // MSpv_6.6 //
analyzed: nipātitāḥ paritas pathika vraja anu pari te paritepuḥ atas bhṛśam
ratipati prahitā iva kṛta krudhaḥ priyatameṣu vadhūḥ anunāyikā
bakula puṣpa rasa āsava peśala dhvaniḥ agāt niragāt madhupa āvaliḥ
priya sakhī sadṛśam pratibodhitāḥ kim api kāmya girā parapuṣṭayā
priyatamāya aṅganāḥ
madhukaraiḥ apavāda karaiḥ iva smṛti bhuvaḥ pathikāḥ hariṇāḥ iva
kala tayā vacasaḥ parivādinī svara jitā vaśam āyayuḥ
samabhisṛtya rasāt avalambitaḥ pramadayā kusuma avacicīrṣayā
a vinaman na rarāja vṛthak uccakais anṛtayā nṛtayā vana pādapaḥ
idam apāsya virāgi parāgīḥ ali kadambakam amburuhām tatīḥ
stana bhareṇa jita stabaka ānaman nava late valate bhimukham tava
surabhi niśvasite dadhataḥ tṛṣam nava sudhā madhure ca tava adhare

original: alamaleriva gandharasāvamū mama na saumanasau manaso mude // MSpv_6.12 //
analyzed: alam aleḥ iva gandha rasau amū mama na saumanasau manasaḥ mude
iti gadantam anantaram aṅganā bhuja yuga unnamana uccatara stanī
praṇayinam rabhasāt udara śriyā vali bhayāt ali bhayāt iva sasvaje
vadana saurabha lobha paribhramat bhramara saṃbhrama saṃbhṛta śobhayā
calitayā vidadhe kala mekhalā kalakalaḥ laka lola dṛśā anyayā

original: ajagaṇan gaṇaśaḥ priyamagrataḥ praṇatamapyabhimānitayā na yāḥ /
analyzed: ajagaṇan gaṇaśas priyam agratas praṇatam api abhimāni tayā na yāḥ

original: sati madhāvabhavanmadanavyathā vidhuritā dhuritāḥ kukurastriyaḥ // MSpv_6.15 //
analyzed: sati madhau abhavat madana vyathāḥ vidhuritāḥ dhuritāḥ kukura striyaḥ
kusuma kārmuka kārmuka saṃhita druta śilīmukha khaṇḍita vigrahāḥ
maraṇam api aparāḥ pratipedire kimu muhur muhur gata bhartṛkāḥ
rurudhiṣā vadana amburuha śriyaḥ su tanu satmalaṅkaraṇāya te

original: tadapi samprati sannihite madhāvadhigamaṃ dhigamaṅgalamaśruṇaḥ // MSpv_6.17 //
analyzed: tat api samprati sannihite madhau adhigamam dhik amaṅgalam aśruṇaḥ
tyajati kaṣṭām asau acirāt asūn viraha vedanayā iti agha śaṅgibhiḥ

original: priyatayā gaditāstvayi bāndhavairavitathā vitathāḥ sakhi mā giraḥ // MSpv_6.18 //
analyzed: priya tayā gaditāḥ tvayi bāndhavaiḥ avitathāḥ vitathāḥ sakhi mā giraḥ
na khalu dūra gataḥ pi adhivartate maham asau iti bandhu tayā uditaiḥ

original: praṇayino niśamayya vadhūrbahiḥ svaramṛtairamṛtairiva nirvavau // MSpv_6.19 //
analyzed: praṇayinaḥ niśamayya vadhūḥ bahis svara mṛtaiḥ amṛtaiḥ iva nirvavau
madhurayā madhu bodhita mādhavī madhu samṛddhi samedhita medhayā
madhukara aṅganayā muhur unmada dhvani bhṛtā nibhṛta akṣaram ujjage
aruṇita akhi śaila vanā muhur vidadhatī pathikān paritāpinaḥ
vikaca kiṃśuka saṃhatiḥ uccakais udavahat davaha vyavaha śriyam
ravi turaṅga tanūruha tulya tām dadhati yatra śirīṣa rajaḥ rucaḥ
upayayau vidadhan nava mallikāḥ śuciḥ asau cira saurabha saṃpadaḥ
dalita komala pāṭala kuḍmale nija vadhū śvasita anuvidhāyini
maruti vāti vilāsibhiḥ unmada bhrama dalau mada laulyam upādade
nidadhire dayitā urasi tad kṣaṇa spana vāri tuṣāra bhṛtaḥ stanāḥ

original: sarasacandanareṇuranukṣaṇaṃ vicakare ca kareṇa varorubhiḥ // MSpv_6.24 //
analyzed: sarasa candana reṇuḥ anu kṣaṇam vicakare ca kareṇa vara ūrubhiḥ
sphurat adhīra taḍit nayanā muhur priyam iva āgalita uru payodharā
jaladhara āvaliḥ apratipālita sva samayā samayān jagatīdharam
gaja kadambaka mecakam uccakais nabhasi vīkṣya nava ambudam ambare

original: abhisasāra na vallabhamaṅganā na cakame ca kamekarasaṃ rahaḥ // MSpv_6.26 //
analyzed: abhisasāra na vallabham aṅganā na cakame ca kam ekarasam rahaḥ
anuyayau vividha upala kuṇḍala dyuti vitānaka saṃvalita aṃśukam

original: dhutatanurvalayasya payomucaḥ śabalimā balimānamuṣo vapuḥ // MSpv_6.27 //
analyzed: dhuta tanuḥ valayasya payomucaḥ śabalimā balimāna muṣaḥ vapuḥ
druta samīra calaiḥ kṣaṇa lakṣita vyavahitā viṭapaiḥ iva mañjarī
nata tamāla nibhasya nabhastaroḥ acirarociḥ arocata vāridaiḥ
paṭalam ambumucām pathika aṅganā sapadi jīvita saṃśayam eṣyatī
sa nayana ambu sakhī jana saṃbhramāt vidhura bandhuḥ abandhuḥ amaikṣata
pravasataḥ sutarām udakampayat vila kandala kampana lālitaḥ

original: namayati sma vanāni manasvinījananamano ghanamārutaḥ // MSpv_6.30 //
analyzed: namayati sma vanāni manasvinī janana manaḥ ghana mārutaḥ
jalada paṅktiḥ anartayat unmadam kala vilāpi kalāpi kadambakam
kṛta sa mārjana mardala maṇḍala dhvani jayā nijayā svana saṃpadā
nava kadamba jaḥ ruṇita ambaraiḥ adhi purandhri śilīndhra sugandhibhiḥ
manasi rāgavatām anurāgi tā nava navā vana vāyubhiḥ ādadhe
śamita tāpam apoḍha mahī rajaḥ prathama bindubhiḥ ambumucaḥ mbhasām

original: praviralairacalāṅganamaṅganājanasugaṃ na sugandhi na cakrire // MSpv_6.33 //
analyzed: praviralaiḥ acala aṅganam aṅganā jana sugam na sugandhi na cakrire
dvirada valakṣam alakṣyata sphurita bhṛṅga mṛd chavi ketakam

original: ghanaghanaughavighaṭṭanayā divaḥ kṛśasikhaṃ śaśikhaṇḍamiva cyutam // MSpv_6.34 //
analyzed: ghana ghana ogha vighaṭṭanayā divaḥ kṛśa sikham śaśi khaṇḍam iva cyutam
dalita mauktika cūrṇa vipāṇḍavaḥ sphurita nirjhara śīkara cāravaḥ
kuṭaja puṣpa parāga kaṇāḥ sphuṭam vidadhire dadhi reṇu viḍambanām
nava payaḥ kaṇa komala mālatī kusuma saṃtati saṃtata saṅgibhiḥ
pracalita uḍu nibhaiḥ paripāṇḍimāḥ śubha rajobharajaḥ libhiḥ ādade
nija rajaḥ paṭa vāsam iva akirat hṛta paṭa upama vāri mucām diśām
priya viyukta vadhū jana cetasām anavanī navanīpa vana āvaliḥ
praṇaya kopa bhṛtaḥ pi parāṅmukhāḥ sapadi vāridhara ārava bhīravaḥ
praṇayinaḥ parirabdhum atha aṅganāḥ vavalire vali recita madhyamāḥ

original: vigatarāgaguṇo 'pi jano na kaścalati vāti payodanabhasvati /
analyzed: vigata rāga guṇaḥ pi janaḥ na kaḥ calati vāti payoda nabhasvati
abhihite libhiḥ evam iva uccakais ananṛte nanṛte nava pallavaiḥ
aramayan bhavanāt aciradyuteḥ kila bhayāt am apayātum anicchavaḥ
yadu narendra gaṇam taruṇā gaṇāḥ tam atha manmatha manthara bhāṣiṇaḥ
dadatam antarita ahima dīdhitim khaga kulāya kulāya nilāyitām
jalada kālam a bodha kṛtam diśām aparā atha apa ratha vayava āyudhaḥ
sa vikaca utpala cakṣuṣam aikṣata kṣitibhṛtaḥ ṅaga gatām dayitām iva
jagati naiśam aśīta karaḥ karaiḥ viyati vārida vṛnda mayam tamaḥ

original: jalajarājiṣu naindramadidravanna mahatāmahatāḥ kva ca nārayaḥ // MSpv_6.43 //
analyzed: jalaja rājiṣu na aindram adidravat na mahatā amahatāḥ kva ca na arayaḥ

original: samaya eva karoti balābalaṃ praṇigatavanta itīva śarīriṇām /
analyzed: samayaḥ eva karoti balābalam praṇigatavantaḥ iti iva śarīriṇām
śaradi haṃsa ravāḥ paruṣīkṛta svara mayūra mayūḥ ramaṇīya tām
tanuruhāṇi puras vijita dhvaneḥ dhavala pakṣa vihaṅgama kūjitaiḥ

original: jagalurakṣamayeva śikhaṇḍinaḥ paribhavo 'ribhavo hi suduḥsahaḥ // MSpv_6.45 //
analyzed: jagaluḥ akṣamayā iva śikhaṇḍinaḥ paribhavaḥ ribhavaḥ hi su duḥsahaḥ
anuvanam vana rāji vadhū mukhe bahala rāga java adhara cāruṇi
vikaca bāṇa valayaḥ dhikam rurucire rucira īkṣaṇa vibhramāḥ
kanaka bhaṅga piśaṅga dalaiḥ dadhe sa rajasā aruṇa keśara cārubhiḥ
priya vimānita mānavatī ruṣām nirasanaiḥ asanaiḥ a vṛthārtha tā
mukha saroja rucam mada pāṭalām anucakāra cakora dṛśām yatas
dhṛta nava ātapam utsuka tām atas na kamalam kamalam bhayat ambhasi
