vigata sasya jidhatsam aghaṭṭayat kalama gopa vadhūḥ na mṛga vrajam
śruta tad īrita komala gītaka dhvani miṣe nimeṣa īkṣaṇam agratas
kṛta madam nigadantaḥ iva ākulīkṛta jagatrayam ūrjam ataṅga jam
vavuḥ ayukchada guccha sugandhayaḥ satatagāḥ tatagānagiraḥ libhiḥ
vigata vāridhara āvaraṇāḥ kvacid adṛśuḥ ullasita asita asitāḥ
kvacid iva indragaja ajina kañcukāḥ śaradi nīradin nīrya devaḥ diśaḥ
vilulitām anilaiḥ śarad aṅganāḥ nava saroruha keśara sambhavām
vikaritum parihāsa vidhitsayā hari vadhūḥ iva dhūlim udhakṣipat
harita patra mayī iva marut gaṇaiḥ sraj avanaddha manorama pallavā

original: madhuriporabhitāmramukhī mudaṃ divi tatā vitatāna śukāvaliḥ // MSpv_6.53 //
analyzed: madhuripoḥ abhitāmra mukhī mudam divi tatā vitatāna śuka āvaliḥ
smita saroruha netra saraḥ jala amati sitaṅga vihaṅga hasat divam

original: akalayan muditāmiva sarvataḥ sa śaradanturadihmukhām // MSpv_6.54 //
analyzed: akalayat muditām iva sarvatas sa śarad antura dihmukhām
gaja dvayasīḥ api haimanaḥ tuhinayan saritaḥ pṛṣatām patiḥ
salila santatim adhvaga yoṣitām atuna tā tanu tāpa kṛtam dṛśām
idam ayuktam aho mahat eva yat vara tanoḥ smarayati anilaḥ nyadā
smṛsa yauvana sa ūṣma payodharān sa tuhinaḥ tu hinastu viyoginaḥ

original: priyatamena yayā saruṣā sthitaṃ na saha sā sahasā parirabhya tam /
analyzed: priyatamena yayā sa ruṣā sthitam na saha sā sahasā parirabhya tam

original: ślathayituṃ kṣaṇamakṣamatāmaṅganā na saha sā sahasā kṛtavepathuḥ // MSpv_6.57 //
analyzed: ślathayitum kṣaṇam akṣamatām aṅganā na saha sā sahasā kṛta vepathuḥ
bhṛśam adūyata yā adhara pallava kṣatiḥ anāvaraṇā hima mārutaiḥ

original: daśanaraśmipaṭena ca sītkṛtairnivāsiteva sitena sunirvavau // MSpv_6.58 //
analyzed: daśana raśmi paṭena ca sītkṛtaiḥ nivāsitā iva sitena su nirvavau
vraṇabhṛtā su tanoḥ kalasīkṛta sphurita danta marīci mayam dadhe
sphuṭam iva āvaraṇam hi mārutaiḥ mṛdu tayā dutayā adhara lekhayā
dhṛta tuṣāra kaṇasya nabhasvataḥ taru latā aṅguli tarjana vibhramāḥ

original: pṛthu nirantaramiṣṭabhujāntaraṃ vanitayānitayā na viṣehire // MSpv_6.60 //
analyzed: pṛthu nirantaram iṣṭa bhujāntaram vanitayā anitayā na viṣehire

original: himaṛtāvapi tāḥ sma bhṛśasvido yuvatayaḥ sutarāmupakāriṇau /
analyzed: hima ṛtau api tāḥ sma bhṛśa svidaḥ yuvatayaḥ sutarām upakāriṇau
prakaṭayati anurāgam akṛtrimam smara mayam ramayanti vilāsinaḥ
kusumayan phali nīra vaimarda vikāsibhiḥ ahita huṃkṛtiḥ
upavanam nirabharsayata priyān viyuvatīḥ yuvatīḥ śiśira anilaḥ
upaciteṣu pareṣu asamartha tām vrajati kāla vaśāt balavān api
tapasi manda gabhastiḥ abhīṣumān nahi mahā hima nikaraḥ bhavat
abiṣiṣeṇayiṣum bhuvanāni yaḥ smaram iva ākhyāta lodhra racaḥ cayaḥ
kṣubhita sainya parāga vipāṇḍura dyutiḥ ayam tirayan ubhūt diśaḥ

original: śiśiramāsamapāsya guṇosya naḥ ka iva śītaharasya kucoṣmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: śiśira māsam apāsya guṇaḥ usya naḥ kaḥ iva śīta harasya kuca ūṣmaṇaḥ

original: iti dhiyāstaruṣaḥ parirebhire ghanamato namato 'numatān priyāḥ // MSpv_6.65 //
analyzed: iti dhiyāḥ taruṣaḥ parirebhire ghanamataḥ namataḥ numatān priyāḥ
adhi lavaṅgam amī rajasā adhikam malinitāḥ sumanaḥ dala tālinaḥ

original: sphuṭamiti prasavena puro 'hasatsapadi kundalatā dalatālinaḥ // MSpv_6.66 //
analyzed: sphuṭam iti prasavena puras hasat sapadi kunda latā dala tālinaḥ
ati surabhi bhāji puṣpa śriyām atunutara tayā iṣa santānakaḥ

original: taruṇaparabhṛtaḥ svanaṃ rāgiṇāmatanuta rataye vasantānakaḥ // MSpv_6.67 //
analyzed: taruṇa parabhṛtaḥ svanam rāgiṇām atanuta rataye vasantānakaḥ
na ujjhitum yuvati mānasa nirāse dakṣam iṣṭa madhu vāsarasām
cūta māli ralinām ati rāgāt akṣam iṣṭa madhu vāsara sāram
jagat vaśīkartum imāḥ smarasya prabhā vanīke tanavai jayantīḥ

original: ityasya tene kadalīrmadhuśrīḥ prabhāvanī ketanavaijayantīḥ // MSpv_6.69 //
analyzed: iti asya tene kadalīḥ madhu śrīḥ prabhāvanī ketana vaijayantīḥ
smara rāga mayī vapuḥ tamisrā parisastāra raveḥ asatya vaśam

original: priyamāpa divāpi kokile strī paritastārarave rasatvaśyam // MSpv_6.70 //
analyzed: priyam āpa divā api kokile strī paritas tāra rave rasa tvaśyam
vapuḥ ambu vihāram iham śucinā ruciram kamanīyatarā gatimā
ramaṇena ramaṇī acira aṃśu latā ruciḥ aṅkam anīyata rāga mitā

original: mudamabdabhuvāmapāṃ mayūrāḥ sahasāyanta nadī papāṭa lābhe /
analyzed: mudam abdabhuvām apām mayūrāḥ sahasāyanta nadī papāṭa lābhe

original: alinā ratamālinī śillīndhre saha sāyantanadīpapāṭalābhe // MSpv_6.72 //
analyzed: alinā ratamālinī śillīndhre saha sāyantana dīpa pāṭalābhe

original: kuṭajāni vīkṣya śikhibhiḥ śikharīndraṃ samayāvanau ghanamadabhramarāṇi /
analyzed: kuṭajāni vīkṣya śikhibhiḥ śikharīndram samayā avanau ghana mada bhramarāṇi

original: gaganaṃ ca gītaninadasya giroccaiḥ samayā vanaughanamadabhramarāṇi // MSpv_6.73 //
analyzed: gaganam ca gīta ninadasya girā uccais samayā vana ogha namada bhramarāṇi

original: abhīṣṭhamāsādya cirāya kāle samuddhṛtāśāṃ kamanī cakāśe /
analyzed: abhīṣṭham āsādya cirāya kāle samuddhṛta āśām kamanī cakāśe
yoṣit manaḥ janma sukha udayeṣu samuddhṛta āśaṅgam anī cakāśe

original: stanayoḥ samayena yāṅganānāmabhinaddhārasamā na sā rasena /
analyzed: stanayoḥ samayena yā aṅganānām abhinaddhāra samā na sā rasena
parirambha rucim tatiḥ jalānām abhinaddhā rasa māna sārasena
jāta prītiḥ yā madhureṇa anu vanāntam kāme kānte

original: tatsamparka prāpya purā mohanalīlāṃ kāmekānte sā rasikā kā kurute na // MSpv_6.76 //
analyzed: tad samparka prāpya purā mohana līlām kām ekānte sā rasikā kā kurute na

original: kāntājanena rahasi prasabhaṃ gṛhītakeśe rate smarasahāsavatopitena /
analyzed: kāntā janena rahasi prasabham gṛhīta keśe rate smara sa hāsava topitena

original: premṇā manastu rajanīṣvapi haimanīṣu ke śerate sma rasahāsavatopitena // MSpv_6.77 //
analyzed: premṇā manaḥ tu rajanīṣu api haimanīṣu ke śerate sma rasa hāsava topitena
gatavatām api vismayam uccakais a sakala amala pallava līlayā
madhukṛtām asakṛt giram āvalī rasa kalā amala pallava līlayā

original: kurvantamityatibhareṇa nagānavācaḥ puṣpaivirāmamalināṃ ca na gānavācaḥ /
analyzed: kurvantam iti ati bhareṇa na gāna vācaḥ ca na gāna vācaḥ

original: śrīmānsamastamanusānu girauvihartu bibhratyacodi sa mayūragirā vihartum // MSpv_6.79 //
analyzed: śrīmān samastam anu sānu girau vihartu bibhratī acodi sa mayūra girā vihartum
anugiram ṛtubhiḥ vitāyamānām atha sa vilokayitum vanānta lakṣmīm

original: niragamadabhirāddhumadṛtānāṃ bhavati mahatsu na niṣphalaḥ prayāsaḥ // MSpv_7.1 //
analyzed: niragamat abhirāddhum adṛtānām bhavati mahatsu na niṣphalaḥ prayāsaḥ

original: dadhati sumanaso vanāni bahvīryuvatiyutā yadavaḥ prayātumīṣuḥ /
analyzed: dadhati sumanasaḥ vanāni bahvīḥ yuvati yutāḥ yadavaḥ prayātum īṣuḥ
manasi mahā astram anyathā amī na kusuma pañca kamalam visoḍhum
avasam adhigamya tam harantayaḥ hṛdayam ayatna kṛta ujvala svarūpāḥ
avaniṣu padam aṅganāḥ tadānīm nyadadhata vibhrama sampadaḥ ṅaganāsu
nakha rucira cindracāpam lalita gateṣu gatāgatam dadhānā

original: mukharitavalayaṃ pṛthau nitambe bhujalatikā muhuraskhalattaruṇyāḥ // MSpv_7.4 //
analyzed: mukharita valayam pṛthau nitambe bhuja latikā muhur askhalat taruṇyāḥ
vitene bahutaram arpita kiṅkiṇīkaḥ
alaghuni jaghana sthale parasyāḥ dhvanim adhikam kala mekhalā kalāpaḥ
guru nibiḍa nitamba bimba bhāra ākramaṇa nipīḍitam aṅganā janasya
caraṇa yugam asusruvat padeṣu svara sama saktam alaktaka chalena

original: tava sapadi samīpamānaye tāmahamiti tasya mayāgrato 'bhyadhāyi /
analyzed: tava sapadi samīpam ānaye tām aham iti tasya mayā agratas bhyadhāyi

original: atirabhasākṛtālaghupratijñāmanṛtagiraṃ guṇagauri mā kṛthā mām // MSpv_7.7 //
analyzed: ati rabhasa kṛta a laghu pratijñām anṛta giram guṇa gauri mā kṛthāḥ mām

original: na ca sutanu na vedmi yanmahīyānasunirasastava niścayaḥ pareṇa /
analyzed: na ca su tanu na vedmi yat mahīyāna su nirasaḥ tava niścayaḥ pareṇa

original: vitathayati na jānātu madvaco 'sāviti ca tathāpi sakhīṣu me 'bhimānaḥ // MSpv_7.8 //
analyzed: vitathayati na jānātu mad vacaḥ sau iti ca tathā api sakhīṣu me bhimānaḥ
satatam anabhibhāṣaṇam mayā te pariṇamitam bhavatīm an ānayantayā

original: tvayi taditi virodhaniścitāyāṃ bhavati bhavatvasuhṛjjanaḥ sakāmaḥ // MSpv_7.9 //
analyzed: tvayi tat iti virodha niścitāyām bhavati bhavatu asuhṛd janaḥ sa kāmaḥ
gata dhṛtiḥ avalambitum bata asūn analam an ālapanāt aham bhavatyāḥ

original: praṇayati yadi na prasādabuddhirbhava mama mānini jīvite dayāluḥ // MSpv_7.10 //
analyzed: praṇayati yadi na prasāda buddhiḥ bhava mama mānini jīvite dayāluḥ
priyam iti vanitā nitāntam āgaḥ smaraṇa sa roṣaṣa kaṣāyita akṣī
caraṇa gata sakhī vacaḥ nurodhāt kila katham api anukūlayāñcakāra

original: drutapadamiti mā vayasya yāsirnanu sutanuṃ paripālayānuyāntīm /
analyzed: druta padam iti mā vayasya yāsiḥ nanu su tanum paripālaya anuyāntīm

original: nahi na viditakhedamedatīyastanajaghanodvahane tavāpi cetaḥ // MSpv_7.12 //
analyzed: nahi na vidita kheda medatīya stana jaghana udvahane tava api cetaḥ
iti vadati sakhī jane nurāgāt dayitatamām aparaḥ ciram pratīkṣya

original: tadanugamavaśādanāyatāni nyadhita mimāna ivāvaniṃ padāni // MSpv_7.13 //
analyzed: tad anugama vaśāt anāyatāni nyadhita mimānaḥ iva avanim padāni

original: yadi mayi laghimānamāgatāyāṃ tava dhṛtirasti gatāsmi sampratīyam /
analyzed: yadi mayi laghimānam āgatāyām tava dhṛtiḥ asti gatā asmi samprati iyam

original: drutatarapadapātamāpapāta priyamiti kopapadena kāpi saṃkhyā // MSpv_7.14 //
analyzed: drutatara pada pātam āpapāta priyam iti kopa padena kā api saṃkhyā
avirala pulakaḥ saha vrajantyāḥ pratipadam ekataraḥ stanaḥ taruṇyāḥ

original: ghaṭitavighaṭitaḥ priyasya vakṣastaṭabhuvi kandukavibhramaṃ babhāra // MSpv_7.15 //
analyzed: ghaṭita vighaṭitaḥ priyasya vakṣaḥ taṭa bhuvi kanduka vibhramam babhāra
a śithilam a parāvasajya kaṇṭhe dṛḍha parirabdha bṛhat bahi stanena
hṛṣita tanuruhā bhujena bhartṛḥ mṛdum amṛdu vyatividdham eka bāhum
muhur asu samam ādhnatī nitāntam praṇadita kāñci nitamba maṇḍalena
viṣamita pṛthu hāra yaṣṭi tiryak kucam itaram tat urasthale nipīḍya
gurutara kala nūpura anunādam sa lalita nartita vāma pāda padmā
itarat ati lolam ādadhānā padam atha manmatha mantharam jagāma
ladhu lalita padam tad aṃsapīṭha dvaya nihita ubhaya pāṇi pallavā anyā
sa kaṭhina kuca cūcuka praṇodam priyam abalā sa vilāsam anvināya
jaghana melagha pīvara ūru kṛcchrāt uru nibirīsa nitamba bhāra khedi
dayitatama śirodharā avalambi sva bhuja latā vibhavena kācid ūhe
anuvapuḥ apareṇa bāhumūla prahita bhuja ākalita stanena ninye
nihita daśana vāsasā kapole viṣama vitīrṇa padam balāt iva anyā
anuvanam asita bhruvaḥ sakhībhiḥ saha padavīm aparaḥ purogatāyāḥ
urasi sarasa rāga pada lekhā pratima tayā anuyayau asaṃśayānaḥ
madana rasa mahā ogha pūrṇa nābhī hrada parivāhita romarājayaḥ tāḥ
saritaḥ iva sa vibhrama prayāta praṇadita haṃsaka bhūṣaṇāḥ virejuḥ
śrutipatha madhurāṇi sārasānām anunadi su śruvire rutāni tābhiḥ
vidadhati janatā manaḥ śara vyavyadha paṭu manmatha cāpa nāda śaṅkām
madhumathana vadhūḥ iva āhvayanti bhramara kulāni jaguḥ yat utsukāni
tad abhinayam iva āvaliḥ vanānām atanuta nūtana pallava aṅ ugulībhiḥ
a sakala kalikā ākulīkṛta ali skhalana vikīrṇa vikāsi keśarāṇām

original: marudavaniruhāṃ rajo vadhūbhyaḥ mupaharan vicakāra korakāṇi // MSpv_7.26 //
analyzed: marut avaniruhām rajaḥ vadhūbhyaḥ m upaharan vicakāra korakāṇi
upavana pavana anupāta dakṣaiḥ alibhiḥ alābhi yat aṅganā janasya
parimala viṣayaḥ tad unnatānām anugamane khalu sampadaḥ gratas sthāḥ
ratha caraṇa dhara aṅganā kara abja vyatikara sampad upātta saumanasyāḥ

original: jagati sumanasastadādi nūnaṃ dadhati parisphuṭamarthato 'bhidhānam // MSpv_7.28 //
analyzed: jagati sumanasaḥ tad ādi nūnam dadhati parisphuṭam arthataḥ bhidhānam
abhimukha patitaiḥ guṇa prakarṣāt avajitam uddhatim ujvalām dadhānaiḥ
taru kisalaya jālam agra hastaiḥ prasabham anīyata bhaṅgam aṅganānām
mudita madhu bhujaḥ bhujena śākhāḥ calita viśṛṅkhala śaṅkhakam dhuvatyāḥ

original: taruratiśāyitāparāṅganāyāḥ śirasi mudeva mumoca puṣpavarṣam // MSpv_7.30 //
analyzed: taruḥ atiśāyita apara aṅganāyāḥ śirasi mudā iva mumoca puṣpa varṣam
anavarata rasena rāga bhājā karaja parikṣati labdha saṃstavena

original: sapadi taruṇapallavena vadhvā vigatadayaṃ khalu khaṇḍitena mamle // MSpv_7.31 //
analyzed: sapadi taruṇa pallavena vadhvā vigata dayam khalu khaṇḍitena mamle
priyam abhi kusuma udyatasya bāhoḥ nava nakha maṇḍana cāru mūlam anyā
muhur itara kara āhitena pīna stana taṭa rodhi tirodadhe ṃśukena
vitata vali vibhāvya pāṇḍu lekhā kṛta parabhā agha vilīna romarājiḥ
kṛśam api kṛśa tām punar nayantī vipulatara unmukha locana avalagnam
a namavat udara ucchvasat dukūla sphuṭatara lakṣya gabhīra nābi mūlā
vyavahitam avijānātī kila anta varṇa bhuvi vallabham ābhimukhya bhājam

original: adhiviṭapi salīlamagrapuṣpagrahaṇapadena ciraṃ vilambya kācit // MSpv_7.35 //
analyzed: adhi viṭapi sa līlam agra puṣpa grahaṇa padena ciram vilambya kācid

original: atha kila kathite sakhībhiratra kṣaṇamapareva sasaṃbhramā bhavantī /
analyzed: atha kila kathite sakhībhiḥ atra kṣaṇam aparā iva sa saṃbhramā bhavantī
śithilita kusuma ākula agra pāṇiḥ pratipada saṃyamita aṃśuka āvṛta aṅgī
kṛta bhaya paritoṣa sannipātam sa cakita sa smita vaktra vārija śrīḥ

original: manasijagurutatkṣaṇopadiṣṭaṃ kimapi rāsena rasantaraṃ bhajantī // MSpv_7.37 //
analyzed: manasija guru tad kṣaṇa upadiṣṭam kim api rāsena rasantaram bhajantī
avanada vadana induḥ icchati iva vyavadhim adhīra tayā yat asthitā asmai

original: aharata sutarāmato 'sya cetaḥ sphuṭamabhibhūṣayati striyastrapaiva // MSpv_7.38 //
analyzed: aharata sutarām atas sya cetaḥ sphuṭam abhibhūṣayati striyaḥ trapā eva
kisalaya śakaleṣu a vācanīyāḥ pulakini kevalam aṅgake nidheyāḥ
nakha pada lipayaḥ pi dīpita arthāḥ praṇidadhire dayitaiḥ anaṅga lekhāḥ
kṛta kṛta karuṣā sakhīm apāsya tvam akuśalā iti kayācid ātmanā eva
abhimatam abhi sa abhilāṣam āviṣkṛta bhuja mūlam abandhi mūrdhni mālā

original: abhimukhamupayāti mā sma kiñcittvamabhidadhāḥ paṭale madhuvratānām /
analyzed: abhimukham upayāti mā sma kiñcid tvam abhidadhāḥ paṭale madhu vratānām
madhu surabhi mukha abja gandha labdheḥ adhikam adhi tvat anena mā nipāti
sa rajasa makaranda nirbharāsu prasava vibhūtiṣu bhūruhām viraktaḥ
dhruvam amṛtapa nāma vāñchayā asau adharam amum madhupaḥ tava ājihīte
iti vadati sakhī jane nimīlat viguṇita sāndratara akṣi pakṣma mālā

original: apadatalibhayena bharturaṅgaṃ bhavati hi viklavatā guṇo 'ṅganānām // MSpv_7.43 //
analyzed: a pada tali bhayena bhartuḥ aṅgam bhavati hi viklava tā guṇaḥ ṅganānām
mukha kamalakam unnamayya yūnā yat abhinava ūḍha vadhūḥ balāt acumbi

original: tadapi na kila bālapallavāgragrahayāparayā vivide vidagdhasakyā // MSpv_7.44 //
analyzed: tat api na kila bāla pallava agra grahayā aparayā vivide vidagdha sakyā
vratati vitatibhiḥ tirohitāyām pratiyuvatau vadanam priyaḥ priyāyāḥ
yat adhayat adhara avala upanṛtyat kara valaya svanitena tat vivavre
vilasitam anukurvatī purastāt haraṇiruha adhiruhaḥ vadhūḥ latāyāḥ
ramaṇam ṛju tayā puras sakhīnām a kalita cāpala doṣam āliliṅga
sa lalikam avalambya pāṇinā aṃse sahacaram ucchrata guccha vāñchayā anyā
sakala kalabha kumbha vibhramābhyām urasi rasāt avatastare stanābhyām
mṛdu caraṇa tala agra duḥsthita tvāt asahatarā kuca kumbhayoḥ bharasya
upari niravalambanam priyasya nyapatat atha uccatara uccicīṣayā anyā
uparijata rujāni kuśala tayā parirambha lolupaḥ nyaḥ

original: prathitapṛthupayodharāṃ gṛhāṇa svayamiti mugdhavadhūmudāsa dorbhyām // MSpv_7.49 //
analyzed: prathita pṛthu payodharām gṛhāṇa svayam iti mugdha vadhūm udāsa dorbhyām
idam idam iti bhūruhām prasūnaiḥ muhur atilobhayatā puraḥpuraḥ nyā

original: anurahasamanāyi nāyakena tvarayati rantumaho janaṃ manobhūḥ // MSpv_7.50 //
analyzed: anurahasam anāyi nāyakena tvarayati rantum aho janam manobhūḥ

original: vijanamiti balādamuṃ gṛhītvā kṣaṇamatha vīkṣya vipakṣamantiko 'nyā /
analyzed: vijanam iti balāt amum gṛhītvā kṣaṇam atha vīkṣya vipakṣam antikaḥ nyā
abhipatitu manāḥ laghu tva bhīteḥ abhavat amuñacati vallabhe

original: adhirajani jagāma dhāma tasyāḥ priyatamayeti ruṣā srajāvanaddhaḥ /
analyzed: adhirajani jagāma dhāma tasyāḥ priyatamayā iti ruṣā srajā avanaddhaḥ

original: padamapi calituṃ yuvā na sehe kimiva na śaktiharaṃ sasādhvasānāṃ // MSpv_7.52 //
analyzed: padam api calitum yuvā na sehe kim iva na śakti haram sa sādhvasānām

original: na khalu vayamamuṣya dānayogyāḥ pibati ca pāti ca yāsakau rahastvāṃ /
analyzed: na khalu vayam amuṣya dāna yogyāḥ pibati ca pāti ca yāsakau rahaḥ tvām

original: vraja vicapamamuṃ dadasva tasyai bhavatu yataḥ sadṛśościrāya yogaḥ // MSpv_7.53 //
analyzed: vraja vicapam amum dadasva tasyai bhavatu yatas sadṛśoḥ cirāya yogaḥ
tava kitava kim āhitaiḥ vṛthā naḥ kṣitiruha pallava puṣpa karṇapūraiḥ
nanu jana viditaiḥ bhavat vyalīkaiḥ cira paripūritam eva karṇa yugmam
muhur upahasitām iva ali nādaiḥ vitarasi naḥ kālikām kimartham enām

original: vasatimupagatena dhāmni tasyāḥ śaṭha kalireṣa mahāṃstvayādya dattaḥ // MSpv_7.55 //
analyzed: vasatim upagatena dhāmni tasyāḥ śaṭha kaliḥ eṣa mahān tvayā adya dattaḥ
iti gaditavatī ruṣā jaghāna sphurita manorama pakṣma keśareṇa

original: śravaṇaniyamitena kāntamanyā samamasitāmburuheṇa cakṣuṣā ca // MSpv_7.56 //
analyzed: śravaṇa niyamitena kānta manyā samam asita amburuheṇa cakṣuṣā ca

original: vinayati sudṛśo dṛśaḥ parāgaṃ praṇayini kausumamānanānilena /
analyzed: vinayati sudṛśaḥ dṛśaḥ parāgam praṇayini kausumam ānana anilena
tad ahita yuvateḥ abhīkṣṇam akṣṇoḥ dvayam api roṣa rajhobhiḥ āpupūre
sphucam idam abhicāra mantre eva pratiyuvateḥ abhidhānam aṅganānām
vara tanuḥ amunā upahūya patyā mṛdu kusumena yadā āhata api amūrcchat
sa madanam avataṃsite dkarṇam praṇayavatā kusume sumadhyamāyāḥ

original: vrajadapi laghutāṃ babhūva bhāraḥ sapadi hiraṇmayamaṇḍanaṃ sapatnyāḥ // MSpv_7.59 //
analyzed: vrajat api laghu tām babhūva bhāraḥ sapadi hiraṇmaya maṇḍanam sapatnyāḥ
avajitam adhunā tava aham akṣṇaḥ rucitayā iti avanamya lajjayā iva
śravaṇa kuvalayam vilāsavatyāḥ bhramara rutaiḥ upakarṇam ācacakṣe
avacita kusumāḥ vihāya vallīḥ yuvatīṣu komala mālya mālinīṣu

original: padamupadadhire kulānyalīnāṃ na paricayo malinātmanāṃ pradhānam // MSpv_7.61 //
analyzed: padam upadadhire kulāni alīnām na paricayaḥ malina ātmanām pradhānam
ślatha śirasija pāta bhārāt iva nitarām natimadbhiḥ aṃsa bhāgaiḥ
mukulita nayanaiḥ mukha aravindaiḥ ghana mahatām iva pakṣmaṇām bhareṇa
adikam aruṇimānam udvahadbhiḥ vikasat aśīta marīci raśami jālaiḥ
paricita paricumbana abhiyogāt apagata kuṅkuma reṇubhiḥ kapolaiḥ
avasita lalita kriyeṇa bāhvoḥ lalitatareṇa tanīyasā yugena
sa rasa kisalaya anurañjitaiḥ vā kara kamalaiḥ punar ukta bhābhiḥ
smara sarasam uraḥsthalena patyuḥ vinimaya saṃkramita aṅgarāga rāgaiḥ
bhṛśam atiśaya kheda sampadā iva stana yugalaiḥ itaretaram niṣaṇṇaiḥ
a tanu kuca bhara ānatena bhūyas śrama janita ānatinā śarīrakeṇa
anucita gati sāda niḥsaha tvam kalabha kara ūrubhiḥ ūrubhiḥ dadhānaiḥ
apagata nava yāvakaiḥ cirāya kṣiti gamanena punar vitīrṇa rāgaiḥ
katham api caraṇa utpalaiḥ caladbhiḥ bhṛśa aviniveśāt parasparasya
muhur iti vana vibhrama abhiṣaṅgāt atami tadā nitarām nitambinībhiḥ

original: mṛdutaratanavo 'nalasāḥ prakṛtyā ciramapi tāḥ kimuta prayāsabhājaḥ // MSpv_7.68 //
analyzed: mṛdutara tanavaḥ nalasāḥ prakṛtyā ciram api tāḥ kim uta prayāsa bhājaḥ
pratamam alaghu mauktaka ābham āsīt śramajalam ujjvala gaṇḍa maṇḍaleṣu

original: kaṭhinakucataṭāgrapāti paścādatha śatasarkaratāṃ jagāma tāsām // MSpv_7.69 //
analyzed: kaṭhina kuca taṭa agra pāti paścāt atha śata sarkara tām jagāma tāsām
vipulakam api yauvana uddhatānām ghana pulaka udaya komalam cakāśe

original: parimalitamapi priyaiḥ prakāmaṃ kucayugamujjvalameṣa kāminīnām // MSpv_7.70 //
analyzed: parimalitam api priyaiḥ prakāmam kuca yugam ujjvalam eṣa kāminīnām
avirata kusuma avacāya khedāt nihita bhuja alatayā ekayā upakaṇṭham
vipulatara nirantara ālagna stana pihita priya vakṣasā lalambe
abhimatam abhitas kṛta aṅga bhaṅgā kuca yugam unnati vittam unnamayya
tanuḥ abhilaṣitam klama chalena vyavṛṇuta vellita bāhu vallarīkā
himalata sadṛśaḥ śrama uda bindūn upanayatā kila nūtana ūḍha vadhvāḥ
kuca kalaśa kiśorakau kathañcid tarala tayā taruṇena paspṛśāte
gatvā udrekam jaghana puline ruddha madhya pradeśaḥ kraman ūru druma bhuja latāḥ pūrṇa nābhī hrada antāḥ

original: ullaṅghyoccaiḥ kucataṭabhuvaṃ plāvayan rokūpān svedapūro yuvatisaritāṃ vyāpa gaṇḍasthalāni // MSpv_7.74 //
analyzed: ullaṅghya uccais kuca taṭa bhuvam plāvayan sveda pūraḥ yuvati saritām vyāpa gaṇḍa sthalāni
priya kara parimārgat aṅganānām yadā abhūt punar adhikatarā eva sveda toya udaya śrīḥ
atha vapuḥ abhiṣektum tāḥ tadā ambhobhiḥ īṣuḥ vana viharaṇa kheda mlānam amlāna śobhāḥ
āyāsāt alaghutara stanaiḥ svanadbhiḥ śrāntānām avikaca locana aravindaiḥ

original: abhyambhaḥ kathamapi yoṣitāṃ samūhaistairurvīnihitacalatpadaṃ pracele // MSpv_8.1 //
analyzed: abhyambhaḥ katham api yoṣitām samūhaiḥ taiḥ urvī nihita calat padam pracele
yāntīnām samam asita bhruvām nata tvāt aṃsānām mahati nitāntam antare pi

original: saṃsaktaivipulatayā mitho nitambaiḥ sambādhaṃ bṛhadapi tadbabhūva vartma // MSpv_8.2 //
analyzed: saṃsaktaiḥ a vipula tayā mithas nitambaiḥ sambādham bṛhat api tat babhūva vartma

original: nīrandhradruśiśirāṃ bhuvaṃ vrajantīḥ sāśaṅkaṃ muhuriva kautukātkaraistāḥ /
analyzed: nīrandhra dru śiśirām bhuvam vrajantīḥ sa āśaṅkam muhur iva kautukāt karaiḥ tāḥ
pasparśa kṣaṇam anila ākulīkṛtānām śākhānām atuhina raśmiḥ antarālaiḥ
ekasyāḥ tapana karaiḥ karālitayā bibhrāṇaḥ sapadi sita uṣṇa āvaraṇa tvam
sevāyai vadana saroja nirjita śrī rāgasya priyam iva candramāḥ cakāra
svam rāgāt upari vitanvatā uttarīyam kāntena prativārita ātapāyāḥ
sa chatrāt apara vilāsinī samūha chāyā āsīt adhikatarā tadā aparasyāḥ
saṃsparśa sukha upacīyamāne sarva aṅge kara tala lagna vallabhāyāḥ

original: kauśeyaṃ vrajadapi gāḍhatāmajasraṃ sasraṃse vigalitanīvi nīrajākṣyāḥ // MSpv_8.6 //
analyzed: kauśeyam vrajat api gāḍha tām ajasram sasraṃse vigalita nīvi nīraja akṣyāḥ
gacchantīḥ alasam avekṣya vismayinyaḥ tāḥ tanvīḥ na vidadhire gatāni haṃsyaḥ

original: buddhvā vā jitamapareṇa kāmamāṣkurvīta svaguṇamapatrapaḥ ka eva // MSpv_8.7 //
analyzed: buddhvā vā jitam apareṇa kāmamāṣkurvīta sva guṇam apatrapaḥ kaḥ eva
śrīmadbhiḥ jita pulināni mādhavīnām ārohaiḥ nibiḍa bṛhat nitamba bimbaiḥ
pāṣāṇa skhalana vilolam āśu nūnam vailakṣyāt yayuḥ avarodhanāni sindhoḥ
muktābhiḥ salila raya asta śukti muktābhiḥ kṛta ruci saikatam nadīnām

original: strīlokaḥ parikalayāñcakāra tulyaṃ palyaṅkairvigalitahāracārubhiḥ svaiḥ // MSpv_8.9 //
analyzed: strī lokaḥ parikalayāñcakāra tulyam palyaṅkaiḥ vigalita hāra cārubhiḥ svaiḥ
ādhrāya śrama jam anindya bandhum niśvāsa śvasanam asaktam aṅganānām

original: āraṇyāḥ sumanasa īṣire na bhṛṅgairaucityaṃ gaṇayati ko viśeṣakāmaḥ // MSpv_8.10 //
analyzed: āraṇyāḥ sumanasaḥ īṣire na bhṛṅgaiḥ aucityam gaṇayati kaḥ viśeṣa kāmaḥ
āyāntyām nija yuvatau vanāt sa śaṅkam barhāṇām apara śikhaṇḍinīm bhareṇa

original: ālokya vyavadadhataṃ puro mayūraṃ kāminyaḥ śradadhuranārjavaṃ nareṣu // MSpv_8.11 //
analyzed: ālokya vyavadadhatam puras mayūram kāminyaḥ śradadhuḥ anārjavam nareṣu
ālāpaiḥ tulita ravāṇi mādhavīnām mādhuryāt amala patatriṇām kulāni

original: antardhāmupayayurutpalāvalīṣu prāduṣkātka iva jitaḥ puraḥ pareṇa // MSpv_8.12 //
analyzed: antardhām upayayuḥ utpala āvalīṣu prāduṣkāt kaḥ iva jitaḥ puras pareṇa

original: mugdhāyāḥ smaralaliteṣu cakravākyā niśaṅkaṃ dayitatamena cumbitāyāḥ /
analyzed: mugdhāyāḥ smara laliteṣu cakravākyāḥ niśaṅkam dayitatamena cumbitāyāḥ

original: praṇeśānabhi vidadhurvadhūtahastāḥ sītkāraṃ samucitamuttaraṃ taruṇyaḥ // MSpv_8.13 //
analyzed: praṇeśān abhi vidadhuḥ vadhūta hastāḥ sītkāram samucitam uttaram taruṇyaḥ
utkṣipta sphuṭita saroruha arghyam uccais sa sneham vihaga rutaiḥ iva ālapantaḥ

original: nārīṇāmatha sarasī saphenahāsā prītyeva vyatanuta pādyamūrmihastaiḥ // MSpv_8.14 //
analyzed: nārīṇām atha sarasī sa phena hāsā prītyā iva vyatanuta pādyam ūrmi hastaiḥ
nityāyāḥ nija vasateḥ nirāsire yad rāgeṇa śriyam aravindataḥ kara agraiḥ

original: vyaktatvaṃ niyatamanena ninyurasyāḥ sāpatnyaṃ kṣitisutavidviṣo mahiṣyaḥ // MSpv_8.15 //
analyzed: vyakta tvam niyatam anena ninyuḥ asyāḥ sāpatnyam kṣiti suta vidviṣaḥ mahiṣyaḥ

original: āskandan kathamapi yoṣito na yāvadbhīmatyaḥ priyakaradhāryamāṇahastāḥ /
analyzed: āskandan katham api yoṣitaḥ na yāvat bhīmatyaḥ priya kara dhāryamāṇa hastāḥ
autsukyāt tvaritam amūḥ tat ambu tāvat saṃkrānta pratima tayā dadhau iva antar

original: tāḥ pūrvaṃ sacakitamāgamayya gādhaṃ kṛtvātho mṛdu padamantarāviśantyaḥ /
analyzed: tāḥ pūrvam sa cakitam āgamayya gādham kṛtvā atho mṛdu padam antar āviśantyaḥ

original: kāminyo mana iva kāminaḥ sarāgairaṅgaistajjalamanurañjayāṃbabhū // MSpv_8.18 //
analyzed: kāminyaḥ manaḥ iva kāminaḥ sa rāgaiḥ aṅgaiḥ tat jalam anurañjayāṃbabhū
saṃkṣobham payasi muhur mahā ibha kumbha śrī bhājā kuca yugalena nīyamāne

original: viśleṣaṃ yugamagamadrathāṅganāmnorudvṛttaḥ ka iva sukhāvahaḥ pareṣāṃ // MSpv_8.17 //
analyzed: viśleṣam yugam agamat rathāṅga nāmnoḥ udvṛttaḥ kaḥ iva sukha āvahaḥ pareṣām

original: āsīnā taṭabhuvi sasmitena bhartrā rambhoruvatirutaṃ sarasyanicchuḥ /
analyzed: āsīnā taṭa bhuvi sa smitena bhartrā rambhā ūruvati rutam sarasya nicchuḥ

original: dhunvānā karayugamīkṣituṃ vilāsāñśītāluḥ salilagatena sicyate sma // MSpv_8.19 //
analyzed: dhunvānā kara yugam īkṣitum vilāsān śītāluḥ salila gatena sicyate sma

original: necchantī samamunā saro 'vagāḍhuṃ rodhastaḥ pratijalamīritā sakhībhiḥ /
analyzed: na icchantī sam amunā saraḥ vagāḍhum rodhastaḥ prati jalam īritā sakhībhiḥ

original: āślakṣadbhayacakitekṣaṇaṃ navoḍhā voḍhāraṃ vipadi na dūṣitātibhūmiḥ // MSpv_8.20 //
analyzed: āślakṣat bhaya cakita īkṣaṇam na voḍhā voḍhāram vipadi na dūṣita ati bhūmiḥ

original: tiṣṭhantaṃ payasi pumāṃsamaṃsamātre taddaghnaṃ tadavayatī kilātmano 'pi /
analyzed: tiṣṭhantam payasi pumāṃsam aṃsa mātre tad daghnam tat avayatī kila ātmanaḥ

original: abhyetuṃ sutanurabhīriyeṣa maugdhyādāśleṣi drutamamunā nimajjatīti // MSpv_8.21 //
analyzed: abhyetum su tanuḥ abhīḥ iyeṣa maugdhyāt āśleṣi drutam amunā nimajjati iti
ānābheḥ sarasi nata bhruvā avagāḍhe cāpalyāt atha payasaḥ taraṅga hastaiḥ
ucchrāyi stana yuga madhya rohi labdha sparśānām bhavati
kāntānām kuvalayam api apāstam akṣṇoḥ śobhābhiḥ na mukha rucā aham ekam eva

original: saṃharṣādalivirutairitīva gāyallolormau payasi mahotpalaṃ nanarta // MSpv_8.23 //
analyzed: saṃharṣāt ali virutaiḥ iti iva gāyat lola ūrmau payasi mahā utpalam nanarta
trasyantī cala śapharī vighaṭṭita ūrū vāma ūrūḥ atiśayam āpa vibhramasya

original: kṣubhyanti pasabhamaho vināpi hetorlīlābhiḥ kimu sati kāraṇe ramaṇyaḥ // MSpv_8.24 //
analyzed: kṣubhyanti pasabham aho vinā api hetoḥ līlābhiḥ kimu sati kāraṇe ramaṇyaḥ
ākṛṣṭa vapuḥ lataiḥ tarat abhiḥ tasya ambhaḥ tat atha saraḥ mahā arṇavasya
akṣobhi
gāmbhīryam dadhat api rantum aṅganābhiḥ saṃkṣobham jadhana vighaṭṭanena nītaḥ
ambhodhi vikasita vārija ānanaḥ sau maryādām sapadi vilaṅghayāṃbabhūva
ādātum dayitam iva avagāḍham ārāt ūrmīṇām tatibhiḥ abhiprasāryamāṇaḥ

original: kasyāścidvitatacalacchikhāṅgulīko lakṣmīvān sarasi rarāja keśahastaḥ // MSpv_8.27 //
analyzed: kasyāścid vitata calat śikhā aṅgulīkaḥ lakṣmīvān sarasi rarāja keśa hastaḥ

original: unnidrapriyakamanoramaṃ ramaṇyāḥ saṃreje sarasi vapuḥ prakāśameva /
analyzed: unnidra priyaka manoramam ramaṇyāḥ saṃreje sarasi vapuḥ prakāśam eva

original: yuktānāṃ vimalatayā tiraskriyāyai nākrāmannapi hi bhavatyalaṃ jalaughaḥ // MSpv_8.28 //
analyzed: yuktānām vimala tayā tiraskriyāyai na ākrāman api hi bhavati alam jala oghaḥ
kim tāvat sarasi sarojam etat āhosvit mukham avabhāsate yuvatyāḥ

original: saṃśayya kṣaṇamiti niścikāya kaścidvivyokairbakasahavāsināṃ parokṣaiḥ // MSpv_8.29 //
analyzed: saṃśayya kṣaṇam iti niścikāya kaścid vivyokaiḥ baka sahavāsinām parokṣaiḥ
śṛṅgāṇi druta kanaka ujvalāni gandhāḥ kausumbham pṛthu kuca kumbha saṅgi vāsaḥ
mārdvīkam prayatam asannidhānam māsa nārīṇām iti jala keli sādhanāni
uttuṅgāt anila cala aṃśukāḥ taṭa antāt cetobhiḥ saha priyāṇām
śreṇibhiḥ gurubhiḥ atūrṇam utpatantayaḥ toyeṣu drutataram aṅganāḥ nipetuḥ
mugdha tvāt avidita kaitava prayogāḥ gacchantyaḥ sapadi parājayam taruṇyaḥ
tā kāntaiḥ saha kara puṣkara īrita ambu vyāti ukṣīm abhisaraṇa glahām adīvyan
yogyasya trinayana locana arciḥ nidagdha smarapūtanā adhirājya lakṣmyāḥ
kāntāyāḥ kara kalaśa udyataiḥ payobhiḥ avaktra indoḥ akṛta mahā abhiṣekam ekaḥ
śiñcantyāḥ katham api bāhum unnamayya preyāṃsam manasija duḥkha durlāyāḥ
sauvarṇam valayam avāgalat kara agrāt lavaṇya śriyaḥ iva śeṣam aṅganāyāḥ

original: snihyantī dṛśamaparā nidhāya pūrṇaṃ mūrtena praṇayarasena vāriṇeva /
analyzed: snihyantī dṛśam aparā nidhāya pūrṇam mūrtena praṇaya rasena vāriṇā iva
kandarpa pravaṇa mānāḥ sakhī sisikṣā lakṣyeṇa pratiyuvam añjalim cakāra

original: ānandaṃ dadhati mukhe karodakena śyāmāyā dayitatamena sicyamāne /
analyzed: ānandam dadhati mukhe kara udakena śyāmāyāḥ dayitatamena sicyamāne
īrṣyantyāḥ vadanam asiktam api analpa sveda ambu snapitam ajāyata itarasyāḥ
udvīkṣya priya kara kuḍmala apaviddhaiḥ vakṣoja dvayam abhiṣiktam anya nāryāḥ
ambhobhiḥ muhur asicat vadhūḥ amarṣat ātmīyam pṛthutara netra yugam amuktaiḥ
kurvadbhiḥ mukha rucim ujjavalām ajasram yaiḥ toyaiḥ asicata vallabhām vilāsī
taiḥ eva pratiyuvateḥ akāri dūrāt kāluṣyam śaśadhara dīdhiti chaṭā acchaiḥ
rāga andhīkṛta nayanena nāmadheya vyatyāsāt abhimukham īritaḥ priyeṇa

original: māninyā vapuṣi patannisargamando bhindāno hṛdayamasāhi nodavajraḥ // MSpv_8.39 //
analyzed: māninyāḥ vapuṣi patat nisarga mandaḥ bhindānaḥ hṛdayam asāhi noda vajraḥ

original: premṇoraḥ praṇayini siñcati priyāyāḥ saṃtāpaṃ navajalavipruṣo gṛhītvā /
analyzed: premṇā uraḥ praṇayini siñcati priyāyāḥ saṃtāpam nava jala vipruṣaḥ gṛhītvā
uddhūtāḥ kaṭhina kuca sthala abhighātāt āsannām bhṛśam apara aṅganām adhākṣuḥ
saṃkrāntam priyatama vakṣasaḥ ṅgarāgam sādhu asyāḥ sarasi hariṣyate dhuna ambhaḥ

original: tuṣṭvaivaṃ sapadi hṛte 'pi tatra tepe kasyaścitsphuṭanakhalakṣmaṇaḥ sapatnyā // MSpv_8.41 //
analyzed: tuṣṭvā evam sapadi hṛte pi tatra tepe kasyaścid sphuṭa nakha lakṣmaṇaḥ sapatnyā
hṛtāyāḥ prati sakhi kāminā anya nāmnā hrīmatyāḥ sarasi galat mukha indu kānteḥ

original: antadhiṃ drutamiva kartumaśruvarṣairbhūmānaṃ gamayitumīṣire payāṃsi // MSpv_8.42 //
analyzed: antadhim drutam iva kartum aśru varṣaiḥ bhūmānam gamayitum īṣire payāṃsi
siktāyāḥ kṣaṇam abhiṣicya pūrvam anyām anyasyāḥ praṇayavatā bata abalāyaḥ

original: kālimnā samadhita man.reva vaktraṃ prāpākṣṇorgaladapaśabdamañjanāmbhaḥ // MSpv_8.43 //
analyzed: kālimnā samadhita manrā iva vaktram prāpa akṣṇoḥ galat apaśabdam añjana ambhaḥ
udvoḍhum kanaka vibhūṣaṇāni aśaktaḥ sadhrīcā valayita padma nāla sūtraḥ
ārūḍha prativanitā kaṭākṣa bhāraḥ sādhīyaḥ gurar abhavat bhujaḥ taruṇyāḥ
ābaddha pracura para arghya kiṅkiṇīkaḥ rāmāṇām anavarata uda gāha bhājām

original: nārāvaṃ vyatanuta mekhalākalāpaḥ kasminvā sajalaguṇe girāṃ paṭutvam // MSpv_8.45 //
analyzed: na arāvam vyatanuta mekhalā kalāpaḥ kasmin vā sa jala guṇe girām paṭu tvam
paryacche sarasi hṛta iṃśuke payobhiḥ lola akṣe surata gurau apatrapiṣṇoḥ

original: suśreṇyā dalavasanena vīcihastanyastena drutamakṛtābjini sakhātvam // MSpv_8.46 //
analyzed: suśreṇyāḥ dala vasanena vīci hasta nyastena drutam akṛta abjini sakhā tvam
nārībhiḥ guru jaghana sthalānām āsya śrī vijita vikāsi vārijānām

original: lolatvādapaharatāṃ tadaṅgarāgasaṃjajñe sa kaluṣa āśayo jalānām // MSpv_8.47 //
analyzed: lola tvāt apaharatām tad aṅgarāga saṃjajñe sa kaluṣaḥ āśayaḥ jalānām
saugandham dadhat api kāmam aṅganānām dūra tvāt gatam ānana upamānam

original: nedīyo jitamiti lajjayeva tāsāmālole payasi manotpalaṃ mamajja // MSpv_8.48 //
analyzed: nedīyaḥ jitam iti lajjayā iva tāsām ālole payasi manaḥ utpalam mamajja
prabhraṣṭaiḥ sarabhasam ambhasaḥ vagāha krīḍābhiḥ vidalita yūthikā piśaṅgaiḥ
ākalpaiḥ sarasi hiraṇmayaiḥ vadhūnām aurva agni dyuti śakalaiḥ iva vyarāji

original: āsmākī yuvatidṛśāmasau tanoti cchāyeva śriyamanapāyinīṃ kimebhiḥ /
analyzed: āsmākī yuvati dṛśām asau tanoti chāyā iva śriyam anapāyinīm kim ebhiḥ
matvā evam sva guṇa pidhāna sa abhyasūyaiḥ vidadhāvire ñjanāni
nirdhaute sati haricandane jala oghaiḥ āpāṇḍoḥ gata parabhāgayā aṅganāyāḥ

original: ahnāya stanakalaśadvayādupeye vicchedaḥ sahṛdayayeva hārayaṣṭyā // MSpv_8.51 //
analyzed: stana kalaśa dvayāt upeye vicchedaḥ sahṛdayayā iva hāra yaṣṭyā
anyūnam guṇam amṛtasya dhārayantī samphulla sphurita saroruha avataṃsā

original: preyobhiḥ saha sarasī niṣevyamāṇā raktatvaṃ vyadhita vadhūdṛśāṃ surā ca // MSpv_8.52 //
analyzed: preyobhiḥ saha sarasī niṣevyamāṇā rakta tvam vyadhita vadhū dṛśām surā ca
snāntīnām bṛhat amala uda bindu citraiḥ rejāte rucira dṛśām uroja kumbhau
hārāṇām maṇibhiḥ upāśritau samantāt utsūtraiḥ guṇavat upaghna kāmyayā iva

original: ārūḍhaḥ patita iti svasambhavo 'pi svacchānāṃ pariharaṇīyatāmupaiti /
analyzed: ārūḍhaḥ patitaḥ iti sva sambhavaḥ svacchānām pariharaṇīya tām upaiti
karṇebhyaḥ cyutam asita ulpalam vadhūnām vīcibhiḥ taṭam anu yat nirāsuḥ āpaḥ
dantānām adharam a yāvakam padāni pratyagrāḥ tanum avilepanām nakha aṅgāḥ

original: āninyuḥ śriyamadhitoyamaṅganānāṃ śobhāyai vipadi sadāśritā bhavanti // MSpv_8.55 //
analyzed: āninyuḥ śriyam adhitoyam aṅganānām śobhāyai vipadi sat āśritāḥ bhavanti
kasyāḥ cina mukham anu dhauta patra lekham vyātene salila bhara avalambinībhiḥ
kiñcalka vyatikara piñcara antarābhiḥ citra śrī ralam alaka agra vallarībhiḥ
vakṣebhyaḥ ghanam anulepanam yadūnām uttaṃsān āharata vāri mūrdhajebhyaḥ

original: netrāṇāṃ madarucirakṣataiva tasthau cakṣuṣyaḥ khalu mahatāṃ parairalaṅghyaḥ // MSpv_8.57 //
analyzed: netrāṇām mada ruci rakṣa tā eva tasthau cakṣuṣyaḥ khalu mahatām paraiḥ a laṅghyaḥ

original: yo bāhyaḥ sa khalu jalairnirāsi rāgo yaścitte sa tu tadavastha eva teṣām /
analyzed: yaḥ bāhyaḥ sa khalu jalaiḥ nirāsi rāgaḥ yaḥ citte sa tu tad avasthaḥ eva teṣām

original: dhīrāṇāṃ vrajati hi sarva eva nāntaḥpātitvādabhibhavanīyatāṃ parasya // MSpv_8.58 //
analyzed: dhīrāṇām vrajati hi sarvaḥ eva na antaḥpāti tvāt abhibhavanīya tām parasya
phenānām urasiruheṣu hāra līlā cela śrīḥ jaghana sthaleṣu śaivalānām

original: gaṇḍeṣu sphuṭaracanābjapatrtravallī paryāptaṃ payasi vibhūṣaṇaṃ vadhūnām // MSpv_8.59 //
analyzed: gaṇḍeṣu sphuṭa racanā abja patrtra vallī paryāptam payasi vibhūṣaṇam vadhūnām
bhraśdbhiḥ jalam abhi bhūṣaṇaiḥ vadhūnām aṅgebhyaḥ gurubhiḥ amajji lajjayā iva

original: nirmālyairatha nanṛte 'vadhīritānāmapyuccairbhavati laghīyasāṃ hi dhārṣṭyam // MSpv_8.60 //
analyzed: nirmālyaiḥ atha nanṛte vadhīritānām api uccais bhavati laghīyasām hi dhārṣṭyam
āmṛṣṭaḥ tilaka rucaḥ srajaḥ nirastāḥ nīraktam vasanam apākṛta uṅga rāgaḥ

original: kāmaḥ strīranuśāyavāniva svapakṣavyāghātāditi sutarāṃ cakāra cārūḥ // MSpv_8.61 //
analyzed: kāmaḥ strīḥ anuśāyavān iva sva pakṣa vyāghātāt iti sutarām cakāra cārūḥ
śīta ārtim balavat upeyuṣatā iva nīraiḥ āsekāt śiśira samīra kampitena
rāmāṇām abhinava yauvana ūṣma bhājoḥ āśleṣi stana taṭayoḥ nava aṃśukena
ścyotadbhiḥ samadhikam āttam aṅgasaṅgāt lāvaṇya ntanumat iva ambu vāsasaḥ
uttere tarala taraṅga līlā niṣṇātaiḥ atha sarasaḥ priyā samūhaiḥ
divyānām api kṛta vismayām purastāt ambhastaḥ sphurat aravinda cāru hastām
udvīkṣya śriyam iva kāñcid uttarantīm asmārṣīt jalanidhi manmathanasya śauriḥ
ślakṣṇam yat parihitam etayoḥ kila antardhāna artham tat uka seka saktam ūrvoḥ
nārīṇām vimala tarau samullasantyā bhāsantaḥ dadhatuḥ urū dukūlam eva

original: vāsāṃsi nyavasata yāni yoṣitastāḥ śubhrābhradyutibhirahāsi tairmudeva /
analyzed: vāsāṃsi nyavasata yāni yoṣitaḥ tāḥ śubhra abhra dyutibhiḥ ahāsi taiḥ mudā iva

original: atyākṣuḥ snapanagalajjalāni yāni sthūlāśrusrutibhirarodiḥ taiḥ śuceva // MSpv_8.66 //
analyzed: snapana galat jalāni yāni sthūla aśru srutibhiḥ arodiḥ taiḥ śucā iva
ārdra tvad atiśāyinīm upeyivadbhiḥ saṃsaktim bhṛśam api bhūriśas vadhūtaiḥ

original: aṅgebhyaḥ kathamapi vāmalocanāṃ viśleṣo bata navaraktakaiḥ prapede // MSpv_8.67 //
analyzed: aṅgebhyaḥ katham api vāma locanām viśleṣaḥ bata nava raktakaiḥ prapede

original: pratyaṃsaṃ vilulitamūrdhajā cirāya snānārdraṃ vapurudavāpayat kilaikā /
analyzed: pratyaṃsam vilulita mūrdhajā cirāya snāna ārdram vapuḥ udavāpayat kila ekā
na ajānāt abhimatam antike sveda ambu dravam abhavattarām punar tat
sīmantam nijam anubadhnatī karābhyām ālakṣya stana taṭa bāhumūla bhāgā

original: bhartrānyā muhurabhilaṣyatā nidadhye naivāho viramati kautukaṃ priyebhyaḥ // MSpv_8.69 //
analyzed: bhartrā anyā muhur abhilaṣyatā nidadhye na eva aho viramati kautukam priyebhyaḥ
su accha ambhaḥsnapana vidhautam aṅga moṣṭhaḥ tāmbūla dyuti viśadaḥ vlāsinīnām

original: vāsaśca pratanu viviktamastvitīyānākalpo yadi kusumeṣuṇā na śūnyaḥ // MSpv_8.70 //
analyzed: vāsaḥ ca pratanu viviktam astu iti yadi kusumeṣuṇā na śūnyaḥ
iti dhauta purandhri matsarān sarasi majjanena śriyam āptavataḥ tiśāyinīm apamala aṅga bhāsaḥ

original: avalokya tadaiva yādavānaparavārirāśeḥ śisiretararociṣāpyapāṃ tatiṣu maṅktumīṣe // MSpv_8.71 //
analyzed: avalokya tadā eva yādavān apara vārirāśeḥ śisiretara rociṣā api apām tatiṣu maṅktum īṣe
abhitāpa saṃpadam atha uṣṇa ruciḥ nija tesām a sahamānaḥ iva
payasi prapitsuḥ apara ambunidheḥ adhiroḍhum asta girim abhyapatat

original: gatayā puraḥ pratigavākṣamukhaṃ dadhatī ratena bhṛśamutsukatāṃ /
analyzed: gatayā puras pratigavākṣa mukham dadhatī ratena bhṛśam utsuka tām
muhur antar arāla bhuvam asta gireḥ savituḥ ca yoṣit amimīta dṛśā
paritas vipāṇḍu dadhat abhra śiraḥ

original: abhavadgataḥ pariṇatiṃ śithilaḥ paramandasūryanayano divasaḥ // MSpv_9.3 //
analyzed: abhavat gataḥ pariṇatim śithilaḥ para manda sūrya nayanaḥ divasaḥ
aparāhna śītalatareṇa śanais anilena lolita latā aṅgulaye

original: nilayāya śākhina ivāhrayate dudurākulāḥ khagakulāni giraḥ // MSpv_9.4 //
analyzed: nilayāya śākhinaḥ iva āhrayate duduḥ ākulāḥ khaga kulāni giraḥ
upasaṃdhyam āsta tanu sānumataḥ śikhareṣu tad kṣaṇam aśītarucaḥ
kara jālam astamaye satām utitam khalu uccataram eva padam
pratikūlam upagate hi vidhau viphala tvam eti bahu sādhana tā
avalambanāya dinabhartuḥ abhūt na patiṣyataḥ kara sahasram api
nava kuṅkuma aruṇa payodharayā sva kara avasakta rucira ambarayā
atisaktim etya varuṇasya diśā bhṛśam anvarajyat a tuṣāra karaḥ
gatavati arājata japā kusuma stabaka dyutau dinakare vanatim
bahala anurāga kuruvinda dala pratibaddha madhyam iva diś valayam
druta śātakumbha nibham aṃśumataḥ vapuḥ ardha magna vapuṣaḥ payasi
ruruce viriñci nakha bhinna bṛhat daṇaḍaka ekatara khaṇḍam iva
anurāgavantam api locanayoḥ dadhatam vapuḥ sukham a tāpa karam
nirakāsayat ravim apeta vasum viyat ālayāt apara diś gaṇikā
abhitigmaraśmi ciram aviramāt avadhāna khinnam animeṣa tayā
vigalan amadhuvrata kula aśru jalam nmamīlat abja nayanam nalinī
avibhāvya tārakam adṛṣṭa hima dyuti bimbam astamita bhānu nabhaḥ
avasanna tāpam atamisram abhāt apadoṣa tā eva viguṇasya guṇaḥ

original: rucidhāmni bhartari bhṛśaṃ vimalāḥ paralokamabhyupagate vivaśuḥ /
analyzed: ruci dhāmni bhartari bhṛśam vimalāḥ para lokam abhyupagate vivaśuḥ

original: jvalanaṃ tviṣaḥ kathamitarathā sulabho 'nyajanmani sa eva patiḥ // MSpv_9.13 //
analyzed: jvalanam tviṣaḥ katham itarathā sulabhaḥ saḥ eva patiḥ
vihita añjaliḥ janatayā dadhatī vikasat kusumbha kusuma aruṇa tām

original: ciramujjhitāpi tanuraujjhadasau na pitṛprasūḥ prakṛtimātmabhuvaḥ // MSpv_9.14 //
analyzed: ciram ujjhitā api tanuḥ aujjhat asau na pitṛ prasūḥ prakṛtim ātmabhuvaḥ
atha sāndra sāndhya kiraṇa aruṇitam hari heti hūti mithunam patatoḥ
pṛthak utpapāta viraha ārti dalat hṛdaya sruta asṛj anuliptam iva

original: nilayaḥ śriyaḥ satatametaditi prathitaṃ yadeva jalajanma tayā /
analyzed: nilayaḥ śriyaḥ satatam etat iti prathitam yat eva jala janma tayā

original: divasātyayāttadapi muktamaho capalājanaṃ prati na codyamadaḥ // MSpv_9.16 //
analyzed: divasa atyayāt tat api muktam aho capalā janam prati na codya madaḥ
divasaḥ nu mitram agamat valayam kim iha āsyate bata mayā abalayā

original: rucibharturasya virahādhigamāditi saṃdhyayāpi sapadi vyagami // MSpv_9.17 //
analyzed: ruci bhartuḥ asya viraha adhigamāt iti saṃdhyayā api sapadi vyagami
patite pataṅga mṛga rāji nija pratibimba roṣite iva ambunidhau
atha nāga yūtha malināni jagat paritas tamāṃsi paritastarire
vyasaran nu bhūdhara guhā antarataḥ bahis bhahala paṅka ruci
divasa avasāna paṭunaḥ tamasaḥ bahis etya ca adhikam abhakta guhāḥ
kim alambata ambara vilagnam adhas kim avardhata ūrdhvam avanī talataḥ

original: visasāra tiryagatha digbhya iti pracurībhavanna niradhāri tamaḥ // MSpv_9.20 //
analyzed: visasāra tiryak atha digbhyaḥ iti pracurībhavat na niradhāri tamaḥ
sthagita ambara kṣiti tale paritas timire janasya dṛśam andhayati

original: dadhire rasāñjanamapūrvataḥ priyaveśmavartma sudṛśo dadṛśuḥ // MSpv_9.21 //
analyzed: dadhire rasāñjanam apūrvataḥ priya veśma vartma sudṛśaḥ dadṛśuḥ
avadhārya kārya guru tām abhavat na bhayāya sāndra tama santamasam

original: sutanoḥ stanau ca dayitopagame tanuromarājipathavepathave // MSpv_9.22 //
analyzed: su tanoḥ stanau ca dayitā upagame tanu romarāji patha vepathave

original: dadṛśe 'pi bhāskararucāhni na yaḥ sa tamīṃ tamobirabhigamya tatām /
analyzed: dadṛśe pi bhāskara rucā ahni na yaḥ sa tamīm tamobiḥ abhigamya tatām
dyutim agrahīt graha gaṇaḥ laghavaḥ prakaṭībhavanti malina āśrayataḥ
anulepanāni kusumāni abalāḥ kṛta manyavaḥ patiṣu dhīpa śikhāḥ
samayena tena cira supta manobhava bodhanam samamabodhiṣata
vasudhā anta niḥsṛtam iva ahipateḥ paṭalam phaṇāmaṇi sahasra rucām

original: sphuradaṃśujālamatha śītarucaḥ kakubhaṃ samaskuruta mādhavanīm // MSpv_9.25 //
analyzed: sphurat aṃśu jālam atha śītarucaḥ kakubham samaskuruta mādhavanīm
viśada prabhā parigatam vibabhau udayācala vyavahita indu vapuḥ
mukham aprakāśa daśanam śanakais sa vilāsa hāsam iva śakra diśaḥ
kalayā tuṣārakiraṇasya puras parimanda bhinna timira ogha jaṭam

original: kṣaṇamabhyapadyata janairna mṛṣā gaganaṃ gaṇādipatimūrtiriti // MSpv_9.27 //
analyzed: kṣaṇam abhyapadyata janaiḥ na mṛṣā gaganam gaṇādipati mūrtiḥ iti
nava candrakā kusuma kīrṇa tamaḥ kabarībhṛtaḥ malayaja ārdram iva

original: dadṛśe lalāṭataṭahāri harerharito mukhe tuhinaraśmidalam // MSpv_9.28 //
analyzed: dadṛśe lalāṭa taṭa hāri hareḥ haritaḥ mukhe tuhina raśmi dalam
prathamam kalā bhavat atha ardham atho himadīdhitiḥ mahat abhūt uditaḥ

original: dadhati dhruvaṃ kramaśa eva na tu dyutiśālino 'pi sahasopacayam // MSpv_9.29 //
analyzed: dadhati dhruvam kramaśas eva na tu sahasā upacayam
udamajji kaiṭabhajitaḥ śayanāt apanidra pāṇḍura saroja rucā
prathama prabuddha nada rāja sutā vadana indunā iva tuhina dyutinā
atha lakṣa maṇā gata kānta vapuḥ jaladhim vilaṅghya śaśi dāśarathiḥ
parivāritaḥ paritas ṛkṣa gaṇaiḥ tiras ogha rākṣasa kulam bibhide

original: upajīvati sma satataṃ dadhataḥ parimugdhatāṃ vaṇigivoḍupateḥ /
analyzed: upajīvati sma satatam dadhataḥ parimugdha tām vaṇij iva uḍupateḥ
ghana vītha vīthim avatīrṇavataḥ nidhiḥ ambhasām upacayāya kalāḥ

original: rajanīmavāpya rucamāpa śaśī sapadi vyabhūṣayadasāvapi tām /
analyzed: rajanīm avāpya rucam āpa śaśī sapadi vyabhūṣayat asau api tām
avilambita krama mahaḥ mahatām itaretara kṛtimat caritam
divasam bhṛśa uṣṇa ruci pāda hatām rudatīm iva anavarata li rutaiḥ
muhur āmṛśat mṛgadharaḥ grakaraiḥ udaśisvasat kumudinī vanitām
pratikāminī iti dadṛśuḥ cakitāḥ smara janma gharma payasā upacitām
su dṛś ūbhi bhartṛ śaśaiḥ raśmi galat jala bindum indu maṇi dāru vadhūm
amṛta dravaiḥ vidadhabja dṛśām amapamārgam oṣadhipatiḥ sma karaiḥ

original: parito visarpi paritāpi bhṛśaṃ vapuṣo 'vatārayati mānaviṣam // MSpv_9.36 //
analyzed: paritas visarpi paritāpi bhṛśam vapuṣaḥ vatārayati māna viṣam
amala ātmasu pratiphalan abhitas taruṇī kapola phalakeṣu muhur
visasāra sāndrataram indu rucām adhika avabhāsita diśām nikaraḥ
upagūḍha velam alaghu ūrmi bhujaiḥ saritām acukṣupa dadhīśam api

original: rajanīkaraḥ kimiva citramado yadurāgiṇāṃ gaṇamanaṅgalaghum // MSpv_9.38 //
analyzed: rajanīkaraḥ kim iva citra madaḥ yadu rāgiṇām gaṇam anaṅga laghum
bhavana udareṣu parimanda tayā śayitaḥ lasaḥ sphaṭika yaṣṭi rucaḥ
avalambya jālaka mukha upagatān udatiṣṭhat indukiraṇān madanaḥ
a vibhāvita iṣu viṣayaḥ prathamam madanaḥ pi nūnam abhavat tamasā

original: udite diśaḥ prakaṭayatyamunā yadagharmadhāmni dhanurācakṛṣe // MSpv_9.40 //
analyzed: udite diśaḥ prakaṭayati amunā yat a gharma dhāmni dhanuḥ ācakṛṣe
yugapad vikāsam udayāt gamite śaśinaḥ śilīmukha gaṇaḥ labhata

original: drutametya puṣpadhanuṣo dhanuṣaḥ kumude 'ṅganāmanasi cāvasaram // MSpv_9.41 //
analyzed: drutam etya puṣpadhanuṣaḥ dhanuṣaḥ kumude ṅganā manasi ca avasaram
kakubhām mukhāni sahasā ujjvalayan dadhat ākula tvam adhikam rataye
adidīpat induḥ aparaḥ dahanaḥ kusumeṣumat trinayana prabhavaḥ
iti niścita priyatama āgatayaḥ sitadīdhitā vadayavatī abalāḥ

original: pratikarma kartumucakramire samaye hi sarvamupakāri kṛtam // MSpv_9.43 //
analyzed: pratikarma kartum ucakramire samaye hi sarvam upakāri kṛtam
samam ekam eva dadhatuḥ su tana ūru hāra bhūṣaṇam uroja taṭau

original: ghaṭate hi saṃhatatayā janitāmidameva nirviratāṃ dadhatoḥ // MSpv_9.44 //
analyzed: ghaṭate hi saṃhata tayā janitām idam eva nirviratām dadhatoḥ
kadalī prakāṇḍa rucira uru tarau jaghana sthalī parisare mahati
raśanā kalāpaka guṇena vadhūḥ makaradhvaja dviradam ākalayat
adareṣu alaktaka rasaḥ su dṛśām viśadam kapola bhuvi lodhra rajaḥ
navam añjanam nayana paṅkajayoḥ bibhide na śaṅkha nihitāt payasaḥ
sphurat ujvala adhara dalaiḥ visat daśana aṃśu keśakaraiḥ paritas
dhṛta mugdha gaṇḍa phalakaiḥ vibabhu vikasadbhiḥ āsya kamalaiḥ pramadāḥ
bhajate videśam adhikena jitaḥ tad anupraveśam athavā kuśalaḥ
mukham induḥ ujjvala kapolam atas pratimā chalena su dṛśām aviśat
dhruvam āgatāḥ pratihatim kaṭhine madana iṣavaḥ kuca taṭe mahati
itara aṅga vat na yat idam garima glapita avalagnam agamat tanu tām
na manoramāsu api viśeṣa vidām niraceṣṭa yogyam idam iti

original: gṛhameṣyati priyatame sudṛśāṃ vasanāṅgarāgasumanaḥsu manaḥ // MSpv_9.50 //
analyzed: gṛham eṣyati priyatame sudṛśām vasana aṅgarāga sumanaḥsu manaḥ
vapuḥ anvalipta parirambha sukha vyavadhāna bhīruka tayā na vadhūḥ
kṣamasya vāḍham idam eva hi yat priya saṃgameṣu an avalepa madaḥ
nija pāṇipallava tala skhalanāt abhināsika vivaram utpatitaiḥ
aparā parīkṣya śanakais mumude mukha vāsam āsya kamala śvasanaiḥ

original: vidhṛte divā savayasā ca puraḥ paripūrṇamaṇḍalavikāśabhṛti /
analyzed: vidhṛte divā savayasā ca puras paripūrṇa maṇḍala vikāśa bhṛti

original: himadhāmni darpaṇatale ca muhuḥ svamukhaśriyaṃ mṛgadṛśo dadṛśuḥ // MSpv_9.53 //
analyzed: hima dhāmni darpaṇa tale ca muhur sva mukha śriyam mṛga dṛśaḥ dadṛśuḥ
adhijānu bāhum upadhāya namat karapallava arpita kapola talam
uda kaṇṭhi kaṇṭha parivarti kala svara sūnya gāna payā aparayā
praṇaya prakāśana vidaḥ madhurāḥ sutarām abhīṣṭa jana citta hṛtaḥ

original: prajighāya kāntamanu mugdhatarastaruṇījano dṛśa ivātha sakhīḥ // MSpv_9.55 //
analyzed: prajighāya kāntam anu mugdhataraḥ taruṇī janaḥ dṛśaḥ iva atha sakhīḥ

original: na ca me 'vagacchati yathā laghutāṃ karuṇāṃ yathā ca kurute sa mayi /
analyzed: na ca me vagacchati yathā laghu tām karuṇām yathā ca kurute sa mayi

original: nipuṇaṃ tathainamupagamya vaderabhidūti kāciditi saṃdidiśe // MSpv_9.56 //
analyzed: nipuṇam tathā enam upagamya vadeḥ abhidūti kācid iti saṃdidiśe
dayitayā māna parayā aparayā tvaritam yayā avagaditā api sakhī

original: kimu coditāḥ priyahitārthakṛtaḥ kṛtino bhavanti suhṛdaḥ suhṛdām // MSpv_9.57 //
analyzed: kimu coditāḥ priya hita artha kṛtaḥ kṛtinaḥ bhavanti suhṛdaḥ suhṛdām

original: pratibhidya kāntamaparādhakṛtaṃ yadi tāvadasya punareva mayā /
analyzed: pratibhidya kāntam aparādha kṛtam yadi tāvat asya punar eva mayā

original: kriyate 'nuvṛttirucitaiva tataḥ kalayedamānamanasaṃ sakhi mām // MSpv_9.58 //
analyzed: kriyate nuvṛttiḥ ucitā eva tatas kalayā idam māna manasam sakhi mām

original: avadhīrya dhairyakalitā dayitaṃ vidadhe virodhamatha tena saha /
analyzed: avadhīrya dhairya kalitā dayitam vidadhe virodham atha tena saha

original: tava gopyate kimiva kartumidaṃ na sahāsmi sāhasamasāhasikī // MSpv_9.59 //
analyzed: tava gopyate kim iva kartum idam na saha asmi sāhasam asāhasikī

original: tadupetya mā sma tamupālabhathāḥ kla doṣamasya na hi vidma vayam /
analyzed: tat upetya mā sma tam upālabhathāḥ kla doṣam asya na hi vidma vayam

original: iti sampradhārya ramaṇāya vadhūrvihitāgase 'pi visasarja sakhīṃ // MSpv_9.60 //
analyzed: iti sampradhārya ramaṇāya vadhūḥ vihita āgase visasarja sakhīm

original: nanu sandiśeti sudṛśoditayā trapayā na kiñcana kilābhidadhe /
analyzed: nanu sandiśā iti sudṛśā uditayā trapayā na kiñcana kila abhidadhe

original: nijamaikṣi mandamaniśaṃ niśitaiḥ kraśitaṃ śarīramaśīraśaraiḥ // MSpv_9.61 //
analyzed: nijam aikṣi mandam aniśam niśitaiḥ kraśitam śarīram aśīra śaraiḥ
bruvate sma dūtyaḥ upasṛtya nara antara vat pragalbha mati garbha giraḥ
suhṛd artham īhitam a jihma dhiyām prakṛteḥ virājati viruddham api
mama rūpa kīrtim aharat bhuvi yaḥ tadanu praviṣṭa hṛdayā iyam iti

original: tvayi matsarādiva nirastadayaḥ sutarāṃ kṣiṇoti khalu tāṃ madanaḥ // MSpv_9.63 //
analyzed: tvayi matsarāt iva nirasta dayaḥ sutarām kṣiṇoti khalu tām madanaḥ

original: tava sā kathāsu parighaṭṭayati śravaṇaṃ yadaṅgulimukhena muhuḥ /
analyzed: tava sā kathāsu parighaṭṭayati śravaṇam yat aṅguli mukhena muhur

original: ghanatāṃ dhruvaṃ nayati tena bhavadguṇapūgapūritamatṛptatayā // MSpv_9.64 //
analyzed: ghana tām dhruvam nayati tena bhavat guṇa pūga pūritam atṛpta tayā
upatapyamānam alaghu uṣṇibhiḥ śvasitaiḥ sitetara saroja dṛśaḥ

original: dravatāṃ na netumadharaṃ kṣamate navanāgavallidalarāgarasaḥ // MSpv_9.65 //
analyzed: drava tām na netum adharam kṣamate nava nāga vallī dala rāga rasaḥ
dadhati sphuṭam ratpateḥ iṣavaḥ śita tām yat utpala palāśa dṛśaḥ
hṛdayam nirantara bṛhat kaṭhina stana maṇaḍala āvaraṇam api abhidan
kusumāt api smita dṛśaḥ sutarām su kumāram aṅgam iti nā aparathā

original: aniśaṃ nijairakaruṇaḥ karuṇaṃ kusumeṣuruttapāti yadviśikhaiḥ // MSpv_9.67 //
analyzed: aniśam nijaiḥ akaruṇaḥ karuṇam kusumeṣuḥ uttapāti yat viśikhaiḥ
viṣa tām niṣevitam apakriyayā samupaiti sarvam iti satya madaḥ

original: amṛtutasru'pi virahādbhavato yadamūṃ dahanti himaraśmirucaḥ // MSpv_9.68 //
analyzed: virahāt bhavataḥ yat amūm dahanti himaraśmi rucaḥ

original: uditaṃ priyāṃ prati sahārdamiti śradadhīyata priyatamena vacaḥ /
analyzed: uditam priyām prati sahārdam iti śradadhīyata priyatamena vacaḥ

original: viditeṅgite hi pura eva jane sapadīritāḥ khalu laganti giraḥ // MSpv_9.69 //
analyzed: vidita iṅgite hi puras eva jane sapadi īritāḥ khalu laganti giraḥ
dayitā hṛtasya yuvabhiḥ manasaḥ parimūḍha tām iva gataiḥ prathamam

original: udite tataḥ sapadi labdhapadaiḥ kṣaṇadākare 'nupadibhiḥ prayaye // MSpv_9.70 //
analyzed: udite tatas sapadi labdha padaiḥ kṣaṇadākare nupadibhiḥ prayaye
nipapāta sambhrama bhṛtaḥ śravaṇāt asita bhruvaḥ praṇadita asi kulam
dayitā avaloka vikasat nayana prasara praṇunnam iva vāriruham
upanetum unnatimatā iva divam kucayoḥ yugena tarasā kalitām

original: rabhasotthitāmupagataḥ sahasā parirabhya kañcana vadhūmarudhat // MSpv_9.72 //
analyzed: rabhasa utthitām upagataḥ sahasā parirabhya kañcana vadhūm arudhat
anudeham āgatavataḥ pratimām pariṇāyakasya gurum udvahatā

original: mukureṇa vepathubhṛto 'tibharāt kathamapyapāti na vadhūkarataḥ // MSpv_9.73 //
analyzed: mukureṇa ti bharāt katham api apāti na vadhūkarataḥ
avanamya vakṣasi nimagna kuca dvitayena gāḍham upagūḍhavatā
dayitena tad kṣaṇa calat raśanā kala kiṅkiṇī ravam udāsi vadhūḥ
kara ruddha nīvi dayitā upagatau galitam tvarā virahita āsanayā
kṣaṇa dṛṣṭa hāṭaka śilā sadṛśa sphurat ūru bhitti vasanam vavase

original: pidadhānamanvagupagamya dṛśau bruvate janāya vada ko 'yamiti /
analyzed: pidadhānam anva gupagamya dṛśau bruvate janāya vada kaḥ yam iti

original: abhidhātumadhyavasasau na girā pulakaiḥ priyaṃ navavadhūnyagadat // MSpv_9.76 //
analyzed: abhidhātum adhyavasasau na girā pulakaiḥ priyam nava vadhūni agadat
udita ūru sādam ati vepathumat su dṛśaḥ vidhuram trapayā
vapuḥ ādara atiśaya śaṃsi punar pratipatti mūḍham api vāḍham abhūt
pimandharābhiḥ alaghu uru bharāt adhiveśma patyuḥ upacāra vidhau
skhalitābhiḥ api anupadam pramadāḥ praṇaya ati bhūmim agaman gatibhiḥ

original: madhurānnatabhrū lalitaṃ ca dṛśoḥ sakaraprayogacaturaṃ ca vacaḥ /
analyzed: madhurāt nata bhrū lalitam ca dṛśoḥ sa kara prayoga caturam ca vacaḥ
prakṛti stham eva nipuṇa āgamitam sphuca nṛtta līlam abhavat su tanoḥ

original: tadayuktamaṅga tava viśvasṛjā na kṛtaṃ yadīkṣaṇasahasratayam /
analyzed: tat ayuktam aṅga tava viśvasṛjā na kṛtam yat īkṣaṇa sahasratayam

original: prakaṭīkṛtā jagati yena khalu sphuṭamindratādya mayi gotrabhidā // MSpv_9.80 //
analyzed: prakaṭīkṛtā jagati yena khalu sphuṭam indra tā adya mayi gotrabhidā
na vibhāvayati aniśam akṣi gatām api mām bhavān ati samīpa tayā

original: hṛdayasthitāmapi punaḥ paritaḥ kathamīkṣate bahirabhīṣṭatāmām // MSpv_9.81 //
analyzed: hṛdaya sthitām api punar paritas katham īkṣate bahis abhīṣṭa tām ām
iti gantum icchum abhidhāya puras kṣaṇa dṛṣṭi pāta vikasat vadanām
sva kara avalambana vimukta galat kala kāñañci kāñcid aruṇat taruṇaḥ

original: apayāti saroṣayā niraste kṛtakaṃ kāmini cukṣuṣe mṛgākṣyā /
analyzed: apayāti sa roṣayā niraste kṛtakam kāmini cukṣuṣe mṛga akṣyā
kalayan api sa vyathaḥ vatasthe śakunena skhalitaḥ kila itaraḥ pi

original: ālokya priyatamamaṃśuke vinīvau yattasthe nāmitamukhendu mānavatyā /
analyzed: ālokya priyatamam aṃśuke vinīvau yat tasthe na amita mukha indu mānavatyā
tat nūnam padam avalokayāṃbabhūve mānasya drutam apayānam āsthitasya
sudṛśaḥ sa rasa vyalīka taptaḥ tarasā a slaṣṭavataḥ sa yauvana ūṣmā

original: kathamapyabhavatsmarānaloṣmaṇaḥ stanabhāro na nakhaṃpacaḥ priyasya // MSpv_9.85 //
analyzed: katham api abhavat smara anala ūṣmaṇaḥ stana bhāraḥ na nakhaṃpacaḥ priyasya
dadhati uroja dvayam urvaśī talam bhuvaḥ gatā iva svayam urvaśī talam

original: babhau mukhenāpratimena kācana śriyādhikā tāṃ prati menakā ca na // MSpv_9.86 //
analyzed: babhau mukhena apratimena kācana śriyā adhikā tām prati menakā ca na

original: itthaṃ nārīrghaṭayitumalaṃ kāmibhiḥ kāmamāsan prāleyāṃśoḥ sapadi rucayaḥ śāntamānāntarāyāḥ /
analyzed: ittham nārīḥ ghaṭayitum alam kāmibhiḥ kāmam āsan prāleya aṃśoḥ sapadi rucayaḥ śānta māna antarāyāḥ

original: ācāryatvaṃ ratiṣu vilasanmanmathaśrīvilāsā hrīpratyūhapraśamakuśalāḥ śīdhavaścakrurāsām // MSpv_9.87 //
analyzed: ācārya tvam ratiṣu vilasat manmatha śrī vilāsāḥ hrī pratyūha praśama kuśalāḥ śīdhavaḥ cakruḥ āsām
sañjitāni surabhīṇi atha yūnām ullasat nayana vāriruhāṇi

original: āyuṣaḥ śughaṭitāni surāyāḥ pātratāṃ priyatamāvadanāni // MSpv_10.1 //
analyzed: āyuṣaḥ surāyāḥ pātra tām priyatamā vadanāni
sa upacāram upaśānta vicāram sa anutarṣam anutarṣa padena

original: te muhūrtamatha mūrtamapīpyan prama mānamavadhūya vadhūḥ svāḥ // MSpv_10.2 //
analyzed: te muhūrtam atha mūrtam apīpyan prama mānam avadhūya vadhūḥ svāḥ
kāntā akānta vadana pratibimbe bhagna bāla sahakāra sugandhau

original: svāduni praṇaditālini śīte nirvivāra madhunīndriyavargaḥ // MSpv_10.3 //
analyzed: svāduni praṇadita ālini śīte nirvivāra madhuni indriya vargaḥ
kāpiśāyana sugandhi vighūrṇan unmadaḥ dhi śayitum samaśeta

original: phulladṛṣṭi vadanaṃ pramadānāmabjacāru caṣakaṃ ca ṣaḍaṅdhriḥ // MSpv_10.4 //
analyzed: phulla dṛṣṭi vadanam pramadānām abja cāru caṣakam ca ṣaḍaṅdhriḥ
bimbitam bṛta parisruti jānan bhājane jalajam iti abalāyāḥ

original: ghrātumakṣi patati bhramaraḥ sma bhrāntibhāji bhavati kva vivekaḥ // MSpv_10.5 //
analyzed: ghrātum akṣi patati bhramaraḥ sma bhrānti bhāji bhavati kva vivekaḥ
dattam iṣṭatamayā madhu patyuḥ bāḍam āpa pibataḥ rasavat tām
yat suvarṇa mukuṭa aṃśubhiḥ āsāt cetanā virahitaiḥ api patim
svadanena su tanoḥ avicārāt oṣṭhataḥ samacariṣṭa

original: anyamanyadiva yanmanadhu yūnaḥ svādamiṣṭamataniṣṭa tadeva // MSpv_10.7 //
analyzed: anyam anyat iva yat manadhu yūnaḥ svādam iṣṭam ataniṣṭa tat eva
bibhratau madhura tām atimātram rāgibhiḥ yugapad eva papāte
ānanaiḥ madhu rasaḥ vikasadabhiḥ nāsikābhiḥ asita utpala gandhaḥ
pativati abhimate madhu tulya svāda moṣṭhakam vidadaṅkṣau

original: labhyate sma pariraktatayātmā yāvakena viyatāpi yuvatyāḥ // MSpv_10.9 //
analyzed: labhyate sma parirakta tayā ātmā yāvakena viyatā api yuvatyāḥ
kasyacid sa madanam madanīya prayasī vadana pāna parasya

original: svāditaḥ sakṛdivāsava eva pratyuta kṣaṇavidaṃśapade 'bhūt // MSpv_10.10 //
analyzed: svāditaḥ sakṛt iva āsavaḥ eva pratyuta kṣaṇa vidaṃśa pade bhūt
pīta śīta dhu madhuraiḥ midhu nānām ānanaiḥ parihṛtam caṣaka antar
vrīḍayā rudat iva ali virāvaiḥ nīla nīrajam agacchat adhastāt
prātibha trisarakeṇa gatānām vakra vākya racanā ramaṇīyaḥ
gūḍha sūcita rahasya sahāsaḥ subhruvām pravavṛte parihāsaḥ

original: hāvakāri hasitaṃ vacanānāṃ khauśalaṃ dṛśi vikāraviśeṣāḥ /
analyzed: hāva kāri hasitam vacanānām khauśalam dṛśi vikāra viśeṣāḥ

original: cakire bhṛśamṛjorapi vadhvāḥ kāmineva taruṇena madena // MSpv_10.13 //
analyzed: cakire bhṛśa mṛjoḥ api vadhvāḥ kāminā iva taruṇena madena
aprasannam aparādh hari patyau kopa dīptam urarīkṛta dhairyam

original: kṣālitaṃ nu śamitaṃ nu vadhūnāṃ dravitaṃ nu hṛdayaṃ madhuvāraiḥ // MSpv_10.14 //
analyzed: kṣālitam nu śamitam nu vadhūnām dravitam nu hṛdayam madhuvāraiḥ
santam eva cira prakṛta tvāt aprakāśita mad dyutaṅge

original: vibhramaṃ madhumadaḥ pramadānāṃ dhātulīnamupasarga ivārtham // MSpv_10.15 //
analyzed: vibhramam madhu madaḥ pramadānām dhātu līnam upasargaḥ iva artham
sa avaśeṣa padam uktam upekṣā srasta mālya vasana ābharaṇeṣu
gantum utthim akāraṇataḥ sma dyotayanti mada vibhramam āsām
madya manda vigalat trapam īṣat cakṣuḥ unmiṣita pakṣma dadhatyā
vīkṣyate sma śanakais nava vadhvā kāminaḥ mukham adhomukhayā eva
yā kathañaacana sakhī vacanena prāk abhipriyatamam prajagalbhe

original: vrīḍājāḍyamabhajanmadhupā sā svāṃ madātprakṛtimeti hi sarvaḥ // MSpv_10.18 //
analyzed: vrīḍā jāḍyam abhajat madhupā sā svām madāt prakṛtim eti hi sarvaḥ

original: chāditaḥ kathamapi trapayayāntaryaḥ priyaṃ prati cirāya ramaṇyāḥ /
analyzed: chāditaḥ katham api trapayaya antaryaḥ priyam prati cirāya ramaṇyāḥ
rāgāḥ
āgatān a gaṇita pratiyātān vallabhān abhisisārayiṣūṇām

original: prāpi cetasi savipratisāre subhruvāmavasaraḥ sarakeṇa // MSpv_10.20 //
analyzed: prāpi cetasi sa vipratisāre subhruvām avasaraḥ sarakeṇa
mā punar tam abhisīsaram āgaskāriṇam mada vimohita cittā

original: yoṣidityabhilāṣa na hālāṃ dustyajaḥ khalu sukhādapi mānaḥ // MSpv_10.21 //
analyzed: yoṣit iti abhilāṣa na hālām dustyajaḥ khalu sukhāt api mānaḥ
hrī vimoham aharat dayitānām antikam rati sukhāya nināya

original: saprasādamiva sevitamāsītsadya eva phaladaṃ madhu tāsām // MSpv_10.22 //
analyzed: sa prasādam iva sevitam āsīt sadyas eva phala dam madhu tāsām
dattam ātta madanam dayitena vyāptam ati śākena rasena

original: sasvade mukhasuraṃ pramadābhyo nāma rūḍhamapi ca vyudapādi // MSpv_10.23 //
analyzed: sasvade mukha suram pramadābhyaḥ nāma rūḍham api ca vyudapādi
labdha saurabha guṇaḥ madirāṇām aṅganā āsya caṣakasya ca gandhaḥ
modita aliḥ itaretara yogāt anya tām abhajata atiśayam nu

original: mānabhaṅgapacaṭunā suratecchāṃ tanvatā prathayatā dṛśi rāgam /
analyzed: surata icchām tanvatā prathayatā dṛśi rāgam

original: lebhire sapadi bhāvayatāntaryoṣitaḥ praṇayineva madena // MSpv_10.25 //
analyzed: lebhire sapadi bhāvayatā antar yoṣitaḥ praṇayinā iva madena
pāna dhauta nava yāvaka rāgam su bhruvaḥ nibhṛta cumbana dakṣāḥ
preyasām adhara rāga rasena svam kila adharam upāli rarañjuḥ
arpitam rasitavatī api nāma grāham anya yuvateḥ dayitena

original: ujjhati sma madamapyapibantī vīkṣya madyamitarā tu mamāda // MSpv_10.27 //
analyzed: ujjhati sma madam api a pibantī vīkṣya madyam itarā tu mamāda
anya anya vanitā gata cittam citta nātham abhiśaṅkitavatyā
pīta bhūri surayā api namede nirvṛtiḥ himanasaḥ mada hetuḥ
kopavatī anunaya an a gṛhītvā prāk atho madhu mada āhita mohā
kopitam viraha khedita cittā kāntam eva kalayantī anuninye
kurvatā mukulita akṣi yugānām aṅga sādam avasādita vagacām

original: īrṣyayeva haratā hriyamāsāṃ tadguṇaḥ svayamakāri madena // MSpv_10.30 //
analyzed: īrṣyayā iva haratā hriyam āsām tad guṇaḥ svayam akāri madena

original: gaṇḍabhittiṣu purā sadṛśīṣu vyāñji nāñjitadṛśāṃ pratimenduḥ /
analyzed: gaṇḍa bhittiṣu purā sadṛśīṣu na añjita dṛśām pratimā induḥ
pāna pāṭalita kāntiṣu paścāt lodhra cūrṇa tilaka ākṛtiḥ āsīt
uddhataiḥ iva paraspara saṅgāt īritāni ubhayatas kuca kumbhaiḥ
yoṣitām ati madena jughūrṇuḥ vibhrama atiśaya puṃsi vapūṃṣi
cāru tā vapuḥ abhūṣayat āsām tām anūna nava yauvana yogaḥ
tam punar makaraketana lakṣa kṣmīḥ tām madaḥ dayita saṃgama bhūṣaḥ
kṣība tām anugatāsu anuvelam tāsu roṣa paritoṣavatīṣu
agrahīt na sa śaram dhanuḥ ujjhāmā āsa nu ujjhita niṣaṅgam anaṅgaḥ
śahaṅgayā anya yuvatau vanitābhiḥ pratyabhedi dayitaḥ sphuṭam eva

original: na kṣamaṃ bhavati tatvavicāre matsareṇa hatasaṃvṛti cetaḥ // MSpv_10.35 //
analyzed: na kṣamam bhavati tatva vicāre matsareṇa hata saṃvṛti cetaḥ
ānanaiḥ vicakase hṛṣitābhiḥ vallabhān abhi tanūbhiḥ abhāvi

original: ārdratāṃ hṛdayamāpa ca roṣo lolati sma vacaneṣu vadhūnām // MSpv_10.36 //
analyzed: ārdra tām hṛdayam āpa ca roṣaḥ lolati sma vacaneṣu vadhūnām
rūpam a pratividhāna manojñam prema kāryam an apekṣya vikāsi
cāṭu ca akṛtaka saṃbhramam āsām kārmaṇa tvam agaman ramaṇeṣu
līlayā eva su tanoḥ tulayitvā gaurava āḍhyam api lāvaṇikena

original: mānavañjanavidā vadanena krītameva hṛdayaṃ dayitasya // MSpv_10.38 //
analyzed: māna vañjana vidā vadanena krītam eva hṛdayam dayitasya
sparśa bhāji viśada cha vicārau kalpite mṛga dṛśām suratāya

original: sannatiṃ dadhati peturajasraṃ dṛṣṭayaḥ priyatame śayane ca // MSpv_10.39 //
analyzed: sannatim dadhati petuḥ ajasram dṛṣṭayaḥ priyatame śayane ca
yūni rāga taralaiḥ api tiryakpātibhiḥ śruti guṇena yutasya

original: dīrghadarśibhirakāri vadhūnāṃ laṅghanaṃ na nayanaiḥ śravaṇasya // MSpv_10.40 //
analyzed: dīrgha darśibhiḥ akāri vadhūnām laṅghanam na nayanaiḥ śravaṇasya

original: saṃkathecchurabhidhātumanīśā saṃmukhī na ca babhūva didṛkṣuḥ /
analyzed: saṃkathā icchuḥ abhidhātum anīśā saṃmukhī na ca babhūva didṛkṣuḥ
sparśanena dayitasya nata bhrūḥ aṅga capalā api cakampe
uttarīya vinayāt trapamāṇā rundhatī kila tad īkṣaṇa mārgam
ācariṣṭa vikaṭena vivoḍhuḥ vakṣasā eva kuca maṇa ḍalam anyā
aṃśukam hṛtavatā tanu bāhu svastika apihita mugdha kuca agrā
bhinna śaṅkha valayam pariṇetrā paryarambhi rabhasāt acira ūḍhā
saṃjahāra sahasā parirabdha preyasīṣu virahayya virodham

original: saṃhitaṃ ratipatiḥ smitabhinnakrodhamāśu taruṇeṣu maheṣum // MSpv_10.44 //
analyzed: saṃhitam ratipatiḥ smita bhinna krodham āśu taruṇeṣu mahā iṣum
sraṃsamānam upayantari vadhvāḥ śliṣṭavati upasapakṣi rasena

original: ātmanaiva rurudhe kṛtineva svasaṅgi vasanaṃ jaghanena // MSpv_10.45 //
analyzed: ātmanā eva rurudhe kṛtinā iva sva saṅgi vasanam jaghanena

original: pīḍite pura uraḥ pratiṣedhaṃ bhartari stanayugena yuvatyāḥ /
analyzed: pīḍite puras uraḥ pratiṣedham bhartari stana yugena yuvatyāḥ
spaṣṭam eva dalataḥ pratināryaḥ tad maya tvam abhavat hṛdayasya
dīpita smaram urasi apapīḍam vallabhe ghanam abhiṣvajamāne

original: vakratāṃ na yayatuḥ kucakumbhau subhruvaḥ kaṭhinatātiśayena // MSpv_10.47 //
analyzed: vakra tām na yayatuḥ kuca kumbhau subhruvaḥ kaṭhina tā atiśayena
saṃpraveṣṭum iva yoṣitaḥ īṣuḥ śliṣyatām hṛdayam iṣṭatamānām

original: ātmanaḥ satatameva tadantarvartino na khalu nūnamajānan // MSpv_10.48 //
analyzed: ātmanaḥ satatam eva tad antarvartinaḥ na khalu nūnam ajānan
snaha nirbharam adatta vadhūnām ārdra tām vapuḥ asaṃśayam antar

original: yūni gāḍhaparirambhiṇi vastraknopamambu vavṛṣe yadanena // MSpv_10.49 //
analyzed: yūni gāḍha parirambhiṇi vastra knā upamambu vavṛṣe yat anena
na sma māti vapuṣaḥ pramadānām antar iṣṭatama saṅgama janmā

original: tadbahurbahiravāpya vikāsaṃ vyānaśe tanuruhāṇyapi harṣaḥ // MSpv_10.50 //
analyzed: tat bahuḥ bahis avāpya vikāsam vyānaśe tanuruhāṇi api harṣaḥ
yad priya vyatikarāt vanitā namaṅga jena pulakena babhūve

original: prāpi tena bhṛśamucchvasibhirnīvibhiḥ sapadi bandhanamokṣaḥ // MSpv_10.51 //
analyzed: prāpi tena bhṛśam ucchvasibhiḥ nīvibhiḥ sapadi bandhana mokṣaḥ
hrī bharāt avanatam parirambhe rāgavān avaṭu jeṣu avakṛṣya
arpita uṣṭha dalam ānana padmam yoṣitaḥ mukulita akṣam adha āsīt
palva upamita sāmya sapakṣam
paryakūji sa rujā iva taruṇyāḥ tāra lola valayena kareṇa
kenacid tat madhuram ulbaṇa rāgam bāṣpa taptam adhikam viraheṣu

original: oṣṭhapallavamavāpya muhūrta subhruvaḥ sarasamakṣi cucumbe // MSpv_10.54 //
analyzed: oṣṭha pallavam avāpya muhūrta subhruvaḥ sarasam akṣi cucumbe
recitam parijanena mahīyaḥ kevala abhirata dampati dhāma
sāmyam āpa kamalā sakha viṣvaksena sevita yugānta payodheḥ
āvṛtāni api nirantaram uccais yoṣitām urasija dvatayena

original: rāgiṇāmita ito vimṛśadbhiḥ pāṇibhirjagṛhire hṛdayāni // MSpv_10.56 //
analyzed: rāgiṇām itas itas vimṛśadbhiḥ pāṇibhiḥ jagṛhire hṛdayāni
kāmi nāma sakalāni vibhugnaiḥ svada vāri mṛdubhiḥ karaja agraiḥ
ākriyanta kaṭhineṣu kathañcid kāminī kuca taṭeṣu padāni
sa ūṣmaṇaḥ stana śilā śikhara agra ātta gharma salilaiḥ taruṇānām
ucchvasat kamala cāruṣu hastaiḥ nimna nābhi sarasīṣu nipete
āmṛśadbhiḥ abhitas vali vīciḥ lolamāna vitata aṅguli hastaiḥ
subhruvām anubhavāt pratipede muṣṭim eyam iti maghyam abhīṣṭaiḥ
prāpya nābhi nada majjanam āśu prasthitam nivasana grahaṇāya

original: aupanīvikamarundha kila strī vallabhasya karamātmakarābhyām // MSpv_10.60 //
analyzed: aupanīvikam arundha kila strī vallabhasya karam ātma karābhyām
kāminaḥ kṛta rata utsava kāla kṣepam ākula vadhū kara saṅgi
mekhalā guṇa vilagnam asūyām dīrghasūtram akarot paridhānam
ambaram vinayataḥ priya pāṇeḥ yoṣitasya karayoḥ kalahasya

original: vāraṇamiva vidhātumabhīkṣṇaṃ kakṣyayā ca valayaiśca śiśiñce // MSpv_10.62 //
analyzed: vāraṇam iva vidhātum abhīkṣṇam kakṣyayā ca valayaiḥ ca śiśiñce
granthim udgrathayitum hṛdaya deśe vāsasaḥ spṛśati mānadhanāyāḥ

original: bhrūyugeṇa sapadi pratipede romabhiśca samameva vibhedaḥ // MSpv_10.63 //
analyzed: bhrū yugeṇa sapadi pratipede romabhiḥ ca samam eva vibhedaḥ
āśu laṅghitavatī iṣṭa kara agre nīvīm ardha mukulīkṛta dṛṣṭyā
rakta vaiṇika hata adhara tantrī maṇḍala kvaṇita cāru cukūje
āyata aṅguliḥ abhūt atiriktaḥ su bhruvām kraśima śālini madhye

original: śroṇiṣu priyakaraḥ pṛthulāsu sparśamāpa sakalena talena // MSpv_10.65 //
analyzed: śroṇiṣu priya karaḥ pṛthulāsu sparśam āpa sakalena talena
cakruḥ eva lalanā ūruṣu rājīḥ sparśa lobha vaśa lola karāṇām
kāmi nāma nibhṛtāni api rambhā stambha komala taleṣu nakhāni
ūru mūla capala īkṣaṇam aghnan yaiḥ vataṃsa kusumaiḥ priyam etāḥ

original: cakrire sapadi tāni yathārtha manmathasya kusumāyudhanāma // MSpv_10.67 //
analyzed: cakrire sapadi tāni yathārtha manmathasya kusumāyudha nāma
dhairyam ulbaṇa manobhava bhavāḥ vāmatām ca vapuḥ arpitavatyaḥ
vrīḍitam saurata dhārṣṭya astenire abhiruciteṣu taruṇyaḥ
pāṇi rodham avirodha vāñcham bhartsanāḥ ca madhura smita garbhāḥ

original: kāminaḥ sma kurute karabhorurhaari śuṣkaruditaṃ ca sukha'pi // MSpv_10.69 //
analyzed: kāminaḥ sma kurute karabha ūruḥ haari śuṣka ruditam ca
vāraṇa artha pada gadgada vācām īrṣyayā muhur apatrapayā ca

original: kurvate sma sudṛśāmanukūlaṃ pratikūlikatayaiva yuvānaḥ // MSpv_10.70 //
analyzed: kurvate sma sudṛśām anukūlam pratikūlika tayā eva yuvānaḥ
anya kāla parihāryam ajasram tad dvayena vidadhe dvayam eva
dhṛṣṭa tā rahasi bhartṛṣu tābhiḥ nirdaya tvam itaraiḥ abalāsu
nakha danta nipātaiḥ
bodhitaḥ tanu śaya taruṇīnām unmimīla viśadam viṣameṣu
kāntayā sapadi kaḥ pi upagūḍhaḥ prauḍha pāṇiḥ apanetum iyeṣa
saṃhata stana tiraskṛta dṛṣṭiḥ bhraṣṭam eva na dukūlam apaśyat

original: āhataṃ kucataṭena taruṇyāḥ sādhu soḍhamamuneti papāta /
analyzed: āhatam kuca taṭena taruṇyāḥ sādhu soḍham amunā iti papāta
truṭyataḥ priyatamā urasi hārāt puṣpa vṛṣcaṭar iva mauktika vṛṣṭiḥ
sītkṛtāni maṇitam karuṇā uktiḥ snigdham uktam alam artha vacāṃsi
hāsa bhūṣaṇa ravāḥ ca ramaṇyāḥ kāmasūtra pada tām upajagmuḥ
uddhataiḥ nibhṛtam ekam anekaiḥ chada vat mṛga dṛśām avirāmaiḥ
śrūyate sma maṇitam kala kāñcī nūpura dhvanibhiḥ akṣatam eva
īdṛśasya bhavataḥ khatam etat lāghavam muhur atīva rateṣu
kṣiptam āyatam adarśayat urvyā kāñcid āma jaghanasya maha tvam
prapyate sma gata citraka citraiḥ catram ārdra nakha lakṣma kapolaiḥ
dadhrire tha rabhasa cyuta puṣpāḥ sva bindu kusumāni alaka antāḥ

original: yadyadeva ruruce rucirebhyaḥ subhruvo rahasi ttadakurvan /
analyzed: yat yat eva ruruce rucirebhyaḥ subhruvaḥ rahasi t tat akurvan

original: ānukūlikatayā hi narāṇāmākṣipanti hṛdayāni taruṇyaḥ // MSpv_10.79 //
analyzed: ānukūlika tayā hi narāṇām ākṣipanti hṛdayāni taruṇyaḥ
prāpya manmatha rasāt ati bhūmim durvaha stana bharāḥ suratasya
śaśramuḥ śramajala ārdra lalāṭa śliṣṭa keśamasita āyata keśyaḥ
saṃgata abhirucitaiḥ calitā api prāk amucyata cireṇa sakhī iva

original: bhūya eva samagaṃsta ratānte hrīvadhūbhirasahā virahasya // MSpv_10.81 //
analyzed: bhūyas eva samagaṃsta rata ante hrī vadhūbhiḥ asahā virahasya
prekṣaṇīyakam eva kṣaṇam āsan hrī vibhaṅgura vilocana pātāḥ
saṃbhrama druta gṛhīta dukūla chādyamāna vapuṣaḥ surata antāḥ
a prabhūta matanīyasi tanvī kāñci dhāmni pihita eka tara ūru
kṣaumam ākula karā vicakarṣa kāntā pallavam abhīṣṭatamena
mṛṣṭa candana viśeṣaka bhaktiḥ mraṣa aṭa bhūṣaṇa kadarthita mālyaḥ
sa aparādhaḥ iva maṇḍanam āsīt ātmanā eva sudṛśām upabhogaḥ
yoṣitaḥ patita kāñcana kāñcau mohana ati rabhasena nitambe

original: mekhaleva paritaḥ sma vicitrā rājate vananakhakṣatalakṣmīḥ // MSpv_10.85 //
analyzed: mekhalā iva paritas sma vicitrā rājate vana nakha kṣata lakṣmīḥ

original: bhātu nāma sudṛśāṃ daśanāṅkaḥ pāṭalo dhavalagaṇaḍataleṣu /
analyzed: bhātu nāma su dṛśām daśana aṅkaḥ pāṭalaḥ dhavala gaṇaḍa taleṣu
dantavāsasi samāna guṇa śrīḥ saṃmukhaḥ pi parabhāgam avāpa
su bhruvām adhi payodhara pīṭham pīḍanaiḥ truṭitavatī api patyuḥ
ṇukta mauktika laghu guṇa śeṣā guruḥ eva
viśrama artham upagūḍham ajasram yat priyaiḥ prathama rati avasāne
yoṣitām udita manmatham ādau tad dvitīya suratasya babhūva
āstṛte bhinava pallava puṣpaiḥ api anārata rata abhiratābhyaḥ

original: dīyate sma śayituṃ śayanīye na kṣaṇaḥ kṣaṇadayāpi vadhūbhyaḥ // MSpv_10.89 //
analyzed: dīyate sma śayitum śayanīye na kṣaṇaḥ kṣaṇadayā api vadhūbhyaḥ
yoṣitām atitarām nakha lūnam gātram ujjavala tayā na kha lūnam

original: kṣobhamāśu hṛdayaṃ nayadūnāṃ rāgavṛddhimakaronna yadūnām // MSpv_10.90 //
analyzed: kṣobham āśu hṛdayam nayat ūnām rāga vṛddhim akarot na yadūnām
iti mada madanābhyām rāgiṇaḥ spaṣṭa rāga na nava rata rata śrī saṅginaḥ tān avekṣya

original: abhajata parivṛttiṃ sātha paryastahastā rajaniravanatendurlajjayādhomukhīva // MSpv_10.91 //
analyzed: abhajata parivṛttim sā atha paryasta hastā rajaniḥ avanata induḥ lajjayā adhomukhī iva

original: śrutisamadhikamuccaiḥ pañcamaṃ pīḍayantaḥ satatamamṛṣabhahīnaṃ bhinnakīkṛtya ṣaḍjam /
analyzed: śruti samadhikam uccais pañcamam pīḍayantaḥ satatamam ṛṣabha hīnam bhinnakīkṛtya ṣaḍjam
praṇijagaduḥ a kāku śrāvaka snigdha kaṇṭhāḥ pariṇatim iti rātreḥ māgadhāḥ mādhavāya
rati rabhasa vilāsa abhyāsa tāntam na yāvat nayana yugam amīlat tāvat eva ahataḥ sau
rajani virati śaṃsī kāminīnām bhaviṣyat viraha vihita nidrā bhaṅgam uccais mṛdaṅgaḥ
sphuṭataram upariṣṭāt alpa mūrteḥ dhruvasya sphurati sura munīnām maṇḍalam vyastamet

original: śakaṭamiva mahīyaḥ śaiśave śārṅgapāṇeś capalacaraṇakābjapreraṇottuṅgitāgram // MSpv_11.2 //
analyzed: śakaṭam iva mahīyaḥ śaiśave śārṅgapāṇeḥ capala caraṇaka abja preraṇa uttuṅgita agram
praharakam apanīya svam nididrāsata uccais pratipadam upahūtaḥ kenacid jāgṛhi iti

original: muhuraviśadavarṇāṃ nidrayā śūnyaśūnyāṃ dadadapi giramantarbuddhyate no manuṣyaḥ // MSpv_11.4 //
analyzed: muhur a viśada varṇām nidrayā śūnya śūnyām dadat api giram antar buddhyate naḥ manuṣyaḥ
vipulatara nitamba ābhoga ruddhe ramaṇyāḥ śayitum an adhigacchan jīvita īśaḥ vakāśam

original: ratiparicayanaśyannaindratandraḥ kathañcid gamayati śayanīye śarvarī kiṃ karotu // MSpv_11.5 //
analyzed: rati paricaya naśyan aindratandraḥ kathañcid gamayati śayanīye śarvarī kim karotu

original: kṣaṇaśayitavibuddhāḥ kalpayantaḥ prayogān udadhimahati rājye kāvyavaddurvigāhe /
analyzed: kṣaṇa śayita vibuddhāḥ kalpayantaḥ prayogān udadhi mahati rājye kāvya vat durvigāhe
gahanam apararātra prāpta buddhi prasādāḥ kavayaḥ iva mahīpāḥ cintayanti artha jātam
kṣiti taṭa śayana antāt utthitam dāna paṅga pluta bahula śarīram śāyayati eṣa bhūyas
mṛdu calat apara anta udīrita andū ninādam gaja patim adhirohaḥ pakṣaka vyatyayena
drutatara kara dakṣāḥ kṣipta vaiśakha śaile dadhati dadhani dhīrān āravān vāriṇi iva

original: śaśinamiva suraughāḥsāramuddhartumete kalaśimudadhigurvī vallavā loḍayanti // MSpv_11.8 //
analyzed: śaśinam iva sura oghāḥ sāram uddhartum ete kalaśim udadhi gurvī vallavāḥ loḍayanti

original: anunayamagṛhītvā vyājasuptā parācī rutamatha kṛkavākostāramākarṇya kalpe /
analyzed: anunayam a gṛhītvā vyāja suptā parācī rutam atha kṛkavākoḥ tāram ākarṇya kalpe

original: kathamapi parivṛttā nidrayāndhā kila strī mukulitanayanaivā śiliṣyati prāṇanātham // MSpv_11.9 //
analyzed: katham api parivṛttā nidrayā andhā kila strī mukulita nayanā evā śiliṣyati prāṇanātham
gatam anugata vīṇaiḥ eka tām veṇu nādaiḥ kalama vikala tālam gāyakaiḥ bodha hetoḥ

original: asakṛdanavagītaṃ gītamākarṇayantaḥ sukhamukulitanetrā yānti nidrāṃ narendrāḥ // MSpv_11.10 //
analyzed: asakṛt anavagītam gītam ākarṇayantaḥ sukha mukulita netrāḥ yānti nidrām narendrāḥ
pariśithilita karṇa grīvam āmīlita akṣaḥ kṣaṇam ayam anubhūya svapnam ūrdhvajñuḥ eva

original: rirasayiṣati bhūyaḥ śaṣpamagre vikīrṇaṃ paṭutaracapalauṣṭhaḥ prasphuratprothamaśvaḥ // MSpv_11.11 //
analyzed: rirasayiṣati bhūyas śaṣpam agre vikīrṇam paṭutara capala oṣṭhaḥ prasphurat protham aśvaḥ

original: udayamuditadīptiryāti yaḥ saṃgatau me patati na varaminduḥ so 'parāmeṣa gatvā /
analyzed: udayam udita dīptiḥ yāti yaḥ saṃgatau me patati na varam induḥ saḥ u parām eṣa gatvā

original: smitaruciriva sadyaḥ sābhyasūyaṃ prabheti sphurati viśadameṣā pūrvakāṣṭhāṅganāyāḥ // MSpv_11.12 //
analyzed: smita ruciḥ iva sadyas sa abhyasūyam prabhā iti sphurati viśadam eṣā pūrva kāṣṭhā aṅganāyāḥ

original: ciraratiparikheda prāptanidrāsukhānāṃ caramamapi śayitvā pūrvameva prabuddhāḥ /
analyzed: cira rati parikheda prāpta nidrā sukhānām caramam api śayitvā pūrvam eva prabuddhāḥ
a paricalita gātrāḥ kurvatena priyāṇām aśithila bhuja cakra āśleṣa bhedam taruṇyaḥ
kṛta dhavalim abhedaiḥ kuṅkumena iva kiñcid malaya ruha rajobhiḥ bhūṣayan paścima āśām
hima ruciḥ aruṇimnā rājate rajyamānaiḥ jaraṭha kamala kanda cheda gauraiḥ mayūkhaiḥ
dadhat a sakalam ekam śriyam aparama pūrṇām ucchvasadbhiḥ palāśaiḥ

original: kalaravamupagīte ṣaṭpadaughena dhattaḥ kumudakamala ṣaṇḍe tulyarūpāmavasthām // MSpv_11.15 //
analyzed: kala ravam upagīte ṣaṭpada oghena dhattaḥ kumuda kamala ṣaṇḍe tulya rūpām avasthām

original: madarucimaruṇenodgacchatā lambhitasya tyajata iva cirāya sthāyinīmāśu lajjām /
analyzed: mada rucim aruṇena udgacchatā lambhitasya tyajataḥ iva cirāya sthāyinīm āśu lajjām

original: vasanamiva mukhasya sraṃsate saṃpratīdaṃ sitakarakarajālaṃ vāsavāśāyuvatyāḥ // MSpv_11.16 //
analyzed: vasanam iva mukhasya sraṃsate saṃprati idam sita kara kara jālam vāsava āśā yuvatyāḥ
avirata rata līlāyāḥ sajāta śramāṇām upaśamam upayāntam niḥsahe ṅge ṅganānām

original: punaruṣasi viviktaimarmātariśvāvacūrṇya jvalayati madanāgniṃ mālatīnāṃ rajobhiḥ // MSpv_11.17 //
analyzed: punar uṣasi viviktaiḥ marmātariśvā avacūrṇya jvalayati madana agnim mālatīnām rajobhiḥ
animiṣam avirāmāḥ rāgiṇām sarvarātram nava nidhuvana līlāḥ kautukena ati vīkṣya
idam udavasitānām asphuṭa āloka saṃpad nayanam iva sa nidram ghūrṇate daipam arciḥ
vikaca kamala gandhaiḥ andhayan bhṛṅga mālāḥ surabhita makarandam mandam āvāti vātaḥ
lulita nayana tārāḥ kṣāma vaktra indu bimbāḥ rajanayaḥ iva nindrā klānta nīlotpala akṣyaḥ

original: timiramiva dadhānāḥ sraṃsinaḥ keśapāśān avanipatigṛhebhyo yāntyamūrvāravadhvaḥ // MSpv_11.20 //
analyzed: timiram iva dadhānāḥ sraṃsinaḥ keśapāśān avanipati gṛhebhyaḥ yānti amūḥ vāra vadhvaḥ
śiśirakiraṇa kāntam vāsara ante bhisārya śvasana surabhi gandhiḥ sāmpratam sa tvarā iva

original: vrajati rajanireṣā tanmayūkhāṅgarāgaiḥ parimalitamanindyairambarāntaṃ vahantī // MSpv_11.21 //
analyzed: vrajati rajaniḥ eṣā tad mayūkha aṅgarāgaiḥ parimalitam anindyaiḥ ambara antam vahantī
nava kumuda vana śrī hāsa keli prasaṅgāt adhika rucira śeṣām api uṣām jāgaritvā

original: ayamaparadiśo 'ṅge muñcati srastahastaḥ śiśayiṣurapi pāṇḍuṃ mlānamātmānaminduḥ // MSpv_11.22 //
analyzed: ayam apara diśaḥ ṅge muñcati srasta hastaḥ śiśayiṣuḥ api pāṇḍum mlānam ātmānam induḥ
sa rabhasa parirambha ārambha saṃrambha bhājā yat adhi niśam apāstam vallabhena aṅganāyāḥ

original: vasanamapi niśānte neṣyate tatpradātu rathacaraṇaviśālaśreṇilolekṣaṇena // MSpv_11.23 //
analyzed: vasanam api niśā ante na iṣyate tat pradātu ratha caraṇa viśāla śreṇi lola īkṣaṇena

original: sapadi kumudinībhirmīlitaṃ hā kṣapāpi kṣayamagamadapetāstārakāstāḥ samastāḥ /
analyzed: sapadi kumudinībhiḥ mīlitam hā kṣapā api kṣayam agamat apetāḥ tārakāḥ tāḥ samastāḥ

original: iti dayitakalatraścintayannaṅgamindur vahati kṛśamaśeṣaṃ bhraṣṭaśobhaṃ śuceva // MSpv_11.24 //
analyzed: iti dayita kalatraḥ cintayan aṅgam induḥ vahati kṛśam aśeṣam bhraṣṭa śobham śucā iva
vrajati viṣayam akṣṇām aṃśumālī na yāvat timiram akhilam astam tāvat eva aruṇena

original: paraparibhavi tejastanvatāmāśu kartuṃ prabhavati hi vipakṣocchedamagresaro 'pi // MSpv_11.25 //
analyzed: para paribhavi tejaḥ tanvatām āśu kartum prabhavati hi vipakṣa ucchedam agresaraḥ pi

original: vigatatimirapaṅgaṃ paśyati vyoma yāvad dhuvati virahakhinnaḥ pakṣatī yāvadeva /
analyzed: vigata timira paṅgam paśyati vyoma yāvat dhuvati viraha khinnaḥ pakṣatī yāvat eva
rathacaraṇa samāhvaḥ tāvat autsukya nunnā sarit apara taṭa antāt āgatā cakravākī
mudita yuva manaskāḥ tulyam eva pradoṣe rucam adadhuḥ ubhayyaḥ kalpitāḥ bhūṣitāḥ ca
parimala rucirābhiḥ nyakkṛtāḥ tu prabhāte yuvatibhiḥ upabhogāt nīrucaḥ puṣpa mālāḥ
vilulita kamala oghaḥ kīrṇa vallī vitānaḥ prativanam avadhūta aśeṣa śākhi prasūnaḥ
kvacid ayam anavasthaḥ sthāsnu tām eti vāyuḥ vadhu kusuma vimardet gandhi veśma antareṣu

original: nakhapadavalinābhīsandhibhāgeṣu lakṣyaḥ kṣatiṣu ca daśanānāmaṅganāyāḥ saśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: nakha pada vali nābhī sandhi bhāgeṣu lakṣyaḥ kṣatiṣu ca daśanānām aṅganāyāḥ sa śeṣaḥ

original: api rahasi kṛtānāṃ vāgvihīno 'pijātaḥ suratavilasitānāṃ varṇako varṇako 'sau // MSpv_11.29 //
analyzed: api rahasi kṛtānām vāc vihīnaḥ pi jātaḥ surata vilasitānām varṇakaḥ sau
prakaṭa malina lakṣmā mṛṣṭa patra avalīkaiḥ adhigata rati śobhaiḥ pratyuṣaḥ proṣita śrīḥ

original: upahasita ivāsau cāndramāḥ kāminīnāṃ pariṇataśarakāṇḍāpāṇḍubhirgaṇḍabhāgaiḥ // MSpv_11.30 //
analyzed: upahasitaḥ iva asau cāndramāḥ kāminīnām pariṇata śara kāṇḍa āpāṇḍubhiḥ gaṇḍa bhāgaiḥ
sakalam api nikāmam kāma lolāni anārī rati rabhasa vimardaiḥ bhinnavati aṅgarāge

original: idamatimahadevāścaryamāścaryadhāmnastava khalu mukharāgo yanna bhedaṃ prayātaḥ // MSpv_11.31 //
analyzed: idam ati mahat eva āścaryam āścarya dhāmnaḥ tava khalu mukha rāgaḥ yat na bhedam prayātaḥ

original: prakaṭataramimaṃ mā drākṣuranyā ramaṇyaḥ sphuṭamiti saviśaṅgaṃ kāntayā tulyavarṇaḥ /
analyzed: prakaṭataram imam mā drākṣuḥ anyāḥ ramaṇyaḥ sphuṭam iti sa viśaṅgam kāntayā tulya varṇaḥ

original: caraṇatalasarojākrāntisaṃkrāntayāsau vapuṣi nakhavilekho lākṣayā rakṣitaste // MSpv_11.32 //
analyzed: caraṇa tala saroja ākrānti saṃkrāntayā asau vapuṣi nakha vilekhaḥ lākṣayā rakṣitaḥ te
tat avitatham avādīḥ yat mama tvam priya jana paribhuktam yat dukūlam dadhānaḥ

original: madadhivasatimāgāḥkāmināṃ maṇḍanaśrīrvrajati hi saphalatvaṃ vallabhālokanena // MSpv_11.33 //
analyzed: mad adhivasatim āgāḥ kāminām maṇḍana śrīḥ vrajati hi sa phala tvam vallabha ālokanena

original: navanakhapadamaṅgaṃ gopayasyaṃśukena sthagayasi punaroṣṭhaṃ pāṇinā dantadaṣṭam /
analyzed: nava nakha padam aṅgam gopayasi aṃśukena sthagayasi punar oṣṭham pāṇinā danta daṣṭam

original: pratidiśamaparastrīsaṅgaśaṃsī visarpannavaparimalagandhaḥ kena śakyo varītum // MSpv_11.34 //
analyzed: pratidiśam apara strī saṅga śaṃsī visarpat nava parimala gandhaḥ kena śakyaḥ varītum
iti kṛta vacanāyāḥ kaścid abhetya bibhyat galita nayana vāreḥ yāti pāda avanāmam

original: karuṇamapi samarthaṃ mānināṃ mānabhede ruditamuditamastraṃ yoṣitāṃ vigraheṣu // MSpv_11.35 //
analyzed: karuṇam api samartham māninām mānabhede ruditam uditam astram yoṣitām vigraheṣu
