madana madana vikāsa spaṣṭa dhārṣṭyedayānām rati kalaha vikīrṇaiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ arciteṣu

original: vidadhati na gṛheṣūtphullapuṣpopahāraṃ viphalavinayayatnāḥ kāminīnāṃ vayasyāḥ // MSpv_11.36 //
analyzed: vidadhati na gṛheṣu utphulla puṣpa upahāram viphala vinaya yatnāḥ kāminīnām vayasyāḥ
karaja daśana cihnam niśam aṅge nya nārī janitam iti sa roṣam īrṣyayā śaṅkamānām

original: smarasi na khalu dattaṃ mattayaitattvayaiva striyamanunayatītthaṃ vrīḍamānāṃ vilāsī // MSpv_11.37 //
analyzed: smarasi na khalu dattam mattayā etat tvayā eva striyam anunayati ittham vrīḍamānām vilāsī
kṛta gurutara hāra chedam āliṅgya patyau pariśithilita gātre gantum āpṛcchamāne
vigalita nava muktā sthūla bhāṣpa ambu bindu stana yugam abalāyāḥ tad kṣaṇam roditi iva

original: bahujagadapurastāttasya mattā kilāhaṃ cakara ca kila cāṭu prauḍhayoṣidvadasya /
analyzed: bahu jagat a purastāt tasya mattā kila aham cakara ca kila cāṭu prauḍha yoṣit vadasya

original: viditamiti sakhībhyo rātrivṛttaṃ vicintya vyapagatamadayāhni vrīḍitaṃ mugdhavadhvā // MSpv_11.39 //
analyzed: viditam iti sakhībhyaḥ rātri vṛttam vicintya vyapagatam adayā ahni vrīḍitam mugdha vadhvā
aruṇa jalaja rājī mugdha hasta agra pādā bahula madhupa mālā kajjala indīvara akṣī

original: anupatati virāvaiḥ patriṇāṃ vyāharantī rajanimacirajātā pūrvasandhyā suteva // MSpv_11.40 //
analyzed: anupatati virāvaiḥ patriṇām vyāharantī rajanim acira jātā pūrva sandhyā sutā iva
pratiśaraṇam a śīrṇa jyotiḥ agni āhitānām vidhi vihita viribdhaiḥ sāmidhenīḥ adhītya
kṛta guru durita ogha dhvaṃsam adhvaryu varyaiḥ huta mayam upalīḍhe sādhu sāmnāyyam agniḥ
prakṛta japa vidhīnām āsyam ud raśmi dantam muhur apihitam oṣṭhyaiḥ akṣaraiḥ lakṣyam anyaiḥ

original: anukṛtimanuvelaṃ ghaṭṭitodghaṭṭitasya vrajati niyamabhājāṃ mugdhamuktāpuṭasya // MSpv_11.42 //
analyzed: anukṛtim anuvelam ghaṭṭita udghaṭṭitasya vrajati niyama bhājām mugdha muktāpuṭasya

original: navakanakapiśaṅgaṃ vāsarāṇāṃ vidhātuḥ kakubhi kuliśapāṇerbhāti bhāsāṃ vitānam /
analyzed: nava kanaka piśaṅgam vāsarāṇām vidhātuḥ kakubhi kuliśa pāṇeḥ bhāti bhāsām vitānam
janita bhuvana dāha ārambham ambhāṃsi dagdhvā jvalitam iva mahā abdheḥ ūrdhva maurva anala arciḥ
vitata pṛthu varatrā atulya rūpaiḥ mayūkhaiḥ kalaśaḥ iva garīyān digbhiḥ ākṛṣyamāṇaḥ
kṛta capala vihaṅga ālāpa kolāhalābhiḥ jalanidhi jala madhyāt eṣa uttāryate īrkaḥ
payasi salilarāśeḥ naktam antar nimagnaḥ sphuṭam aniśam atāpi jvālayā bāḍava agneḥ
yat ayam idam idānīm aṅgam udyan dadhāti jvalita khadira kāṣṭha aṅgāra gauram vivasvān

original: atuhinarucināsau kevalaṃ nodayādriḥ kṣaṇamuparigatena kṣmābhṛtaḥ sarva eva /
analyzed: a tuhina rucinā asau kevalam na udayādriḥ kṣaṇam upari gatena kṣmābhṛtaḥ sarve eva
nava kara nikareṇa spaṣṭa bandhūka sūna stabaka racitam ete śekharam bibhratī iva
udaya śikhari śṛṅga prāṅgaṇeṣu eva riṅgan sa kamala mukha hāsam vīkṣitaḥ padminībhiḥ

original: vitatamṛdukarāgraḥ śabdayantyā vayobhiḥ paripatati divo 'ṅgake helayā bālasūryaḥ // MSpv_11.47 //
analyzed: vitata mṛdu kara agraḥ śabdayantyā vayobhiḥ paripatati divaḥ ṅgake helayā bāla sūryaḥ
kṣaṇam ayam upaviṣṭaḥ kṣmā tala nyasta pādaḥ praṇati param avekṣya prītam ahne lokam
bhuvana talam aśeṣam pratyavekṣiṣyamāṇaḥ kṣitidhara pīṭhāt utthitaḥ saptasaptiḥ
pariṇata madirā ābham bhāskareṇa uṃśu bāṇaiḥ timira kari ghaṭāyāḥ sarva dikṣu kṣatāyāḥ

original: rudhiramiva vahantyo bhānti bālātapenacchuritamubhayarodhovāritaṃ vāri nadyaḥ // MSpv_11.49 //
analyzed: rudhiram iva vahantyaḥ bhānti bāla ātapena churitam ubhaya rodhaḥ vāritam vāri nadyaḥ
dadhati paripatantyaḥ jālavātāyanebhyaḥ taruṇa tapana bhāsaḥ mandira abhyantareṣu

original: praṇayiṣu vanitānāṃ prātaricchatsu gantuṃ kupitamadanamuktottaptanārācalīlām // MSpv_11.50 //
analyzed: praṇayiṣu vanitānām prātar icchatsu gantum kupita madana mukta uttapta nārāca līlām
adhirajani vadhūbhiḥ pīta maireya riktam kanaka caṣakam etat rocanā lohitena
udayat a hima rociḥ jyotiṣā ākrāntam antar madhunaḥ iva tathā eva āpūrṇam adyā api bhāti
sita ruci śayanīye naktam ekāntam uktam dinakara kara saṅga vyakta kausumbha kānti

original: nijamiti ratibandhorjānatīmuttarīyaṃ parihasati sakhī strīmādadānāṃ dinādau // MSpv_11.52 //
analyzed: nijam iti ratibandhoḥ jānatīm uttarīyam parihasati sakhī strīm ādadānām dina ādau
plutam iva śiśirāṃśoḥ aṃśubhiḥ yat niśāsu sphaṭika maya rājat rājata adri sthala ābham
aruṇitam a kaṭhoraiḥ veśma kāśmīraja ambhaḥ snapitam iva tat etat bhānubhiḥ bhāti bhānoḥ
sa rasa nakha pada antar daṣṭa keśa pramokam praṇayini vidadhāne yoṣitām ullasantyaḥ

original: vidadhati daśanānāṃ sītkṛtāviṣkṛtānām abhinavaravibhāsaḥ padmarāgānukāram // MSpv_11.54 //
analyzed: vidadhati daśanānām sītkṛta āviṣkṛtānām abhinava ravi bhāsaḥ padmarāga anukāram
avirata dayita aṅga āsaṅga sañcaritena churitam abhinava asṛj kāntinā kuṅkumena

original: kanakanikaṣarekhā komalaṃ kāminīnāṃ bhavati vapuravāptacchāyamevātape 'pi // MSpv_11.55 //
analyzed: kanaka nikaṣa rekhā komalam kāminīnām bhavati vapuḥ avāpta chāyam evā ātape
sarasija vana kāntam bibhrat abhrānta vṛttiḥ kara nayana sahasram hetum āloka śakteḥ

original: akhilamatimahimnā lokamākrāntavantaṃ haririva haridaśvaḥ sādhu vṛtraṃ hinasti // MSpv_11.56 //
analyzed: akhila mati mahimnā lokam ākrāntavantam hariḥ iva haridaśvaḥ sādhu vṛtram hinasti
avatamasa bhidāyai bhāsvatā ami udgatena prasabham uḍu gaṇaḥ sau darśanīyaḥ pi apāstaḥ
nirasitum arim icchoḥ ye tadīya āśrayeṇa śriyam adhigatavantaḥ te hantavya pakṣe
pratiphalati kara oghe saṃmukha avasthitāyām rajata kaṭaka bhittau sāndra candra aṃśu gauryām

original: bahirabhihatamadreḥ saṃhataṃ kandarāntargatamapi timiraughaṃ gharmabhānurbhinatti // MSpv_11.58 //
analyzed: bahis abhihatam adreḥ saṃhatam kandara antargatam api timira ogham gharmabhānuḥ bhinatti

original: bahirapi vilasantyaḥ kāmamāninyire yad divasakararuco 'ntaṃ dhvāntamantargṛheṣu /
analyzed: bahis api vilasantyaḥ kāmam āninyire yat divasakara rucaḥ dhvāntam antargṛheṣu
niyata viṣaya vṛtteḥ api analpa pratāpa kṣata sakala vipakṣaḥ tejasaḥ sa svabhāvaḥ

original: ciramatirasalaulyādbandhanaṃ lambhitānāṃ punarayamudayāya prāpya dhāma svameva /
analyzed: ciram ati rasa laulyāt bandhanam lambhitānām punar ayam udayāya prāpya dhāma svam eva

original: dalitadalakapāṭaḥ ṣaṭpadānāṃ saroje sarabhasa iva guptisphoṭamarkaḥ karoti // MSpv_11.60 //
analyzed: dalita dala kapāṭaḥ ṣaṭpadānām saroje sa rabhasaḥ iva gupti sphoṭam arkaḥ karoti
yuga pada yuga saptiḥ tulya saṃkhyaiḥ mayūkhaiḥ daśa śata dala bhedam kautukena āśu kṛtvā
śriyam ali kula gītaiḥ lālitām paṅkaja antar bhavanam adhiśayānām ādarāt paśyati iva

original: adayamiva karāgraireṣa nipīḍya sadyaḥ śaśadharamaharādau rāgavānuṣṇaraśmiḥ /
analyzed: adayam iva kara agraiḥ eṣa nipīḍya sadyas śaśadharam ahar ādau rāgavān uṣṇaraśmiḥ
avakirati nitāntam kānti niryāsam abda sruta nava jala pāṇḍum puṇḍarīka udareṣu
pravikasati cirāya dyotita aśeṣa loke daśa śatakara mūrtā vakṣiṇi iva dvitīye

original: sitakaravapuṣāsau lakṣyate saṃprati dyaur vigalitakiraṇena vyaṅgitaikekṣaṇeva // MSpv_11.63 //
analyzed: sitakara vapuṣā asau lakṣyate saṃprati dyauḥ vigalita kiraṇena vyaṅgita eka īkṣaṇā iva
kumuda vanam apaśri śrīmat ambhoja ṣaṇḍam tyajati mudam ulūkaḥ prītimāḥ cakravākaḥ

original: udayamahimaraśmiryāti śītāṃśurastaṃ hatavidhilasitānāṃ hī vicitro vipākaḥ // MSpv_11.64 //
analyzed: udaya mahima raśmiḥ yāti śītāṃśuḥ astam hata vidhi lasitānām hī vicitraḥ vipākaḥ

original: kṣaṇamatuhinadhāmni preṣya bhūyaḥ purastād upagatavati pāṇigrāhavaddigvadhūnām /
analyzed: kṣaṇam a tuhina dhāmni preṣya bhūyas purastāt upagatavati pāṇigrāha vat diś vadhūnām

original: drutataramupayāti sraṃsamānāṃśuko 'sāv upapātiriti nīcaiḥ paścimāntena candraḥ // MSpv_11.65 //
analyzed: drutataram upayāti sraṃsamāna aṃśukaḥ sau upapātiḥ iti nīcais paścima antena candraḥ
pralayam akhila tārā lokam ahne nītvā śriyam anatiśaya śrīḥ sa anurāgām dadhānaḥ

original: gaganasalilarāśiṃ rātrikalpāvasāne madhuripuriva bhāsvāneṣa eko 'dhiśete // MSpv_11.66 //
analyzed: gagana salila rāśim rātri kalpa avasāne madhuripuḥ iva bhāsvān eṣaḥ ekaḥ dhiśete
kṛta sakala jagat vibodhaḥ vadhūta andhakāra udayaḥ kṣayita kumuda tāraka śrīḥ viyogam nayan kāminaḥ

original: bahutaraguṇadarśanādabhyupetālpadoṣaḥ kṛtī tava varada karotu suprātamahnāmayaṃ nāyakaḥ // MSpv_11.67 //
analyzed: bahutara guṇa darśanāt abhyupeta alpa doṣaḥ kṛtī tava vara da karotu su prātam ahnām ayam nāyakaḥ

original: itthaṃ rathāśvebhaniṣādināṃ prage gaṇo nṛpāṇāmatha toraṇādbahiḥ /
analyzed: ittham ratha aśva ibha niṣādinām prage gaṇaḥ nṛpāṇām atha toraṇāt bahis
prasthāna kāla kṣama veṣa kalpanā kṛtakṣaṇa kṣepam udaikṣata acyutam
svakṣam su patram kanaka ujvala dyutim javena nāgān jitavantam uccakais

original: āruhya tārkṣya nabhasīva bhūtale yayāvanudghātamukhena so 'dhvanā // MSpv_12.2 //
analyzed: āruhya tārkṣya nabhasi iva bhū tale yayau an udghāta mukhena saḥ dhvanā
hasta sthita ākhaṇḍita cakra śālinam dvaja indra kāntam śrita vakṣasam śriyā

original: satyānuraktaṃ narakasya jiṣṇavo guṇairnṛpāḥ śāṅgiṇamanyayāsiṣuḥ // MSpv_12.3 //
analyzed: satya anuraktam narakasya jiṣṇavaḥ guṇaiḥ nṛpāḥ śāṅgiṇam anya yāsiṣuḥ
śuklaiḥ sa tāraiḥ mukulīkṛtaiḥ sthūlaiḥ kumudvatīnām kumuda ākaraiḥ iva

original: vyuṣṭaṃ prayāṇaṃ ca viyogavedanāvidūnanārīkamabhūtsamaṃ tadā // MSpv_12.4 //
analyzed: vyuṣṭam prayāṇam ca viyoga vedanā vidūna nārīkam abhūt samam tadā
utkṣipta gātraḥ sma viḍambayan nabhaḥ samutpatiṣyantam aga indram uccakais
ākuñcita proha nirūpita kramam kareṇuḥ ārohayate niṣādinam
svairam kṛta āsphālana lalitān puras sphuratnūn darśita lāghava kriyāḥ
vaṅga avalagna eka savalga pāṇayaḥ turaṅgamān āruruhuḥ turaṅgiṇaḥ
ahnāya yāvat na cakāra bhūyase niṣedivān āsana bandham adhvane
tīvra utthitāḥ tāvat asahya raṃhasaḥ viśṛṅkhalam śṛṅkhalakāḥ pratasthire
gaṇḍa ujvalām ujjva nābhi cakrayā virājamānām navayā udara śriyā

original: kaścitsukhaṃ prāptumanāḥ susārathī rathīṃ yuyojādhidhurāṃ vadhūmiva // MSpv_12.8 //
analyzed: kaścid sukham prāptu manāḥ su sārathiḥ rathīm yuyoja adhi dhurām vadhūm iva
utthātum icchan vidhṛtaḥ puras balāt nidhīyamāne bhara bhāji yantrake

original: ardhojjhitodgāravijharjharasvaraḥ svanāma ninye ravaṇaḥ sphuṭārthatām // MSpv_12.9 //
analyzed: ardha ujjhita udgāra vijharjhara svaraḥ sva nāma ninye ravaṇaḥ sphuṭa artha tām
dhuvan viṣāṇayoḥ yugam sa sūtkāra vivartita trikaḥ

original: goṇīṃ janana sma nidhātumuddhṛtāmanukṣaṇaṃ nokṣataraḥ pratīcchati // MSpv_12.10 //
analyzed: goṇīm janana sma nidhātum uddhṛtām anukṣaṇam na ukṣataraḥ pratīcchati
nānāvidha āviṣkṛsām aja svaraḥ sahasra vartmā capalaiḥ duradhyayaḥ

original: gāndharvabhūyṣṭhatayā samānatāṃ sa sāmavedasya dadhau balodadhiḥ // MSpv_12.11 //
analyzed: gāndharva bhūyṣṭha tayā samāna tām sa sāmavedasya bala udadhiḥ
prati anya nāgam caltaḥ tarāvatā nirasya kuṇṭham dadhatā anyam aṅkuśam
mūrdhānam ūrdhva āyata danta maṇḍalam dhuvan arodhi dviradām niṣādinā
sa mūrcchat ucchṛṅkhala śaṅkha nisvanaḥ svanaḥ prayāte paṭahasya śārṅgiṇi

original: svānininye nitarāṃ mahāntyapi vyathāṃ dvayeṣāmapi medinīghṛtām // MSpv_12.13 //
analyzed: svānininye nitarām mahānti api vyathām dvayeṣām api medinī ghṛtām
kālīyaka kṣoda vilepana śriyam diśat diśam ullasat aṃśumat dyuti

original: khātaṃ khuraimudgabhujāṃ vipaprate gireradhaḥ kāñcanabhūmijaṃ rajaḥ // MSpv_12.14 //
analyzed: khātam khuraiḥ mudga bhujām vipaprate gireḥ adhas kāñcana bhūmi jam rajaḥ
mandra aigajānām ratha maṇḍala svanaiḥ nijuhnuve tādṛśam eva bṛṃhitam
tāraiḥ babhūve parabhāga lābhataḥ pariśphuṭaiḥ teṣu turaṅga heṣitaiḥ
anvetu kāmaḥ vamatā aṅguśa grahaḥ tirogatam sa aṅguśam udvahan śiraḥ
sthūla uccayena agamat antika gatām gajaḥ kareṇukām
yantaḥ spṛśantaḥ caraṇaiḥ iva avanim javāt prakīrṇaiḥ abhitas prakīrṇakaiḥ

original: adyāpi senāturagāḥ savismayairalūnapakṣā iva menire janaiḥ // MSpv_12.17 //
analyzed: adyā api senā turagāḥ sa vismayaiḥ a lūna pakṣāḥ iva menire janaiḥ
ṛjvīḥ dadhānaiḥ avatatya kandharāḥ cala avacūḍāḥ kalā gharghara rāravaiḥ
bhūmiḥ mahatī api avilambita kramam kramelakaiḥ takṣaṇam eva cicchide
tūrṇa praṇetrā kṛta nādam uccakais praṇoditam vesara yugma dhvani
ātmīya nemi kṣata sāndra medinī rajaḥ caya ākrānta bhayāt iva adravat
vyāvṛtta vaktraiḥ akhilaiḥ camū caraiḥ vrajidbhiḥ eva kṣaṇam īkṣita ānanāḥ
valgat garīyaḥ stana kampra kañcukam yayuḥ turaṅga adhiruhaḥ vara udhikāḥ

original: pādaiḥ puraḥ kūbariṇāṃ vidāritāḥ prakāmamākrāntatalāstato gajaiḥ /
analyzed: pādaiḥ puraḥ kūbariṇām vidāritāḥ prakāmam ākrānta talāḥ tatas gajaiḥ
bhagna unnata anantara pūrita antarāḥ babhuḥ bhuvaḥ kṛṣṭa samīkṛtāḥ iva
durduntam upakṛtya nirasta sādinam saha asahākāram alokayat janaḥ
paryāṇataḥ srastam uraḥ vilambinaḥ turaṅgamam pradrutam ekayā diśā
bhūbhṛdbhiḥ api a skhalitāḥ khalu unnataiḥ api apahnavānā saritaḥ pṛthūḥ api

original: anvarthasaṃjñayaiva paraṃ trimārgagā yayāvasaṃkhyaiḥ pathibhiścamūrasau // MSpv_12.23 //
analyzed: anvartha saṃjñayā eva param tri mārga gā yayau asaṃkhyaiḥ pathibhiḥ camūḥ asau
trastau samāsanna kareṇu sūtkṛtāt niyantari vyākula mukta rajjuke

original: kṣiptāvarodhāṅganamutpathena gāṃ vilaṅghya laghvīṃ karabhau babhañjatuḥ // MSpv_12.24 //
analyzed: kṣipta avarodha aṅganam utpathena gām vilaṅghya laghvīm karabhau babhañjatuḥ

original: srastāṅgasandhau vigatāśāpāṭave rujā nikāmaṃ vikalīkṛte rathe /
analyzed: srasta aṅga sandhau vigata āśā pāṭave rujā nikāmam vikalīkṛte rathe

original: āptena tatkṣaṇā bhiṣajeva tatkṣaṇaṃ pracakrame laṅghanapūrvakaḥ kramaḥ // MSpv_12.25 //
analyzed: āptena tad kṣaṇā bhiṣajā iva tad kṣaṇam pracakrame laṅghana pūrvakaḥ kramaḥ
dhūḥ bhaṅga saṃkṣobha vidārita uṣṭrikā galat madhu plāvita dūra vartmani

original: sthāṇau niṣaṅgiṇyanasi kṣaṇaṃ puraḥ śuśoca lābhāya kṛtakrayo vaṇik // MSpv_12.26 //
analyzed: sthāṇau niṣaṅgiṇi anasi kṣaṇam puras śuśoca lābhāya kṛta krayaḥ vaṇij
bheribhiḥ ākruṣṭa mahā guhā mukhaḥ dhvaja aṃśukaiḥ tarjita kandalī vanaḥ

original: uttaṅgamātaṅgajitālaghūpalo balaiḥ sa paścātkiyate sma bhūdharaḥ // MSpv_12.27 //
analyzed: uttaṅga mātaṅga jita a laghu upalaḥ balaiḥ sa paścāt kiyate sma bhūdharaḥ
vanya ibha dāna anila gandha da durdhurāḥ kṣaṇam taru cheda vinodita krudhaḥ
vyāla dvipāḥ yantṛbhiḥ unmatiṣṇavaḥ kathaṃcid īrāt apanayena ninyire
taiḥ vajayantī vana rāji rājibhiḥ giri praticchanda mahā mataṅga jaiḥ
bahvyaḥ prasarpat janatā nānadī śataiḥ bhuvaḥ balaiḥ antarāyām ababhūvire

original: tasthemuhūrta hariṇīvilocanaiḥ sadṛśi dṛṣṭvā nayanāni yoṣitām /
analyzed: tasthe muhūrta hariṇī vilocanaiḥ sadṛśi dṛṣṭvā nayanāni yoṣitām
tvā atha sa trāsam aneka vibhrama kriyā vikārāṇi mṛgaiḥ palāyyata

original: nimnāni duḥkhādavatārya sādibhiḥ sayatnamākṛṣṭakaśāḥ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ /
analyzed: nimnāni duḥkhāt avatārya sādibhiḥ sa yatnam ākṛṣṭa kaśāḥ śanais śanais
utteruḥ uttāla khura āravam drutāḥ ślathīkṛta pragraha marvatām vrajāḥ
adhyadhvam ārūḍhavatā eva kenacid pratīkṣamāṇena janam muhur dhṛtaḥ

original: dākṣyaṃ hi sadyaḥ phaladaṃ yadagrataścakhāda dāserayuvā vanāvalīḥ // MSpv_12.32 //
analyzed: dākṣyam hi sadyas phala dam yat agratas cakhāda dāsera yuvā vana āvalīḥ
śaureḥ pratāpa upanataiḥ itas tatas samāgataiḥ praśraya namra mūrtibhiḥ
eka atapatrā pṛthivībhṛtām gaṇaiḥ abhūt a bahu chātra tayā patākinī
āgacchataḥ nūci gajasya ghaṇḍayoḥ svanam samāpakarṇya samākula aṅganāḥ
dūra apavartita bhāra vāhaṇāḥ patho pasruḥ tvaritam camū carāḥ
ojasvi varṇa ujvala vṛtta śālinaḥ prasādinaḥ gotra saṃvidaḥ

original: ślokānupendrasya puraḥ sma bhūyaso guṇānsamuddiśya paṭhanti vandinaḥ // MSpv_12.35 //
analyzed: ślokān upendrasya puras sma bhūyasaḥ guṇān samuddiśya paṭhanti vandinaḥ
niḥśśeṣam ākrānta mahī talaḥ jalaiḥ calan samudraḥ pi samujjhati sthitim

original: grāmeṣu sainyairakarodavāritaiḥ kimavyavasthāṃ calito 'pi keśavaḥ // MSpv_12.36 //
analyzed: grāmeṣu sainyaiḥ akarot a vāritaiḥ kim avyavasthām calitaḥ pi keśavaḥ
kośātakī puṣpa guluccha kāntibhiḥ mukhaiḥ vinidrā ulbaṇa bāṇa cakṣuṣaḥ
grāmīṇa vadhvaḥ tam alakṣitāḥ janaiḥ ciram mṛtānām upari vyalokayan
goṣṭheṣu goṣṭhī kṛta maṇḍalāsanān sa nādam utthāya muhur sa valgataḥ
grāmyān apaśyat kapiśam pipāsataḥ sva gotra saṅkīrtana bhāvitātmanaḥ

original: paśyankṛtārthairapi vallavījano janādhināthaṃ na yayau vitṛṣṇatām /
analyzed: paśyan kṛtārthaiḥ api vallavī janaḥ janādhinātham na yayau vitṛṣṇa tām
ekānta maugdhyā an avabuddha vibhramaiḥ prasiddha vistāra guṇaiḥ vilocanaiḥ
prītyā niyuktān lihatī stanandhayān nigṛhya pārīm ubhayena jānunoḥ

original: vardhiṣṇudhārādhvani rohiṇīḥ payaściraṃ nidadhau duhataḥ sa goduhaḥ // MSpv_12.40 //
analyzed: vardhiṣṇu dhārā adhvani rohiṇīḥ payaḥ ciram nidadhau duhataḥ sa goduhaḥ
abhyājataḥ bhyāgata tūrṇa tarṇakān niryāṇa hastasya purodudhukṣataḥ
vargāt gavām huṃkṛti cāru niryatīm ariḥ madhoḥ aikṣata gomata tallikām
sa vrīhiṇām yāvat apāsitum gatāḥ śukān mṛgaiḥ tāvat upadruta śriyām

original: kaidārikāṇāmabhitaḥ samākulāḥ sahāsamālokayati sma gopikāḥ // MSpv_12.42 //
analyzed: kaidārikāṇām abhitas samākulāḥ sahāsam ālokayati sma gopikāḥ
vyeddhum asmān avadhānataḥ purā calati asau iti upakarṇayan asau

original: gītāni gopyāḥ kalamaṃ mṛgavrajo na nūnamattīti harivyalokayat // MSpv_12.43 //
analyzed: gītāni gopyāḥ kalamam mṛga vrajaḥ na nūnam atti iti hari vyalokayat
śaureḥ upānūpam āpāharat manaḥ svana antarāt unmada sāra sāravaḥ
uccais gatām askhalitām garīyasīm tadā ati dūrāt api tasya gacchataḥ
eke samūhuḥ bala reṇu saṃhatim śirobhiḥ ājñām apare mahībhṛtaḥ

original: prāyeṇa nīcānapi medinībhṛto janaḥ samenaiva pathādhirohati /
analyzed: prāyeṇa nīcān api medinībhṛtaḥ janaḥ samena eva pathā adhirohati

original: senā murāreḥ patha eva sā punarmahāmahīdhrānparito 'dhyarohayat // MSpv_12.46 //
analyzed: senā murāreḥ pathaḥ eva sā punar mahā mahīdhrān paritas dhyarohayat
danta agra nirbhinna payodam unmukhāḥ śiloccayān āruruhuḥ mahīyasaḥ
dvipāḥ
ścyota mat mada ambha kaṇakena kenacid janasya jīmūta kadambaka dyutā
nagena garīyasā uccakais arodhi panthāḥ pṛthu danta śālinā
bhagna drumāḥ cakruḥ itas tatas diśaḥ samullasat ketana nākulāḥ
piṣṭa adri pṛṣṭhāḥ tarasā ca dantinaḥ calat nija aṅga acala durgamāḥ bhuvaḥ
ālokayāmāsa hariḥ mahīdharān adhiśrayantīḥ gajatāḥ paraḥśatāḥ
utpāta vāta pratikūla pātinīḥ upatyakābhyaḥ bṛhatīḥ śilāḥ iva
śaila adhiroha abyasana adhika uddhuraiḥ payodharaiḥ āmalakī vana āśritāḥ
tam parvatīya pramadāḥ cacāyire vikāsa visphārita vibhrama īkṣaṇāḥ

original: sāvajñamunmīlya vilocane sakṛtkṣaṇaṃ mṛjendreṇa suṣupsunā punaḥ /
analyzed: sa avajñam unmīlya vilocane sakṛt kṣaṇam mṛja indreṇa suṣupsunā punar

original: sainyānna yātaḥ samayāpi vivyathe kathaṃ surājaṃbhavamanmathāthavā // MSpv_12.52 //
analyzed: sainyāt na yātaḥ samayā api vivyathe katham surājaṃbhava manmatha athavā
utsedha nirdhūta mahīruhām dhvajaiḥ jana avaruddha uddhata sindhu raṃhasām
nāgaiḥ adhikṣipta mahā śilam muhur balam babhūva upari tat mahībhṛtām

original: śmaśrūyamāṇe maghujālake tarorgajena gaṇḍaṃ kaṣatā vidhūnite /
analyzed: śmaśrūyamāṇe maghu jālake taroḥ gajena gaṇḍam kaṣatā vidhūnite
kṣudrābhiḥ akṣudratarābhiḥ ākulam vidaśyamānena janena dudruve
nīte palāśini ucite śarīravat gajāntakena anta mada anta karmaṇā

original: saṃcerurātmāna ivāparaṃ kṣaṇātkṣamāruhaṃ dehamiva plavaṃgamāḥ // MSpv_12.55 //
analyzed: saṃceruḥ ātmānaḥ iva aparam kṣaṇāt kṣamā ruham deham iva plavaṃgamāḥ
prahvān atīva kvacid uddhati śritaḥ kvacid prakāśān atha
sāmyāt apetān iti vāhinī hareḥ tadā aticakrāma girīn gurūn api

original: sa vyāptavatyā parito 'pathānyapi svasenayā sarvapathīnayā tayā /
analyzed: sa vyāptavatyā paritas pathāni api sva senayā sarva pathīnayā tayā

original: ambhobhirullaṅghita tuṅgarodhasaḥ pratīpanāmnīḥ kurute sma nimnagāḥ // MSpv_12.57 //
analyzed: ambhobhiḥ ullaṅghita tuṅga rodhasaḥ pratīpa nāmnīḥ kurute sma nimnagāḥ
yāvat vyagāhanta na dantinām ghaṭāḥ turaṅgamaiḥ tāvat udīritam khuraiḥ

original: kṣiptaṃ samīraiḥ saritāṃ puraḥ patajjalānyanaiṣīdraja eva paṅkatām // MSpv_12.58 //
analyzed: kṣiptam samīraiḥ saritām puras patat jalāni anaiṣīt rajaḥ eva paṅka tām
rantum kṣata uttuṅga nitamba bhūmayaḥ muhur vrajantaḥ pramadam mada uddhatāḥ
paṅgam kara apākṛta śaivala aṃśukāḥ samudragāṇām udapādayat nibhāḥ
rugṇa ūru rodhaḥ paripūrita ambhasaḥ samasthalīkṛtya purātanīḥ nadīḥ
kūlaṃkaṣa oghāḥ saritastha aparāḥ pravartayāmāsuḥ ibhāḥ mada ambubhiḥ
padmaiḥ an anvīta vadhū mukha dyutaḥ gatāḥ na haṃsaiḥ śriyam ātapatra jām
dūre bhavan bhojavalayasya gacchataḥ śaila upama atīta gajasya nimnagāḥ
snagdha añjana śyāma tanūbhiḥ unnataiḥ nirantarālā kariṇām kadambakaiḥ

original: senā sudhākṣālitasaudhasaṃpadāṃ purāṃ bahūnāṃ parabhāgamāpa sā // MSpv_12.62 //
analyzed: senā sudhā kṣālita saudha saṃpadām purām bahūnām parabhāgam āpa sā
prāsada śobhā atiśayālubhiḥ pathi prabho nivāsāḥ paṭaveśmabhiḥ babhuḥ

original: nūnaṃ sahānena viyogaviklavā puraḥ puraśrīrapi niryayau tadā // MSpv_12.63 //
analyzed: nūnam saha anena viyoga viklavā puras pura śrīḥ api niryayau tadā
varṣma dvipānām viruvantaḥ uccakais vanecarebhyaḥ ciram ācacakṣire
āyāmavadbhiḥ kariṇām ghaṭā śataiḥ adhas kṛta aṭṭāla sa paṅktiḥ uccakais

original: dūṣyairjitodagragṛhāṇi sā camūratītya bhūyāṃsi purāṇyavartata // MSpv_12.65 //
analyzed: dūṣyaiḥ jita udagra gṛhāṇi sā camūḥ atītya bhūyāṃsi purāṇi avartata
uddhūtam uccais dhvajinābhiḥ aṃśubhiḥ prataptam abhyarṇa tayā vivasvataḥ

original: āhlādikahlārasamīraṇāhate puraḥ papātāmbhasi yamune rajaḥ // MSpv_12.66 //
analyzed: āhlādi kahlāra samīraṇa āhate puras papāta ambhasi yamuneḥ rajaḥ

original: yā gharmabhānostanayāpi śītalaiḥ svasā yamasyāpi janasya jīvanaiḥ /
analyzed: yā gharmabhānoḥ tanayā api śītalaiḥ svasā yamasya api janasya jīvanaiḥ

original: kṛṣṇāpi śuddheradhikaṃ vidhātṛbhirvihantumahāṃsi jalaiḥ paṭīyasī // MSpv_12.67 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇā api śuddheḥ adhikam vidhātṛbhiḥ vihantu mahāṃsi jalaiḥ paṭīyasī

original: yasyā mahānīlataṭīriva drutāḥ prayānti pītvā himapiṇḍapāṇḍurāḥ /
analyzed: yasyāḥ mahā nīla taṭīḥ iva drutāḥ prayānti pītvā hima piṇḍa pāṇḍurāḥ
kālīrapāḥ tābhiḥ iva anurañjitāḥ kṣaṇena bhinnāñjana vartāḥ ghanāḥ

original: vyaktaṃ balīyān yadi heturāgamādapūrayatsā jaladhiṃ na jāhnavī /
analyzed: vyaktam balīyān yadi hetuḥ āgamāt apūrayat sā jaladhim na jāhnavī
gaṅgā ogha nirbhasmita śambhu kandharā savarṇam arṇaḥ katham anyathā asya tat

original: abhyudyatasya kramituṃ javena gāṃ tamālanīlā girāṃ dhṛtāyatiḥ /
analyzed: abhyudyatasya kramitum javena gām tamāla nīlā girām dhṛta āyatiḥ

original: sīmeva sā tasya puraḥ kṣaṇaṃ babhau balāmburāśermahato mahāpagā // MSpv_12.70 //
analyzed: sīmā iva sā tasya puras kṣaṇam babhau bala amburāśeḥ mahataḥ mahā āpagā
lolaiḥ aritraiḥ caraṇaiḥ iva abhitas javāt vrajantībhiḥ asau sarit janaiḥ
naubhiḥ pratere paritas plava udita bhramī nimīlat lalanā avalambitaiḥ

original: tatpūrvamaṃsadvayasaṃ dvipādhipāḥ kṣaṇaṃ sahelāḥ parito jagāhire /
analyzed: tad pūrvam aṃsa dvayasam dvipa adhipāḥ kṣaṇam sa helāḥ paritas jagāhire
sadyas tatas teruḥ anārata sruta sva dānava ari pracurīkṛtam payaḥ
prothaiḥ sphuradbhiḥ sphuṭa śabdam unmukhaiḥ turaṅgamaiḥ āyata kīrṇa vāladhi
utkarṇam udvāhita dhīra kandharaiḥ atīryata agre taṭa datta dṛṣṭibhiḥ

original: tīrtvā janenaiva nitāntadustarāṃ nadīṃ pratijñāmiva tāṃ garīyasīm /
analyzed: tīrtvā janena eva nitānta dustarām nadīm pratijñām iva tām garīyasīm
śṛṅgaiḥ apaskīrṇa mahat taṭī bhuvām aśobhata uccais naditam kakudmatām
sīmantyamānā yadu bhūbhṛtām balaiḥ babhau taridbhiḥ gavala asita dyutiḥ
sindūrita aneka pakaṅgaṇa aṅkitā taraṅgiṇī veṇiḥ iva āyatā bhuvaḥ
avyāhata kṣipra gataiḥ samucchrita an anujjhita drāmabiḥ garīyasaḥ
nāvyam payaḥ kecid atāriṣuḥ bhujaiḥ kṣipadbhiḥ ūrmīn aparaiḥ iva ūrmibhiḥ
vidalita mahā kūlām ukṣṇām viṣāṇa vighaṭṭanaiḥ alaghu caraṇa ākṛṣṭa grāhām vipaṇibhiḥ unmadaiḥ

original: sapadi saritaṃ sā śrībharturbṛhadrathamaṇḍalaskhalilamullaṅghyaināṃ jagāma varūthinī // MSpv_12.77 //
analyzed: sapadi saritam sā śrī bhartuḥ bṛhat ratha maṇḍala skhalilam ullaṅghya enām jagāma varūthinī
yamunām atītam atha śuśruvānam umum tapasaḥ tanūjaḥ iti na adhunā ucyate

original: sa yadācalannijapurādaharniśaṃ nṛpatestadādi samacāri vārtayā // MSpv_13.1 //
analyzed: sa yadā acalat nija purāt aharniśam nṛpateḥ tad ādi samacāri vārtayā
yadu bhartuḥ āgamana labdha janmanaḥ pramadā damān iva pure mahīyasi
sahasā tatas sa sahitaḥ nu janmabhiḥ vasudhādhipaḥ bhimukham asya niryayau
rabhasa pravṛtta kuru cakra dundubhi dhvanibhiḥ janasya badhirīkṛta śruteḥ
samavādi vaktṛbhiḥ abhīṣṭa saṅkathā prakṛta artha śeṣam atha hasta saṃjñayā
a pada antaram ca paritas kṣiti kṣitām apatan druta bhramita hema nemayaḥ
javi māruta āñcita paraspara upama kṣiti reṇu ketu vasanāḥ patākinaḥ
drutam adhvanan upari pāṇi vṛttayaḥ paṇavāḥ iva aśva caraṇa kṣatāḥ bhuvaḥ
nanṛtuḥ ca vāridhara dhīra vāraṇa dhvani hṛṣṭa kūjita kalāḥ kalāpinaḥ
vrajatoḥ api praṇaya pūrvam eka tām asurāri pāṇḍu suta sainyayoḥ tadā

original: raruṣe viṣāṇibhiranukṣaṇaṃmitho madamūḍhabuddhiṣu vivekitā kutaḥ? // MSpv_13.6 //
analyzed: raruṣe viṣāṇibhiḥ anu kṣaṇam mithas mada mūḍha buddhiṣu viveki tā kutas

original: avaloka eva nṛpateḥ sma dūrato rabhasādrathādavatarītumicchataḥ /
analyzed: avaloke eva nṛpateḥ sma dūratas rabhasāt rathāt avatarītum icchataḥ

original: avatīrṇavānprathamamātmanā harirvinayaṃ viśeṣayati sambhrameṇa saḥ // MSpv_13.7 //
analyzed: avatīrṇavān prathamam ātmanā hariḥ vinayam viśeṣayati sambhrameṇa saḥ
vapuṣā purāṇapuruṣaḥ puras kṣitau paripuñjyamāna pṛthu hāra yaṣṭinā

original: bhuvanairnato 'pi vihitāttmagauravaḥ praṇanāma nāma tanayaṃ pitṛṣvasuḥ // MSpv_13.8 //
analyzed: bhuvanaiḥ nataḥ pi vihita āttma gauravaḥ praṇanāma nāma tanayam pitṛṣvasuḥ

original: mukuṭāṃśurañjitaparāgamagrataḥ sa na yāvadāpa śirasā mahītalam /
analyzed: mukuṭa aṃśu rañjita parāgam agratas sa na yāvat āpa śirasā mahī talam
kṣitipena tāvat an apekṣita kramam bhuja pañjareṇa rabhasāt agṛhyata

original: na mamau kapāṭataṭavistṛtaṃ tanau muravairimavakṣa urasi kṣamābhujaḥ /
analyzed: na mamau kapāṭa taṭa vistṛtam tanau muravairim avakṣaḥ urasi kṣamābhujaḥ
bhujayoḥ tathā api yugalena dīrghayoḥ vikaṭīkṛtena paritas bhiṣasvaje
gatayā nirantara nivāsam adhi uraḥ parinābhi nūnam avamucya vārijam
kura rāja nirdaya nipīḍana abhayāt mukham adhyarohi muravidviṣaḥ śriyā

original: śirasi sma jighrati surāribandhane chalavāmanaṃ vinayavāmanaṃ tadā /
analyzed: śirasi sma jighrati surāri bandhane chala vāmanam vinaya vāmanam tadā
yaśasā iva vīrya vijita amara druma prasavena vāsita śiroruhe nṛpaḥ
sukha vedanā hṛṣita romakūpayā śithilīkṛte vasudeva janmani
kuru bhartuḥ aṅga latayā na tatyaje vikasat kadamba nikuramba cāru tā
itarān api kṣitibhujaḥ nu janmanaḥ pramanāḥ pramoda pariphulla cakṣuṣaḥ
sa yathocitam jana sabhā jana ucitaḥ prasabha uddhṛta asura sabho sabhājayat
samapetya tulya mahasaḥ śilā ghanān ghana pakṣa dīrghatara bāhu śālinaḥ

original: pariśiśliṣuḥ kṣitipatīnkṣitīśvarāḥ kuliśātpareṇa girayo girīniva // MSpv_13.15 //
analyzed: pariśiśliṣuḥ kṣitipatīn kṣitīśvarāḥ kuliśāt pareṇa girayaḥ girīn iva
ibha kumbha tuṃṅga kaṭhina itaretara stana bhāra dūra vinivārita udarāḥ
pariphulla gaṇḍa phalakāḥ parasparam parirebhire kukura kaurava striyaḥ
ratha vāji patti kariṇī samākulam tad anīkayoḥ samagata dvayam mithas

original: dadhire pṛthakkariṇa eva dūrato mahatāṃ hi sarvamathavā janātigam // MSpv_13.17 //
analyzed: dadhire pṛthakkariṇaḥ eva dūratas mahatām hi sarvam athavā jana atigam
adhiruhyatām iti mahībhṛtā uditaḥ kapiketunā arpita karaḥ ratham hariḥ

original: avalambitailavilapāṇipallavaḥ śrayati sma meghamiva meghavāhanaḥ // MSpv_13.18 //
analyzed: avalambi tailavila pāṇi pallavaḥ śrayati sma megham iva meghavāhanaḥ
ratham āsthitasya ca pura abhivartinaḥ tisṛṇām purām iva ripoḥ muradviṣaḥ

original: atha dharmamūrtiranurāgabhāvitaḥ svayamādita pravayaṇaṃ prajāpatiḥ // MSpv_13.19 //
analyzed: atha dharma mūrtiḥ anurāga bhāvitaḥ svayam ādita pravayaṇam prajāpatiḥ
śanakais atha asya tanu jālaka antara sphurita kṣapākara kara utkara ākṛti
pṛthu phena kūṭam iva nimnagā pateḥ marutaḥ ca sūnu raghu vat prakīrṇakam
vikasat kalāya kusuma asita dyuteḥ alaghu uḍu pāṇḍu jagatām adhīśituḥ
pavanātmaja indra suta madhya vartinā nitarām aroci rucireṇa cakriṇā
dadhatā iva yogam ubhaya graha antara sthiti kāritam durudhara ākhyam indunā

original: vaśinaṃ kṣiterayanayāviveśvaraṃ niyamo yamaśca niyataṃ yatiṃ yathā /
analyzed: vaśinam kṣiteḥ ayanayā aviva īśvaram niyamaḥ yamaḥ ca niyatam yatim yathā
vijaya śriyā vṛtam iva arka mārutau anusasratuḥ tam atha dasrayoḥ sutau
muditaiḥ tadā iti diti janmanām ripau avinīya sambhrama vikāsi bhaktibhiḥ
upasedivadbhiḥ upadeṣṭari iva taiḥ vavṛte vinītam avinīta śāsibhiḥ
gatayoḥ abhedam iti sainyayoḥ tayoḥ atha bhānu ta jahnu tanayā ambhasoḥ iva
pratinādita amara vimāna mānakaiḥ nitarām mudā paramayā iva dadhvane
makham ākṣitum kṣitipateḥ upeyuṣām paritas prakalpita niketanam bahis

original: uparudhyamānamiva bhūbhṛtāṃ balaiḥ puṭabhedanaṃ danusutāriraikṣata // MSpv_13.26 //
analyzed: uparudhyamānam iva bhūbhṛtām balaiḥ puṭabhedanam danu sutāriḥ aikṣata
pratināda pūrita digantaraḥ patan pura gopuram prati sa sainya sāgaraḥ

original: ruruce himācalaguhāmukhonmukhaḥ payasāṃ pravāha iva saurasaindhavaḥ // MSpv_13.27 //
analyzed: ruruce himācala guhā mukha unmukhaḥ payasām pravāhaḥ iva saurasaindhavaḥ
asakṛt gṛhīta bahu deha sambhavaḥ tat asau vibhakta nava gopura antaram

original: puruṣaḥ puraṃ praviśati sma pañcabhiḥ samamindriyairiva narendrasūnubhiḥ // MSpv_13.28 //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ puram praviśati sma pañcabhiḥ samam indriyaiḥ iva narendra sūnubhiḥ
tanubhiḥ trinetra nayana anavekṣita smara vigraha dyutibhiḥ adyutat narāḥ

original: pramadāśca yatra khalu rājayakṣmaṇaḥ parato niśākaramanoramairmukhaiḥ // MSpv_13.29 //
analyzed: pramadāḥ ca yatra khalu rājayakṣmaṇaḥ paratas niśākara manoramaiḥ mukhaiḥ
avalokanāya sura vidviṣām dviṣaḥ paṭaha praṇāda vihita upahūtayaḥ
avadhīrita anya karaṇīya sa tvarāḥ pratirathyam īyuḥ atha paura yoṣitaḥ
abhivīkṣya sāmi kṛta maṇḍanam yatīḥ kara ruddha nīvi galat aṃśukāḥ striyaḥ
dadhire dhibhitti paṭaha pratisvanaiḥ sphuṭam aṭṭahāsam iva saudha paṅktyaḥ
rabhasena hāra pada danta kāñcayaḥ prati mūrdhajam nihita karṇapūrakāḥ
parivartita ambara yugāḥ samāpatan valayīkṛta śravaṇa pūrakāḥ striyaḥ
vyatanot udapāsya caraṇam prasādhikā karapallavāt rasa vaśena kācana

original: drutayāvakaikapadacitritāvaniṃ padavīṃ gateva girijā harārdhatām // MSpv_13.33 //
analyzed: druta yāvaka eka pada citrita avanim padavīm gatā iva girijā hara ardha tām
vyacalan viśaṅkaṭa kaṭīraka sthalī śikhara skhalat mukhara mekhalā ākulāḥ
bhavanāni tuṅga tapanīya saṃkrama kramaṇa kvaṇat kanaka nūpurāḥ striyaḥ
adhi rukma mandira gavākṣam ullasat sadṛśaḥ rarāja murajit didṛkṣayā
vadana aravindam udayādri kandarā vivara udara stha tam iva indu maṇḍalam
adhirūḍhayā nija niketam uccakais pavana avadhūta vasana antayā ekayā

original: vihitopaśobhamupayāti mādhave nagaraṃ vyarocata patākayeva tat // MSpv_13.36 //
analyzed: vihita upaśobham upayāti mādhave nagaram vyarocata patākayā iva tat
kara yugma padma mukula apavarjitaiḥ prativeśma lāja kusamaiḥ avākiran
avadīrṇa śukti puṭa mukta mauktika prakaraiḥ iva priya rathāṅgam aṅganāḥ
hima mukta candra ruciraḥ sa padmakaḥ madayan dvijān janita mīnaketanaḥ

original: abhavatprasāditasuro mahotsavaḥ pramadājanasya sa cirāya mādhavaḥ // MSpv_13.38 //
analyzed: abhavat prasādita suraḥ mahā utsavaḥ pramadā janasya sa cirāya mādhavaḥ
dharaṇīdhara indra hituḥ bhayāt asau viṣama īkṣaṇaḥ sphuṭam amūḥ na paśyati

original: madanenavītabhayamityadhiṣṭhitāḥ kṣaṇamīkṣate sma sa purovilāsinīḥ // MSpv_13.39 //
analyzed: madanena vīta bhayam iti adhiṣṭhitāḥ kṣaṇam īkṣate sma sa puras vilāsinīḥ

original: vipulena sāgaraśayasyakukṣiṇā bhuvanāni yasya papire yugakṣaye /
analyzed: vipulena sāgara śayasya kukṣiṇā bhuvanāni yasya papire yuga kṣaye

original: madavibhramāsakalayā pape punaḥ sa purastriyaikatamayaikayā dṛśā // MSpv_13.40 //
analyzed: mada vibhrama asakalayā pape punar sa pura striyā ekatamayā ekayā dṛśā
adhika unnamat ghana payodharam muhur pracalat kalāpi kala śaṅkhaka svanā
abhikṛṣṇam aṅguli mukhena kācana drutam eka karṇa vivaram vyaghaṭṭayat
paripāṭala abja dala cāruṇā asakṛt calita aṅgulī kisalayena pāṇinā
sa śiraḥ prakampam aparā ripum madhoḥ anudīrṇa varṇa nibhṛta artham āhvayat
nalina antika upahita pallava śriyā vyavadhāya cāru mukham eka pāṇinā
sphurita aṅgulī vivara niḥsṛta ullasat daśana prabhā aṅguram ajṛmbhata aparā
valaya arpita asita mahopala prabhā bahulīkṛta pratanu romarājinā
hari vīkṣaṇa akṣaṇika cakṣuṣā anyayā karapallavena galat ambaram dadhe
nija saurabha bhramita bhṛṅga pakṣati vyajana anila kṣayita gharma vāriṇaḥ

original: abhiśauri kācidanimeṣadṛṣṭinā puradevateva vapuṣā vyabhāvyata // MSpv_13.45 //
analyzed: abhiśauri kācid animeṣa dṛṣṭinā pura devatā iva vapuṣā vyabhāvyata

original: abhiyāti naḥ satṛṣa eva cakṣuṣo harirityakhidyata nitambinījanaḥ /
analyzed: abhiyāti naḥ sa tṛṣaḥ eva cakṣuṣaḥ hariḥ iti akhidyata nitambinī janaḥ

original: na viveda yaḥ satatamenamīkṣate na vitṛṣṇatāṃ vrajati khalvasāvapi // MSpv_13.46 //
analyzed: na viveda yaḥ satatam enam īkṣate na vitṛṣṇa tām vrajati khalu asau api
a kṛta sva sadma gamana ādaraḥ kṣaṇam lipikarma nirmitaḥ iva vyatiṣṭhata

original: gatamacyutena saha śūnyatāṃ gataḥ pratipālayanmana ivāṅganājanaḥ // MSpv_13.47 //
analyzed: gatam acyutena saha śūnya tām gataḥ pratipālayan manaḥ iva aṅganā janaḥ

original: alasairmadena sudṛśaḥ śarīrakaiḥ svagṛhānprati pratiyayuḥ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ /
analyzed: alasaiḥ madena sudṛśaḥ śarīrakaiḥ sva gṛhān prati pratiyayuḥ śanais śanais
nava gandha vāri virajīkṛtāḥ puras ghana dhūpa dhūma kṛta reṇu vibhramāḥ
pracura uddhata dhvaja vilambi vāsasaḥ pura vīthayaḥ hariṇā atipetire

original: upanīya bindusaraso mayena yā maṇidāru cāru kila vārṣaparvaṇam /
analyzed: upanīya bindusarasaḥ mayena yā maṇi dāru cāru kila vārṣaparvaṇam

original: vidadhe 'vadhūtasurasadmasampadaṃ samupāsadatsapadi saṃsadaṃ sa tām // MSpv_13.50 //
analyzed: vidadhe vadhūta sura sadma sampadam samupāsadat sapadi saṃsadam sa tām
adhirātri yatra nipatat nabholihām kaladhauta dhauta śilā veśmanām rucau
punar api avāpat iva dugdha vāridhi kṣaṇa garbha vāsama nidāgha dīdhitiḥ
layaneṣu lohitaka nirmitāḥ bhuvaḥ śiti ratna raśmi haritīkṛta antarāḥ

original: jamadagnisūnupitṛtarpaṇīrapovahati sma yā viralaśaivalā iva // MSpv_13.52 //
analyzed: jamadagni sūnu pitṛ tarpaṇīḥ apovahati sma yā virala śaivalāḥ iva

original: viśadāśmakūṭaghaṭitāḥ kṣapākṛtaḥ kṣaṇadāsu yatra ca rucekatāṃ gatāḥ /
analyzed: viśada aśma kūṭa ghaṭitāḥ kṣapā kṛtaḥ kṣaṇadāsu yatra ca rucekatām gatāḥ
gṛha paṅktayaḥ ciram atīyire janaiḥ tamasi iva hasta parimarśa sūcitāḥ
nilaya iṣu naktam asita aśmanām cayaiḥ bisinī vadhū paribhava spuṭa āgasaḥ

original: muharatrasadbhirapi yatra gauravācchaśalāñchanāṃśava upāṃśu jadhnire // MSpv_13.54 //
analyzed: muharat rasadbhiḥ api yatra gauravāt śaśalāñchana aṃśavaḥ upāṃśu jadhnire
sukhinaḥ puras bhimukha tām upāgataiḥ pratimāsu yatra gṛha ratna bhittiṣu
nava saṅgamaiḥ abibharuḥ priyā janaiḥ pramadam trapā bhara parāṅmukhaiḥ api
tṛṇa vāñchayā muhur avāñcita ānanān nicayeṣu yatra harita aśma veśmanām
rasanā agra lagna kiraṇa aṅkurān janaḥ hariṇān gṛhīta kavalān iva aikṣata
vipula ālavāla bhṛta vāri darpaṇa pratimā gataiḥ abhivirejuḥ ātmabhiḥ

original: yadupāntikeṣu dadhato mahīruhaḥ sapalāśarāśimiva mūlasaṃhatim // MSpv_13.57 //
analyzed: yad upāntikeṣu dadhataḥ mahīruhaḥ sa palāśa rāśim iva mūla saṃhatim
uraga indra mūrdha ruha ratna sannidheḥ muhur unnatasya rasitaiḥ payomucaḥ
abhavan yad aṅgaṇa bhuvaḥ samucchvasat nava vālavāya ja maṇi sthala aṅkurāḥ

original: nalinī nigūḍhasalilā ca yatra sā sthalamityadhaḥ patati yā suyodhane /
analyzed: nalinī nigūḍha salilā ca yatra sā sthalam iti adhas patati yā suyodhane
anilātmaja prahasana ākula akhila kṣiti pakṣayā āgama nimitta tām yayau
hasitum pareṇa paritas parisphurat karavāla komala rucau upekṣitaiḥ

original: udakarṣi yatra jalaśaṅkayā janairmuhurindranīlabhuvi dūramambaram // MSpv_13.60 //
analyzed: udakarṣi yatra jala śaṅkayā janaiḥ muhur indranīla bhuvi dūram ambaram
abhitas hari pāṇḍavau rathāt amala aṃśu maṇḍala samullasat tanū
avateratuḥ nayana nandanau nabhaḥ śaśi bhārgavau udaya parvatāt iva
tat alakṣya ratna maya kuḍyam ādarāt abhidhātari itas itas iti atho nṛpe
dhavala aśma raśmi paṭala avibhāvita pratihāram āviśat asau sadaḥ śanais

original: navahāṭakeṣṭakacitaṃ dadarśa sa kṣitipasya pastyamatha tatra saṃsadi /
analyzed: nava hāṭaka iṣṭaka citam dadarśa sa kṣitipasya pastyam atha tatra saṃsadi

original: gaganaspṛśāṃ maṇirucāṃ cayena yatsadanānyudayasmayata nākināmapi // MSpv_13.63 //
analyzed: gagana spṛśām maṇi rucām cayena yat sadanāni udayasmayata nākinām api
udayādri mūrdhni yugapad cakāsatoḥ dinanātha pūrṇa śaśinoḥ asambhavām

original: rucimāsane ruciradhāmni bibhratāvalaghunyatha nyaṣadatāṃ nṛpācyutau // MSpv_13.64 //
analyzed: rucim āsane rucira dhāmni bibhratau alaghuni atha nyaṣadatām nṛpa acyutau
sutarām sukhena sakala klama chidā sa nidādham aṅgam iva mātariśvanā

original: yadunandanena tadudanvataḥ payaḥ śasineva rājakulamāpa nandathum // MSpv_13.65 //
analyzed: yadunandanena tat udanvataḥ payaḥ śasinā iva rāja kulam āpa nandathum
anavadya vādi alaya gāmi komalam nava gītam api anavagīta tām dadhat
sphuṭa sātvika āṅgikam anṛtyat ujjvalam savilāsa lāsika vilāsanī janaḥ

original: sakale ca tatra gṛhamāgate harau nagare 'pyakālamahamādideśa saḥ /
analyzed: sakale ca tatra gṛham āgate harau nagare pi akālam aham ādideśa saḥ

original: satatotsavaṃ taditi nūnanmunmudo rabhasena vismṛtamabhūnmahībhṛtaḥ // MSpv_13.67 //
analyzed: satata utsavam tat iti nūnam munmudaḥ rabhasena vismṛtam abhūt mahībhṛtaḥ
hariḥ ākumāram akhila abhidhāna vid sva janasya vārtam ayamayam anvayuṅkta ca

original: mahatīmapi śriyamavāpya vismayaḥ sujano na vismarati jātu kiñcana // MSpv_13.68 //
analyzed: mahatīm api śriyam avāpya vismayaḥ su janaḥ na vismarati jātu kiñcana
martya loka duravāpam avāpta rasa udayam nūtana tvam atirikta tayā anupadam dadhat
śrīpatiḥ patiḥ asau avaneḥ ca parasparam saṅkathā amṛtam anekam asisvadatām amubhau
tam jagāda giram udgiran iva sneham āhita vikāsayā dṛśā

original: yajñakarmaṇi manaḥ samādadhadvāgvidāṃ varamakamadvado nṛpaḥ // MSpv_14.1 //
analyzed: yajña karmaṇi manaḥ samādadhat vāc vidām varam akamadvadaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: lajjate na gaditaḥ priyaṃ paro vaktureva bhavati trapādhikā /
analyzed: lajjate na gaditaḥ priyam paras vaktuḥ eva bhavati trapā adhikā

original: vrīḍametina tava priyaṃ vadanhrīmatātrabhavataiva bhūyate // MSpv_14.2 //
analyzed: vrīḍam eti na tava priyam vadan hrīmatā atrabhavatā eva bhūyate

original: toṣameti vitathaiḥ stavaiḥ paraste ca tasya sulabhāḥ śarīribhiḥ /
analyzed: toṣam eti vitathaiḥ stavaiḥ paraḥ te ca tasya sulabhāḥ śarīribhiḥ

original: asti na stutivaco 'nṛtaṃ tava stotrayogyana ca tena tuṣyasi // MSpv_14.3 //
analyzed: asti na stuti vacaḥ tava stotra yogī ana ca tena tuṣyasi

original: bahvapi priyamayaṃ tava bruvanna vrajatyanṛtavāditāṃ janaḥ /
analyzed: bahu api priyam ayam tava bruvan na vrajati anṛta vādi tām janaḥ
sambhavanti yat adoṣa dūṣite sārva sarva guṇa sampadaḥ tvayi

original: sā vibhūtiranubhāva sampadāṃ bhūyasī tava yadāyatāyati /
analyzed: sā vibhūtiḥ anubhāva sampadām bhūyasī tava yadā āyatā āyati

original: etadūḍhagurubhāra bhārataṃ varṣamadya mama vartate vaśe // MSpv_14.5 //
analyzed: etat ūḍha guru bhāra bhāratam varṣam adya mama vartate vaśe
saptatantum adhigantum icchataḥ kuru anugraham anujñayā mama

original: mūlatāmupagate prabho tvayi prāpi dharmamayavṛkṣatā mayā // MSpv_14.6 //
analyzed: mūla tām upagate prabho tvayi prāpi dharma maya vṛkṣa tā mayā
sambhṛta upakaraṇena nirmalām kartum iṣṭim abhivāñchatā mayā

original: tvaṃ samīraṇa iva pratīkṣitaḥ karṣakeṇa valajānpupūṣatā // MSpv_14.7 //
analyzed: tvam samīraṇaḥ iva pratīkṣitaḥ karṣakeṇa valajān pupūṣatā
vīta vighnam anaghena bhāvitā sannidheḥ tava makhena me dhunā
kaḥ vihantum alam āsthita udaye vāsara śriyam aśīta dīdhitau
svāpateyam adhigamya dharmataḥ paryapālayam avīvṛdham ca yat

original: tīrthagāmī karavai vidhānatastajjuṣasva juhavāni cānale // MSpv_14.9 //
analyzed: tīrtha gāmī karavai vidhānataḥ tat juṣasva juhavāni ca anale

original: pūrvamaṅga juhudhi tvameva vā snātavatyavabhṛthe tatastvayi /
analyzed: pūrvam aṅga juhudhi tvam eva vā snātavati avabhṛthe tatas tvayi
somapāyini bhaviṣyate mayā vāñchita uttama vitāna yājinā
kim vidheyam anayā vidhīyatām tvad prasāda jitayā artha sampadā

original: śādhi śāsaka jagattrayasya māmāśravo 'smi bhavataḥ sahānujaḥ // MSpv_14.11 //
analyzed: śādhi śāsaka jagattrayasya mām āśravaḥ smi bhavataḥ sahānujaḥ
tam vadantam iti viṣṭaraśravāḥ śrāvayan atha samasta bhūbhṛtaḥ
vyājahāra daśana aṃśu maṇḍala vyājahāra śabalam dadhat vapuḥ
sādita akhila nṛpam mahat mahaḥ samprati sva naya saṃpadā eva te

original: kiṃ parasya sa guṇaḥ samaśnute pathyavṛttirapi yadyarogitām // MSpv_14.13 //
analyzed: kim parasya sa guṇaḥ samaśnute pathya vṛttiḥ api yadī arogi tām

original: tatsurājñi bhavati sthite punaḥ kaḥ kratuṃ yajatu rājalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: tat su rājñi bhavati sthite punar kaḥ kratum yajatu rāja lakṣaṇam

original: uddhṛtau bhavati kasya vā bhuvaḥ śrīvarāhamapahāya yogyatā // MSpv_14.14 //
analyzed: uddhṛtau bhavati kasya vā bhuvaḥ śrīvarāham apahāya yogya tā

original: śāsane 'pi guruṇi vyavasthitaṃ kṛtyavastuṣu niyuṅkṣva kāmataḥ /
analyzed: śāsane pi guruṇi vyavasthitam kṛtya vastuṣu niyuṅkṣva kāmataḥ

original: tvatprayojanaghanaṃ dhanañjayādanya eva iti māṃ ca māvagāḥ // MSpv_14.15 //
analyzed: tvad prayojana ghanam dhanañjayāt anyaḥ eva iti mām ca mā avagāḥ

original: yastaveha savane na bhūpatiḥ karma karmakaravatkariṣyati /
analyzed: yaḥ tava iha savane na bhūpatiḥ karma karmakara vat kariṣyati

original: tasya neṣyati vapuḥ kabandhatāṃ bandhureva jagatāṃ sudarśanaḥ // MSpv_14.16 //
analyzed: tasya nā iṣyati vapuḥ kabandha tām bandhuḥ eva jagatām sudarśanaḥ

original: ityudīritagiraṃ nṛpastvayi śreyasi sthitavati sthirā mama /
analyzed: iti udīrita giram nṛpaḥ tvayi śreyasi sthitavati sthirā mama
sarva sampad iti śaurim uktavān udvahan mudam udasthita kratau
ānanena śaśinaḥ kalām dadhat darśana kṣayita kāma vigrahaḥ
āplutaḥ sa vimalaiḥ jalaiḥ abhūt aṣṭa mūrti dhara mūrtiḥ aṣṭamī

original: tasya sāṃkhyapuruṣeṇa tulyatāṃ bibhrataḥ svayamakurvataḥ kriyāḥ /
analyzed: tasya sāṃkhya puruṣeṇa tulya tām bibhrataḥ svayam akurvataḥ kriyāḥ
kartṛ tā tad upalambhataḥ bhavat vṛtti bhāji karaṇe yathā ṛtviji
śabditām anapaśabdam uccakais vākya lakṣaṇa vidaḥ nuvākyayā
yājyayā yajana karmiṇaḥ tyajan dravya jātam apadiśya devatām
saptama bheda kara kalpita svaram sāma sāma vid asaṅgam ujjagau
tatra sūnṛta giraḥ ca sūrayaḥ puṇyam ṛc yajuṣam adhyagīṣata
baddha darbha maya kāñcid āmayā vīkṣitāni yajamāna jāyayā
śuṣmaṇi praṇayana ādi saṃskṛte taiḥ havīṃṣi juhavāṃbabhūvire
na aññjasā nigaditum vibhaktibhiḥ vyaktibhiḥ ca nikhilābhiḥ āgame

original: tatra karmaṇi viparyaṇīnaman mantramūhakuśalaḥ prayogiṇaḥ // MSpv_14.23 //
analyzed: tatra karmaṇi mantramūha kuśalaḥ prayogiṇaḥ

original: saṃśayāya dadhatoḥ sarūpatā dūrabhinnaphalayoḥ kriyāṃ prati /
analyzed: saṃśayāya dadhatoḥ sarūpa tā dūra bhinna phalayoḥ kriyām prati

original: śabdaśāsanavidaḥ samāsayorvigrahaṃ vyavasasuḥ svareṇa te // MSpv_14.24 //
analyzed: śabda śāsana vidaḥ samāsayoḥ vigraham vyavasasuḥ svareṇa te
lola heti rasanā śataprabhā maṇḍalena lasatā hasan iva
prājyam ājyam asakṛt vaṣaṭkṛtam nirmalīmasam alīḍha pāvakaḥ

original: tatra mantrapavitaṃ haviḥ kratāvaśnato na vapureva kevalam /
analyzed: tatra mantra pavitam haviḥ kratau aśnataḥ na vapuḥ eva kevalam
varṇa sampadam ati sphuṭām dadhat nāma ca ujjvalam abhūt havirbhujaḥ

original: sparśamuṣṇamucitaṃ dadhacchikhī yaddadāha haviradbhutaṃ na tat /
analyzed: sparśam uṣṇam ucitam dadhat śikhī yat dadāha haviḥ adbhutam na tat
gandhataḥ pi huta havya sambhavāt dehinām adahat ogham aṃhasām
unnaman sapadi dhūmrayan diśaḥ sāndra tām dadhat adhas kṛta ambudaḥ

original: dyāmiyāya dahanasya ketanaḥ kīrtayanniva divaukasāṃ priyam // MSpv_14.28 //
analyzed: dyām iyāya dahanasya ketanaḥ kīrtayan iva divaukasām priyam
nirjita akhila mahā arṇava oṣadhi syanda sāram amṛtam vavalgire

original: nākinaḥ kathamapi pratīkṣituṃ hūyamānamanale viṣehire // MSpv_14.29 //
analyzed: nākinaḥ katham api pratīkṣitum hūyamānam anale viṣehire
tatra nitya vihita upahūtiṣu proṣiteṣu patiṣu dyu yoṣitām
gumphitāḥ śirasi veṇayaḥ bhavat na praphulla sura pādapa srajaḥ
prāśuḥ āśu havanīyam atra yat tena dīrgham amara tvam adhyaguḥ

original: uddhatānadhika medhitaujaso dānavāṃśca vibudhāḥ vijigyire // MSpv_14.31 //
analyzed: uddhata anadhika medhita ojasaḥ dānavān ca vibudhāḥ vijigyire
na apacāram agaman kkaccit kriyāḥ sarvam atra samapādi sādhanam

original: atyaśerata parasparaṃ dhiyaḥ sattriṇāṃ narapateścasaṃpadaḥ // MSpv_14.32 //
analyzed: atyaśerata parasparam dhiyaḥ sattriṇām narapateḥ ca saṃpadaḥ
dakṣiṇīyam avagamya paṅktiśas paṅkti pāvanam atha dvija vrajam
dakṣiṇaḥ kṣitipatiḥ vyaśiśraṇat dakṣiṇāḥ sadasi rājasūyakīḥ
vāri pūrvam akhilāsu satkriyā labdha śuddhiṣu dhanāni bīja vat

original: bhāvi bibhrati phalaṃ mahaddvijakṣetrabhūmiṣu narādhipo 'vapat // MSpv_14.34 //
analyzed: bhāvi bibhrati phalam mahat dvija kṣetra bhūmiṣu narādhipaḥ vapat
kim nu citram adhivedi bhūpatiḥ dakṣayan dvija gaṇān apūyata

original: rājataḥ pupuvire nirenasaḥ prāpya te 'pi vimalaṃ pratigraham // MSpv_14.35 //
analyzed: rājataḥ pupuvire nirenasaḥ prāpya te vimalam pratigraham
sa sva hasta kṛta cihna śāsanaḥ pākaśāsana samāna śāsanaḥ
āśaśāṅka tapana arṇava sthitoḥ viprasāda kṛta bhūyasīḥ bhuvaḥ
śuddham aśruti virodhi bibhratam śāstram ujjvala varṇa saṅkaraiḥ
pustakaiḥ samam asau gaṇam muhur vācyamānam aśṛṇot dvijanmanām
tad praṇīta manasām upeyuṣām draṣṭum āhavanam agrajanmanām
ātitheyam a nivārita atithiḥ kartum āśramaguruḥ sa nā aśramat
mṛgyamāṇam api yat durāsadam bhūri sāram upanīya tat svayam
āsata avasara kāṅkṣiṇaḥ bahis tasya ratnam upadīkṛtam nṛpāḥ

original: eka eva vasu yaddadau nṛpastatsamāpakamatarkyata kratoḥ /
analyzed: ekaḥ eva vasu yat dadau nṛpaḥ tat samāpakam atarkyata kratoḥ

original: tyāgaśālini tapaḥsute yayuḥ sarvapārthivadhanānyapi kṣayam // MSpv_14.40 //
analyzed: tyāga śālini tapaḥsute yayuḥ sarva pārthiva dhanāni api kṣayam
prītiḥ asya dadataḥ bhavat tathā yena tad priya cikīrṣavaḥ nṛpāḥ
sparśitaiḥ adhikam āgamat mudam na adhiveśma nihitaiḥ upāyanaiḥ
yam laghunī api laghūkṛta āhitaḥ śiṣya bhūtam aśiṣat sa karmaṇi
sa spṛham nṛpatibhiḥ nṛpo paraiḥ gauraveṇa dadṛśetarām asau
ādya kola tulitām prakampanaiḥ kampitām muhur anīdṛś ātmani

original: vāciropitavatāmunā mahīṃ rājakāya viṣayā vibhejire // MSpv_14.43 //
analyzed: vāci ropitavatā amunā mahīm rājakāya viṣayāḥ vibhejire
āgatāt vyavasitena cetasā sattva sampad avikāri mānasaḥ

original: tatra nābhavadasau mahāhave śātravādiva parāṅmukho 'rthinaḥ // MSpv_14.44 //
analyzed: tatra nā abhavat asau mahā āhave śātravāt iva parāṅmukhaḥ ṛthinaḥ
na aikṣata arthinam avajñayā muhur yācitaḥ tu na ca kālam ākṣipat

original: nāditālpamatha na vyakatthayaddattamiṣṭamapi nānvaśeta saḥ // MSpv_14.45 //
analyzed: nādita alpam atha na vyakatthayat dattam iṣṭam api nā anvaśeta saḥ
nirguṇaḥ pi vimukhaḥ na bhūpateḥ dāna śauṇḍa manasaḥ puras bhavat
varṣukasya kim apaḥ kṛta unnateḥ ambudasya parihāryam ūṣaram

original: prema tasya na guṇeṣu nādhikaṃ na sma veda na guṇāntaraṃ ca saḥ /
analyzed: prema tasya na guṇeṣu na adhikam na sma veda na guṇa antaram ca saḥ

original: ditsayā tadapi pārthivo 'rthinaṃ guṇyaguṇya iti na vyajīgaṇat // MSpv_14.47 //
analyzed: ditsayā tat api pārthivaḥ rthinam guṇya guṇyaḥ iti na vyajīgaṇat
darśana anupadam eva kāmatas svam vanīyaka jane dhigacchati
prārthanā artha rahitam tadā abhavat dīyatām iti vacaḥ tisarjane
na anavāpta vasunā artha kāmya tā na acikitsita gadena rogiṇā

original: icchatāśitumanāśuṣā na ca pratyagāmi tadupeyuṣā sadaḥ // MSpv_14.49 //
analyzed: icchatā aśitum an āśuṣā na ca pratyagāmi tat upeyuṣā sadaḥ
svādayan rasam aneka saṃskṛta prākṛtaiḥ akṛta pātra saṅkaraiḥ

original: bhāvaśuddhisahitairmudaṃ jano nāṭakairiva babhāra bhojanaiḥ // MSpv_14.50 //
analyzed: bhāva śuddhi sahitaiḥ mudam janaḥ nāṭakaiḥ iva babhāra bhojanaiḥ

original: rakṣitāramiti tatra karmaṇi nyasya duṣṭadamanakṣamaṃ harim /
analyzed: rakṣitāram iti tatra karmaṇi nyasya duṣṭa damana kṣamam harim
akṣatāni niravartayat tadā dāna homa yajanāni bhūpatiḥ
ekaḥ eva su sakhā eṣa sunvatām śauriḥ iti abhinayāt iva uccakais
yūpa rūpakam anīnamat bhujam bhūri caṣāla tulita aṅgulīyakam

original: itthamatra vitatakrame kratau vīkṣya dharmamatha gharmajanmanā /
analyzed: ittham atra vitata krame kratau vīkṣya dharmam atha gharmajanmanā

original: arghadānamanucodito vacaḥ sabhyamabhyadhita śantanoḥ sutaḥ // MSpv_14.53 //
analyzed: argha dānam anucoditaḥ vacaḥ sabhyam abhyadhita śantanoḥ sutaḥ

original: ātmanaiva guṇadoṣakovidaḥ kiṃ na vetsi karaṇīyavastuṣu /
analyzed: ātmanā eva guṇa doṣa kovidaḥ kim na vetsi karaṇīya vastuṣu

original: yattathāpi na gurūnnapṛcchasi tvaṃ kramo 'yamiti tatra kāraṇam // MSpv_14.54 //
analyzed: yat tathā api na gurūn na pṛcchasi tvam kramaḥ yam iti tatra kāraṇam

original: snātakaṃ gurumabhīṣṭamṛtvijaṃ saṃyujā ca saha medinīpatim /
analyzed: snātakam gurum abhīṣṭam ṛtvijam saṃyujā ca saha medinīpatim

original: arghabhāja iti kīrtayanti ṣaṭ te ca te yugapadāgatāḥ sadaḥ // MSpv_14.55 //
analyzed: argha bhājaḥ iti kīrtayanti ṣaṭ te ca te yugapad āgatāḥ sadaḥ
śobhayanti paritas pratāpinaḥ mantra śakti vinivārita āpadaḥ
tvad makha mukha bhuvaḥ svayambhuvaḥ bhūbhujaḥ ca para loka jiṣṇavaḥ
ābhajanti guṇinaḥ pṛthak pṛthak pārtha satkṛtim akṛtrimām amī

original: eka eva guṇavattamo 'thavāpūjya ityayamapīṣyate vidhiḥ // MSpv_14.57 //
analyzed: ekaḥ eva iti ayam api iṣyate vidhiḥ
atra ca eṣa sakale pibhāti mām prati aśeṣa guṇa bandhuḥ arhati
bhūmideva naradeva saṅgame pūrva deva ripuḥ arhaṇām hariḥ
martya mātram avadīdharat bhavān mā enam ānamita daitya dānavam

original: aṃśa eṣa janatātivartino vedhasaḥ pratijanaṃ kṛtasthiteḥ // MSpv_14.59 //
analyzed: aṃśaḥ eṣa janatā ativartinaḥ vedhasaḥ pratijanam kṛta sthiteḥ
dhyeyam ekam apathe sthitam dhiyaḥ stutyam uttamam atīta vākpatham
āmananti yam upāsyam ādarāt dūra vartinam atīva yoginaḥ

original: padmabhūriti sṛjañjagadrajaḥ satvamacyuta iti sthitiṃ nayan /
analyzed: padmabhūḥ iti sṛjan jagat rajaḥ satvam acyutaḥ iti sthitim nayan

original: saṃharanhara iti śritastamasraidhameṣa bhajati tribhirguṇaiḥ // MSpv_14.61 //
analyzed: saṃharan haraḥ iti śritaḥ tam asraidham eṣa bhajati tribhiḥ guṇaiḥ
sarva vedinam anādim āsthitam dehinām anujighṛkṣayā vapuḥ
kleśa karma phala bhoga varjitam puṃs viśeṣam amum īśvaram viduḥ
bhaktimantaḥ iha bhakta vatsale santata smaraṇa rīṇa kalmaṣāḥ
yānti nirvahaṇam asya saṃsṛti kleśa nāṭaka viḍambanā vidheḥ
grāmya bhāvam apahātum icchavaḥ yoga mārga patitena cetasā

original: durgamekamapunarnivṛttaye yaṃ viśanti vaśinaṃ mumukṣavaḥ // MSpv_14.64 //
analyzed: durgam ekam apunarnivṛttaye yam viśanti vaśinam mumukṣavaḥ
ādi tām a jananāya dehinām anta tām ca dadhate napāyine

original: bibhrate bhuvamadhaḥ sadātha ca brahmaṇo 'pyupari tiṣṭhate namaḥ // MSpv_14.65 //
analyzed: bibhrate bhuvam adhas sadā atha ca brahmaṇaḥ u pi upari tiṣṭhate namaḥ

original: kevalaṃ dadhati kartṛvācinaḥ pratyayāniha na jātu karmaṇi /
analyzed: kevalam dadhati kartṛ vācinaḥ pratyayān iha na jātu karmaṇi
dhātavaḥ sṛjati saṃhṛśa astayaḥ stautiḥ atra viparīta kārakaḥ
pūrvam eṣa kila sṛṣṭavān apaḥ tāsu vīryam anivāryam ādadhau
tat ca kāraṇam abhūt hiraṇmayam brahmaṇaḥ sṛjat asau idam jagat
matkuṇau iva purā pariplavau sindhunātha śayane niṣeduṣaḥ

original: gacchataḥ sma madhukaiṭabhau vibhoryasya naidrasukhavighnatāṃ kṣaṇam // MSpv_14.68 //
analyzed: gacchataḥ sma madhu kaiṭabhau vibhoḥ yasya naidra sukha vighna tām kṣaṇam
śrauta mārga sukha gāna kovida brahma ṣaṭcaraṇa garbham ujjvalam
śrī mukha indu savidhe śobhate yasya nābhi sarasī saroruham
satya vṛttam api māyinam jagat vṛddham api ucita nidram arbhakam

original: janma bibhratamajaṃ navaṃ budhā yaṃ purāṇapuruṣaṃ pracakṣate // MSpv_14.70 //
analyzed: janma bibhratam ajam navam budhāḥ yam purāṇapuruṣam pracakṣate
skandha dhūnana visāri kesara kṣipta sāgara mahā plava āmayam
uddhṛtām iva muhūrtam aikṣata sthūla nāsika vapuḥ vasundharām
divya kesari vapuḥ suradviṣaḥ nā eva labdha śamam āyudhaiḥ api
durnivāra raṇa kaṇḍu komalaiḥ vakṣaḥ eṣa niradārayat nakhaiḥ
vāridheḥ iva kara agra vīcibhiḥ diś mataṅga ja mukhāni abhighnataḥ
yasya cāru nakha śuktayaḥ sphurat mauktika prakara garbha tām
dīpti nirjita virocanāt ayam gām virocana sutāt abhīpsataḥ
ātmabhūḥ avaraja akhila prajaḥ svarpateḥ avaraja tvam āyayau

original: kiṃ kramiṣyati kilaiṣa vāmano yāvaditthamahasanna dānavāḥ /
analyzed: kim kramiṣyati kila eṣa vāmanaḥ yāvat ittham ahasan na dānavāḥ

original: tāvadasya na mamau nabhastale laṅghitārkaśaśimaṇḍalaḥ kramaḥ // MSpv_14.75 //
analyzed: tāvat asya na mamau nabhastale laṅghita arka śaśi maṇḍalaḥ kramaḥ
gacchatā api gagana agram uccakais yasya bhūdhara garīyasā aṅghriṇā
krānta kandharaḥ iva abalaḥ baliḥ svarga bhartuḥ agamat subandha tām
kāmatas sya dadṛśuḥ divaukasaḥ dūram ūru malinīlam āyatam
vyomni divya sarit ambu paddhati spardhayā iva yamunā ogham utthitam
yasya kiñcid apakartum akṣamaḥ kāya nigraha gṛhīta vigrahaḥ
kānta vaktra sadṛśa ākṛtim kṛtī rāhuḥ indum adhunā api bādhate
sampradāya vigamāt upeyuṣīḥ eva nāśam avināśi vigrahaḥ
smartum apratihata smṛtiḥ śrutīḥ dattaḥ iti abhavat atri gotra jaḥ
reṇukā tanaya tām upāgataḥ śātita pracura patra saṃhati
lūna bhūri bhuja śākham ujjhita chāyam arjuna vanam vyadhāt ayam
eṣa dāśarathi bhūyam etya ca dhvaṃsita uddhata daśānanām api
rākṣasīm akṛta rakṣita prajaḥ tejasā adhika vibhīṣaṇām purīm
niṣprahantum amara īśa vidviṣām arthitaḥ svayam atha svayaṃbhuvā

original: samprati śrayati sūnutāmayaṃ kaśyapasya vasudevarūpiṇaḥ // MSpv_14.82 //
analyzed: samprati śrayati sūnu tā mayam kaśyapasya vasudeva rūpiṇaḥ
tāta nā udadhi viloḍanam prati tvad vinātha vayam utsahāmahe

original: yaḥ surairiti suraughavallabho ballavaiśca jagade jagatpatiḥ // MSpv_14.83 //
analyzed: yaḥ suraiḥ iti sura ogha vallabhaḥ ballavaiḥ ca jagade jagatpatiḥ
na ātta gandham avadhūya śatrubhiḥ chāyayā ca śamita amara śramam
yaḥ bhimānam iva vṛtra vidviṣaḥ pārijātam udamūlayat divaḥ

original: yaṃ sametya ca lalāṭalekhayā bibhrataḥ sapadi śaṃbhuvibhramam /
analyzed: yam sametya ca lalāṭa lekhayā bibhrataḥ sapadi śaṃbhu vibhramam
caṇḍa mārutam iva pradīpa vat cedipasya niravāt vilocanam

original: yaḥ kolatāṃ ballavatāṃ ca bibhraddaṃṣṭrāmudasyāśu bhujāṃ ca gurvīm /
analyzed: yaḥ kola tām ballava tām ca bibhrat daṃṣṭrām udasya āśu bhujām ca gurvīm

original: magnasya toyāpadi dustarāyāṃ gomaṇḍalasyoddharaṇaṃ cakāra // MSpv_14.86 //
analyzed: magnasya toya āpadi dustarāyām go maṇḍalasya uddharaṇam cakāra

original: dhanyo 'si yasya harireṣa samakṣa eva dūrādapi kratuṣu yajvabhirijyate yaḥ /
analyzed: dhanyaḥ si yasya hariḥ eṣa samakṣaḥ eva dūrāt api kratuṣu yajvabhiḥ ijyate yaḥ
da tvā argham atrabhavate bhuvaneṣu yāvat saṃsāra maṇḍalam avāpnuhi sādhuvādam

original: bhīṣmoktaṃ taditi vaco niśamya samyak sāmrājyaśriyamadhigacchatā nṛpeṇa /
analyzed: bhīṣma uktam tat iti vacaḥ niśamya samyak sāmrājya śriyam adhigacchatā nṛpeṇa

original: datter'dhe mahati mahībhṛtāṃ puro 'pi trailokye madhubhidabhūdanargha eva // MSpv_14.88 //
analyzed: datta īrdhe mahati mahībhṛtām puras pi trailokye madhubhid abhūt anarghaḥ eva
atha tatra pāṇḍu tanayena sadasi vihitam muradviṣaḥ

original: mānamasahata na cedipatiḥ paravṛddhimatsari mano hi māninām // MSpv_15.1 //
analyzed: mānam asahata na cedi patiḥ para vṛddhi matsari manaḥ hi māninām

original: pura eva śārṅgiṇi savairamatha punaramuṃ tadarcayā /
analyzed: puras eva śārṅgiṇi sa vairam atha punar amum tad arcayā

original: manyurabhajadavagāḍhataraḥ samadoṣakāla iva dehinaṃ jvaraḥ // MSpv_15.2 //
analyzed: manyuḥ abhajat avagāḍhataraḥ sama doṣa kāle iva dehinam jvaraḥ
abhitarjayan iva samasta nṛpa gaṇam asau akampayat
lola mukuṭa maṇi raśmi śanais aśanais prakampita jagattrayam śiraḥ
sa vaman ruṣā aśru ghana gharma vigalat uru gaṇḍa maṇḍalaḥ
sveda jala kaṇa karāla karaḥ vyarucat prabhinnaḥ iva kuñjaraḥ tridhā
sa nikāma gharmitam abhīkṣṇa madhu vat avadhūta rājakaḥ
kṣipta bahula jala bindu vapuḥ pralaya arṇava utthitaḥ iva ādiśūkaraḥ
kṣaṇam āśliṣat ghaṭita śaila śikhara kaṭhina aṃsa maṇḍanaḥ
stambham upahita vidhūtim asau adhika avadhūnita samasta saṃsadam
kanaka aṅgada dyutibhiḥ asya gamitam arucat piśaṅga tām
krodha maya śikhi śikhā paṭalaiḥ paritas parītam iva bāhu maṇḍalam
kṛta sannidhānam iva tasya punar api tṛtīya cakṣuṣā
krūram ajani kuṭila bhru guru bhrukuṭī kaṭhorita lalāṭam ānanam
ati rakta bhāvam upagamya kṛta matiḥ amuṣya sāhase
dṛṣṭiḥ agaṇita bhaya asi latām alambata sma sa bhayā sakhīm iva
kara kuḍmalena nijam ūrum urutara naga aśma karkaśam
trasta capala calamāna jana śruta bhīma nāda mayam āhata uccakais

original: iti cakrudhe bhṛśamanena nanu mahadavāpya vipriyam /
analyzed: iti cakrudhe bhṛśam anena nanu mahat avāpya vipriyam

original: yāti vikṛtimapi saṃvṛtimatkimu yannisarganiravagrahaṃ manaḥ // MSpv_15.11 //
analyzed: yāti vikṛtim api saṃvṛtimat kimu yat nisarga niravagraham manaḥ
prathamam śarīra ja vikāra kṛta mukula bandham avyathī
bhāvi kalaha phala yogam asau vacanena kopa kusumam vyacīkasat
dhvanayan sabhām atha sa nīra ghana rava gabhīra vāgabhīḥ
vācam avadat ati roṣa vaśāt ati niṣṭhura sphuṭatara akṣaram asau
yat apūpujaḥ tvam iha pārtha murajitam apūjitam satām

original: prema vilasati mahattadaho dayitaṃ janaḥ khalu guṇīti manyate // MSpv_15.14 //
analyzed: prema vilasati mahat tat aho dayitam janaḥ khalu guṇī iti manyate
yat a rājñi rāja vat iha arghyam upahitam idam muradviṣi

original: grāmyamṛga iva havistadayaṃ bhajate jvalatsu na mahīśavahniṣu // MSpv_15.15 //
analyzed: grāmya mṛgaḥ iva haviḥ tat ayam bhajate jvalatsu na mahīśa vahniṣu

original: anṛtāṃ giraṃ na gadasīti jagati paṭahairvighuṣyase /
analyzed: anṛtām giram na gadasi iti jagati paṭahaiḥ vighuṣyase

original: nindyamatha ca harimarcayatastava karmaṇaiva vikasatyasatyatā // MSpv_15.16 //
analyzed: nindyam atha ca harim arcayataḥ tava karmaṇā eva vikasati asatya tā

original: tava dharmarāja iti nāma kathamidamapaṣṭhu paṭhyate /
analyzed: tava dharmarājaḥ iti nāma katham idam apaṣṭhu paṭhyate
bhauma dinam abhidadhati athavā bhṛśam apraśastam api maṅgalam janāḥ

original: yadi vārcanīyatama eṣa kimapi bhavatāṃ pṛthāsutāḥ /
analyzed: yadi vā arcanīyatamaḥ eṣa kim api bhavatām pṛthāsutāḥ
śauriḥ avanipatibhiḥ nikhilaiḥ avamānana artham iha kim nimantritaiḥ
athavā na dharmam a su bodha samayam avayāta bāliśāḥ
khāmam ayam iha vṛthā pālitaḥ hatabuddhiḥ apraṇihitaḥ saritsutaḥ
svayam eva śantanu tanūja yam api gaṇam arghyam abhyadhāḥ

original: tatra muraripurayaṃ katamo yamanindyabandivadabhiṣṭuṣe vṛthā // MSpv_15.20 //
analyzed: tatra muraripuḥ ayam katamaḥ yama nindya bandi vat abhiṣṭuṣe vṛthā
avanībhṛtām tvam apahāya gaṇam ati jaḍaḥ samunnatam

original: nīci niyatamiha yaccapalo nirataḥ sphuṭaṃ bhavasi nimnagāsutaḥ // MSpv_15.21 //
analyzed: nīci niyatam iha yat capalaḥ nirataḥ sphuṭam bhavasi nimnagā sutaḥ

original: pratipattumaṅga ghaṭate ca na tava nṛpayogyamarhaṇam /
analyzed: pratipattum aṅga ghaṭate ca na tava nṛpa yogyam arhaṇam

original: kṛṣṇa kalaya nanu ko 'hamiti sphuṭamāpadāṃ padamanātmaveditā // MSpv_15.22 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇa kalaya nanu kaḥ ham iti sphuṭam āpadām padam anātma veditā

original: asurastvayā nyavadhi ko 'pi madhuriti kathaṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: asuraḥ tvayā kaḥ pi madhuḥ iti katham pratīyate
daṇḍa dalita saraghaḥ prathase madhusūdanaḥ tvam iti sūdayat madhu
mucukunda talpa śaraṇasya magadha pati śātita ojasaḥ
siddham abala sabala tvam aho tava rohiṇīta tanaya sāhacaryataḥ
chalayan prajāḥ tvam anṛtena kapaṭa paṭuḥ aindrajālikaḥ

original: prītimanubhavasi nagnajitaḥ sutayeṣṭasatya iti sampratīyase // MSpv_15.25 //
analyzed: prītim anubhavasi nagnajitaḥ sutayā iṣṭa satyaḥ iti sampratīyase
dhṛtavān na cakram ari cakra bhaya cakitam āhave nijam

original: cakradhara iti rathāṅgamadaḥ satataṃ bibharṣi bhuvaneṣu rūḍhaye // MSpv_15.26 //
analyzed: cakradharaḥ iti rathāṅga madaḥ satatam bibharṣi bhuvaneṣu rūḍhaye
jagati śriyā virahitaḥ pi yat udadhisutām upāyathāḥ

original: jñātijanajanitanāmapadāṃ tvamataḥ śriyaḥ patiriti prathāmagāḥ // MSpv_15.27 //
analyzed: jñāti jana janita nāma padām tvam atas śriyaḥ patiḥ iti prathāma gāḥ
abhiśatru saṃyati kadācid avihita parākramaḥ yat

original: vyomni kathamapi cakartha padaṃ vyapadiśyate jagati vikramītyataḥ // MSpv_15.28 //
analyzed: vyomni katham api cakartha padam vyapadiśyate jagati vikramī iti atas

original: pṛthivīṃ bibhartha yadi pūrvamidamapi guṇāya vartate /
analyzed: pṛthivīm bibhartha yadi pūrvam idam api guṇāya vartate
bhūmibhṛt iti para hārita bhūḥ tvam udāhriyasva katham anyathā janaiḥ
tava dhanya tā iyam api sarva nṛpati tulitaḥ yat kṣaṇam
klānta kara tala dhṛta acalakaḥ pṛthivī tale tulita bhūbhṛt ucyase
tvam aśaknuvan na śubha karma nirataḥ paripāka dāruṇam
jetum akuśala matiḥ narakam yaśase dhi lokam ajayaḥ sutam bhuvaḥ
sakalaiḥ vapuḥ sakala doṣa samuditam idam guṇaiḥ tava
tyaktam apaguṇa guṇaḥ tritaya tyajana prayāsam upayāsi kim mudhā

original: tvayi pūjanaṃ jagati jālma kṛtamidamapākṛte guṇaiḥ /
analyzed: tvayi pūjanam jagati jālma kṛtam idam apākṛte guṇaiḥ
hāsa karam aghaṭate nitarām śirasi iva kaṅkatam apeta mūrdhaje
mṛga vidviṣām iva yat ittham ajani miṣatām pṛthā sutaiḥ

original: asya vanaśuna ivāpacitiḥ paribhāva eva bhavatāṃ bhuvo 'dhipāḥ // MSpv_15.34 //
analyzed: asya vanaśunaḥ iva apacitiḥ paribhāvaḥ eva bhavatām bhuvaḥ dhipāḥ

original: avadhījjanaṅgama ivaiṣa yadi hatavṛṣo vṛṣaṃ nanu /
analyzed: avadhīt janaṅgamaḥ iva eṣa yadi hata vṛṣaḥ vṛṣam nanu

original: sparśamaśucivapurarhati na pratimānanāṃ tu nitarāṃ nṛpocitām // MSpv_15.35 //
analyzed: sparśam aśuci vapuḥ arhati na pratimā ānanām tu nitarām nṛpa ucitām

original: yadi nāṅganeti matirasya mṛdurajani pūtanāṃ prati /
analyzed: yadi nā aṅganā iti matiḥ asya mṛduḥ ajani pūtanām prati

original: stanyamaghṛṇamanasaḥ pibataḥ kila dharmato bhavati sā jananyapi // MSpv_15.36 //
analyzed: stanyam aghṛṇa manasaḥ pibataḥ kila dharmataḥ bhavati sā jananī api
śakaṭa vyudāsa taru bhaṅga dharaṇidhara dhāraṇa ādikam

original: karma yadayamakarottaralaḥ sthiracetasāṃ ka iva tena vismayaḥ // MSpv_15.37 //
analyzed: karma yat ayam akarot taralaḥ sthira cetasām kaḥ iva tena vismayaḥ
ayam ugrasena tanayasya nṛ paśuḥ aparaḥ paśūn avan

original: svamivadhamasukaraṃ puruṣaiḥ kurute sma yatparamametadadbhutam // MSpv_15.38 //
analyzed: svami vadham asukaram puruṣaiḥ kurute sma yat paramam etat adbhutam
iti vācam uddhatam udīrya sapadi saha veṇu dāriṇā
soḍha ripu bala bharo sahanaḥ sa jahāsa datta kara tālam uccakais
kaṭunā api caidya vacanena vikṛtim agamat na mādhavaḥ

original: satyaniyatavacasaṃ vacasā sujanaṃ janāścalayituṃ ka īśate // MSpv_15.40 //
analyzed: satya niyata vacasam vacasā su janam janāḥ calayitum ke īśate

original: na cataṃ tadeti śapamānamapi yadunṛpāḥ pracukrudhuḥ /
analyzed: na tadā iti śapamānam api yadu nṛpāḥ pracukrudhuḥ
śauri samaya nigṛhīta dhiyaḥ prabhu cittam eva hi janaḥ nuvartate
vihita āgasaḥ muhur asaṅghya nija vacana dāma saṃyataḥ

original: tasya katitha iti tatprathamaṃ manasā samākhyadaparādhamacyutaḥ // MSpv_15.42 //
analyzed: tasya katithaḥ iti tat prathamam manasā samākhyat aparādham acyutaḥ
smṛti vartma tasya na samastam apakṛtam iyāya vidviṣaḥ

original: smartumadhigataguṇasmaraṇāḥ paṭavo na doṣamakhilaṃ khalūttamāḥ // MSpv_15.43 //
analyzed: smartum adhigata guṇa smaraṇāḥ paṭavaḥ na doṣam akhilam khalu uttamāḥ
nṛpatau adhikṣipati śaurim atha surasarit sutaḥ vacaḥ

original: smāha calayati bhuvaṃ maruti kṣubhitasya nādamanukurvadambudheḥ // MSpv_15.44 //
analyzed: sma āha calayati bhuvam maruti kṣubhitasya nādam anukurvat ambudheḥ
atha gauraveṇa parivādam a parigaṇayan tam ātmanaḥ

original: prāha murariputiraskaraṇakṣubhitaḥ sma vācamiti jāhnavīsutaḥ // MSpv_15.45 //
analyzed: prāha muraripu tiraskaraṇa kṣubhitaḥ sma vācam iti jāhnavīsutaḥ
vihitam mayā adya sadasi idam apamṛṣitam acyuta arcanam

original: yasya namayatu sa cāpamayaṃ caraṇaḥ kṛtaḥ śirasi sarvabhūbhṛtām // MSpv_15.46 //
analyzed: yasya namayatu sa cāpa mayam caraṇaḥ kṛtaḥ śirasi sarva bhūbhṛtām
iti bhīṣma bhāṣita vacaḥ ūrtham adhigatavatām iva kṣaṇāt
kṣobham agamat atimātram atho śiśupāla pakṣa pṛthivībhṛtām gaṇaḥ
śiti tārakā anumita tāmra nayanam aruṇīkṛtam krudhā

original: bāṇavadanamudadīpi bhiye jagataḥ sakīlamiva sūryamaṇḍalam // MSpv_15.48 //
analyzed: bāṇa vadanam udadīpi bhiye jagataḥ sa kīlam iva sūrya maṇḍalam
pravidārita aruṇatara ugra nayana kusuma ujjvalaḥ sphuran
prātar a himakara tāmra tanuḥ viṣa ja drumaḥ paraḥ iva abhavat drumaḥ
a niśā anta vaira dahanena virahitavatā antara ārdra tām

original: kopamarudabhihitena bhṛśaṃ narakātmajena taruṇeva jajvale // MSpv_15.50 //
analyzed: kopa marut abhihitena bhṛśam narakātmajena taruṇā iva jajvale
abhidhitsataḥ kim api rāhu vadana vikṛtam vyabhāvyata
grasta śaśadharam iva upalasat sita danta paṅkti mukham uttamaujasaḥ
kupita ākṛtim prathamam eva hasitam aśanaiḥ asūcayat
kruddham aśani dalita adri taṭa dhvani danta vakra mari cakra bhīṣaṇam
pratighaḥ samupetya narapati gaṇam samāśrayat

original: jāmiharaṇajanitānuśayaḥ samudācacāra nija eva rukmiṇaḥ // MSpv_15.53 //
analyzed: jāmi haraṇa janita anuśayaḥ samudācacāra nije eva rukmiṇaḥ
caraṇena hanti subalaḥ sma śithilita mahīdhra bandhanām
tīra tarala jala rāśi jalām avabhugna bhogi phaṇa maṇḍalām bhuvam
kupiteṣu tathā api ratha caraṇa pāṇi pūjayā
citta kalita kalaha āgamanaḥ mudam āhukiḥ suhṛd iva adhikām
guru kopa ruddha padam āpad asita yavanasya rodra tām
vyāttam aśitum iva sarva jagat vikarālam āsya kuharam vivakṣataḥ
vivṛta ūru bāhu parigheṇa sarabhasa padam nidhitsatā

original: hantumakhilanṛpatīnvasunā vasane vilambini nije vicaskhale // MSpv_15.57 //
analyzed: hantum akhila nṛpatīn vasunā vasane vilambini nije vicaskhale
iti tat tadā vikṛta rūpam abhajat tad avibhinna cetasam
māra balam iva bhayaṅkara tām hari bodhisatvam abhi rāja maṇḍalam
ramasāt udasthuḥ atha yuddham anucita bhiyaḥ bhilāṣukāḥ
sāndra mukuṭa kiraṇa ucchalita sphaṭika aṃśavaḥ sadasi medinībhṛtaḥ
sphuramāṇa netra kusuma uṣṭha dalam abhṛta bhūbhṛt aṅghripaiḥ
dhūta pṛthu bhuja latam calitaiḥ druta vāta pāta vana vibhramam sadaḥ
harim api amaṃsata tṛṇāya kuru patim ajīgaṇat na vā
māna tulita bhuvana tritayāḥ saritaḥ sutāt abibhayuḥ na bhūbhṛtaḥ
guru niḥśvasan atha vilola sa davathu vapuḥ vacaḥ viṣam
kīrṇa daśana kiraṇa agni kaṇaḥ phaṇavān iva eṣa visasarja cedipaḥ
kim aho nṛpāḥ samam amībhiḥ upapati sutaiḥ na pañcabhiḥ

original: vadhyamabhihata bhujiṣyamamuṃ saha cānayā sthavirarājakanyayā // MSpv_15.63 //
analyzed: vadhyam abhihata bhujiṣyam amum saha ca anayā sthavira rāja kanyayā
athavā ādhvam eva khalu yūyam agaṇita marut gaṇa ojasaḥ

original: vastu kiyadidamayaṃ na mṛdhe mama kevalamasya mukhamīkṣituṃ kṣamaḥ // MSpv_15.64 //
analyzed: vastu kiyat idam ayam na mṛdhe mama kevalam asya mukham īkṣitum kṣamaḥ
vida turya muttama śeṣa pariṣadi nadīja dharma jau

original: yātu nikaṣamadhiyuddhamasau vacanena kiṃ bhavatu sādhvasādhu vā // MSpv_15.65 //
analyzed: yātu nikaṣam adhi yuddham asau vacanena kim bhavatu sādhu asādhu vā
acirāt mayā saha gatasya samara muraga ari lakṣmaṇaḥ
tīkṣṇa viśikha mukha pītam asṛk patatām gaṇaiḥ pibatu sārdham urvarā

original: abhidhāya rūkṣamiti mā sma gama iti pṛthāsuteritām /
analyzed: abhidhāya rūkṣam iti mā sma gamaḥ iti pṛthāsuta īritām

original: vācamanunayaparāṃ sa tataḥ sahasāvakarṇya niriyāya saṃsadaḥ // MSpv_15.67 //
analyzed: vācam anunaya parām sa tatas sahasā avakarṇya niriyāya saṃsadaḥ
gṛham āgatāya kṛpayā ca katham api nisarga dakṣiṇāḥ
kṣānti mahita manasaḥ jananī svasuḥ ātmajāya cukupuḥ na pāṇḍavāḥ
calitam tatas avanipati yajña bhūmitaḥ
tūrṇam atha yayum iva anuyayuḥ damaghoṣa sūnum avanīśa sūnavaḥ
viśikha antarāṇi atipapāta sapadi javanaiḥ sa vājibhiḥ
draṣṭum alaghu rabhasā pātitāḥ vanitāḥ cakāra na sa kāma cetasaḥ

original: kṣaṇamīkṣataḥ pathi janena kimidamiti jalpatā mithaḥ /
analyzed: kṣaṇam īkṣataḥ pathi janena kim idam iti jalpatā mithas
prāpya śibiram aviśaṅki manāḥ samanīnahat drutam anīkinīm asau
tvaramāṇa śāṅkhika sa vega vadana pavana abhipūritaḥ
śaila kaṭaka taṭa bhinna ravaḥ praṇanāda sāṃnahanikaḥ sya vārijaḥ
dhīra nija rava vilīna guru pratiśabdam asya raṇa tūryam āvadhi
sahasā sa sa bhrama vilola sakala jana tā samākulam
sthānam agamat atha tad paritas calita uḍu maṇḍala nabhaḥ sthala upamām
dadhataḥ bhayānakatara tvam upagatavataḥ samāna tām
dhūma paṭala pihitasya gireḥ samavarmayan sapadi medinībhṛtaḥ
parimohiṇā parijanena katham api cirāt upāhṛtam
varma kara tala yugena mahat tanu cūrṇa peṣam apiṣat ruṣā paraḥ
raṇa saṃmada udaya vikāsi bala kalakala ākulīkṛte

original: śārimaśakadhiropayituṃ dvirade madacyuti janaḥ kathañcana // MSpv_15.77 //
analyzed: dvirade mada cyuti janaḥ kathañcana
paritas ca dhauta mukha rukma vilasat ahimāṃśu maṇḍalāḥ

original: tenuratanuvapuṣaḥ pṛthivīṃ sphuṭalakṣyatejasa ivātmajāḥ śriyaḥ // MSpv_15.78 //
analyzed: tenuḥ atanu vapuṣaḥ pṛthivīm sphuṭa lakṣya tejasaḥ iva ātmajāḥ śriyaḥ
pradhi maṇḍala uddhata parāga ghana valaya madhya vartinaḥ
petuḥ aśanāyaḥ iva aśanakais guru niḥsvana vyathita jantavaḥ rathāḥ
dadhataḥ śaśa aṅkita śaśāṅka ruci lasat uraśchadam vapuḥ

original: cakruratha saha purandhijanairayathārthasiddhiṃ sarakaṃ mahībhṛtaḥ // MSpv_15.80 //
analyzed: cakruḥ atha saha purandhi janaiḥ ayathārtha siddhim sarakam mahībhṛtaḥ
dayitāya sa āsavam udastam apatat avasādinaḥ karāt
kāṃsyam upahita saroja patat bhramara ogha bhāra guru rāja yoṣitaḥ
bhṛśam aṅga sāda karuṇa tvam aviśada dṛśaḥ kapolayoḥ
vākyam asakalam apāsya madam vidadhuḥ tadīya guṇam ātmanā śucaḥ
sudṛśaḥ samīka gamanāya yuvabhiḥ atha saṃbabhāṣire
śoka pihita gala ruddha giraḥ tarasā āgata aśru jala kevala uttarāḥ
vipula acala sthala ghanena jigamiṣubhiḥ aṅganāḥ priyaiḥ
pīna kuca taṭa nipīḍa dalat vara vāra bāṇam urasā āliliṅgire
na mumoca locana jalāni dayita jaya maṅgala eṣiṇi
yātam avani bhava sanna bhujān na galat viveda valayam vilāsinī
pravivatsataḥ priyatamasya nigaḍam iva cakṣuḥ akṣipat
nīla nalina dala dāma ruci prati pāda yugmam acira ūḍha sundarī
vrajataḥ kva tāta vajasi iti paricaya gata artham asphuṭam
dhairyam abhinat uditam śiśunā jananī nirbhatsana vivṛddha manyunā
śaṭha nāka loka lalanābhiḥ avirata ratam riraṃsase
tena vahasi mudam iti avadat raṇa rāgiṇam ramaṇam īrṣyayā aparā
dhriyamāṇam api agalat aśru calati dayite nata bhruvaḥ
sneham akṛtaka rasam dadhatām idam eva yuktam ati mugdha cetasām
saha kajjalena virarāja nayana kamala ambu santatiḥ
gaṇḍa phalakam abhitas su tanoḥ padavī iva śoka maya kṛṣṇavartmanaḥ
kṣaṇa mātra rodhi calitena katipaya padam nata bhruvaḥ
srasta bhuja yuga galat valaya svanitam pratikṣutam iva upaśuśruve
abhivartma vallabhatamasya vigalat amala āyata aṃśukā

original: bhūminabhasi rabhasena yatī virarāja kācana samaṃ maholkayā // MSpv_15.92 //
analyzed: bhūmi nabhasi rabhasena yatī virarāja kācana samam mahā ulkayā
samara unmukhe nṛpa gaṇe tad anu maraṇa udyata eka dhīḥ

original: dīnaparijanakṛtāśrujalo na bhaṭījanaḥ sthiramanāḥ vicaklame // MSpv_15.93 //
analyzed: dīna parijana kṛta aśru jalaḥ na bhaṭī janaḥ sthira manāḥ vicaklame
viduṣī iva darśanam amuṣya yuvati rati durlabham punar

original: yāntamanimiṣamatṛptamanāḥ patimīkṣate sma bhṛśayā dṛśaḥ pathaḥ // MSpv_15.94 //
analyzed: yāntam animiṣam atṛpta manāḥ patim īkṣate sma bhṛśayā dṛśaḥ pathaḥ
sampratyupeyāḥ kuśalī punar yudhaḥ sa sneham āśīḥ iti bhartuḥ īritā

original: sadyaḥ prasahya dvitayena netrayoḥ pratyācacakṣe galatā bhaṭastriyāḥ // MSpv_15.95 //
analyzed: sadyas prasahya dvitayena netrayoḥ pratyācacakṣe galatā bhaṭa striyāḥ

original: kācitkīrṇā rajobhirdivamanuvidadhe bhinnavaktrendulakṣmīr aśrīkāḥ kāścidantardiśa iva dadhire dāhamudbhrāntasatvāḥ /
analyzed: kācid kīrṇā rajobhiḥ divam anuvidadhe bhinna vaktra indu lakṣmīḥ aśrīkāḥ kāścid antar diśaḥ iva dadhire dāham udbhrānta satvāḥ

original: bhremurvātyā ivānyāḥ pratipadamaparā bhūmivatkampamāpuḥ prasthāne pārthivānāmaśivamiti puro bhāvi nāryaḥ śaśaṃsuḥ // MSpv_15.96 //
analyzed: bhremuḥ vātyāḥ iva anyāḥ pratipadam aparāḥ bhūmi vat kampam āpuḥ prasthāne pārthivānām aśivam iti puras bhāvi nāryaḥ śaśaṃsuḥ
damaghoṣa sutena kaścana pratiśiṣṭaḥ pratibhānavān atha
upagamya harim sadasi adaḥ sphuṭa bhinna artham udāharat vacaḥ

original: abhidhāya tadā tadapriyaṃ śiśupālo 'nuśayaṃ paraṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: abhidhāya tadā tat apriyam śiśupālaḥ nuśayam param gataḥ

original: bhavato 'bhimanāḥ samīhate saruṣaḥ kartumupetya mānanām // MSpv_16.2 //
analyzed: bhavataḥ bhimanāḥ samīhate sa ruṣaḥ kartum upetya mānanām
vipulena nipīḍya nirdayam mudam āyātu nitāntam unmanāḥ

original: pracurādhigatāṅganirvṛtiṃ paritastvāṃ khalu vigraheṇa saḥ // MSpv_16.3 //
analyzed: pracura adhigata aṅga nirvṛtim paritas tvām khalu vigraheṇa saḥ

original: praṇataḥ śirasā kariṣyate sakalairetya samaṃ dharādhipaiḥ /
analyzed: praṇataḥ śirasā kariṣyate sakalaiḥ etya samam dharādhipaiḥ

original: tava śāsanamāśu bhūpatiḥ paravānadya yatastvayaiva saḥ // MSpv_16.4 //
analyzed: tava śāsanam āśu bhūpatiḥ paravān adya yatas tvayā eva saḥ
adhi vahni pataṅga tejasaḥ niyata svānta samartha karmaṇaḥ

original: tava sarvavidheyavartinaḥ praṇatiṃ bibhrati kena bhūbhṛtaḥ // MSpv_16.5 //
analyzed: tava sarva vidheya vartinaḥ praṇatim bibhrati kena bhūbhṛtaḥ
janatām bhaya śūnya dhīḥ paraiḥ abhibhūtām avalambase yatas

original: tava kṛṣṇa guṇāstato narairasamānasya dadhatyagaṇyatām // MSpv_16.6 //
analyzed: tava kṛṣṇa guṇāḥ tatas naraiḥ asamānasya dadhati agaṇya tām
ahita adana patrapaḥ trasan atimātra ujjhita bhīra nāstikaḥ
vinaya upahitaḥ tvayā kutas sadṛśaḥ anyaḥ guṇavān avismayaḥ
kṛta gopa vadhū rateḥ ghnataḥ vṛṣam ugre narake saṃprati
pratipattiḥ adhas kṛta enasaḥ janatābhiḥ tava sādhu varṇyate
vihita apacitiḥ mahībhṛtām dviṣatām āhita sādhvasaḥ balaiḥ
bhava sa anucaraḥ tvam uccakais mahatām api upari kṣamābhṛtām
ghana jāla nibhaiḥ durāsadāḥ paritas nāga kadambakaiḥ tava

original: nagareṣu bhavantu vīthayaḥ parikīrṇā vanajairmṛgādibhiḥ // MSpv_16.10 //
analyzed: nagareṣu bhavantu vīthayaḥ parikīrṇāḥ vana jaiḥ mṛga ādibhiḥ
ripuḥ unnata dhīra cetasaḥ satata vyādhiḥ anītiḥ astu te
vikaca utpala cāru locanaḥ tava caidyena ghaṭām upeyuṣaḥ

original: yadupuṅgava bandhusauhṛdāttvayi pātā sasuro navāsavaḥ // MSpv_16.12 //
analyzed: yadu puṅgava bandhu sauhṛdāt tvayi pātā sa suraḥ nava asavaḥ

original: calitānakadundubhiḥ puraḥ sabalastvaṃ saha sāraṇena tam /
analyzed: calita ānakadundubhiḥ puras sa balaḥ tvam saha sāraṇena tam
samitau rabhasāt upāgataḥ sa gadaḥ saṃpratipattum arhasi
samareṣu ripūn vinighnatā śiśupālena sametya saṃprati
su ciram saha sarva sātvataiḥ bhava viśvasta vilāsinī janaḥ
vijita krudham īkṣatām asau mahatām tvām ahitam mahībhṛtām

original: asakṛjjitasaṃyataṃ puro muditaḥ sapramadaṃ mahīpatiḥ // MSpv_16.15 //
analyzed: asakṛt jita saṃyatam puras muditaḥ sa pramadam mahīpatiḥ

original: iti joṣamavasthitaṃ dviṣaḥ praṇidhiṃ gāmabhidhāya sātyakiḥ /
analyzed: iti joṣam avasthitam dviṣaḥ praṇidhim gām abhidhāya sātyakiḥ

original: vadati sma vaco 'tha coditaścalitaikabhrū rathāṅgapāṇinā // MSpv_16.16 //
analyzed: vadati sma vacaḥ coditaḥ calita eka bhrūḥ rathāṅga pāṇinā
madhuram bahis antara priyam kṛtinā avāci vacaḥ tathā tvayā
sakala artha tayā vibhāvyate priyam antar bahis apriyam yathā
ati komalam ekatas nyatas sarasa ambhoruha vṛnta karkaśam

original: vahati sphuṭamekameva te vacanaṃ śākapalāśadeśyatām // MSpv_16.18 //
analyzed: vahati sphuṭam ekam eva te vacanam śāka palāśa deśya tām

original: prakaṭaṃ mṛdu nāma jalpataḥ paruṣaṃ sūcayatorthamantarā /
analyzed: prakaṭam mṛdu nāma jalpataḥ paruṣam sūcayataḥ ṛtham antarā
śakunāt iva mārga vartibhiḥ paruṣāt udvijitavyam īdṛśāt
harim arcitavān mahīpatiḥ yadi rājñaḥ tava kaḥ matsaraḥ
nyasanāya sa saurabhasya kaḥ taru sūnasya śirasi asūyati
sukumāram aho laghīyasām hṛdayam tat gatam apriyam yatas

original: sahasaiva samudgirantyamī jarayantyeva hi tanmanīṣiṇaḥ // MSpv_16.21 //
analyzed: sahasā eva samudgiranti amī jarayanti eva hi tat manīṣiṇaḥ
upakāra paraḥ svabhāvataḥ satatam sarva janasya sat janaḥ
asatām aniśam tathā api aho guru hṛd roga karī tad unnatiḥ
paritapyate eva na uttamaḥ paritaptaḥ u pi aparaḥ su saṃvṛtiḥ
para vṛddhibhiḥ āhita vyathaḥ sphuṭa nirbhinna durāśayaḥ dhamaḥ
a nirākṛta tāpa saṃpadam phala hīnām sumanobhiḥ ujjhitām

original: khalatāṃ khalatāmivāsatīṃ pratipadyeta kathaṃ budho janaḥ // MSpv_16.24 //
analyzed: khala tām khala tām iva asatīm pratipadyeta katham budhaḥ janaḥ
prativācam adatta keśavaḥ śapamānāya na cedi bhūbhuje

original: anuhuṅkurute ghanadhvaniṃ na hi gomāyurutāni kesarī // MSpv_16.25 //
analyzed: anuhuṅkurute ghana dhvanim na hi gomāyu rutāni kesarī
jita roṣa rayā mahā dhiyaḥ sapadi krodha jitaḥ laghuḥ janaḥ

original: vijitena jitasya durmatermatimadbhiḥ saha kā virodhitā // MSpv_16.26 //
analyzed: vijitena jitasya durmateḥ matimadbhiḥ saha kā virodhi tā

original: vacanairasatāṃ mahīyaso na khalu vyeti gurutvamuddhataiḥ /
analyzed: vacanaiḥ asatām mahīyasaḥ na khalu vyeti guru tvam uddhataiḥ
kim apaiti rajobhiḥ aurvaraiḥ avakīrṇasya maṇeḥ mahārgha tā

original: paritoṣayitā na kaścana svagato yasya guṇo 'sti dehinaḥ /
analyzed: paritoṣayitā na kaścana svagataḥ yasya guṇaḥ sti dehinaḥ
para doṣa kathābhiḥ alpakaḥ sva janam toṣayitum kila icchati
sahaja andha dṛśaḥ sva durnaye para doṣa īkṣaṇa divya cakṣuṣaḥ
sva guṇa ucca giraḥ muni vratāḥ para varṇa grahaṇeṣu asādhavaḥ
prakaṭāni api naipuṇam mahat para vācyāni cirāya gopitum
vivarītum atha ātmanaḥ guṇān bhṛśam ākauśalam ārya cetasām
kim iva akhila loka kīrtitam kathayati ātma guṇam mahāmanāḥ

original: vaditā na laghīyaso 'paraḥ svaguṇaṃ tena vadatyasau svayam // MSpv_16.31 //
analyzed: vaditā na paraḥ sva guṇam tena vadati asau svayam
visṛjanti avikatthinaḥ pare viṣam āśīviṣa vat narāḥ krudham
dadhataḥ ntara sāra rūpa tām dhvani sārāḥ paṭahāḥ iva itare
naraka chidam icchati īkṣitum vidhinā yena sa cedi bhūpatiḥ

original: drutametu na hāpayiṣyate sadṛśaṃ tasya vidhātumuttaram // MSpv_16.33 //
analyzed: drutam etu na hāpayiṣyate sadṛśam tasya vidhātum uttaram
samanaddha kim aṅga bhūpatiḥ yadi saṃdhitsuḥ asau saha amunā

original: harirākramaṇena saṃnati kila vibhrati bhiyetyasaṃbhavaḥ // MSpv_16.34 //
analyzed: hariḥ ākramaṇena saṃnati kila vibhrati bhiyā iti asaṃbhavaḥ
mahataḥ tarasā vilaṅghayan nija doṣeṇa kudhīḥ vinaśyati

original: kurute na khalu svayecchayā śalabhānindhanamiddhadīdhitiḥ // MSpv_16.35 //
analyzed: kurute na khalu svayā icchayā śalabhān indhanam iddha dīdhitiḥ

original: yadapūri purā mahīpatirna mukhena svayamagasā śatam /
analyzed: yat apūri purā mahīpatiḥ na mukhena svayam agasā śatam

original: atha saṃprati paryapūpurattadasau dūtamukhena śārṅgiṇaḥ // MSpv_16.36 //
analyzed: atha saṃprati paryapūpurat tat asau dūta mukhena śārṅgiṇaḥ
yat anargala gopura ānanaḥ tvam itas vakṣyasi kiñcid apriyam

original: vivariṣyati taccirasya naḥ samayodvīkṣaṇarakṣitāṃ krudham // MSpv_16.37 //
analyzed: vivariṣyati tat cirasya naḥ samaya udvīkṣaṇa rakṣitām krudham
niśamya tat ūrjitam śineḥ vacanam naptuḥ an āptuḥ enasām

original: punarujjhitasādhvaso dviṣāmabhidhatte sma vaco vacoharaḥ // MSpv_16.38 //
analyzed: punar ujjhita sādhvasaḥ dviṣām abhidhatte sma vacaḥ vacoharaḥ

original: vivinakti na buddhidurvidhaḥ svayameva svahitaṃ pṛthagjanaḥ /
analyzed: vivinakti na buddhi durvidhaḥ svayam eva sva hitam pṛthagjanaḥ

original: yadudīritamapyadaḥ parairna vijānāti tadadbhutaṃ mahat // MSpv_16.39 //
analyzed: yat udīritam api adaḥ paraiḥ na vijānāti tat adbhutam mahat
viduḥ iṣyat apāyam ātmanā paratas śraddadhate budhāḥ

original: na paropahitaṃ na ca svataḥ pramimīte 'nubhavādṛte 'lpadhīḥ // MSpv_16.40 //
analyzed: na para upahitam na ca svatas pramimīte nubhavāt ṛte lpa dhīḥ

original: kuśalaṃ khalu tubhyameva tadvacanaṃ kṛṣṇa yadabhyadhāmaham /
analyzed: kuśalam khalu tubhyam eva tat vacanam kṛṣṇa yat abhyadhām aham
upadeśa parāḥ pareṣu api sva vināśa abhimukheṣu sādhavaḥ
ubhayam yugapad mayā uditam tvarayā sāntvam atha itarat ca te

original: pravibhajya pṛthaṅmanīṣayā svaguṇaṃ yatkila tatkariṣyasi // MSpv_16.42 //
analyzed: pravibhajya pṛthak manīṣayā sva guṇam yat kila tat kariṣyasi
athavā abhiniviṣṭa buddhiṣu vrajati vyarthaka tām subhāṣitam
ravi rāgiṣu śītarociṣaḥ kara jālam kamala ākareṣu iva
an apekṣya guṇa aguṇau janaḥ sva rucim niścayataḥ anudhāvati

original: apahāya mahīśamarcicatsadati tvāṃ nanu bhīmapūrvajaḥ // MSpv_16.44 //
