analyzed: apahāya mahīśam arci cat sadati tvām nanu bhīmapūrvajaḥ

original: tvayi bhaktimatā na satkṛtaḥ kururājā gurureva cedipaḥ /
analyzed: tvayi bhaktimatā na satkṛtaḥ kuru rājā guruḥ eva cedipaḥ
priya māṃsa mṛga adhipa ujjhitaḥ kim avadyaḥ kari kumbha jaḥ maṇiḥ
kriyate dhavalaḥ khalu uccakais dhavalaiḥ eva sitetaraiḥ adhas
śirasā odham adhatta śṅkaraḥ surasindhoḥ madhujit tam aṅghriṇā

original: abudhaiḥ kṛtamānasamvidastava pārthaiḥ kuta eva yogyatā /
analyzed: abudhaiḥ kṛta māna samvidaḥ tava pārthaiḥ kutas eva yogyatā

original: sahasi plavagairupāsitaṃ na hi guñjāphalameti soṣmatām // MSpv_16.47 //
analyzed: sahasi plavagaiḥ upāsitam na hi guñjā phalam eti sa ūṣma tām
aparādha śata kṣamam nṛpaḥ kṣamayā atyeti bhavantam ekayā

original: hṛtavatyapi bhīṣmakātmajāṃ tvayi cakṣāma samartha eva yat // MSpv_16.48 //
analyzed: hṛtavati api bhīṣmaka ātmajām tvayi cakṣāma samarthaḥ eva yat
gurubhiḥ pratipāditām vadhūm apahṛtya sva janasya bhūpateḥ

original: janako 'si janārdana sphuṭaṃ hatadharmārthatayā manobhuvaḥ // MSpv_16.49 //
analyzed: si janārdana sphuṭam hata dharma artha tayā manobhuvaḥ
a nirūpi rūpa saṃpadaḥ tamasaḥ vā anya bhṛtacchada chaveḥ

original: tava sarvagatasya saṃprati kṣitipaḥ kṣipnurabhīśumāniva // MSpv_16.50 //
analyzed: tava sarva gatasya saṃprati kṣitipaḥ kṣipnuḥ abhīśumān iva
kṣubhitasya mahībhṛtaḥ tvayi praśama upanyasanam vṛthā mama

original: pralayollasitasya vāridheḥ parivāho jagataḥ karoti kim // MSpv_16.51 //
analyzed: pralaya ullasitasya vāridheḥ parivāhaḥ jagataḥ karoti kim
prahitaḥ pradhanāya mādhavān aham ākārayitum mahībhṛtā

original: na pareṣu mahaujasaśchalādapakurvanti malimlucā iva // MSpv_16.52 //
analyzed: na pareṣu mahā ojasaḥ chalāt apakurvanti malimlucāḥ iva

original: tadayaṃ samupaiti bhūpatiḥ payasāṃ pūra ivānivāritaḥ /
analyzed: tat ayam samupaiti bhūpatiḥ payasām pūraḥ iva anivāritaḥ

original: avilambitamedhi vetasastaruvanmādhava mā sma bhajyathāḥ // MSpv_16.53 //
analyzed: avilambita medhi vetasaḥ taru vat mādhava mā sma bhajyathāḥ

original: paripāti sa kevalaṃ śiśūniti tannāmani mā sma viśvasīḥ /
analyzed: paripāti sa kevalam śiśūn iti tad nāmani mā sma viśvasīḥ

original: taruṇānapi rakṣati kṣamī sa śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇāgatāndviṣaḥ // MSpv_16.54 //
analyzed: taruṇān api rakṣati kṣamī sa śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇa āgatān dviṣaḥ

original: na vidadhyuraśaṅkamapriyaṃ mahataḥ svārthaparāḥ pare katham /
analyzed: na vidadhyuḥ aśaṅkam apriyam mahataḥ sva artha parāḥ pare katham
bhajate kupitaḥ u pi udāra dhīḥ anunītim nati mātrakeṇa saḥ

original: hitamapriyamicchasi śrutaṃ yadi saṃdhatsva purā na naśyasi /
analyzed: hitam apriyam icchasi śrutam yadi saṃdhatsva purā na naśyasi
anṛtaiḥ atha tuṣyasi priyaiḥ jayatāt jīva bhavau anīśvaraḥ
pratipakṣa jit api asaṃśayam yudhi caidyena vijeṣyate bhavān

original: grasate hi tamopahaṃ muhurnanu rāhvāhvamaharpatiṃ tamaḥ // MSpv_16.57 //
analyzed: grasate hi tamaḥ upaham muhur nanu rāhu āhva maharpatim tamaḥ
acirāt jita mīnaketanaḥ vilasan vṛṣṇi gaṇaiḥ namaskṛtaḥ

original: kṣitipaḥ kṣayitoddhatāntako haralīlāṃ sa viḍambayiṣyati // MSpv_16.58 //
analyzed: kṣitipaḥ kṣayita uddhata antakaḥ hara līlām sa viḍambayiṣyati
nihata unmada duṣṭa kuñjarāt dadhataḥ bhūri yaśaḥ krama arjitam

original: na bibheti raṇe harerapi kṣitipaḥ kā gaṇanāsya vṛṣṇiṣu // MSpv_16.59 //
analyzed: na bibheti raṇe hareḥ api kṣitipaḥ kā gaṇanā asya vṛṣṇiṣu

original: na tadadbhutamasya yanmukhaṃ yudhi paśyanti bhiyā na śatravaḥ /
analyzed: na tat adbhutam asya yat mukham yudhi paśyanti bhiyā na śatravaḥ

original: dravatāṃ nanu pṛṣṭhamīkṣate vadanaṃ so 'pi na jātu vidviṣām // MSpv_16.60 //
analyzed: dravatām nanu pṛṣṭham īkṣate vadanam na jātu vidviṣām
śaradam prāpya vikhaṇḍita āyudhāḥ

original: dadhate 'ribhirasya tulyatāṃ yadi nāsārabhṛtaḥ payobhṛtaḥ // MSpv_16.61 //
analyzed: dadhate ribhirasya tulya tām yadi na asāra bhṛtaḥ payobhṛtaḥ
malinam raṇa reṇubhiḥ muhur dviṣatām kṣālitam aṅganā aśrubhiḥ
nṛpa mauli marīci varṇakaiḥ atha yasya aṅghi yugam vilipyate
samarāya nikāma karkaśam kṣaṇam ākṛṣṭam upaiti yasya ca
dhanuṣā samam āśu vidviṣām kulam āśaṅkita bhaṅgam ānatim
tuhināṃśum amum suhṛd janāḥ kalayanti uṣṇakaram virodhinaḥ

original: kṛtibhiḥ kṛtadṛṣṭivibhramāḥ srajameke bhujagaṃ yathāpare // MSpv_16.64 //
analyzed: kṛtibhiḥ kṛta dṛṣṭi vibhramāḥ srajam eke bhujagam yathā apare
dadhataḥ sulabha kṣaya āgamāḥ tanum ekānta ratām amānuṣīm

original: bhuvi samprati na pratiṣṭhitāḥ sadṛśā yasya surairarātayaḥ // MSpv_16.65 //
analyzed: bhuvi samprati na pratiṣṭhitāḥ sadṛśāḥ yasya suraiḥ arātayaḥ
ati vismayanīya karmaṇaḥ nṛpateḥ yasya virodhi kiñcana
yadu mukta nayaḥ nayati asau ahitānām kulam akṣayam kṣayam
calita ūrdhva kabandha sampadaḥ makara vyūha nirūddha vartmanaḥ
atarat sva bhuja ojasā muhur mahataḥ saṅgara sāgara ānasau

original: na cikīrṣati yaḥ smayoddhato nṛpatittaccaraṇopapagaṃ śiraḥ /
analyzed: na cikīrṣati yaḥ smayā uddhataḥ nṛpatiḥ tad caraṇa upapagam śiraḥ

original: caraṇaṃ kurute gatasmayaḥ smasāveva tadīyamūrdhani // MSpv_16.68 //
analyzed: caraṇam kurute gata smayaḥ smasau eva tadīya mūrdhani
sva bhuja dvaya kevala āyudhaḥ caturaṅgām apahāya vāhinīm

original: bahuśaḥ saha śakradantinā sa caturdantamagacchadāhavam // MSpv_16.69 //
analyzed: bahuśas saha śakradantinā sa caturdantam agacchat āhavam
a vicālita cāru cakrayoḥ anurāgāt upagūḍhayoḥ śriyā

original: yuvayoridameva bhidyate yadupendrastvamatīndra eva saḥ // MSpv_16.70 //
analyzed: yuvayoḥ idam eva bhidyate yat upendraḥ tvam atīndraḥ eva saḥ
bhūtabhūtiḥ ahīna bhoga bhāj vijita aneka puraḥ pi vidviṣām
rucim indu dale karoti ajaḥ paripūrṇa indu ruciḥ mahīpatiḥ
nayati drutam uddhati śritaḥ prasabham bhaṅgam abhaṅgura udayaḥ
gamayati avanī tala sphurat bhuja śākham bhṛśam anyam unnatim
adhigamya ca randhram antarā janayan maṇḍala bhedam anyatas

original: khanati kṣatasaṃhati kṣaṇādapi mūlāni mahānti kasyacit // MSpv_16.73 //
analyzed: khanati kṣata saṃhati kṣaṇāt api mūlāni mahānti kasyacid
ghana patra bhṛtaḥ nugāminaḥ tarasā ākṛṣya karoti kāṃścana

original: dṛḍhamapyaparaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ pratikūlaṃ nitarāṃ nirasyati // MSpv_16.74 //
analyzed: dṛḍham api aparam pratiṣṭhitam pratikūlam nitarām nirasyati

original: iti pūra ivodakasya yaḥ saritāṃ prāvṛṣijas taṭadrumaiḥ /
analyzed: iti pūraḥ iva udakasya yaḥ saritām prāvṛṣijaḥ taṭa drumaiḥ

original: kvacanāpi mahānakhaṇḍitaprasaraḥ krīḍati bhūbhṛtāṃ gaṇaiḥ // MSpv_16.75 //
analyzed: kvacana api mahān akhaṇḍita prasaraḥ krīḍati bhūbhṛtām gaṇaiḥ
a laghu upala paṅkti śālinīḥ paritas ruddha nirantara ambarāḥ

original: adhirūḍhanitambabhūmayo na vimuñcanti cirāya mekhalāḥ // MSpv_16.76 //
analyzed: adhirūḍha nitamba bhūmayaḥ na vimuñcanti cirāya mekhalāḥ
kaṭakāni bhajanti cārubhiḥ nava muktāphala bhūṣaṇaiḥ bhujaiḥ

original: niyataṃ dadhate ca citrakairaviyogaṃ pṛthugaṇḍaśailataḥ // MSpv_16.77 //
analyzed: niyatam dadhate ca citrakaiḥ aviyogam pṛthu gaṇḍaśailataḥ
iti yasya sa saṃpadaḥ purā yat avāpuḥ bhavaneṣu ari striyaḥ
sphuṭam eva samastam āpadā tat idānīm avanīdhra mūrdhasu
mahataḥ kukura andhaka drumān atimātram dava vat dahan api
ati citram idam mahīpatiḥ yat akṛṣṇām avanīm kariṣyati

original: paritaḥ pramitākṣarāpi sarvaṃ viṣayaṃ vyāptavatī gatā pratiṣṭhām /
analyzed: paritas pramitā akṣarā api sarvam viṣayam vyāptavatī gatā pratiṣṭhām

original: na khalu pratihanyate kutaścitparibhāṣeva garīyasī yadājñā // MSpv_16.80 //
analyzed: na khalu pratihanyate kutaścid paribhāṣā iva garīyasī yat ājñā
yām ūḍhavān ūḍha varāha mūrtiḥ muhūrtam ādau puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ

original: tenohyate sāṃpratamakṣataiva kṣatāriṇā samyagasau punarbhūḥ // MSpv_16.81 //
analyzed: tena uhyate sāṃpratam akṣatā eva kṣata ariṇā samyak asau punarbhūḥ

original: bhūyāṃsa kvacidapi kāmamaskhalantastuṅgatvaṃ dadhati ca yadyapi dvaye 'pi /
analyzed: kvacid api kāmam a skhalantaḥ tuṅga tvam dadhati ca yadi api dvaye

original: kallolāḥ salilanidheravāpya pāraṃ śīryante na guṇamahormayastadīyāḥ // MSpv_16.82 //
analyzed: kallolāḥ salilanidheḥ avāpya pāram śīryante na guṇa mahā ūrmayaḥ tadīyāḥ

original: lokālokavyāhataṃ gharmaraśmeḥ śālīnaṃ vā dhāma nālaṃ prasartum /
analyzed: lokāloka vyāhatam gharmaraśmeḥ śālīnam vā dhāma na alam prasartum

original: lokasyāgre paśyato dhṛṣṭamāśu krāmatyuccairbhūbhṛto yasya tejaḥ // MSpv_16.83 //
analyzed: lokasya agre paśyataḥ dhṛṣṭam āśu krāmati uccais bhūbhṛtaḥ yasya tejaḥ

original: vicchittirnavacandanena vapuṣo bhinno 'dharo 'laktakair acchācche patitāñjane ca nayane śroṇyo 'lasanmekhalāḥ /
analyzed: vicchittiḥ nava candanena vapuṣaḥ bhinnaḥ dharaḥ laktakaiḥ accha acche patita añjane ca nayane śroṇyaḥ lasat mekhalāḥ

original: prāpto mauktikahāramunnatakucābhogastadīyadviṣām itthaṃ nityavibhūṣaṇā yuvatayaḥ saṃpatsu cāpatsvapi // MSpv_16.84 //
analyzed: prāptaḥ mauktika hāram unnata kuca ābhogaḥ tadīya dviṣām ittham nitya vibhūṣaṇāḥ yuvatayaḥ saṃpatsu ca āpatsu api
vinihatya bhavantam ūrjita śrī yudhi sadyas śiśupāla tām yathārthām
rudatām bhavat aṅganā gaṇānām karuṇa antaḥkaraṇaḥ kariṣyate sau
iti īrite vacasi vacasvinā amunā yuga kṣaya kṣubhita marut garīyasi

original: pracakṣubhe sapadi tadamburāśinā samaṃ mahāpralayasamudyataṃ sadaḥ // MSpv_17.1 //
analyzed: pracakṣubhe sapadi tad amburāśinā samam mahāpralaya samudyatam sadaḥ
sa rāgayā sruta ghana gharma toyayā kara āhati dhvanita pṛthu uru pīṭhayā

original: muhurmuhurdaśanavikhaṇḍitoṣṭhayā ruṣā nṛpāḥ priyatamayeva bhejire // MSpv_17.2 //
analyzed: muhur muhur daśana vikhaṇḍita uṣṭhayā ruṣā nṛpāḥ priyatamayā iva bhejire
alakṣyata kṣaṇa dalita aṅgade gade kara udara prahita nija aṃsa dhāmani
samullasat śakalita pāṭalā upalaiḥ sphuliṅgavān sphuṭam iva kopa pāvakaḥ
avajñayā yat ahasat uccakais balaḥ samullasat daśana mayūkha maṇḍalaḥ

original: ruṣāruṇīkṛtamapi tena tatkṣaṇaṃ nijaṃ vapuḥ punarayannijāṃ rucim // MSpv_17.4 //
analyzed: ruṣā aruṇīkṛtam api tena tad kṣaṇam nijam vapuḥ punar ayat nijām rucim
yat utpatat pṛthutara hāra maṇḍalam vyavartata drutam abhidūtam ulmukaḥ
bṛhat śilā tala kaṭhina aṃsa ghaṭṭitam tatas bhavat bhramitām iva akhilam sadaḥ
prakupyataḥ śvasana samīraṇa āhati sphuṭa ūṣmabhiḥ tanu vasana anta mārutaiḥ
yudhājitaḥ kṛta paritūrṇa vījanam punastarām vadana sarojam asvidat
prajāpati kratu nidhana artham utthitam vyatarkayat jvaram iva raudram uddhatam

original: samudyataṃ sapadi vadhāya vidviṣāmatikrudhaṃ niṣadhamanauṣadhaṃ janaḥ // MSpv_17.7 //
analyzed: samudyatam sapadi vadhāya vidviṣām ati krudham niṣadham anauṣadham janaḥ
parasparam parikupitasya piṃṣataḥ kṣata ūrmikā kanaka parāga paṅkilam
kara dvayam sapadi sudhanvanaḥ nijaiḥ anārata srutibhiḥ adhāvyata ambubhiḥ
nirāyatām anala śikhā ujjvalām jvalat nakha prabhā kṛta pariveṣa saṃpadam
a vibhramat bhramat anala ulmuka ākṛtim pradeśinīm jagat iva dagdhum āhukiḥ
durīkṣa tām abhajata manmathaḥ tathā yathā purā paricita dāha dhārṣṭyāyā

original: dhruvaṃ puraḥ saśaramamuṃ tṛtīyayā haro 'pi na vyasahata vīkṣituṃ dṛśā // MSpv_17.10 //
analyzed: dhruvam puras sa śaram amum tṛtīyayā haraḥ pi na vyasahata vīkṣitum dṛśā
vicintayan upanatam āhavam rasāt uraḥ sphurat tanuruham agra pāṇinā
parāmṛśat kaṭhina kaṭhora kāminī kuca sthala pramuṣita candanam pṛthuḥ
vilaṅghita sthitim abhivīkṣya rukṣayā ripoḥ girā gurum api gāndinī sutam
janaiḥ tadā yuga parivarta vāyubhiḥ vivartitāḥ giripatayaḥ pratīyire
vivartayan mada kaluṣīkṛte dṛśau kara āhata kṣiti kṛta bhairava aravaḥ
krudhā dadhat tanum ati lohinīm abhūt prasenajit gajaḥ iva gairika aruṇaḥ
sa kuṅkumaiḥ aviralam ambu bindubhiḥ gaveṣaṇaḥ pariṇata dāḍima aruṇaiḥ

original: sa matsarasphuṭitavapurviniḥsṛtairbabhau ciraṃ nicita ivāsṛjāṃ lavaiḥ // MSpv_17.14 //
analyzed: sa matsara sphuṭita vapuḥ viniḥsṛtaiḥ babhau ciram nicitaḥ iva asṛjām lavaiḥ
sa saṃbhramam caraṇa tala abhitāḍana sphuṭat mahī vivara vitīrṇa vartmabhiḥ
raveḥ karaiḥ anucita tāpita uragam prakāśa tām śiniḥ anayat rasātalam

original: pratikṣaṇaṃ vidhuvati śāraṇe śiraḥ śikhidyutaḥ kanakakirīṭaraśmayaḥ /
analyzed: pratikṣaṇam vidhuvati śāraṇe śiraḥ śikhi dyutaḥ kanaka kirīṭa raśmayaḥ

original: aśaṅkitaṃ yudhamadhunā viśantvamī kṣamāpatīniti nirarājayanniva // MSpv_17.16 //
analyzed: a śaṅkitam yudham adhunā viśantu amī kṣamāpatīn iti nirarājayan iva
calat pṛthu rasanam vivakṣayā vidāritam vitata bṛhat bhujālataḥ

original: vidūrathaḥ pratibhayamāsyakandaraṃ calatphaṇādharamiva koṭaraṃ taruḥ // MSpv_17.17 //
analyzed: vidūrathaḥ pratibhayam āsya kandaram calat phaṇa adharam iva koṭaram taruḥ

original: samākule sadasi tathāpi vikriyāṃ mano 'gamanna murabhidaḥ paroditaiḥ /
analyzed: samākule sadasi tathā api vikriyām manaḥ gamat na murabhidaḥ para uditaiḥ

original: ghanāmbubhirbahulitanimnagājalairjalaṃ na hi vrajati vikāramambudheḥ // MSpv_17.18 //
analyzed: ghana ambubhiḥ bahulita nimnagā jalaiḥ jalam na hi vrajati vikāram ambudheḥ

original: parānamī yadapavadanta ātmanaḥ stuvanti ca sthitirasatāmasāviti /
analyzed: parān amī yat apavadante ātmanaḥ stuvanti ca sthiti rasatām asau iti

original: nināya no vikṛtimavismitaḥ smitaṃ mukhaṃ śaracchaśadharamugdhamuddhavaḥ // MSpv_17.19 //
analyzed: nināya naḥ vikṛtim avismitaḥ smitam mukham śarad śaśadhara mugdham uddhavaḥ

original: nirākṛte yadubhiriti prakopibhiḥ spaśe śanairgatavati tatra vidviṣām /
analyzed: nirākṛte yadubhiḥ iti prakopibhiḥ spaśe śanais gatavati tatra vidviṣām

original: muradviṣaḥ svanitabhayānakānakaṃ balaṃ kṣaṇādatha samanahyatājaye // MSpv_17.20 //
analyzed: muradviṣaḥ svanita bhayānaka ānakam balam kṣaṇāt atha samanahyata ājaye
muhur pratiskhalita para āyudhāḥ yudhi sthavīyasīḥ acala nitamba nirbharāḥ
a daṃśayan a rahita śaurya daṃśanāḥ tanūḥ ayam naya iti vṛṣṇi bhūbhṛtaḥ
durudvahāḥ kṣaṇam aparaiḥ tad antare raṇa śravāt upacayam āśu bibhrati

original: mahībhujāṃ mahimabhṛtāṃ na saṃmamurmudo 'ntarāvapuṣi bahiśca kañcukāḥ // MSpv_17.22 //
analyzed: mahībhujām mahima bhṛtām na saṃmamuḥ mudaḥ bahis ca kañcukāḥ
saṃkalpam dvirada gaṇam varūthinaḥ turaṅgiṇaḥ jayana yujaḥ ca vājinaḥ

original: tvarāyujaḥ svayamapi kurvato nṛpāḥ punaḥ punastadadhikṛtānatatvaran // MSpv_17.23 //
analyzed: tvarā yujaḥ svayam api kurvataḥ nṛpāḥ punar punar tad adhikṛtān atatvaran
yudhe paraiḥ saha dṛḍha baddha kakṣayā kalakvaṇat madhupa kula upagītayā

original: adīyata dvipaghaṭayā savāribhiḥ karodaraiḥ svayamatha dānamakṣayam // MSpv_17.24 //
analyzed: adīyata dvipa ghaṭayā sa vāribhiḥ kara udaraiḥ svayam atha dānam akṣayam
su mekhalāḥ sitatara danta cāravaḥ samullasat tanu paridhāna saṃpadaḥ

original: raṇaiṣiṇāṃ pulakabhṛto 'dhikandharaṃ lalambire sadasilatāḥ priyā iva // MSpv_17.25 //
analyzed: raṇa eṣiṇām pulaka bhṛtaḥ dhi kandharam lalambire sat asi latāḥ priyāḥ iva
manoharaiḥ prakṛti manorama ākṛtiḥ bhaya pradaiḥ samitiṣu bhīma darśanaḥ
sa daivataiḥ satatam atha anapāyibhiḥ nija aṅga vat murajit asevya tā āyudhaiḥ
a vāritam gatam ubhayeṣu bhūriśas kṣamābhṛtām atha kaṭaka antareṣu api

original: muhuryudhi kṣatasuraśatruśoṇitaplutapradhiṃ rathamadhirohati sma saḥ // MSpv_17.27 //
analyzed: muhur yudhi kṣata sura śatru śoṇita pluta pradhim ratham adhirohati sma saḥ
upetya ca svana guru pakṣa mārutam divaḥ tviṣā kapiśita dūra diṅmukhaḥ

original: prakampitasthiratarayaṣṭi tatkṣaṇaṃ patatpatiḥ padamadhiketanaṃ dadhau // MSpv_17.28 //
analyzed: prakampita sthiratara yaṣṭi tad kṣaṇam patatpatiḥ padam adhiketanam
gabhīra tā vijita mṛdaṅga nādayā svana śriyā hata ripu haṃsa harṣayā

original: pramodayannatha mukharānkalāpinaḥ pratiṣṭhate navaghanavadrathaḥ sma saḥ // MSpv_17.29 //
analyzed: pramodayan atha mukharān kalāpinaḥ pratiṣṭhate nava ghana vat rathaḥ sma saḥ
nirantara sthagita digantaram tatas samuccalat balam avalokayan janaḥ
vikautukaḥ prakṛta mahā plave bhavat viśṛṅkhalam pracalita sindhu vāriṇi
babṛṃhire gaja patayaḥ mahā ānakāḥ pradadhvanuḥ jaya turagāḥ jiheṣire

original: asaṃbhavadgirivaragahvarairabhūttadā ravairdalita iva sva āśrayaḥ // MSpv_17.31 //
analyzed: asaṃbhavat giri vara gahvaraiḥ abhūt tadā ravaiḥ dalitaḥ iva svaḥ āśrayaḥ

original: anārataṃ rasati jayāya dundubhau madhudviṣaḥ phaladalaghupratisvanaiḥ /
analyzed: anāratam rasati jayāya dundubhau madhudviṣaḥ phalada laghu pratisvanaiḥ
viniṣpatat mṛga patibhiḥ guhā mukhaiḥ gatāḥ parām mudam ahasan iva adrayaḥ
jaḍīkṛta śravaṇa pathe divaukasām camūrave viśati sura adri kandarāḥ
anarthakaiḥ ajani vidagdha kāminī rata antara kvaṇita vilāsa kauśalaiḥ
arātibhiḥ yudhi sahayudhvanaḥ hatān jighṛkṣavaḥ śruta raṇa tūrya niḥsvanāḥ

original: akurvata prathamasamāgamocitaṃ cirojjhitaṃ suragaṇikāḥ prasādhanam // MSpv_17.34 //
analyzed: akurvata prathama samāgama ucitam cira ujjhitam sura gaṇikāḥ prasādhanam
pracoditāḥ paricita yantṛ karmabhiḥ niṣādibhiḥ vidita yata aṅkuśa kriyaiḥ
gajāḥ sakṛt kara tala lola nālikā hatāḥ muhur praṇadita ghaṇḍam āyayuḥ

original: savikramakramaṇacalairitastataḥ prakīrṇakaiḥ kṣipata iva kṣite rajaḥ /
analyzed: sa vikrama kramaṇa calaiḥ itas tatas prakīrṇakaiḥ kṣipataḥ iva kṣiteḥ rajaḥ
vyaraṃsiṣuḥ na khalu janasya dṛṣṭayaḥ turaṅgamāt abhinava bhāṇḍa bhāriṇaḥ
cala aṅgulī kisalayam uddhataiḥ karaiḥ anṛtyata sphuṭa kṛta karṇa tālayā
mada udaka drava kaṭa bhitti saṅgibhiḥ kala svaram madhupa gaṇaiḥ agīyata
asicyata praśamita pāṃśubhiḥ mahī mada ambubhiḥ dhṛta nava pūrṇa kumbhayā
avādyata śravaṇa sukham samunnamat payodhara dhvani guru tūryam ānanaiḥ
udāsire pavana vidhūta vāsasaḥ tatas tatas gagana lihaḥ ca ketavaḥ

original: yataḥ puraḥ pratiripu śārṅgiṇaḥ svayaṃ vyadhīyata dvipaghaṭayeti maṅgalam // MSpv_17.39 //
analyzed: yatas puras pratiripu śārṅgiṇaḥ svayam vyadhīyata dvipa ghaṭayā iti maṅgalam

original: na śūnyatāmagamadasau niveśabhūḥ prabhūtatāṃ dadhati bale calatyapi /
analyzed: na śūnya tām agamat asau niveśa bhūḥ prabhūta tām dadhati bale calati api

original: payasyabhidravati bhuvaṃ yugāvadhau saritpatirna hi samupaiti riktatām // MSpv_17.40 //
analyzed: payasi abhidravati bhuvam yuga avadhau saritpatiḥ na hi samupaiti rikta tām
yiyāsitām atha madhubhid vivasvatā janaḥ jarat mahiṣa viṣāṇa dhūsarām
puras patat para bala reṇu mālinīm alakṣayat diśam abhidhūmitām iva
manasvinām udita guru pratiśrutiḥ śrutaḥ tathā na nija mṛdaṅga niḥsvanaḥ
yathā puras sama rasam udyata dviṣad vala ānaka dhvaniḥ udakarṣayat manaḥ

original: yathā yathā paṭaharavaḥ samīpatāmupāgamatsa harivarāgrataḥ saraḥ /
analyzed: yathā yathā paṭaha ravaḥ samīpa tām upāgamat sa hari vara agratas saraḥ

original: tathā tathā hṛṣitavapurmudākulā dviṣāṃ camūrajani janīva cetasā // MSpv_17.43 //
analyzed: tathā tathā hṛṣita vapuḥ mudā ākulā dviṣām camūḥ ajani janī iva cetasā
prasāriṇi sapadi nabhastale tatas samīraṇa bhramita parāga rūṣitā
vyabhāvyata pralaya ja kālikā ākṛtiḥ vidūrataḥ pratibala ketana āvaliḥ
kṣaṇena ca pratimukha tigmadīdhiti prati prabhā sphurat asi duḥkha darśanā

original: bhayaṅkarā bhṛśamapi darśanīyatāṃ yayāvasāvasuracamūśca bhūbhṛtām // MSpv_17.45 //
analyzed: bhayaṅkarā bhṛśam api darśanīya tām yayau asau asura camūḥ ca bhūbhṛtām

original: payomucāmabhipatatāṃ divi drutaṃ viparyayaḥ parita ivātapasya saḥ /
analyzed: payomucām abhipatatām divi drutam viparyayaḥ paritas iva ātapasya saḥ
sama kramaḥ sama viṣameṣu atha kṣaṇāt kṣamā talam bala jala rāśiḥ ānaśe

original: mamau puraḥ kṣaṇamiva paśyato mahattanūdarasthitabhuvanatrayasya tat /
analyzed: mamau puras kṣaṇam iva paśyataḥ mahat tanu udara sthita bhuvanatrayasya tat

original: viśālatāṃ dadhati nitāntamāyate balaṃ dviṣāṃ madhumathanasya cakṣuṣi // MSpv_17.47 //
analyzed: viśāla tām dadhati nitāntamāyate balam dviṣām madhumathanasya cakṣuṣi
bhṛśa svidaḥ pulaka vikāsi mūrtayaḥ rasa adhike manasi niviṣṭa sāhasāḥ

original: mukhe yudhaḥ sapadi raterivābhavansasambhramāḥ kṣitipacamūvadhūgaṇāḥ // MSpv_17.48 //
analyzed: mukhe yudhaḥ sapadi rateḥ iva abhavan sa sambhramāḥ kṣitipa camū vadhū gaṇāḥ
dhvaja aṃśukaiḥ dhruvam anukūla māruta prasāritaiḥ prasabha kṛta upahūtayaḥ

original: yadūnabhi drutataramudyatāyudhāḥ krudhā paraṃ rayamarayaḥ prapedire // MSpv_17.49 //
analyzed: yadūn abhi drutataram udyata āyudhāḥ krudhā param rayam arayaḥ prapedire
hareḥ api prati parakīya vāhinīḥ adhi syadam pravavṛtire camū carāḥ

original: vilambituṃ na khalu sahā manasvino vidhitsataḥ kalahamavekṣya vidviṣaḥ // MSpv_17.50 //
analyzed: vilambitum na khalu sahāḥ manasvinaḥ vidhitsataḥ kalaham avekṣya vidviṣaḥ
upāhitaiḥ vapuṣi nivāta varmabhiḥ sphurat maṇi prasṛta marīci sūcibhiḥ

original: nirantaraṃ narapatayo raṇājire rarājire śaranikarācitā iva // MSpv_17.51 //
analyzed: nirantaram narapatayaḥ raṇa ajire rarājire śara nikara ācitāḥ iva
atha uccakais jaraṭha kapota kandharā tanūruha prakara vipāṇḍura dyuti
valaiḥ calat caraṇa vidhūtam uccarat dhana āvalīḥ udacarata kṣamā rajaḥ
viṣaṅgibhiḥ bhṛśam itaretaram kvacid turaṅgamaiḥ upari niruddha nirgamāḥ
cala acalaiḥ anupadam āhatāḥ khuraiḥ vibabhramuḥ ciram adhas eva dhūlayaḥ
garīyasaḥ pracura mukhasya rāgiṇaḥ rajaḥ bhavat vyavahita satvam utkaṭam

original: sisṛkṣataḥ sarasijajanmano jagadbalasya tu kṣayamapanetumicchataḥ // MSpv_17.54 //
analyzed: sisṛkṣataḥ sarasija janmanaḥ jagat balasya tu kṣayam apanetum icchataḥ

original: purā śarakṣatijanitāni saṃyuge nayanti naḥ prasabhamasṛñji paṅkatām /
analyzed: purā śara kṣati janitāni saṃyuge nayanti naḥ prasabham asṛñji paṅka tām

original: iti dhruvaṃ vyalagiṣurāttabhītayaḥ khamuccakairanalasakhasya ketavaḥ // MSpv_17.55 //
analyzed: iti dhruvam vyalagiṣuḥ ātta bhītayaḥ kham uccakais anala sakhasya ketavaḥ
kvacid lasat ghana nikuramba karburaḥ kvacid hiraṇmaya kaṇa puñja piñjaraḥ
kvacid śarad śaśadhara khaṇḍa pāṇḍuraḥ khura kṣata kṣiti tala reṇuḥ udyayau
mahīyasā mahati diganta dantinām anīka je rajasi mukha anuṣaṅgiṇi
visāritām ajihata kokila āvalī malīmasāḥ jalada mada amburājayaḥ

original: śiroruhairalikulakomalairamī mudhā mṛdhe mṛṣata yuvāna eva mā /
analyzed: śiroruhaiḥ ali kula komalaiḥ amī mudhā mṛdhe mṛṣata yuvānaḥ eva mā

original: baloddhataṃ dhavalitamūrdhajāniti dhruvaṃ janāñjarata ivākarodrajaḥ // MSpv_17.58 //
analyzed: bala uddhatam dhavalita mūrdhajān iti dhruvam janān jarataḥ iva akarot rajaḥ

original: susaṃhatairdadhadapi dhāma nīyate tiraskṛtiṃ bahubhirasaṃśayaṃ paraiḥ /
analyzed: su saṃhataiḥ dadhat api dhāma nīyate tiraskṛtim bahubhiḥ asaṃśayam paraiḥ
yatas kṣiteḥ avayava saṃpadaḥ ṇavaḥ tviṣām nidheḥ api vapuḥ āvarīṣata
druta dravat ratha caraṇa kṣata kṣamā tala ullasat bahula rajaḥ vaguṇṭhitam
yuga kṣaya kṣaṇa niravagrahe jagat payonidheḥ jale iva magnam ābabhau
samullasat dinakara vaktra kāntayaḥ rajasvalāḥ parimalita ambara śriyaḥ

original: digaṅganāḥ kṣaṇamavilokanakṣamāḥ śarīriṇāṃ pariharaṇīyatāṃ yayuḥ // MSpv_17.61 //
analyzed: diś aṅganāḥ kṣaṇam a vilokana kṣamāḥ śarīriṇām pariharaṇīya tām yayuḥ
nirīkṣitum viyati sametya kautukāt parākramam samara mukhe mahībhṛtām
rajaḥ tatau animiṣa locana utpala vyathā ākṛti tridaśa gaṇaiḥ palāyyata
viṣaṅgiṇi pratipadam āpibati apaḥ hata aciradyutini samīra lakṣmaṇi
śanais śanais upacita paṅka bhārikāḥ payomucaḥ prayayuḥ apeta vṛṣṭayaḥ
nabhaḥ nadī vyatikara dhauta mūrtibhiḥ viyat gataiḥ anadhigatāni lebhire
calat camū turaga khura āhata utpatat mahī rajaḥ snapana sukhāni diggajaiḥ
gaja vraja ākramaṇa bhara avanamrayā rasātalam yat akhilam ānaśe bhuvā

original: nabhastalaṃ bhahulatareṇa reṇunā tato 'gamattrijagadivaikatāṃ sphuṭam // MSpv_17.65 //
analyzed: nabhastalam bhahulatareṇa reṇunā tatas gamat trijagat iva eka tām sphuṭam
sama sthalīkṛta vivareṇa pūritāḥ mahībhṛtām bala rajasā mahā guhāḥ
rahaḥ trapā vidhura vaghūra tā arthinām nabhaḥsadām upakaraṇīya tām yayuḥ

original: gate mukhacchadapaṭasādṛśīṃ dṛśaḥ pathasthiro dadhati ghane rajasyapi /
analyzed: gate mukhacchada paṭa sādṛśīm dṛśaḥ patha sthiraḥ dadhati ghane rajasi api
mada anilaiḥ adhimadhu cūta gandhibhiḥ dvipāḥ dvipān abhiyayuḥ eva raṃhasā
mada ambhasā parigalitena saptadhā gajāñjanaḥ śamita rajaḥ caya anadhas
upari avasthita ghana pāṃśu maṇḍalān alokayat tata paṭa maṇḍapān iva
anyūna unnatayaḥ timātra pṛthavaḥ pṛthvīdhara śrībhṛtaḥ stanvantaḥ kanaka āvalībhiḥ upamām saudāmanī dāmabhiḥ

original: varṣantaḥ śamamānayannupalasacchṛṅgāralekhāyudhāḥ kāle kāliyakāyakālavapuṣaḥ pāṃsūngajāmbhomucaḥ // MSpv_17.69 //
analyzed: varṣantaḥ śamam ānayan upalasat śṛṅgāra lekhā āyudhāḥ kāle kāliya kāya kāla vapuṣaḥ pāṃsūn gaja ambhomucaḥ
sañjagmāte tau apāyana pekṣau senā ambhodhī dhīra nādau rayeṇa

original: pakṣacchedātpūrvamekatra deśe vāñchantau vā vindhyasahyau niletum // MSpv_18.1 //
analyzed: pakṣacchedāt pūrvam ekatra deśe vāñchantau vā vindhya sahyau niletum

original: pattiḥ pattiṃ vāhameyāya vājī nāgaṃ nāgaḥ syandanastho rathastham /
analyzed: pattiḥ pattim vāham eyāya vājī nāgam nāgaḥ syandana sthaḥ ratha stham

original: itthaṃ senā vallabhasyeva rāgādaṅgenāṅgaṃ pratyanīkasya bheje // MSpv_18.2 //
analyzed: ittham senā vallabhasya iva rāgāt aṅgena aṅgam pratyanīkasya bheje
rathyā ghoṣaiḥ bṛṃhaṇaiḥ vāraṇānām aikyam gacchan vājinām hreṣayā ca
vyoma vyāpī santatam dundubhīnām avyaktaḥ bhūt īśitā iva praṇādaḥ
roṣa āveśāt gacchatām pratyamitram dūra utkṣipta sthūla bāhu dhvajānām
dīrghāḥ tiryak vaijayantī sadṛśyaḥ pādātānām bhrejire khaḍga lekhāḥ
vardhrā baddhāḥ dhauritena prayātām aśvīyānām uccakais uccalantaḥ

original: raukmā rejuḥ sthāsakā mūrtibhājo darpasyeva vyāptadehasyaśeṣāḥ // MSpv_18.5 //
analyzed: raukmāḥ rejuḥ sthāsakāḥ mūrti bhājaḥ darpasya iva vyāpta dehasya aśeṣāḥ
sāndra tvakkāḥ talpala āśliṣṭa kakṣāḥ āṅgīm śobhām āpnuvantaḥ caturthīm
kalpasya ante mārutena upanunnāḥ celuḥ caṇḍam gaṇḍaśailāḥ iva ibhāḥ
saṃkrīḍantī tejita aśvasya rāgāt udyamya ārāma grakāya utthitasya

original: raṃhobhājāmakṣadhūḥ syandanānāṃ hāhākāraṃ prājituḥ pratyanandat // MSpv_18.7 //
analyzed: raṃhaḥ bhājām akṣa dhūḥ syandanānām hāhākāram prājituḥ pratyanandat
kurvāṇānām sāmparāya antarāyam bhū reṇūnām mṛtyunā mārjanāya

original: sammārjanyo nūnamuddhūyamānā bhānti smoccaiḥ ketanānāṃ patākā // MSpv_18.8 //
analyzed: sammārjanyaḥ nūnam uddhūyamānāḥ bhānti sma uccais ketanānām patākā
udyat nādam dhanvibhiḥ niṣṭhurāṇi sthūlāni uccais maṇḍala tvam dadhanti

original: āsphālyante kārmukāṇi sma kāmaṃ hastyārohaiḥ kuñjarāṇāṃ śirāṃsi // MSpv_18.9 //
analyzed: āsphālyante kārmukāṇi sma kāmam hasti ārohaiḥ kuñjarāṇām śirāṃsi
ghaṇḍā nādaḥ nisvanaḥ ḍiṇḍimānām graiveyāṇām āravaḥ bṛṃhitāni
āma iti iva pratyavocan gajānām utsāha artham vācam ādhoraṇasya
yātaiḥ cāturvidhyam astra ādi bhedāt avyāsaṅgaiḥ sauṣṭhavāt lāghavāt ca
śikṣā śaktim prāharan darśayantaḥ mukta a muktaiḥ āyudhaiḥ āyudhīyāḥ
roṣa āveśāt ābhimukhyena kaucid pāṇigrāham raṃhasā eva upayātau

original: hitvā hetīrmallavanmuṣṭighātaṃ ghnantau bāhūbāhavi vyāsṛjetām // MSpv_18.12 //
analyzed: hitvā hetīḥ malla vat muṣṭi ghātam ghnantau bāhu bāhavi vyāsṛjetām

original: śuddhāḥ saṅgaṃ na kaucitprāptavanto dūrānmuktā śīghratāṃ darśayantaḥ /
analyzed: śuddhāḥ saṅgam na kaucid prāptavantaḥ dūrāt muktā śīghra tām darśayantaḥ

original: antaḥsenaṃ vidviṣāmāviśanto yuktaṃ cakruḥ sāyakā vājitāyāḥ // MSpv_18.13 //
analyzed: antaḥsenam vidviṣām āviśantaḥ yuktam cakruḥ sāyakāḥ vājitāyāḥ
ākramya ājeḥ agrima skandham uccais āsthāya atho vīta śaṅkam śiraḥ ca

original: helālolā vartma gatvātimartyaṃ dyāmārohanmānabhājaḥ sukhena // MSpv_18.14 //
analyzed: helā lolāḥ vartma gatvā atimartyam dyām ārohat māna bhājaḥ sukhena
rodoḥ randhram vyaśnuvānāni lolaiḥ aṅgasya antar māditaiḥ sthāvarāṇi

original: kecitgurvīmetya saṃyanniṣadyāṃ krīṇanti sma prāṇamūlyairyaśāṃsi // MSpv_18.15 //
analyzed: kecid gurvīm etya saṃyat niṣadyām krīṇanti sma prāṇa mūlyaiḥ yaśāṃsi
vīrya utsāha ślāghi kṛtvā avadānam saṅgrāma agre māninām lajjitānām

original: ajñātānāṃ śatrubhiryuktamuccaiḥ śrīmannāma śrāvayanti sma nagnāḥ // MSpv_18.16 //
analyzed: ajñātānām śatrubhiḥ yuktam uccais śrīmat nāma śrāvayanti sma nagnāḥ
ādhāvantaḥ sammukham dhāritānām anyaiḥ anye tīkṣṇa kaukṣeyakāṇām
vakṣaḥ pīṭhaiḥ ātsaroḥ ātmanā eva krodhena andhāḥ praviśan puṣkarāṇi
miśrībhūte tatra sainya dvaye pi prāyeṇa ayam vyaktam āsīt viśeṣaḥ

original: ātmīyāste ye parāñcaḥ purastādabhyāvartī saṃmukho yaḥ paro 'sau // MSpv_18.18 //
analyzed: ātmīyāḥ te ye parāñcaḥ purastāt abhyāvartī saṃmukhaḥ yaḥ sau
sat vaṃśa tvāt aṅga saṃsaṅginī tvam nītvā kāmam gauraveṇa ābababddhā

original: nītā hastaṃ vañcayitvā pareṇa drohaṃ cakre kasyacitsvā kṛpāṇī // MSpv_18.19 //
analyzed: nītā hastam vañcayitvā pareṇa droham cakre kasyacid svā kṛpāṇī
nīte bhedam dhauta dhārā abhighātāt ambhoda ābhe śātraveṇa aparasya

original: sāsṛgrājistīkṣṇamārgasya mārgo vidyuddīptaḥ kaṅkaṭe lakṣyate sma // MSpv_18.20 //
analyzed: sa asṛj rājiḥ tīkṣṇa mārgasya mārgaḥ vidyut dīptaḥ kaṅkaṭe lakṣyate sma
ā mūla antāt sāyakena āyatena syūte bāhau maṇḍuka śliṣṭa muṣṭeḥ
prapya asahyām vedanām asta dhairyāt api abhraśyat carma na anyasya pāṇeḥ
bhitvā ghoṇām āyasena adhi vakṣaḥ sthūrī pṛṣṭhaḥ gārdhrapakṣeṇa viddhaḥ

original: śikṣāhetorgāḍharajjveva baddho hartuṃ vaktraṃ nāśakaddurmukho 'pi // MSpv_18.22 //
analyzed: śikṣā hetoḥ gāḍha rajjvā iva baddhaḥ hartum vaktram nā aśakat durmukhaḥ
kuntena uccais sādinā hantum iṣṭān na ajāneyaḥ dantinaḥ trasyati sma

original: karmodāraṃ kīrtaye kartukāmānkiṃvā jātyāḥ svāminohrepayanti // MSpv_18.23 //
analyzed: karma udāram kīrtaye kartu kāmān kiṃvā jātyāḥ svāminaḥ uhrepayanti

original: jetuṃ jaitrāḥ śekire nārisainyaiḥ paśyanto 'dho lokamasteṣujālāḥ /
analyzed: jetum jaitrāḥ śekire na ari sainyaiḥ paśyantaḥ loka masta iṣu jālāḥ

original: nāgārūḍhāḥ pārvatāni śrayanto durgāṇīva trāsahīnāstrasāni // MSpv_18.24 //
analyzed: nāga ārūḍhāḥ pārvatāni śrayantaḥ durgāṇi iva trāsa hīnāḥ trasāni
viṣvadrīcīḥ vikṣapan sainya vīcī rājā avantaḥ kvāpi dūram prayātam

original: babhrāmaikobandhumiṣṭaṃ didṛkṣuḥ sindhau vādyo maṇḍalaṃ gorvarāhaḥ // MSpv_18.25 //
analyzed: babhrāma ekaḥ bandhum iṣṭam didṛkṣuḥ sindhau vādyaḥ maṇḍalam goḥ varāhaḥ

original: yāvaccakre nāñjanaṃ bodhanāya vyutthānajño hasticārī madasya /
analyzed: yāvat cakre na añjanam bodhanāya vyutthāna jñaḥ hasti cārī madasya
senā svānāt dantinām ātmanā eva sthūlāḥ tāvat prāvahan dānakulyāḥ
krudhyan gandhāt anya nāgāya dūrāt āroḍhāram dhūta mūrdha avamatya

original: ghorārāvadhvanitāśeṣadikke viṣke nāgaḥ paryāṇaṃsītsva eva // MSpv_18.27 //
analyzed: ghora ārāva dhvanita aśeṣa dikke viṣke nāgaḥ paryāṇaṃsīt sve eva

original: pratyāsanne dantini prātipakṣe yantrā nāgaḥ prāstavaktracchado 'pi /
analyzed: pratyāsanne dantini prātipakṣe yantrā nāgaḥ prāsta vaktracchadaḥ pi

original: krodhākrāntaḥ krūranirdāritākṣaḥ prekṣāṃcakre naiva kiñcinmadāndhaḥ // MSpv_18.28 //
analyzed: krodha ākrāntaḥ krūra nirdārita akṣaḥ prekṣāṃcakre nā eva kiñcid mada andhaḥ
tūrṇam yāvat na apaninye niṣādī vāsaḥ cakṣuḥ vāraṇam vāraṇasya
tāvat pūgaiḥ anya nāga adhirūḍhaḥ kādambānām eka pātaiḥ asīvyat

original: āsthaddṛṣṭerācchadaṃ ca pramatto yantā yātuḥ pratyarībhaṃ dvipasya /
analyzed: āsthat dṛṣṭeḥ ācchadam ca pramattaḥ yantā yātuḥ pratyarībham dvipasya

original: bhagnasyoccairbarhabhāreṇa śaṅkoravavrāte vīkṣaṇe ca kṣaṇena // MSpv_18.30 //
analyzed: bhagnasya uccais barha bhāreṇa śaṅkoḥ avavrāte vīkṣaṇe ca kṣaṇena
yatnāt rakṣan susthita tvāt anāśam niścatya anyaḥ cetasā bhāvitena
antya avasthā kāla yogya upayogam dadhre bhīṣṭam rāgam āpad dhanam vā
anyonyeṣām puṣkaraiḥ āmṛśantaḥ dāna udbhedān uccakais bhugna vālāḥ
unmūrdhānaḥ sannipatya aparāntaiḥ prāyudhyanta spaṣṭa danta dhvanībhāḥ
saṃhatāḥ sthema bhājaḥ cāru udagrāḥ tīkṣṇa tām atyajantaḥ

original: dantā dantairāhatāḥ sāmajānāṃ bhaṅgaṃ jagmurna svayaṃ sāmajātāḥ // MSpv_18.33 //
analyzed: dantāḥ dantaiḥ āhatāḥ sāma jānām bhaṅgam jagmuḥ na svayam sāma jātāḥ
mātaṅgānām danta saṃghaṭṭa janmā hema cheda chchāyā cañcat śikhā agraḥ

original: lagno 'pyagniścāmareṣu prakāmaṃ māñjiṣṭheṣu vyajyate na sma sainyaiḥ // MSpv_18.34 //
analyzed: lagnaḥ pi agniḥ cāmareṣu prakāmam māñjiṣṭheṣu vyajyate na sma sainyaiḥ
oṣā māse matsara utpāta vāta āśliṣyat danta kṣmāruhām gharṣaṇa utthaiḥ
yoga antaiḥ vā vahnibhiḥ vāraṇānām uccais mūrdha vyomni nakṣatra mālā

original: sāndrāṇbhodaśyāmale sāmajānāṃ vṛnde nītāḥ śoṇitaiḥ śoṇimānam /
analyzed: sāndra aṇbhoda śyāmale sāma jānām vṛnde nītāḥ śoṇitaiḥ śoṇimānam

original: dantāḥ śobhāmāpurambhonidhīnāṃ kandodbhedā vaidrumā vāriṇīva // MSpv_18.36 //
analyzed: dantāḥ śobhām āpuḥ ambhonidhīnām kanda udbhedāḥ vaidrumāḥ vāriṇī iva
ākampa agraiḥ ketubhiḥ sannipātam tārā udīrṇa graiva nādam vrajantaḥ

original: magnānaṅge gāḍhamanyadvipānāṃ dantānduḥkhāduttkhananti sma nāgāḥ // MSpv_18.37 //
analyzed: magna anaṅge gāḍham anya dvipānām dantān duḥkhāt uttkhananti sma nāgāḥ
utkṣapya uccais prasphurantam radābhyām īṣā dantaḥ kuñjaram śātravīyam
śṛṅga prota prāvṛṣeṇya ambudasya spaṣṭam prāpat sāmyam urvīdharasya

original: bhagne 'pībhe sve parāvartya dehaṃ yoddhrā sārdhaṃ vrīḍayā muñcateṣūn /
analyzed: bhagne pībhe sve parāvartya deham yoddhrā sārdham vrīḍayā muñcata iṣūn

original: sākaṃ yantuḥ saṃmadenānubandhī dūno 'bhīkṣṇaṃ vāraṇaḥ pratyarodhi // MSpv_18.39 //
analyzed: sākam yantuḥ saṃmadena anubandhī dūnaḥ bhīkṣṇam vāraṇaḥ pratyarodhi
vyāptam lokaiḥ duḥkha labhya apasāram saṃraṃbhi tvāt etya dhīraḥ mahīyaḥ

original: senāmadhyaṃ gāhate vāraṇaḥ sma brahmaiva prāgādidevodarāntaḥ // MSpv_18.40 //
analyzed: senā madhyam gāhate vāraṇaḥ sma brahmā eva prāc ādideva udara antaḥ
bhṛṅga śreṇī śyāma bhāsām samūhaiḥ nārācānām viddha nīrandhra dehaḥ
nirbhīka tvāt āhavena āhata icchaḥ hṛṣyan hastī hṛṣṭa romā iva reje
ātāmra ābhāḥ roṣa bhājaḥ kaṭā antāt āśu utkhāte mārgaṇe dhūrgatena

original: niścyotantī nāgarājasya jajñe dānasyāho lohitasyeva dhārā // MSpv_18.42 //
analyzed: niścyotantī nāga rājasya jajñe dānasya ahar lohitasya iva dhārā
krāman dantau dantinaḥ sāhasikyāt īṣā daṇḍau mṛtyu śayyā talasya
sainyaiḥ anyaḥ tad kṣaṇāt āśaśaṅke svargasya uccais ardha mārga adhirūḍhaḥ
kurvan jyotsnā vipruṣām tulya rūpaḥ tāraḥ tārā jāla sārām iva dyām
khaḍga āghātaiḥ dāritāt danti kumbhāt ābhāti sma procchalat mauktika oghaḥ

original: dūrotkṣiptakṣipracakreṇa kṛttaṃ matto hastaṃ hastirājaḥ svameva /
analyzed: dūra utkṣipta kṣipra cakreṇa kṛttam mattaḥ hastam hasti rājaḥ svam eva

original: bhīmaṃ bhūmau lolamānaṃ saroṣaḥ pādenāsṛkpaṅkapeṣaṃ pipeṣa // MSpv_18.45 //
analyzed: bhīmam bhūmau lolamānam sa roṣaḥ pādena asṛj paṅka peṣam pipeṣa
āpaskārāt lūna gātrasya bhūmim niḥsādhāram gacchata upāc mukhasya

original: labdhāyāmaṃ dantayoryugmameva svaṃ nāgasya prāpaduttambhanatvam // MSpv_18.46 //
analyzed: labdha āyāmam dantayoḥ yugmam eva svam nāgasya prāpat uttambhana tvam
labdha sparśam bhū vyadhāt avyathena sthitvā kiṃcid dantayoḥ antarāle
ūrdhva ardha asi chinna danta praveṣṭam jitvā uttasthe nāgam anyena sadyas
hastena agre vīta bhītim gṛhītvā kañcid vyālaḥ kṣiptavān ūrdhvam uccais

original: āsīnānāṃ vyomni tasyaiva hetoḥ svargastrīṇāmarpayāmāsa nūnam // MSpv_18.48 //
analyzed: āsīnānām vyomni tasya eva hetoḥ svarga strīṇām arpayāmāsa nūnam
kaṃcid dūrāt āyatena draḍhīyaḥ prāsa prota srotasā antar kṣatena
hasta agreṇa prāptam api agratas bhū dāna aiśvaryam vāraṇasya grahītum

original: tanvāḥ puṃso nanda gopātmajāyāḥ kaṃseneva sphoṭitāyāḥ gajena /
analyzed: tanvāḥ puṃsaḥ nanda gopa ātmajāyāḥ kaṃsena iva sphoṭitāyāḥ gajena
divyā mūrtiḥ vyoma gaiḥ utpatantī vīkṣāmāse vismitaiḥ caṇḍikā iva
ākramya ekām agra pādena jaṅghām anyām uccais ādadānaḥ kareṇa
saṃsthita svānam dāru vat dāruṇa ātmā kañcid madhyāt pāṭayāmāsa dantī

original: śocitvāgre bhṛtyayormṛtyubhājoraryaḥ premṇā no tathā vallabhasya /
analyzed: śocitvā agre bhṛtyayoḥ mṛtyu bhājoḥ aryaḥ premṇā no tathā vallabhasya

original: pūrvaṃ kṛtvā netarasya prasādaṃ paścāttāpādāpa dāhaṃ yathāntaḥ // MSpv_18.52 //
analyzed: pūrvam kṛtvā na itarasya prasādam paścāttāpāt āpa dāham yathā antar
utplutya ārāt ardhacandreṇa lūne vaktre nyasya krodha daṣṭa uṣṭha dante

original: sainyaiḥ kaṇṭhacchedalīne kabandhādbhūyo bibhye valgataḥ sāsipāṇeḥ // MSpv_18.53 //
analyzed: sainyaiḥ kaṇṭha cheda līne kabandhāt bhūyas bibhye valgataḥ sa asi pāṇeḥ
tūrya ārāvaiḥ āhita uttāla tālaiḥ gāyantībhiḥ kāhalam kāhalābhiḥ
nṛtte cakṣuḥ śūnya hasta prayogam kāye kūjan kambuḥ uccais jahāsa

original: pratyāvṛttaṃ bhaṅgabhāji svasainye tulyaṃ muktairākiranti sma kaścit /
analyzed: pratyāvṛttam bhaṅga bhāji sva sainye tulyam muktaiḥ ākiranti sma kaścid

original: ekaughena svarṇapuṅkhairdviṣantaḥ siddhāḥ mālyaiḥ sādhuvādairdvaye 'pi // MSpv_18.55 //
analyzed: eka oghena svarṇa puṅkhaiḥ dviṣantaḥ siddhāḥ mālyaiḥ sādhuvādaiḥ dvaye
bāṇa ākṣipta āroha śūnya āsanānām prakrāntānām anya sainyaiḥ grahītum

original: saṃrabdhānāṃ bhrāmyatāmājibhūmau vārī vāraiḥ sasmare vāraṇānām // MSpv_18.56 //
analyzed: saṃrabdhānām bhrāmyatām āji bhūmau vārī vāraiḥ sasmare vāraṇānām
paunar punyāt asra gandhena mattaḥ mṛdgan kopāt lokam āyodhana urvyām
pāde lagnam atra mālām ibha indraḥ pāśī kalpām āyatām ācakarṣa
kaścid mūrcchām etya gāḍha prahāraḥ siktaḥ śītaiḥ śīkaraiḥ vāraṇasya

original: ucchvāsa prasthitā taṃ jighṛkṣurvyarthākūtā nākanārī mumūrccha // MSpv_18.58 //
analyzed: ucchvāsa prasthitā tam jighṛkṣuḥ vyartha ākūtā nākanārī mumūrccha
lūna grīvāt sāyakena aparasya dyām ati uccais ānanāt utpatiṣṇoḥ
mugdhaiḥ saiṃhikeya anukārāt raudra ākārāt apsaraḥ vaktra candraiḥ

original: vṛttaṃ yuddhe śūramāśliṣya kācidrantuṃ tūrṇaṃ merukuñjaṃ jagāma /
analyzed: vṛttam yuddhe śūram āśliṣya kācid rantum tūrṇam meru kuñjam jagāma

original: tyaktvā nāgnau dehameti sma yāvatpatnī sadyastadviyogāsamarthā // MSpv_18.60 //
analyzed: tyaktvā nā agnau deham eti sma yāvat patnī sadyas tad viyoga asamarthā

original: tyaktaprāṇaṃ saṃyuge hastinīsthā vīkṣya premṇā tatkṣaṇādudgatāsu /
analyzed: tyakta prāṇam saṃyuge hastinī sthāḥ vīkṣya premṇā tad kṣaṇāt udgatāsu

original: prāpyākhaṇḍaṃ devabhūyaṃ satītvādāśiśleṣa svaiva kañcitpurandhrī // MSpv_18.61 //
analyzed: prāpya akhaṇḍam deva bhūyam satī tvāt āśiśleṣa svā eva kañcid purandhrī

original: svargevāsaṃ kārayantyā cirāya pratyagratvaṃ pratyahaṃ dhārayantyā /
analyzed: svargevāsam kārayantyā cirāya pratyagra tvam pratyaham dhārayantyā

original: kaścidbheje divyanāryā parasmiṃlloke lokaṃ prīṇayantyeha kīrtyā // MSpv_18.62 //
analyzed: kaścid bheje divya nāryā parasmin loke lokam prīṇayantyā iha kīrtyā

original: gatvā nūnaṃ vaibudhaṃ sadma ramyaṃ mūcchābhājāmājagāmāntarātmā /
analyzed: gatvā nūnam vaibudham sadma ramyam mūcchā bhājām ājagāma antarātmā

original: bhūyo dṛṣṭapratyayāḥ prāptasaṃjñāḥ sādhīyaste yadraṇāyādriyante // MSpv_18.63 //
analyzed: bhūyas dṛṣṭa pratyayāḥ prāpta saṃjñāḥ sādhīyaḥ te yad raṇāya ādriyante
kaścid śstrā pāta mūḍhaḥ upavoḍhuḥ labdhvā bhūyas cetanām āhavāya

original: vyāvartiṣṭa krośataḥ sakhyuruccaistyaktaścātmā kā ca lokānuvṛttiḥ // MSpv_18.64 //
analyzed: vyāvartiṣṭa krośataḥ sakhyuḥ uccais tyaktaḥ ca ātmā kā ca loka anuvṛttiḥ
bhinna uraskau śatruṇā ākṛṣya dūrāt āsanna tvāt kaucid eka iṣeṇa eva
anyaḥ svar gatau api abhūtām
bhinnān astraiḥ moha bhājaḥ bhijātān hantum lolam vārayantaḥ sva vargam

original: jīvagrāhaṃ grāhayāmāsuranye yogyenārthāḥ kasya na syājjanena // MSpv_18.66 //
analyzed: jīva grāham grāhayāmāsuḥ anye yogyena arthāḥ kasya na syāt janena
bhagnaiḥ daṇḍaiḥ ātapatrāṇi bhūmau paryastāni prauḍha candra dyutīni

original: āhārāya pretarājasya raupyasthālānīva sthāpitāni sma bhānti // MSpv_18.67 //
analyzed: āhārāya pretarājasya raupya sthālāni iva sthāpitāni sma bhānti

original: rejurbhraṣṭā vakṣasaḥ kuṅkumāṅkā muktāhārāḥ pārthivānāṃ vyasūnām /
analyzed: rejuḥ bhraṣṭāḥ vakṣasaḥ kuṅkuma aṅkāḥ muktā hārāḥ pārthivānām vyasūnām

original: hāsāllakṣyāḥ pūrṇakāmasya manye mṛtyordantāḥ pītaraktāsavasya // MSpv_18.68 //
analyzed: hāsāt lakṣyāḥ pūrṇa kāmasya manye mṛtyoḥ dantāḥ pīta rakta āsavasya
nimneṣu odhībhūtam astra kṣatānām asram bhūmau yat cakāsāñcakāra

original: rāgārthaṃ tatkiṃ nu kausumbhamambhaḥ saṃvyānānāmantakāntaḥ purasya // MSpv_18.69 //
analyzed: rāga artham tat kim nu kausumbham ambhaḥ saṃvyānānām antaka antar purasya

original: rāmeṇa triḥsaptakṛtvo hradānāṃ citraṃ cakre pañcakaṃ kṣatriyāstraiḥ /
analyzed: rāmeṇa tris sapta kṛtvas hradānām citram cakre pañcakam kṣatriya astraiḥ
rakta ambhobhiḥ stad kṣaṇāt eva tasmin saṃkhye saṃkhyāḥ pravahan dvīpavatyaḥ
saṃdāna anta ādaḥ tribhiḥ śikṣita astraiḥ a viśya adhas śāta śastra avalūnāḥ
kūrma aupamyam vktam antar nadīnām aibhāḥ prāpan aṅghrayaḥ sṛj mayīnām
padma ākāraiḥ yodha vaktraiḥ ibhānām karṇa bhraṣṭaiḥ cāmaraiḥ eva haṃsaiḥ
sa upaskārāḥ prāvahan asra toyāḥ srotasvinyaḥ vīciṣu uccais taradbhiḥ
utkrāntānām āmiṣāya upariṣṭāt adhi ākāśam babhrumuḥ patra vāhāḥ

original: mūrtāḥ prāṇāḥ nūnamadyāpyavekṣāmāsuḥ kāyaṃ tyajitāḥ dāruṇāstraiḥ // MSpv_18.73 //
analyzed: mūrtāḥ prāṇāḥ nūnam adya api avekṣāmāsuḥ kāyam tyajitāḥ dāruṇa astraiḥ
ātanvadbhiḥ dikṣu patra agra nādam prāptaiḥ dūrāt āśu tīkṣṇaiḥ mukha agraiḥ
ādau raktam sainikānām ajīvaiḥ jīvaiḥ paścāt patri pūgaiḥ apāyi
ojaḥ bhājām yat raṇe saṃsthitānām ādatti ivram sārdham aṅgena nūnam
jvālā vyājāt udvamantī tad antar tejaḥ tāram dīpta jihvā vavāśe
nairantarya chinna deha antarālam durbhakṣasya jvālinā vāśitena
yoddhuḥ bāṇa protam ādīpya māṃsam pāka apūrva svāda māde śivābhiḥ
glāni chedi kṣudh prabodhāya pītvā raktāriṣṭam śoṣita ajīrṇa śeṣam

original: svāduṃkāraṃ kālakhaṇḍopadaṃśaṃ kroṣṭā ḍimbaṃ vyaṣvaṇadvyasvanañca // MSpv_18.77 //
analyzed: svāduṃkāram kālakhaṇḍa upadaṃśam kroṣṭā ḍimbam vyaṣvaṇat vyasvanat ca
kravyād pūgaiḥ puṣkarāṇi anakānām pratyāśābhiḥ medasaḥ dāritāni

original: ābhīlāni prāṇinaḥ pratyavasyankālo nūnaṃ vyadadāvānanāni // MSpv_18.78 //
analyzed: ābhīlāni prāṇinaḥ pratyavasyan kālaḥ nūnam vyadadau ānanāni

original: kīrṇā reje sājibhūmiḥ samantādaprāṇadbhiḥ prāṇabhājāṃ pratīkaiḥ /
analyzed: kīrṇā reje sā āji bhūmiḥ samantāt aprāṇadbhiḥ prāṇabhājām pratīkaiḥ
bahu ārambhaiḥ ardha saṃyojitaiḥ vā rūpaiḥ sraṣṭuḥ sṛṣṭi karmānta śālā
āyantīnām avirata rayam rājaka anīkinīnām ittham sainyaiḥ samam alughubhiḥ śrīpateḥ ūrmimadbhiḥ
āsīt oghaiḥ muhur iva mahat vāridheḥ āpagānām dolā yuddham kṛta gurutara dhvānam auddhatya bhājām
athā uttasthe raṇa aṭavyām asuhṛd veṇu dāriṇā
nṛpa aṅghripa ogha saṃgharṣāt agni vat veṇu dāriṇā
āpatantam amundūra a dūrīkṛta parākramaḥ
balaḥ valokayāmāsa mātaṅgam iva kesarī
tam tataḥ ti tata a ti tut
bhā bhaḥ bhī bhā abhi bhū bhā rārāri rari rīraraḥ
bhavan bhavāya lokānām ākampita mahī talaḥ
nirghātaḥ iva nirghoṣa bhīmaḥ tasya apatat rathaḥ
rāme ripuḥ śara ānāji mahā iṣvāsa vicakṣaṇe

original: kopādathainaṃ śitamā maheṣvā sa vicakṣaṇe // MSpv_19.5 //
analyzed: kopāt athā enam śitamāḥ mahā iṣvā sa vicakṣaṇe
diśam arkam iva avācīm mūrcchā gatam apāharat
manda pratāpam tam sūtaḥ śīghram āji vihāyasaḥ
kṛtvā śineḥ śālva camūm sa prabhāvā camūḥ jitām
sasarja vaktraiḥ phulla abja saprabhā vācam ūrjitām
ulmukena drumam prāpya saṃkucat patra saṃpadam
tejaḥ prakiratā dikṣu sa pratāpam adīpyata
pṛthoḥ adhyakṣipa dhṛt rukmī yayā cāpam udāyudhaḥ
tayā eva vācā apagamam yayā ācāpam udāyudhaḥ
samam samantataḥ rājñām āpatantīḥ anīkinīḥ
kārṣṇiḥ pratyagrahīt ekaḥ sārasvān iva nimnagāḥ
dadhānaiḥ ghana sādṛśyam lasat āyasa daṃśanaiḥ

original: tatra kāñcanasacchāyā sasṛje taiḥ śarāśaniḥ // MSpv_19.11 //
analyzed: tatra kāñcana sat chāyā sasṛje taiḥ śara aśaniḥ
nakha aṃśu mañjarī kīrṇam asau taruḥ iva uccakais
babhau vibhramat dhanuḥ śākhām adhirūḍha śilīmukhām
prapya bhīmam asau janyam saujanyam dadhat ānate
vidhyan mumoca na ripūn a ripu ga antakaḥ śaraiḥ
kṛtasya sarva kṣitipaiḥ vijaya āśaṃsayā puras
anekasya cakāra asau bāṇaiḥ bāṇasya khaṇḍanam
yā ābabhāra kṛta aneka māyā senā sasāra tām
dhanuḥ sa karṣan rahitam āyāsena āsasāra tām
ojaḥ mahaujāḥ kṛtvā adhas tad kṣaṇāt uttamaujasaḥ
kurvan ājau amukhya tvam anaman nāma mukhya tām

original: dūrādeva camūrbhallaiḥ kumāro hanti sa sma yāḥ /
analyzed: dūrāt eva camūḥ bhallaiḥ kumāraḥ hanti sa sma yāḥ

original: na punaḥ sāṃyugīṃ tāḥ sma kumāro hanti sasmayāḥ // MSpv_19.17 //
analyzed: na punar sāṃyugīm tāḥ sma kumāraḥ hanti sa smayāḥ
nipīḍya tarasā tena muktāḥ kāmam anāsthayā
upāyayuḥ vilakṣa tvam vidviṣaḥ na śilīmukhāḥ
tasya avadānaiḥ samare sahasā romaharṣibhiḥ

original: surairaśaṃsi vyomasthaiḥ saha sāro maharṣibhiḥ // MSpv_19.19 //
analyzed: suraiḥ aśaṃsi vyoma sthaiḥ saha sāraḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ
sugandhayat diśaḥ śubhram amlāni kusumam divaḥ
bhūri tatra apatat tasmāt utpapāta divam yaśaḥ
soḍhum tasya dviṣaḥ na alam a vayodhara vā raṇam
ūrṇunāva yaśaḥ ca dyāma payodhara vāraṇam
keśa pracura lokasya vikāsinā
śekhareṇa iva yuddhasya śiraḥ kusuma lakṣmaṇā
sa ādaram yuddha mānā api tena anya nara sādaram

original: sā daraṃ pṛtanā ninye hīyamānā rasādaram // MSpv_19.23 //
analyzed: sā daram pṛtanā ninye hīyamānā rasā ādaram
iti āliṅgatām ālokya jaya lakṣmyā jhaṣadhvajam

original: kruddhayeva krudhā sadyaḥ prapede cedibhūpatiḥ // MSpv_19.24 //
analyzed: kruddhayā iva krudhā sadyas prapede cedi bhūpatiḥ
ahitān abhi vāhinyā sa mānī catur aṅgayā
cacāla vallgat kalabha samānī caturaṅgayā
tatas tata dhanuḥ maurvī visphāra sphāri niḥsvanaiḥ
tūryaiḥ yuga kṣaye kṣubhyat akūpāra anukāriṇī
sakāra nānāra kāsa kāya sāda da sāyakā
nāda vāda da vādanā
lolāsikāliyakulā yamasya eva svasā svayam
cikīrṣuḥ ullasat loha varma śyāmā sahāya tām
rasena āsīt anāratā
tāra nāda jana āmatta dhīra nāga manāmayā
dhūta dhauta asayaḥ praṣṭhāḥ pratiṣṭhanta kṣamā bhṛtām
śaurī anurāga nikaṣaḥ sā hi velā anujīvinām
gantum komala amala sampadam
dadhau silatām kaḥ mala amala sampadam
kṛta ūru vegam yugapad vyajigīṣanta sainikāḥ
vipakṣam bāhu parighaiḥ jaṅghābhiḥ itaretaram
tatas
matta sāraga rāja ibhe bhārī hāvat jana dhvani
nidhvanat javahārī bhās bheje rāga rasāttamaḥ
tata mānava jārāsā senā māni jana āhavā
a bhagna vṛttāḥ prasabhāt ākṛṣṭāḥ yauvana uddhataiḥ
cakranduḥ uccakais muṣṭi grāhya madhyāḥ dhanuḥ latāḥ
kareṇuḥ pramthitaḥ nekaḥ reṇuḥ ghaṇṭāḥ sahasraśas

original: kareṇuḥ śīkaro jajñe reṇustena śamaṃ yayau // MSpv_19.36 //
analyzed: kareṇuḥ śīkaraḥ jajñe reṇuḥ tena śamam yayau
dhṛta pratyagra śṛṅgāra rasa rāgaḥ api dvipaiḥ

original: saroṣasambhramairbarbhre raudra eva raṇe rasaḥ // MSpv_19.37 //
analyzed: sa roṣa sambhramaiḥ barbhre raudraḥ eva raṇe rasaḥ
na tasthau bhartṛtaḥ prāpta māna sampratipattiṣu

original: raṇaikasargeṣu bhayaṃ mānasaṃ prati pattiṣu // MSpv_19.38 //
analyzed: raṇa eka sargeṣu bhayam mānasam prati pattiṣu
bāṇa āhita pūrṇa tūṇīra koṭaraiḥ dhanvi śākhibhiḥ
godhā āśliṣṭa bhujā śākhaiḥ abhūt bhīmā raṇa aṭavī
nānā ājau avajānānā sā jana ogha ghana ojasā
parān iha hāniḥ āpa tān viyāta tayā anvitā
viṣamam sarvatobhadra cakra gomūtrika ādibhiḥ
ślokaiḥ iva mahākāvyam vyūhaiḥ tat abhavat balam
saṃhatyā sātvatām caidyam prati bhāsvara senayā
vavale yoddhum utpanna pratimā sva rasena yā
vistīrṇa māyāmavatī lola loka nirantarā

original: narendramārgaṃ rathyeva papāta dviṣatāṃ balam // MSpv_19.43 //
analyzed: narendra mārgam rathyā iva papāta dviṣatām balam
vāraṇāga gabhīrā sā sārābhīga gaṇāravā
kāri tāri vadhā senā nāsedhā vāri tārikā
adhināgam prajavinaḥ vikasat piccha cāravaḥ
petuḥ barhiṇa deśīyāḥ śaṅkavaḥ prāṇa hāriṇaḥ
vavṛṣe ivika sat dānaṃyudha māpya viṣāṇibhiḥ
puras prayuktaiḥ yuddham tad calitaiḥ labdha śuddhibhiḥ
ālāpaiḥ iva gāndharvam adīpyata padātibhiḥ
kenacid su āsinā anyeṣām maṇḍalāgra anavadya tā
prāpe kīrti pluta mahī maṇḍala agrān avadyata
vihantum vidviṣaḥ tīkṣṇaḥ samam eva su saṃhateḥ
parivārāt pṛthak cakre khaḍgaḥ ca ātmā ca kenacid
anyena vidadhe rīṇām atimātrā vilāsinā
udgūrṇena camūḥ tūrṇam ati mātrā vilāsinā
sahasrapūraṇaḥ kaścid lūna mūrdha asinā dviṣaḥ
tathā ūrdhve eva kābandhīm abhajan nartana kriyām
dadṛśe nyaḥ rāvaṇa vat alaṅkaraṇa bhūṣitaḥ
dviṣat viśasana cheda nirasta ūru yugaḥ paraḥ
siktaḥ ca astraiḥ ubhayathā babhūva aruṇa vigrahaḥ
bhīma tām aparaḥ mbhodhi same mahā āhave

original: dākṣe kopaḥ śivasyeva samedhitamahā have // MSpv_19.54 //
analyzed: kopaḥ śivasya iva samedhita mahā have
dantauḥ cicchidire kopāt pratipakṣam gajāḥ iva
para nistriṃśa nirlūna karavālāḥ padātayaḥ
raṇe rabhasa nirbhinna dvipa pāṭa vikāsini

original: na tatra gatabhīḥ kaścidvipapāṭa vikāsini // MSpv_19.56 //
analyzed: na tatra gata bhīḥ kaścid vipapāṭa vikāsini
yāvat na satkṛtaiḥ bhartuḥ snehasya ānṛṇyam icchubhiḥ
amarṣāt itaraiḥ tāvat tatyaje yudhi jīvitam
ayaśobhi durāloke kopadhā maraṇāt ṛte
ayaśaḥ bhidurāḥ loke kopadhāḥ maraṇāt ṛte
skhalantī na kvacid taikṣṇāt abhyagra phala śālinī

original: amoci śaktiḥ śaktikairlohajā na śarīrajā // MSpv_19.59 //
analyzed: amoci śaktiḥ śaktikaiḥ loha jā na śarīra jā
apādi vyāpṛta nayān tathā yuyudhire nṛpāḥ

original: āpa divyā pṛtanayā vismayaṃ janatā yathā // MSpv_19.60 //
analyzed: āpa divyā pṛtanayā vismayam janatā yathā
sva guṇaiḥ ā phala prāpteḥ ākṛṣya gaṇikāḥ iva
kāmukān iva nālīkān triṇantāḥ sahasā amucan
vājinaḥ śatru sainyasya
vājinaḥ ca śarāḥ madhyam aviśan druta vājinaḥ
puraskṛtya phalam prāptaiḥ sat pakṣa āśraya yaśa ālibhiḥ
kṛta puṅkha tayā lebhe lakṣam api āśu mārgaṇaiḥ
rakta śrutim japā sūna sama rāgām iṣu vyadhāt
kaścid puras sapatneṣu samara āgam iṣu vyadhāt
rayeṇa raṇa kāmyantau dūrāt upagata vibhau
gatāsuḥ antarā dantī varaṇḍakaḥ iva abhavat
bhūribhiḥ bhāribhiḥ bhīraiḥ bhū bhāraiḥ abhirebhire
bherī rebhibhiḥ abhrābhaiḥ abhīru bhiribhaiḥ ibhāḥ
niśita asi latā lūnaiḥ tathā hastaiḥ na hastinaḥ
yudhyamānāḥ yathā dantaiḥ bhagnaiḥ āpuḥ vihasta tām
nipīḍanāt iva mithas dāna toya nāratam
vapuṣām adayā pāta ādi bhānām abhitas galat
raṇa aṅgaṇam saraḥ iva plāvitam mada vāribhiḥ
gajaḥ pṛthu kara ākṛṣṭa śata patram aloḍayat
śara kṣate gaje bhṛṅgaiḥ sa viṣādi viṣādini
ruta vyājena ruditam tatra āsīt atisīdati
antakasya pṛthau tatra śayanīye iva āhave
daśana vyasanāt īyuḥ matkuṇa tvam mataṅga jāḥ
abhīka matikena iddhe bhīta ānanda syanāśane
kanat sa kāma senāke manda kāma kamasyati
dadhataḥ pi raṇe bhīmam abhīkṣṇam bhāvam āsuram
hatāḥ paraiḥ abhimukhāḥ sura bhūyam upāyayuḥ
yena aṅgam ūhe vraṇa vat sa rucā paratas maraiḥ
sama tvam sa yayau khaḍga tsa rucā aparatas maraiḥ
nipātita suhṛd svāmi pitṛvya bhrātṛ mātulam
pāṇinīyam iva avaloki dhīraiḥ tat sama rājiram
abhāvi sindhvā sandhyā abhra sadṛś rudhira toyayā

original: hṛte yoddhuṃ janaḥ pāṃśau sa dṛgrudhi rato yathā // MSpv_19.76 //
analyzed: hṛte yoddhum janaḥ pāṃśau sa dṛś rudhi rataḥ yathā
vidalat puṣkara ākīrṇāḥ patat śaṅkha kula ākulāḥ
tarat patrarathāḥ nadyaḥ prāsarpan rakta vāri jāḥ
asṛj jano stra kṣati māna vamajja vasādanam
rakṣaḥ piśācam mumude nava majja vasādanam
citram cāpaiḥ apeta jyaiḥ sphurat rakta śata hṛdam
payoda jālam iva tat vīra āśaṃsanam ābabhau
bandhau vipanne na ekena nareṇa iha tad antike

original: aśoci sainye ghaṇṭābhirna reṇe hatadantike // MSpv_19.80 //
analyzed: aśoci sainye ghaṇṭābhiḥ na reṇe hata dantike

original: kṛttaiḥ kīrṇā mahī reje dantairgātraiśca dantinām /
analyzed: kṛttaiḥ kīrṇā mahī reje dantaiḥ gātraiḥ ca dantinām
kṣuṇṇa loka asubhiḥ mṛtyoḥ musala ulūkhalaiḥ iva
yuddham ittham gataḥ
caidyaḥ parān parājigye mānavān abhiyogataḥ
atha vakṣomaṇi chāyā ācchurita āpīta vāsasā
sphurat indradhanuḥ bhinna taḍitā iva taḍit tva tā
nīlena ānāla nalina nilīna ullala nālinā
lalanā lālanena alam līlā lolena lālinā
apūrvayā iva tad kāla samāgama sa kāmayā
dṛṣṭena rājan vapuṣā kaṭākṣaiḥ vijaya śriyā

original: vibhāvī vibhavī bhābho vibhābhāvī vivo vibhīḥ /
analyzed: vibhāvī vibhavī bhābho vibhābhāvī vivaḥ vibhīḥ

original: bhavābhibhāvī bhāvāvo bhavābhāvo bhuvo vibhuḥ // MSpv_19.86 //

analyzed: upaitu kāmaiḥ tad pāram niścitaiḥ yogibhiḥ paraiḥ
dehatyāga kṛta udyogaiḥ adṛśyata paraḥ pumān
tam śriyā ghanayānaḥ ta rucā sāratayā tayā
yātayā tarasā cāru stanayā anaghayā śritam
vidviṣaḥ dviṣuḥ udvīkṣya tathā api āsan nirenasaḥ
arucyam api roga ghnam nisargāt eva bheṣajam

original: viditaṃ divi ke 'nīke taṃ yātaṃ nijitājini /
analyzed: viditam divi ke nīke tam yātam nijita ajini

original: vigadaṃ gavi roddhāro yoddhā yo natimeti naḥ // MSpv_19.90 //
analyzed: vigadam gavi roddhāraḥ yoddhā yaḥ natim eti naḥ
niyujyamānena puras karmaṇi ati garīyasi
āropyamāṇa ūru guṇam bhartrā kārmukam ānamat
tatra bāṇāḥ su paruṣaḥ samadhīyanta cāravaḥ
dviṣām abhūt su paruṣaḥ tasya ākṛṣṭasya cāravaḥ
paścātkṛtānām api asya narāṇām iva patriṇām

original: yoyo guṇena saṃyuktaḥ sa sa karṇāntamāyayau // MSpv_19.93 //
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ guṇena saṃyuktaḥ sa sa karṇa antam āyayau

original: prape rūpī purārepāḥ paripūrī paraḥ paraiḥ /
analyzed: prape rūpī purārepāḥ paripūrī paraḥ paraiḥ
ropaiḥ apāraiḥ upari pupūre pi paraiḥ
diṅmukha vyāpinaḥ tīkṣṇān hradinaḥ marma bhedinaḥ
cikṣepa eka kṣaṇena eva sāyakān ahitān ca saḥ
śara varṣī mahā nādaḥ sphurat kārmuka ketanaḥ
nīla chaviḥ asau reje keśava chala nīradaḥ
na kevalam janaiḥ tasya laghu saṃdhāyinaḥ dhanuḥ
maṇḍalīkṛta moka antāt balam aikṣi dviṣām api
kālo kalo kaliḥ kāle kola keli kilaḥ kila
akṣitārāsu vivyādha dviṣataḥ sa tanutriṇaḥ

original: dāneṣu sthūlalakṣyatvaṃ na hi tasya śarāsane // MSpv_19.99 //
analyzed: dāneṣu sthūlalakṣya tvam na hi tasya śarāsane
vararaḥ vivaraḥ vairivivārī vārirāravaḥ

original: vivavāra varo vairaṃ vīro ravirivaurvaraḥ // MSpv_19.100 //
analyzed: vivavāra varaḥ vairam vīraḥ raviḥ iva aurvaraḥ
mukta aneka śaram praṇān aharat bhūyasām dviṣām

original: tadīyaṃ dhanuranyasya na hi sehe sajīvatām // MSpv_19.101 //
analyzed: tadīyam dhanuḥ anyasya na hi sehe sa jīva tām
rājarājī ruroja ajerajire jaḥ jaraḥ rajāḥ
rejārijūrajorjārjī rarājarjurajarjaraḥ
uddhatān dviṣataḥ tasya nidhnataḥ dvitayam yayuḥ

original: pānārthe rudhiraṃ dhātau rakṣārthe bhuvanaṃ śarāḥ // MSpv_19.103 //
analyzed: pāna arthe rudhiram dhātau rakṣā arthe bhuvanam śarāḥ
vidhātum avatīrṇaḥ pi laghimānam asau bhuvaḥ
anekam ari saṃghātam akarot bhūmi vardhanam

eka iṣuṇā saṅgha tithān dviṣaḥ bhindan drumān iva
sa janmāntara rāmasya cakre sadṛśam ātmanaḥ
śūraḥ śauriḥ aśiśiraiḥ āśāśaiḥ āśu rāśiśaḥ
śarāruḥ śrī śarīra īśaḥ śuśūre riśiraḥ śaraiḥ
vktā āsīt arita ariṇām yat tadīyāḥ tadā muhur

original: manohṛto 'pi hṛdaye legureṣāṃ na patriṇaḥ // MSpv_19.109 //
analyzed: manohṛtaḥ u pi hṛdaye leguḥ eṣām na patriṇaḥ
nāma akṣarāṇām malanā mā bhūt bhartuḥ atas sphuṭam
agṛhṇata parāṅga nāmasūnasram na mārgaṇāḥ
ācchidya yodha sārthasya prāṇa sarvasvam āśugāḥ
aikāgārika vat bhūmau dūrāt jagmuḥ adarśanam
bhīma astra rājinaḥ tasya balasya dhvaja rājinaḥ
kṛta ghora ajinaḥ cakre bhuvaḥ sa rudhirāḥ jinaḥ
māṃsa vyadha ucita mukhaiḥ śūnya tām dadhat akriyam
śakuntibhiḥ śatru balam vyāpi tasya iṣubhiḥ nabhaḥ
dādadaḥ daddaduddādī dādādaḥ dūdadīdadoḥ
duddādam dadade dudde dadāda dadadaḥ dadaḥ
pluta ibha kumbha urasijaiḥ hṛdaya kṣati janmabhiḥ
prāvartayat nadīḥ asraiḥ dviṣām tad yoṣitām ca saḥ
sadāmada bala prāyaḥ samuddhṛ rasaḥ babhau
pratīta vikramaḥ śrīman hāriḥ hariḥ iva aparaḥ

original: dvidhā tridhā caturdhā ca tamekamapi śatravaḥ /
analyzed: dvidhā tridhā caturdhā ca tam ekam api śatravaḥ

original: paśyantaḥ spardhayā sadyaḥ svayaṃ pañcatvamāyayuḥ // MSpv_19.117 //
analyzed: paśyantaḥ spardhayā sadyas svayam pañcatvam āyayuḥ
sadā eva saṃpanna vapūḥ raṇeṣu sa daiva saṃpanna vapūḥ

original: maho dadhe 'stāri mahānitāntaṃ mahodadhestārimahā nitāntam // MSpv_19.118 //
analyzed: mahaḥ dadhe stāri mahā nitāntam mahā udadheḥ tāri mahā nitāntam

original: iṣṭaṃ kṛtvārthaṃ patriṇaḥ śārṅgapāṇer etyādhomukhyaṃ praviśanbhūmimāśu /
analyzed: iṣṭam kṛtvā artham patriṇaḥ śārṅgapāṇeḥ etya adhomukhyam praviśan bhūmim āśu

original: śuddhayā yuktānāṃ vairivargasya madhye bhartrā kṣiptānāmetadevānurūpam // MSpv_19.119 //
analyzed: śuddhayā yuktānām vairi vargasya madhye bhartrā kṣiptānām etat eva anurūpam
sattvam māna viśiṣṭam āji rabhasāt ālambya bhavyaḥ puras labdha agha kṣaya śuddhiḥ uddharatara śrīvatsa bhūmiḥ mudā

original: muktvā kāmamapāstabhīḥ paramṛgavyādhaḥ sa nādaṃ harer ekaughaiḥ samakālamabhramudayī ropaistadā tastare // MSpv_19.120 //
analyzed: muktvā kāmam apāsta bhīḥ para mṛga vyādhaḥ sa nādam hareḥ eka oghaiḥ sama kālam abhram udayī ropaiḥ tadā tastare
mukham ullasita trirekham uccais bhidura bhrū yuga bhīṣaṇam dadhānaḥ
samitau iti vikramān amṛṣyan gata bhīra āhvata cedi rāj murārim

original: śitacakranipātasaṃpratīkṣyaṃ vahataḥ skandhagataṃ ca tasya mṛtyum /
analyzed: śita cakra nipāta saṃpratīkṣyam vahataḥ skandha gatam ca tasya mṛtyum

original: abhiśauri ratho 'thanoditāśvaḥ prayayau sārathirūpayā niyatyā // MSpv_20.2 //
analyzed: prayayau sārathi rūpayā niyatyā
abhicaidyam agāt rathaḥ pi śaureḥ avanim jāguḍa kuṅkuma abhitāmraiḥ
gura nemi nipīḍana avadīrṇa vyasu deha sruta śoṇitaiḥ vilimpan
sa nirāyata ketana aṃśuka antaḥ kala nikvāṇa karāla kiṅkiṇīkaḥ

original: virarāja ripukṣayapratijñāmukharo muktaśikhaḥ svayaṃ nu mṛtyuḥ // MSpv_20.4 //
analyzed: virarāja ripu kṣaya pratijñā mukharaḥ mukta śikhaḥ svayam nu mṛtyuḥ
sa jala ambudhara ārava anukārī dhvaniḥ āpūrita diṅmukhaḥ rathasya
praguṇīkṛta kekam ūrdhva kaṇṭhaiḥ śitikaṇṭhaiḥ upakarṇayāmbabhūve
abhivīkṣya vidarbha rājaputrī kuca kāśmīraja cihnam acyuta uraḥ

original: cirasevitayāpi cedirājaḥ sahasāvāpa ruṣā tadaiva yogam // MSpv_20.6 //
analyzed: cira sevitayā api cedi rājaḥ sahasā avāpa ruṣā tadā eva yogam
janita aśani śabda śaṅkam uccais dhanuḥ āsphālitam adhvanat nṛpeṇa
capala anila codyamāna kalpa kṣaya kālāgni śikhā nibha sphurat jyam
sama kālam iva abhilakṣaṇīya graha saṃdhāna vikarṣaṇa apavargaiḥ

original: atha sābhisāraṃ śaraistarasvī sa tiraskartumupendramadhyavarṣat // MSpv_20.8 //
analyzed: atha sa abhisāram śaraiḥ tarasvī sa tiraskartum upendram adhyavarṣat
ṛju tā phala yoga śuddhi bhājām guru pakṣa āśrayiṇām śilīmukhānām

original: guṇinā natimāgatena sandhiḥ saha cāpena samañjaso babhūva // MSpv_20.9 //
analyzed: guṇinā natim āgatena sandhiḥ saha cāpena samañjasaḥ babhūva
aviṣahyatame kṛta adhikāram vaśinā karmaṇi cedi pārthivena
arasat dhanuḥ uccakai dṛḍha ārti prasabha ākarṣaṇa vepamāna jīvam
anusantati pātinaḥ paṭu tvam dadhataḥ śuddhi bhṛtaḥ gṛhīta pakṣāḥ

original: vadanādiva vādino 'tha śabdāḥ kṣitibharturdhanuṣaḥ śarāḥ prasasruḥ // MSpv_20.11 //
analyzed: vadanāt iva śabdāḥ kṣitibhartuḥ dhanuṣaḥ śarāḥ prasasruḥ
gavala asita kānti tasya madhya sthita ghora āyata bāhu daṇḍa nāsam
dadṛśe kupita antaka unnmat bhrū yuga bhīma ākṛti kārmukam janena
taḍit ujjvala jātarūpa puṅkhaiḥ kham ayaḥ śyāma mukhaiḥ abhidhvanadbhiḥ

original: jaladairiva raṃhasā patadbhiḥ pidadhe saṃhatiśālibhiḥ śaraughaiḥ // MSpv_20.13 //
analyzed: jaladaiḥ iva raṃhasā patadbhiḥ pidadhe saṃhati śālibhiḥ śara oghaiḥ
śita śalya mukha avadīrṇa megha kṣara dambhaḥ sphuṭa tīvra vedanānām
cakravālam kakubhām aurṇaviṣuḥ suvarṇa puṅkhāḥ

original: amanoramatāṃ yatī janasya kṣaṇamālokapathānnabhaḥ sadāṃ vā /
analyzed: amanorama tām yatī janasya kṣaṇam āloka pathāt nabhaḥ sadām vā
rurudhe pihitā a hima dyutiḥ dhīḥ viśikhaiḥ antaritā cyutā dharitratrī
vinivārita bhānu tāpam ekam sakalasya api muradviṣaḥ balasya

original: śarajālamayaṃ samaṃ samantāduru sadmeva narādhipena tene // MSpv_20.16 //
analyzed: śara jāla mayam samam samantāt uru sadma iva narādhipena tene
iti cedi mahībhṛtā tadānīm tad anīkam danu sūnu sūdanasya
vayasam iva cakram akriyākam paritas rodhi vipāṭa pañcareṇa
iṣu varṣam anekam eka vīraḥ tat ari pracyutam acyutaḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ

original: atha vādikṛtaṃ pramāṇamanyaiḥ prativādīva nirākarotpramāṇaiḥ // MSpv_20.18 //
analyzed: atha vādi kṛtam pramāṇam anyaiḥ prativādī iva nirākarot pramāṇaiḥ
pratikuñcita kūrpareṇa tena śravaṇa upāntika nīyamāna gavyam
dhvanati sma dhanuḥ ghana anta matta pracura krauñca rava anukāram uccais
urasā vitatena pātita aṃsaḥ sa mayūra āñcita mastakaḥ tadānīm

original: kṣaṇamālikhito nu sauṣṭhavena sthirapūrvāparamuṣṭirābabhau vā // MSpv_20.20 //
analyzed: kṣaṇam ālikhitaḥ nu sauṣṭhavena sthira pūrva apara muṣṭiḥ ābabhau vā
dhvanataḥ nitarām rayeṇa gurvyaḥ taḍit ākāra calat guṇāt asaṃkhyāḥ
iṣavaḥ dhanuṣaḥ sa śabdam āśu nyapatan ambudharāt iva ambudharāḥ
śikhara unnata niṣṭhura aṃsapīṭhaḥ sthagayan eka digantam āyata antaḥ
niravarṇi sakṛt prasāritaḥ sya kṣitibhartā iva camūbhiḥ eka bāhuḥ
tam akuṇṭha mukhāḥ suparṇa ketoḥ iṣavaḥ kṣiptam iṣu vrajam pareṇa
vibhidām anayanta kṛtya pakṣam nṛpateḥ netuḥ iva ayathārtha varṇāḥ
dayitaiḥ iva khaṇḍitā murāreḥ viśikhaiḥ saṃmukham ujjvala aṅga lekhaiḥ

original: laghimānamupeyuṣī pṛthivyāṃ viphalā śatruśarāvaliḥ papāta // MSpv_20.24 //
analyzed: laghimānam upeyuṣī pṛthivyām viphalā śatru śara āvaliḥ papāta
pramukhe bhihatāḥ ca patravāhāḥ prasabham mādhava mukta vatsa dantaiḥ

original: paripūrṇataraṃ bhuvo gatāyāḥ parataḥ kātaravatpratīpamīyuḥ // MSpv_20.25 //
analyzed: paripūrṇataram bhuvaḥ gatāyāḥ paratas kātara vat pratīpam īyuḥ
itaretarat sannikarṣa janmā gala saṃghaṭṭa vikīrṇa visphuliṅgaḥ
paṭalāni lihan valāhakānām apareṣu kṣaṇam ajjvalat kṛśānuḥ
śaradi iva śara śriyā vibhinne vibhunā śatru śilīmukha abhra jāle

original: vikasanmukhavārijāḥ prakāmaṃ babhurāśā iva yādavadhvajinyaḥ // MSpv_20.27 //
analyzed: vikasat mukha vārijāḥ prakāmam babhuḥ āśāḥ iva yādava dhvajinyaḥ
sa divam samacicchadat śara oghaiḥ kṛta tigma dyuti maṇḍala apalāpaiḥ

original: dadṛśe 'tha ca tasya cāpayaṣṭyāmiṣurekaiva janai sakṛdvisṛṣṭā // MSpv_20.28 //
analyzed: dadṛśe tha ca tasya cāpa yaṣṭyām iṣuḥ ekā eva janaiḥ sakṛt visṛṣṭā

original: bhavati sphuṭamāgato vipakṣānna sapakṣo 'pi hi nirvṛtervidhātā /
analyzed: bhavati sphuṭam āgataḥ vipakṣāt na hi nirvṛteḥ vidhātā

original: śiśupālabalāni kṛṣṇamuktaḥ sutarāṃ tena tatāpa tomaraughaḥ // MSpv_20.29 //
analyzed: śiśupāla balāni kṛṣṇa muktaḥ sutarām tena tatāpa tomara oghaḥ
guru vega virāvibhiḥ patatraiḥ iṣavaḥ kāñcana piṅgala bhāsaḥ

original: vinatāsutavattalaṃ bhuvaḥ sma vyathitabhrāntabhujaṅgamaṃ viśanti // MSpv_20.30 //
analyzed: vinatā suta vat talam bhuvaḥ sma vyathita bhrānta bhujaṅgamam viśanti

original: śataśaḥ paruṣāḥ puro viśaṅkaṃ śiśupālena śilīmukhāḥ prayuktāḥ /
analyzed: śataśas paruṣāḥ puras viśaṅkam śiśupālena śilīmukhāḥ prayuktāḥ

original: paramarmabhido 'pi dānavāreraparādhā iva na vyathāṃ vitenuḥ // MSpv_20.31 //
analyzed: para marma bhidaḥ pi dānavāreḥ aparādhāḥ iva na vyathām vitenuḥ
vihita adbhuta loka sṛṣṭi māye jamam icchan kila māyayā murārau
bhuvana kṣaya kāla yoga nidre nṛpatiḥ svāpanam astram ājahāra
salila ārdra varāha deha nīlaḥ vidadhat bhāskaram artha śūnya saṃjñam
pracala āyata locana aravindam vidadhe tat balam andhakāraḥ

original: guravo 'pi niṣadya yannidadrurdhanuṣi kṣmāpatayo na vācyametat /
analyzed: guravaḥ pi niṣadya yat nidadruḥ dhanuṣi kṣmāpatayaḥ na vācyam etat

original: kṣayitāpadi jāgrato 'pi nityaṃ nanu tatraiva hi te 'bhavanniṣaṇṇāḥ // MSpv_20.34 //
analyzed: kṣayi tā āpadi jāgrataḥ nityam nanu tatra eva hi te bhavat niṣaṇṇāḥ
ślatha tām vrajataḥ tathā pareṣām agaddhā raṇā śaktim ujjhataḥ svām
su gṛhītam api pramada bhājām manasaḥ śāstram iva amastram agra pāṇeḥ
ucita svapanaḥ pi nīra rāśau sva bala ambhonidhi madhya gaḥ tadīnīm

original: bhuvanatrayakāryajāgarūkaḥ sa paraṃ tatra paraḥ pumānajāgaḥ // MSpv_20.36 //
analyzed: bhuvana traya kārya jāgarūkaḥ sa param tatra paraḥ pumān ajāgaḥ
atha sūrya rucī iva tasya dṛṣṭau udbhūt kaustubha darpaṇam gatāyām

original: paṭuḥ dhāma tato na cādbhutaṃ tadvibhurindvarkavilocanaḥ kilāsau // MSpv_20.37 //
analyzed: paṭuḥ dhāma tatas na ca adbhutam tad vibhuḥ indu arka vilocanaḥ kila asau

original: mahataḥ praṇateṣviva prasādaḥ sa maṇeraṃśucayaḥ kakuṃmukheṣu /
analyzed: mahataḥ praṇateṣu iva prasādaḥ sa maṇeḥ aṃśucayaḥ kakuṃmukheṣu
vyakasat vikasat vilocanebhyaḥ dadat ālokam anāvilam balebhyaḥ

original: prakṛtiṃ pratipādukaiśca pādaiścakḷṣe bhānumataḥ punaḥ prasartum /
analyzed: prakṛtim pratipādukaiḥ ca pādaiḥ cakḷṣe bhānumataḥ punar prasartum
tamasaḥ bhibhavāt apāsya mūrcchām upajīvat sahasā eva jīva lokaḥ
ghana saṃtamasaiḥ javena bhūyas yadu yodhaiḥ yudhi redhire dviṣantaḥ

original: nanu vāridharoparodhamuktaḥ sutarāmuttapate patiḥ prabhāṇām // MSpv_20.40 //
analyzed: nanu vāridhara uparodha muktaḥ sutarām uttapate patiḥ prabhāṇām
vyavahāre iva anṛta abhiyogam timiram nirjitavati atha prakāśe

original: ripurulbaṇabhīmabhogabhājāṃ bhujagānāṃ jananīṃ jajāpa vidyām // MSpv_20.41 //
analyzed: ripuḥ ulbaṇa bhīma bhoga bhājām bhujagānām jananīm jajāpa vidyām
pṛthu darvi bhṛtaḥ tatas phaṇi indrāḥ viṣama āśībhiḥ anāratam vamantaḥ
abhavan yugapad vilola jihvā yuga līḍha ubhaya sṛkka bhāgam āvis
kṛta keśa viḍambanaiḥ vihāyaḥ vijayam tad kṣaṇam icchubhiḥ chalena

original: amṛtāgrabhuvaḥ pureva pucchaṃ baḍavābharturavāri kādraveyaiḥ // MSpv_20.43 //
analyzed: amṛta agra bhuvaḥ purā iva puccham baḍavābhartuḥ avāri kādraveyaiḥ
dadhataḥ tani māna māna pūrvyāḥ babhuḥ akṣiśravasaḥ mukhe viśālāḥ
bharata jña kavi praṇīta kāvya grathita aṅkāḥ iva nāṭaka prapañcāḥ
sa viṣa śvasana uddhata ūru dhūma vyavadhi mlāna marīci pannagānām
uparāgavatā iva tigma bhāsā vapuḥ audumbara maṇḍala ābham ūhe
śikhi piccha kṛtadhvaja avacūḍa kṣaṇa sa āśaṅka vivartamāna bhogāḥ
yama pāśa vat āśu bandhanāya nyapatan vṛṣṇi gaṇeṣu lelihānāḥ
pṛthu vāridhi vīci maṇḍala antar vilasat phena vitāna pāṇḍurāṇi

original: dadhati sma bhujaṅgamāṅgamadhye navanirmokaruciṃ dhvajāṃśukāni // MSpv_20.47 //
analyzed: dadhati sma bhujaṅgama aṅga madhye nava nirmoka rucim dhvaja aṃśukāni
kṛta maṇḍala bandham ullasadbhiḥ śirasi pratyurasam vilambamānaiḥ
vyarucat janatā bhujaṅga bhogaiḥ dalita indīvara māla bhāriṇī iva
pariveṣṭita mūrtayaḥ ca mūlāt uragaiḥ āśirasaḥ sa ratna puṣpaiḥ
dadhuḥ āyata valli veṣṭitānām upamānam manujāḥ mahīruhāṇām
bahula añjana paṅka paṭṭa nīla dyutayaḥ deham itas tatas śramantaḥ
dadhire phaṇinaḥ turaṅgameṣu sphuṭa palyāṇa nibaddha vardhra līlām
prasṛtam rabhasa ādayaḥ abhinīlā pratipadam paritas bhiveṣṭayantī
tanuḥ āyati śālinī mahā aheḥ gaja manduḥ iva niścalam cakāra
atha sa smita vīkṣitāt avajñā calita eka unnamita bhru mādhavena
nija ketu śiraḥ śritaḥ suparṇāt udapaptan ayutāni pakṣirājām
druta hema rucaḥ khagāḥ khagendrāt a laghu udīrita nādam utpatantaḥ
kṣaṇam aikṣiṣata uccakais camūbhiḥ jvalataḥ saptaruceḥ iva sphuliṅgāḥ
upamānam alābhi lola pakṣa kṣaṇa vikṣipta mahā ambuvāha matsyaiḥ
gagana arṇavam antarā asumeroḥ kula jānām garuḍaiḥ ilā dharāṇām
patatām paritas parisphuradbhiḥ paripiṅgīkṛta diṅmukhaiḥ mayūkhaiḥ
sutarām abhavat at durīkṣya bimbaḥ tapanaḥ tad kiraṇaiḥ iva ātma darśaḥ
dadhuḥ ambudhi manthana adrimantha bhramaṇa āyasta phaṇi indra pitta jānām
rucam ullasamāna vainateya dyuti bhinnāḥ phaṇa bhāriṇaḥ maṇīnām
abhitas kṣubhita amburāśi dhīra dhvaniḥ ākṛṣṭa samūla pādapa oghaḥ
janayan abhavat yugānta śaṅkām anilaḥ nāga vipakṣa pakṣa janmā
pracalat pataga indra patra vāta prasabha unmūlita śaila datta mārgaiḥ
bhaya vihvalam āśu dandaśūkaiḥ vivaśaiḥ āviviśe svam eva dhāma
kha caraiḥ kṣayam akṣaye hi sainye sukṛtaiḥ duṣkṛta vat tadā upanīte
ayugāciḥ iva jvalan ruṣā atho ripuḥ audarciṣam ājuhāva mantram
sahasā dadhat uddhata aṭṭahāsa śriyam uttrāsita jantunā svanena
viyatā āyata heti bāhuḥ uccais atha vetālaḥ iva utpapāta vahniḥ
calita uddhata dhūmaketano sau rabhasāt ambararohi rohitāśvaḥ
druta māruta sārathiḥ śikhāvān kanaka syandana sundaraḥ cacāla
jvalat ambara koṭara antarālam bahula ārdra ambuda patra baddha dhūmam
paridīpita dīrgha kāṣṭham uccais taru vat viśvam uvoṣa jātavedāḥ
guru tāpa viśuṣyat ambu śubhrāḥ kṣaṇam ālagna kṛśānu tāmra bhāsaḥ
svam asāra tayā maṣībhavantaḥ punar ākāram avāpuḥ ā ambuvāhāḥ
jvalita anala lola pallava antāḥ sphurat aṣṭa āpada patra pīta bhāsaḥ
kṣaṇa mātra bhavām abhāva kāle sutarām āpuḥ iva āyatim patākāḥ
nikhilām iti kurvataḥ cirāya druta cāmīkara cāru tām iva dyām
pratighāta samartham astram agneḥ atha meghaṅkaram asmarat murāriḥ
catur ambudhi garbha dhīra kukṣeḥ vapuṣaḥ sandhiṣu līna sarva sindhoḥ
udaguḥ salila ātmanaḥ tridhāmnaḥ jala vāhāḥ valayaḥ śiroruhebhyaḥ
kakubhaḥ kṛta nādam āstṛṇantaḥ tirayantaḥ paṭalāni bhānu bhāsam
udanaṃsiṣuḥ abhram abhra saṅghāḥ sapadi śyāmalimānam ānayantaḥ
tapanīya nikarṣa rāji gaura sphurat uttāla taḍit śaṭā aṭṭahāsam
anubaddha samuddhata ambuvāha dhvanita āḍambaram ambaram babhūva
savituḥ paribhāvukaiḥ marīcīna cira abhyakta mataṅga jāṅga bhābhiḥ
jaladaiḥ abhitas sphuradbhiḥ uccais vidadhe ketana tā iva dhūmaketoḥ
jvalataḥ śamanāya citrabhānoḥ pralaya āplāvam iva abhidarśayantaḥ
vavṛṣuḥ vṛṣa nādinaḥ nadīnām prataṭa āropita vāri vārivāhāḥ

original: madhurairapi bhūyasā sa medhyaiḥ prathamaṃ pratyuta vāribhirdidīpe /
analyzed: madhuraiḥ api bhūyasā sa medhyaiḥ prathamam pratyuta vāribhiḥ didīpe
pavamāna sakhaḥ tatas krameṇa praṇaya krodhaḥ iva a śama dvivādaiḥ
paritas prasabhena nīyamānaḥ śara varṣaiḥ avasāyam āśraya āśaḥ

original: prabaleṣu kṛtī cakāra vidyudvyapadeśena ghaneṣvanupraveśam // MSpv_20.72 //
analyzed: prabaleṣu kṛtī cakāra vidyut vyapadeśena ghaneṣu anupraveśam
prayataḥ praśamam hutāśanasya kvacid ālakṣyata mukta mūlam arciḥ
balabhid prahita āyudha abhighātāt truṭitam patri pateḥ iva eka patram
vyagaman sahasā diśām mukhebhyaḥ śamayitvā śikhinā aṅghanā ghana oghāḥ

original: upakṛtyanisargataḥ pareṣāmuparodhaṃ na hi kurvate mahāntaḥ // MSpv_20.74 //
analyzed: upakṛtya nisargataḥ pareṣām uparodham na hi kurvate mahāntaḥ
kṛta dāham udarciṣaḥ śikhābhiḥ pariṣiktam muhur ambhasā navena
vihita ambudhara vraṇam prapede gaganam tāpita pāyita asi lakṣmīm

original: iti narapatirastraṃ yadyadāviścakāra prakupita iva rogaḥ kṣiprakārī vikāram /
analyzed: iti narapatiḥ astram yat yat āviścakāra prakupitaḥ iva rogaḥ kṣiprakārī vikāram

original: bhiṣagiva gurudoṣacchedinopakrameṇa kramavidatha murāriḥ pratyahaṃstattadāśu // MSpv_20.76 //
analyzed: bhiṣaj iva guru doṣa chedinā upakrameṇa krama vid atha murāriḥ pratyahan tat tat āśu
śuddhim gataiḥ api parām ṛjubhiḥ viditvā bāṇaiḥ ajayyam a vighaṭṭita marmabhiḥ tam

original: marmātigairanṛjubhirnitarāmaśuddhair vāksāyakairatha tutoda tadā vipakṣaḥ // MSpv_20.77 //
analyzed: marma atigaiḥ anṛjubhiḥ nitarām aśuddhaiḥ vāc sāyakaiḥ atha tutoda tadā vipakṣaḥ
rāhu strī stanayoḥ akāri sahasā yena aślatha āliṅgana vyāpāra eka vinoda durlalitayoḥ kārkaśya lakṣmīḥ vṛthā

original: tenākrośata eva tasya murajittatkālalolānalajvālāpallavitena mūrdhavikalaṃ cakreṇa cakre vapuḥ // MSpv_20.78 //
analyzed: tena ākrośataḥ eva tasya murajit tad kāla lola anala jvālā pallavitena mūrdha vikalam cakreṇa cakre vapuḥ

original: śriyā juṣṭaṃ divyaiḥ sapaṭaharavairanvitaṃ puṣpavarṣair vapuṣṭacaidyasya kṣaṇamṛṣigaṇaiḥ stūyamānaṃ nirīya /
analyzed: śriyā juṣṭam divyaiḥ sa paṭaha ravaiḥ anvitam puṣpa varṣaiḥ vapuṣṭa caidyasya kṣaṇam ṛṣi gaṇaiḥ stūyamānam nirīya

original: prakāśenākāśe dinakarakarānvikṣipadvismitākṣair narendrairaupendraṃ vapuratha viśaddhāma vīkṣāṃbabhūve // MSpv_20.79 //
analyzed: prakāśena ākāśe dinakara karān vikṣipat vismita akṣaiḥ narendraiḥ aupendram vapuḥ atha viśat dhāma vīkṣāṃbabhūve
